mkhyen par gyur to// de dang dus mnyam par a nu yo ga'i sde snod rnams kyang sing+ga la'i gling du bab par gyur te/ kun bzang ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i thabs kyi lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi le'u lnga par/ ma hA yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni rgyal po dza'i khang steng du 'bab par 'gyur la/ a nu yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni sing+ga la'i nags tshal du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pas kyang ngo// de nas rgyal pos rgyud don ma lus pa mkhyen par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes kyi rkyen la ma ltos par

gdul bya rnams rgyud la rang dgar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa ltar mdzad nas glegs bam rnams za hor gyi yul tsam na mkhyen pa che bar grags pa slaub dpon u pa rA dza la bstan pas brda dang don ma mjal/ de nas slob dpon ku ku rA dza la bstan pas des rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rdor sems zhal mthong gi le'u rtogs te bsgrubs pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhal bstan nas da ste rgyud kyi don rnams gsang bdag gis ston par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan/ da dung bsgrubs pas gsang bdag dngos su byon nas don gyi bstan pa dang/ theg pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbang bskur nas tshig gi bstan pa li tsa bI dri ma med pa la zhus shig ces lung byin pa ltar slob dpon gyis gsang bdag gis bka' ltar rgyud sde chen po bco brgyad du phyes nas rgyal po dza la bstan par bshad de/ shes phyin tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa las/ sngon sangs rgyas mi yul na lo brgyad cu bzhugs pa'i tshe na/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga dang/ gu h+ya sa mA dza la sogs pas 'dul zhing theg pa de dag gi snod du gyur pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi yul na med pas rgyal chen bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ dga' ldan la sogs pa'i gnas na lha rnams dang skal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa snod du gyur nas de'i tshe mdo sde de na bzhugs so// slad kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu za hor rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa ngo mtshar du chos la dad pa dag cig 'dug pa theg pa de'i 'dul skal du gyur cing snod du gyur nas sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa sde snod chen po bco brgyad phyag na rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyis za hor gyi yul du gshegs pa dang/ za hor gyi rgyal po in+d+ta b+hu tis mdo sde dag bltas na brda ma 'phrod nas sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa thob pas bltas na yul gyi dbus su yul ma la pa na A tsar+ya ku ku rA dza nyin zhing khyi stong tsam la chos 'chad/ mtshan zhing ni khyi de dag la dam tshig gi longs spyod mdzad pa khyi'i slob dpon mdzad pa zhig bzhugs pa de theg pa'i snod du gyur la/ bdag gi 'dul skal du gyur pa yang 'dra nas rgyal pos pho nya btang ste slob dpon gshegs su gsol ba dang/ slob dpon de yang sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan nas/ rgyal po de bdag gi 'dul skal du 'bab bam mi 'bab mdo sde de dag gi snod du bdag gyur ram ma gyur brtags na/ bdag gis 'dul skal du yang bab/ bdag kyang mdo sde'i snod du yang gyur/ rgyal po'i the tshom yang sel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dag sngar ma bltas na brgya la rgyal po'i the tshem dag ma sel

bar gyur na shin tu mi legs pas pho nya la slar spring ba/ mdo sde dag kho bos sngar bltas 'tshal gyis tshur skur zhig ces springs pa dang/ de nas mdo sde dag phas gshegs te bltas na mgo mjug gar blta ba'i cha ma mchis na de nyid du lus brdabs te mgon med do// skyabs med do// zhes bos pa dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par gshegs te khyod ci 'dod ces dris pa dang/ bdag mdo sde zab mo 'di bltas pa tsam gyis shes par 'dod ces gsol ba dang/ de bzhin gnang ngo zhes gsungs nas de nas sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa'i glengs bam rnams ma phye bar de dag gi don yid la mngon sum du gsal bar gyur to// de nas slob dpon de za hor gyi yul du gshegs nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la d+harma de dag bshad de/ rdo rje sems dpas lung bstan nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar sgom du stsal te dbus su rgyal po nyid/ btsun mo dam pa bzhi yum gyi sar bkod/ blon po bzhi rigs bzhi'i sar bkod/ sras mo rnams nang gi lha mo'i sar bkod/ btsun mo phal ba rnams phyi'i lha mo'i sar bkod/ blon po phal ba rnams sgo srung bzhi dang/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' ltar bkod pa dang/ rgyal pos bsams pa bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rig 'dzin gyi gnas su grub pa'i phyir dang dam pa'i chos 'di mi nub par bya ba'i phyir sras shakra pu ti rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas/ A tsar+ya ku ku pas lung dang man ngag bstan pa rgyal bu de la bstan te bzhag nas bsgoms pa dang/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa stongs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'dzin du grub bo// de'i sras shakra bu tis kyang de bzhin du bsgoms pa dang/ 'khor sgom pa bdun brgya dang yang rig 'dzin gyi gnas grub bo// yang rgyal bu shakra bu tis sras ni chung ste sras mo go ba de byi la dpal dam pa'i nang nas tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bkod de bshams nas in+d+ra b+hu ti'i lung de sras mo yul dang sa 'dzin du stsal de la bstan ba las sras mo de yang 'khor dang bcas pa brgya dang yang rig 'dzin gyi gnas grub bo// de nas sras mo des/ rgyal bu la lung man ngag bzhag pa las 'phel ba ni deng du 'di lags te/ zhes bshad cing/ dad pa mtshung par mnyam sbyor 'grel pa las kyang/ sprul pa'i sku 'das phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe// rgyal ba'i bka' gsang 'dzam gling gnas su shar// rgyal po'i khab tu spyan drangs mchod byas te// dga' zhing gus bstod legs bltas brda' ma 'jal// thugs rje'i 'brel shugs gsang sngags 'dzin par grags// dam pa bzung ste glegs bam gzigs par zhus// sgyu 'phrul thig le stong pa'i dkyil

'khor gzhung// grub thob lhag pa'i lha yis lung bstan mdzad// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs sna tshogs mtha'// dam pa rnams kyis gdams pa ji bzhin pa// mi 'gal legs par bsdus shing rab bkrol te// 'grel dang bsdus don sgrub thabs mang du bstan// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir lugs de gnyi ga 'gal ba med kyang rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyogs legs par mngon te nyid kyi mdzad pa'i lam rnam bkod du/ shar phyogs in+d+ra'i lung pa na// rgya lung rdo rje brtsegs pa ru// rigs can in+d+ra b+hu ti ngas// gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon bstan pas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i bsgrub pa yang// tshom bu lnga bcu stong dang bcas// phyag na rdo rje mngon grub ste// spang len brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang// dge bar bskur nas sdig pa med// de nas sa la reg par byas// zhes pa dang/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lam rim las/ 'grel pa snang ba mngon brtags pas// thugs kyi sgrub pa mngon rtogs te// de nyid sgo nas de nyid grub// brtan pa'i dngos grub de nas thob// don dam bcud kyis de nas rgyas// 'dod pa'i bsam pa de ru 'grub// lhag pa'i lha dang de ru mjal// zhes pa la sogs pas rang nyid kyis rtogs par bshad pa'i phyir ro// de la slob dpon ku ku rA dza khyi'i rgyal po zhes par grags shing lo rgyus 'ga' zhig tu ku ta rA dza zhes kyang 'byung ste nyin mo khyi'i rnam pa can gyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma stong phrag re la chos ston cing mtshan mo de dag dang lhan cig tu dur khrod kyis gnas rnams su gshegs nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa dam tshig gi kun tu spyod pa la gnas shing de ltar lo bcu gnyis su spyad pas mthar phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa yin la/ yang kha cig gis slob dpon 'dis spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe/ u rgyan du byon nas slar yang rgyud sde chen po bco brgyad kyi nang nas sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor la sogs pa'i nang rgyud sde lnga rgya cher bshad cing mthar gyis zla gsang thig le la brten nas mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa yin no zhes kyang zer/ slob dpon 'dis mnyam sbyor la rtsal du bton cing gsang don rnam par dgod pa drug dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa sogs bstan bcos du ma mdzad do// de ltar ma hA yo ga la rgyud sde dang sgrub sde gnyis su yod pa las snga ma tan+t+ra chen po sde bco brgyad ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i gzhi dang rtsa bar gyur ba'i rgyud sde chen po lnga dang/ sgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba'i rgyud sde lnga dang/ spyod pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba'i rgyud sde lnga dang/ ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud gnyis dang/ thams cad kyi bsdus don lta bu'i rgyud sde gcig dang bco brgyad do// de thams cad rgyal pos ku ku rA dza la bshad/ des

sras shakra pu tri'am in+d+ra b+hu ti chung ba la bshad/ des seng ha rA dza la bshad/ des shakra pu ti 'am u pa rA dza la bshad/ des sras mo go ma de bI la bshad cing so so'i tshom bu dang bcas pa tshogs sgrub kyi lam gyis rdo rje 'chang gi sa la gshegs so// de ltar yang lam rim las// de nas rdo rje gdan steng gi/ 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams su// pho brang dam pa rin chen nang// bkra shis dam pa'i khang bu ru// ku ku rA dzen+d+ra b+hu ti// sed+ha u pa rA dza dang// sras mo go ma de bI sogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bsgrubs te// rdo rje 'chang sar mngon du gshegs// zhes so// rgyal po 'dis sgyu 'phrul lam rnam bkod dang/ rim pa gnyis pa la sogs pa mdzad cing bla med kyi bstan bcos gzhan yang bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa dang/ ye shes grub pa dang/ lhan cig skyes grub sogs mchog tu gsang ba'i don slong nges pa mang po mdzad/ 'phags yul gyi grub chen rnams la khyab gdal du gyur pa'i rgyud dang/ gdams ngag ci rigs pa thams cad las phal mo che rgyal po'i rigs kyi slob dpon 'di nyid las byung ba shas che zhing/ bde ba chen po dang 'od gsal gyi gdams pa'i bka' rnams rgyal po 'dis grub thob byis pa'i zhabs sam dza lan+d+ha ri pa la gnang/ des nag po spyod pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa la brgyud nas/ til+li pa dang nA ro pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad brgyud pa'i srol ka 'di nyid las byung ba yin no// de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i bka' bab sa'i khungs kyang de nyid do// sras mo go ma de bIs rgyal po ku ku rA dza/ des slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje dang/ sangs rgyas gsang ba gsum la bshad de/ de la slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje ni yul ShaM Sha ra 'khrungs/ u rgyan gyi gnas su rab tu byung zhing sde snod gsum la sbyangs/ khyad par thogs med lugs kyi grub mtha' la mkhas shing thun mong gi rig pa'i gnas thams cad kyang mkhyen/ u rgyan gyi gling phran ma d+hi ma zhes bya bar 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub pa mdzad pas grub par nye ba na 'jam dpal gyi bris sku'i zhal las 'od zer byung ste gling de yun ring du snang bar byas pas nyi ma dang 'dra ba zhes bya bar mtshan gsol/ dus gzhan zhig tu lta ba log pa'i sgrub ba po zhig la nang pa'i pan+Di ta'i dbang po lnga bsgrub rdzas la dgos pa byung nas slob dpon bkrong du 'ongs pa na glang po che dang/ rta dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ ma he dang/ rma bya sogs sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su snang bar mdzad pas slob dpon gang yin ma shes par phyir log pas sna tshogs gzugs can zhes mtshan du grags shing sku tshe'i smad la o rgyan gyi yul du 'gro

ba'i don rgya cher mdzad/ slob dpon chen po 'di spyir rgyud sde thams cad dang khyad par sgyu 'phrul dra ba la mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa yin/ na lan+dar yang lo bcu bzhugs shing sngags kyi bstan pa bskyangs/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bla med rgyud du bkral ba'i TI ka mdzad pa dang/ dgyes pa rdo rje'i rdzogs rim thig le chen po'i rim pa dang/ 'dus pa la rgyud kyis bshad pa bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad pa dang/ lhan skyes sgrub thabs sogs rgyud gzhan dang/ gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa spar khab dang/ thugs thig dang/ rim pa drug pa dang/ dam tshig gsal bkra dang/ phra rgyas sogs sgyu 'phrul phyogs la'ang bstan bcos mang du mdzad cing rgya cher bshad/ mthar gyis rdo rje'i sku brnyes pa yin no// 'di rab tu byung ba'i mtshan dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi bskal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang/ gsang mtshan sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang/ bstan bcos rnams su sgeg pa'i rdo rje nyi ma dang 'dra ba sna tshogs gzugs can zhes 'byung ba yin no// 'di la slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyis kyang/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang/ mnyam sbyor dang/ gsang ba 'dus pa dang/ zla gsang thig le ste tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad kyi gtso bo nang rgyud sde lngar grags pa rnams gsan cing bsgoms pas ye shes la dbang thob pa yin te/ zhal gyi lung las/ des nas yon tan kun 'byung u rgyan yul du bgrod/ 'jo sgeg rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol rab tu grags// de las mang thos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du// zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe sgeg pa'i zhabs kyis u rgyan du sngags kyi bstan pa skyong ba de'i tshe gdol pa'i bu zhig gis Ar+ya de ba mjal/ byin gyis brlabs pas chos rdol shes su byung/ 'phags pa klu sgrub yab sras kyi sngags gzhung rnams ci rigs par bshad pa'i ma tang+gipa dang/ kong+ka na ru bsrung ba'i zhabs kyis kyang zla grags las dngos su mnyan nas/ sgron gsal gyi glegs bam thog mar rnyed cing/ de bzhin du paN+Di ta sgra gcan 'dzin gyis kyang klu byang mjal zer te 'dus pa 'phags skor thog mar byung ba'i skabs ka yin/ slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba ni yul dbus su 'khrungs shing na lan+dar rab tu byung/ 'di dang slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi ba gnyis ka ye shes zhabs kyi sku tshe'i stod kyi slob ma yin/ wA ra nA si'i gnas shin tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal bsgrubs pas nam zhig na bris skur bzhad cing/ dngos grub kyi rdzas ba dmar po'i mar khu yang khol/ me tog rnying pa rnams kyang kha 'bus pas dngos grub gyi ltas su mkhyen kyang thog mar me tog 'bul lam mar khu gsol snyam pa'i the tshom gyi ngang du cung zad lus pas gnod sbyin mo zhig gis gegs byas te slob dpon gyi

'gram par thal lcag bsnun pas cung zad brgyal/ de sangs tsan bris sku rdul gyis gos/ me tog rnying/ mar khu bo ba yang gzigs/ 'on kyang rdul phyis me tog dbu la phul/ mar khu gang yod gsol bas sku lus nad thams cad dang bral zhing shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang blo shin tu rno zhing mngon par shes pa la dbang sgyur ba byung/ de skabs shes o rgyan du byon nas slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang mjal zhing/ rnal 'byor rgyud dang bla med nang rgyud sde lnga gsan cing khyad par sgyu 'phrul la mkhas/ dus gzhan zhig tu sangs rgyas zhi ba dang mnyam du ri bo ta lar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mjal bar byon pas ri'i rtsa bar 'phags ma sgrol ma klu'i tshogs la chos ston pa dang/ sked par khro gnyer can mas lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin gyi tshogs la chos ston pa dang/ rtse mor 'phags pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa yang rang rang gi snang ba dang mthun par mjal/ der sangs rgyas gsang bas zhabs sa la mi reg pa sogs dngos grub kyang brnyes/ 'phags ma sgrol mas ri kha ba can gyi gangs ti ser song la sgrub pa gyis zhes lung bstan/ tshur slebs nas bA ra nA sI la sogs par lo mang po'i bar du chos bshad pas slar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis sngar sgrol mas lung bstan pa ltar bskul bas/ ri ti ser byon nas sgrub pa mdzad pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lan grangs du mar gzigs shing 'jam dpal dbyangs dang mi dang mi lag pa bzhin du gyur/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyang bran du khol/ slob dpon 'dis gsang ba snying po la 'grel pa rnam dbye 'grel dang/ rdo rje las rim dang/ dkyil 'khor chos don dang/ dam pa rgyan dang/ dra chen dra chung dang/ lam rim che chung gnyis dang/ zhi ba dang khro bo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang/ rnal 'byor rgyud la'ang rdo rje dbyings kyi sgrub thabs yo ga la 'jug pa dang/ rnam snang mngon byang gi bsdus 'grel dang/ bsam gtan phyi ma'i rgyas 'grel sogs shin tu mang bar mdzad cing bod la'ang bka' drin che ba'i tshul 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur la/ mthar sku lus mi snang bar gyur skad/ yang rgyal po ku ku rA dzas/ ro langs bde ba'i dngos grub dang/ drang srong b+hA Shi ta gnyis la bshad/ snga mas badzra ha s+ya la bshad/ slob dpon 'dis gsang ba 'dus pa la'ang 'grel pa dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa dang/ bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs sogs mdzad nas rtsal du bton cing bshad pas 'phags yul du 'dus pa la bkal srol mi 'dra ba lugs nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod par 'dod pa las bod du drug byung ba'i bzhi pa 'dus pa rdo rje bzhad pa'i skor gyi srol ka byung sa de yin/ 'dis na lan+da'i nub sgo srung ba ngag gi dbang

phyug grags pa la 'khor lo sdom pa'i dbang bskur ba mdzad cing rgyud kyang bshad/ gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa rnams kyang bstsal/ man ngag bsgoms pas ngag gi dbang phyug chen po sogs grub pa thob cing sku lus de nyid kyis zung 'jug gi sku phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur pa yin no// slob dpon de dang drang srong b+ha Shi ta gnyis kas za hor rgyal po pra hasti la bshad/ 'di ni nub phyogs su rgyal rigs su sku 'khrungs tsi ta ba ri'i yul gyi slob dpon zhi ba 'od dang ma ru'i yul gyi 'dul 'dzin chen po bsod nams grags pa las rab tu byung zhing mtshan shAkya 'od du grags/ sde snod gsum ka la mkhas par sbyangs shing slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa sogs sngags kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yang ches mang bar brten cing rgyud sde thams cad thugs su chud pa dang mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa yin zhes grags/ sngags su zhugs pa'i mtshan pra b+hA ha sti zhes 'byung/ slob dpon 'di'i slob ma shAkya bshes gnyen gyis rnal 'byor rgyud de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ko sa la'i rgyan zhes bya ba'ang brtsams/ 'di gnyis kas kha cher byon nas 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad de/ snga ma las slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba dang slob dpon chen po pad+ma sam+b+ha ba gnyis kyis gsan zhing slob dpon pad+mas rgyal po dza nyid la'ang gsan no// de yang slob dpon chen po 'di ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang// che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang// zhes lung gis bstan pa yin la/ don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa'i sku ste d+ha na ko sa'i mtsho'i dbus su pad+ma'i sdong po las mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par brdzus te 'khrungs so// de la gter ma'i phyogs phal che bar rdzus skyes kho na grags che la/ bka' ma phur pa'i rnam bshad sogs su mngal skyes kyi phyogs kyang gsungs shing/ de dang mthun par 'phags pa'i yul gyi gtam du'ang grags mod/ rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang 'byor ba'i phyir gang ltar yin kyang rung la/ brdzus skyes ltar na hu rmu dzu dang/ si ko d+ha ra dang/ d+ha na ko sa dang/ rug+ma sogs gling phran re yin cing o Di yA na'i yul dngos ma yin kyang de rnams su 'gro don ci rigs par mdzad do// zhes 'byung la/ u rgyan gyi yul nyid du'ang shar dang lho dang byang gsum du rgya mtsho chen po re yod pas/ de dag gang du 'khrungs pa'i tshul gsal ka 'phags yul pa'i gtam rgyud du ma byung/ gang ltar o Di yA na'i 'phral skad du sra do zhes pa rgya gar pa rnams sri ga d+ha ra me tog phreng ba 'dzin zhes pa o rgyan gyi

rgyal po'i rigs su gyur pa'i blon po dkon mchog gsum la bla mar byed pa zhig gis thog mar rnyed cing mjal/ mngal skyes kyi phyogs su de'i sras yin par 'dod/ 'di'i ming zur chag pas kr-iSh+Na 'dzin du gyur pa de yin/ de nas rig pa'i gnas yan lag dang bcas pas so so'i slob dpon brten nas sbyang ba'i tshul gyis nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ ShaM ra ga Sha zhes bya bar 'dul pa 'dzin pa zhig las skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs/ sde snod gsum kyang bslabs/ sngags kyi slob dpon shAn+ti rU'u pa las bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dbang bskur ba mang po zhus pas/ me tog thams cad pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha kho nar phog/ gzhan yang grub thob chen po su kha de ba zhes 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang gnyis su med pa zhig dang/ u rgyan gyi yul nyid du smad 'tshong ma su kha d+ha rI zhes rdo rje 'chang las dngos su chos gsan pa'i grub pa mo chen mo de la gsang sngags nang gi dbang dang gdams pa mang po yang zhus so// dge slong ma kun dga' mo zhes pa'ang 'di'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs so// de nas gnas dben pa rnams su bsnyen pa dang/ nye bar bsnyen pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sgrub pa chen po rnams mdzad pa na thog mar cho 'phrul gyi rigs du ma byung yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i lam du btang nas bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i zhal gzigs/ khro bo'i rgyal po ha ya grI ba dngos su gzigs/ mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po rnams bran du khol ba sogs byung/ skabs der rgyal srid kyi bya ba'ang ci rigs par mdzad/ dus gzhan zhig tu yul de'i blon po'i tshogs dang ma 'tshams pa ltar mdzad nas srid spangs te dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du byon/ der rig sngags bzlas shing spyod pa mdzad pas khams gsum rnam rgyal dang gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa rdo rje'i khro bo thams cad kyi zhal gzigs shing gsung thos/ ma hA kA la dang re ma ti sogs bran bzhin byed/ klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang mngag gzhug tu khol/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i drag sngags 'bum phrag brgya la dbang thob/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod chen po gzhan rnams su'ang rdzu 'phrul gyis byon cing der grub pa'i slob dpon rnams dang mjal zhing ral gri sogs thun mong gi grub chen brgyad po'ang nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ de tsam na rig pa 'dzin pa'i lus su gyur kyang da ni spyod pa spyad de zung 'jug gi go 'phang thob par bya snyam du dgongs pa na sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyis de kho na nyid ma mthong bar drag shul spyod pa'i las kyis 'dod pa'i don la bar du gcod pa yin gyi

khyod kyi 'di tsam gyis mchog gi dngos grub mi thob pas sngon gyi las 'brel yod pa'i slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes yin pas des bstan pa bzhin sgoms shig/ ces lung bstan pa ltar yul dbus su byon cing slob dpon shAkya 'od las rgyud sde 'og ma gsum sogs sngags phyi nang thams cad la sgro 'dogs chod par mdzad/ slob dpon chen po ye shes zhabs las pha rol phyin pa'i sde snod rnams dang/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang/ zla gsang thig le dang/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dang/ gsang ba 'dus pa dang/ karma mA la sogs rgyud dang man ngag thams cad gsan/ sangs rgyas gsang ba las kyang rnal 'byor rgyud dang gsang ba snying po la sogs rgyud sde mang po gsan cing mtha' dag pa thugs su chud par mdzad/ khyad par sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen dang/ shrI seng ha gsum las rdzogs pa chen po don brgyud kyi man ngag rig pa rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi tshul du thos pas zab gsal gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rang dbang brnyes shing rdo rje 'chang dang mi gnyis par gyur/ spyir slob dpon chen po 'di ni sprul pa'i sku yin pas thun mong rim gyis pa ltar gsan bsam la ma ltos kyang 'dir re zhig gdul bya'i dbang gis thun mong ltar bshad pa yin gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam thar kyang 'chad par byar yod mod kyi spros pas chog go/ de la ye shes zhabs kyis slob ma mthong ba'i chos su mya ngan las 'das pa bzhi'i ya gyal bde ba chen po pad+ma ka ra zhes pa slob dpon 'di nyid yin ces 'phags yul du grags mod/ slob dpon de nyid kyis lung bstan pa ltar grong khyer pan+Da pa'i byang ngos par+shi bya ba'i nags kyi mthongs su ri de'u zhig yod pa der yin zer/ don du brag phug ma ra ti kar pad+ma can gyi las rgya man+dA ri la brten nas bde ba chen po'i lam gyis zla ba drug tu sgrub pa chen po mdzad pas phra yang sogs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i skur gyur/ ti ra hu ti sogs tha ru'i rgyal khams dang/ ka ma ru dang bal po sogs byang phyogs kyi yul rnams su'ang chos ston pa dang/ thun mong gi grub pa rnams kyis phan 'dogs par mdzad/ tsam+pArna'i yul du klung chen po b+ha taM zhes pa nyin lam gcig tsam sa'i 'og tu bcug pa dang/ tsha lam tsam du bcug pa gnyis yod/ de skabs tsam du rgya gar lho phyogs tri ling ga dang nye ba tri ma la'i yul la k+Sha mAn gyi gnas dang nye ba na shi ba s+thA na zhes pas dbang phyug gi ling+ga rang byung du byung/ des nang pa'i sde rnams dang lha khang sogs la shin tu gnod pa zhig yod la/ yang shar phyogs b+hang ga lar nye ba bA' ren+d+ra'i lho nub bA gal zhes bya bar mtsho chung zhig gsar du rdol zhing der mu stegs la

dga' ba'i klu gdug pa can zhig kyang gnas bcas/ de'i mthus shar phyogs su mu stegs kyi sde gsar pa mang du byung/ sangs rgyas pa rnams la klu de shin tu cho 'phrul che bas gnod par gyur/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab na shel gyi pha wang gcig la mu stegs pa'i lha 'byung po mang du gnas pas bsgrub mi dgos par mig mthong dang rna sgrogs dang mo rtsis kyi mngon shes sogs ston pa zhig byung/ de rnams 'dul bar dgongs te rdo rje gdan du sgrub khang mdzad nas 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi dkyil 'khor zhal phyes nas dpal yang dag he ru ka bsgrubs pas 'bar ba dang/ ha ha hi hi sogs bzhad pa brgyad kyis bzhad pa'i dpal he ru kas zhal bstan/ phur bu gsum byung ba las khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi phur bu slob dpon nyid kyis blangs te tri ma la'i ling+ga dang nye ba'i shing sdong gcig la btab pas de skor gyi nags thams cad tshig/ ling+ga phyed lhag tsam thal bar song/ phyis nang pa la gnod pa med cing mchod pa nyams pa rnams kyang gsos/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs ma man dA ra ba'ang ngang tshul can gyis blangs te b+haM ga la'i mtsho de la btab pas klu 'khor bcas thal bar song/ zhag bdun nas mtsho yang bskams/ mu stegs kyi sde de rnams zhig/ phur bu chung ba de sgrub g.yog ka ma ru'i rnal 'byor pa rat+na shi las blangs te rgyal po'i khab gyi shel gyi pha wang de la btab pas sil gyis zhig/ de gnyis kyis kyang sangs rgyas pa'i sde rnams la phan par byung/ gnyis ka'ang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lus su gyur te mi snang la/ 'dod na sprul pa'i lus kyis snang bar byed do/ slob dpon gyis tri ma la dang bi kra ma shI lar thogs re bzhugs shing lha khang re'ang bzhengs/ de nas slar yang o rgyan du byon/ skal pa dang ldan pa rnams la gsang sngags phyi nang gi chos mang du bstan cing thams cad kyang dngos grub sna re ma thob pa med/ lha khang chen po gcig kyang bzhengs/ de skabs o rgyan dang nye ba'i yul kats+tsha na sangs rgyas pa'i sde bzang ba zhig yod/ yul mo la tA na'i grong khyer bA ga da'i rgyal po stag gzig tu ruSh+ka yin pa de'i dmag gis yul rnams bcom/ chos grwa 'ga' ni zhig bshigs/ mang po 'jom la khad kyi skabs dmag mi rnams nI la zhes pa'i chu klung la gru dang rkyal gyis byung bar/ tshur kha nas slob dpon gyis lta stangs sdigs mdzub drag tu mdzad pas gru che ba bdun dang gru chung lnga brgya tsam dang/ rkyal zhing 'ong ba'i mi dang bcas pa thams cad chur byings nas tu ru Sh+ka'i dpa' bo thams cad shi'o// de phyin chad phyogs der tu ruSh+ka'i gnod pa ma byung ngo// bal yul phyogs su phebs nas yang le shod du dpal yang dag he ru ka'i sgrub pa tshom

bu lnga pa'i tshogs kyi spyod pa spros bcas zla ba drug tu spyad pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad zhal rtag tu ston cing gsung gleng mdzad pa dang/ 'od gsal gyi sku las zung 'jug gi skur bzhengs te phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub mngon du mdzad do// de nas rgya gar shar nub lho dbus rnams su 'gro don ci rigs par mdzad la/ de nas chu bo gang gA'i byang phyogs nai pa la'i yul phan chad du 'gro ba'i don cher mdzad/ de bas kyang 'gro lding gi yul du 'gro don che/ de bas kyang bod kyi yul du 'gro ba'i don rgya che/ de las kyang rnga yab gling phran sogs su mi ma yin gyi 'gro don mdzad pa shin tu rgya ches che ba yin te/ snga ma rnams ni yul nyi tshe ba dang skye bo nyung ngu tsam dang/ dus kyang lo grangs brgya stong snyed sogs yun thung ngu yin la/ phyi ma 'di la ni yul dus skye bo sogs tshad gzhal bar dka' ba'i phyir slob dpon 'di nyid gtso bor mi ma yin 'dul ba'i phrin las can no// de la slob dpon 'di rab tu byung ba'i mtshan pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ gsang ba'i mtshan pad+ma sam+b+ha ba dang/ ma hA su kha dang/ pad+ma badzra la sogs mtshan gyi rnam grangs dang/ phyis o rgyan d+harma gany+dzi nas dgyes rdor gyi rgyud spyan 'dren pa po slob dpon mtsho skyes su grags pa o rgyan du rgyal pos gson bsregs byas pas slob dpon yab yum he ru ka'i rnam par bzhugs pa sogs cho 'phrul khyad par can bstan pa de yang 'di nyid yin nam sems shing gzhan yang slob dpon chen po pad+ma badzra che chung dang/ Dom+bi pa dang/ bI ru ba dang/ nag po spyod pa chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang slob dpon nyid sku'i rnam pa gzhan dang mtshan gzhan gyis yul ci rigs par 'gro don ma nges par mdzad par grub la/ de dag kyang rnam pa 'di dang mtshan 'dis mtshon pa'i rnam thar gyi dbang du byas pa yin mod/ dngos rgyud kyi khyad par tsam ma gtogs sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid kyi gdul bya'i zhing du ma gyur pa gcig kyang med pa'i phyir zung 'jug gi go 'phang la bzhugs pa rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i mtha' ni sus kyang brjod par mi nus so// de bas na grub thob chen po rnams gdul bya phal gyi mngon sum du mi snang bas yun ring por song ba na slar yang sku snang bar mdzad nas dus ring por bzhugs pa dang/ skabs re yul la lar mi snang bar la lar snang ba dang/ kha cig tu 'pho ba'i tshul mdzad nas kha cig tu skye bar ston pa sogs rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'i phyir sngon bI ru pa mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang sku dngos kyis lan gsum du byon pa dang/ dza lan+d+ha ri pa lan lnga byon pa dang/ spyod pa ba chen po de bI ko Tar grongs pa'i tshul mdzad nas slob ma rnams kyis sku gdung bsregs pa bcas grub pa na slar yang yul

gzhan du snga ma'i sku de nyid kyi 'gro don mdzad pa dang yul la lar skye ba gsar du bzung nas mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa'i tshul mdzad par grags pa sogs la so skye'i snang tshul dang bstun pa'i dus snga phyi dang gnas yul sogs khrig khrig kad kad sgrig tu mi btub cing phal pa'i rnam gzhag rgyal po la 'grigs pa'i skabs med pa bzhin no// de yang sems can rnams kyi mos pa dang/ bsam pa'i dbang gi rjes su kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul las dbang phyug pa nyid kyis te/ 'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag pa sdud pa'i mdo sde las/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa chags pa'i bskal par mos na yang 'jig pa'i bskal pa chags pa'i bskal par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis kyang chags pa'i bskal par shes so// chags pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa'i bskal par mos na yang chags pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa'i bskal par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis kyang 'jig pa'i bskal bar shes so// 'jig pa dang chags pa yang gzhan du gyur pa ma yin te mos pa de ltar du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bskal pa gcig snga dro tsam du mos na yang de na sems can de dag gis bskal pa gcig snga dro tsam du shes so// snga dro bskal pa tsam du mos na yang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ des na sems can de dag gis de bzhin du shes te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa la byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o// zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro// slob dpon 'di nyid 'gro lding du phebs pa'i snga phyi gang yin mi gsal zhing 'dir grags pa ltar na bod kyi ljongs 'di nas srin po'i yul du byon par 'dod la/ 'gro lding ba rnams 'gro lding nyid nas der byon par 'dod la/ sku'i bkod pa gnyis dus gcig tu bstan par byas kyang mi 'gal mod/ gang ltar yang rgya gar lho phyogs nas nub drang thad du grus brgal te rgya mtsho la phyin pa na rgya mtsho'i dbus kyi gling chung du DA mi Di pa zhes bya ba yod de sngon du srin po dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams nam mkha' la lding zhing 'gro ba kho nas gang ba'i phyir de skad du grags shing 'byung po mi'i gzugs can gyi skyes pa dang/ bud med rnams ni rigs sngags sna tshogs pas ngan thabs byed pa gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro 'am sngags 'chang ma shas che/ yul der slob dpon gyis thog mar byon te gling de nyid gyi bdag mo sngags 'chang ma drug cu rtsa bzhi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshul gyis yod pa thams cad bkug nas sngags dang phyag rgyas gzir te btul nas gtso mo gzhan rnams kyang bsdur bcug nas dam bzhag dang po mdzad/ lan cig slob dpon grong khyer du byon pa zhig la/ sngags 'chang ma mang po 'dzam bu gling gi mi mang po za bar gzigs te/ de thams cad dbang med du

bkugs nas bsdigs pas de rnams 'bros par brtsams pa na yan lag la phur bus btab cing phyin chad 'dzam bu gling pa rnams la gnod par mi byed pa'i mna' bor du bcug cing sems bskyed kyang phog ste dam bzhag gnyis pa mdzad/ yang dus gzhan zhig tu na mgron khang zhig tu byon pas bud med mang pos snod du mar chu bskol gyin 'dug pa ji zhig na chu de rnams la la khrag tu 'gro/ la la tshil du 'gro/ de bzhin du la la thig le dang sha dang/ mar khu dang/ bu ram dang/ 'bras chan dang/ chang la sogs par 'gyur par gzigs nas de rnams la dris pas slob dpon yin pa ngo ma shes te 'di dag ni 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lus dang zas kyi bcud bkug pa yin zer/ khyod rnams kyis slob dpon pad+ma ka ra'i drung du mna' bor ba ma yin nam byas pas/ nged rnams gyis dpon mos mna' bor yang kho mo cag gis ma bor ro zer bas/ yang sngar gyi phug pa der sngags 'chang ma dpon g.yog bsdus pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byung/ de thams cad kyi srog sngags dang sgrub thabs blangs/ dpon mo rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug/ g.yog rnam las sems bskyed phog/ thams cad kyang mna' 'dor du bcug ste dam bzhag gsum pa mdzad/ gzhan yang yul de'i mi ma yin pa thams cad btul/ mi rnams kyang 'dul bar dgongs te yi dwags parbA re zhes bya ba yul de'i rgyal po'i pho lha mthu rtsal che ba zhig yod pa'ang btul/ rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i gzungs ma'i ched du bkug pas rgyal po khros te dmag gi tshogs dang bcas te byung ba la slob dpon gyis yungs kar gtor bas go cha dang mtshon cha ma lus pa tshig/ dmag thams cad kyang lus rengs/ ngag lkugs/ sems myosate shi la thug par gyur pa na skye bo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pas slob dpon gyis bum pa'i chus bkrus pas skad cig la bde bar gsos so// de nas rgyal po 'khor bcas kyis zhabs la phyag btsal nas bka' bzhin sgrub par byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa tshugs shig gsungs/ bi d+ha/ ar+d+ha/ su d+hA zhes pa'i gtsug lag khang gsum bzhengs/ rab gnas slob dpon gyis mdzad/ ma ga d+ha nas sde snod gsum gyi mkhan po spyan drangs te bshad pa dang lag len rkang tshugs pa btsugs/ slob dpon nyid kyis rgyal po 'khor bcas la gdams pa mang du gsungs/ skal ba dang ldan pa drug la rgyud drug bshad/ de drug po yang grub pa thob/ yul so sor lha khang mang du bzhengs/ de ltar yul der lo bcu gnyis su bzhugs nas mthar bla gos kyis gshog pa'i tshul mdzad de nam mkha'i lam la gya gyur gshegs te/ lho nub srin po'i gling du bzhud do zer/

yul der phra men ma rnams dam bzhag dang po mdzad dus kyi me thab brag las bcos pa yod/ gnyis pa'i skabs 'kha' 'gro ma rnams la phur bu btab pa'i rjes stong phrag tsam dang/ grub pa'i phur bu gzhan rnams yal nas med kyang/ gcig ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul du bzhag pa mi'i lus bongs sum 'gyur tsam yod pa rdo shing zangs lcags sogs gang yin mtshon du med pa zhig yod skad do// gling der slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i lugs kyi sngags gzhung rnam dar bar yod cing/ dges rdor dang/ zla gsang thig le dang/ dpal mchog rnams shin tu dar/ phyis su rgya gar lho phyogs pa bud+d+ha nA tha gup+tas kyang der phebs shing slob dpon blo gros bzang po la slob dpon pad+ma lugs kyi dgyes rdor dang/ bde mchog gi dbang bskur ba dang/ rgyud kyi bshad pa mang po zhus shing gzhan yang phur pa dang/ khro bcu'i rgyud dang/ rta mgrin dang/ yang dag dang/ ma mo'i skor sogs rgya gar na ma grags pa'i rgyud sde mang po bzhugs shing mdor na slob dpon chen po'i bka' srol gyi rgyud sde bzhi'i nyan bshad bsgom gsum shin tu dar zhing rgyas pa da lta'i bar du yod do// der ma zad bskyed rim gyi bka' rnams ni slob dpon chen po 'di nyid la ka ma ru'i slob dpon rat+na shI las zhus/ des ka yas+tha br-id+d+ha la gdams/ 'di kyai rdor 'grel ba kha sbyor dri med mdzad mkhan de yin/ des dur ha ri la gdams/ des rdo rje gdan pa che ba la gdams/ des rdo rje gdan pa bar ba la gdams/ de nas slob dpon ab+h+ya ka ra slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa las byung ba yin la/ de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i bka' yang slob dpon 'dis ku sa la la gnang/ de la ku sa la b+ha dra chung pas zhus/ de la slob dpon a si ta g+ha nas zhus/ de la ye shes bshes gnyen gyis zhus nas rim bzhin byung ba yin cing bka' bab de rnams bzhugs pa'i slob dpon rnams slob dpon chen po 'di nyid kyi rjes 'brangs su don gyis 'gyur ba yin no// !// sgrub sde'i phyogs su'ang bka' gter gnyis kyi bab tshul la dang po ni/ slob dpon hU~M ka ra la thugs mi bskyod pa'i rigs he ru ka kal po sogs yang dag thugs kyi bka' babs te/ slob dpon 'di ni bal po'i yul du bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs shing rig byed sogs dang mu stegs kyi gzhung lugs la'ang shin tu mkhas shing nus pa'ang thob/ phyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mchog tu dad pas yul dbus su na lan+d+rar slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes dang pan+Di ta sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po las rab tu byung/ pha rol phyin pa nas bzung gsang sngags phyi nang gi bar gyi thos pas rgyud sbyangs/ dbang bskur ba nod cing gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa mtha' dag gnang/

khyad par dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i tshe me tog khro bo hU~M mdzad la phog/ yun ring du bsgoms pas rim pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes shing/ zla ba drug tu sgrub pa byas pas dngos grub thob par dgongs te las rgya gdol ba'i bu mo ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog lta bu rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid tshang ba zhig dgos pas phyogs gzhan zhig nas btsal ba rnyed nas pha ma la bslangs pas de rnams na re/ bram ze'i slob dpon khyod smyo ba yin nam/ nged gdol ba'i rigs yin pas khyod nyid dang nged rnams la'ang chad pa mi 'ong ngam zer/ nga la sgrub pa'i rten du dgos pas tha mal gyi rigs nyams pa sogs kyi chad pa mi 'ong byas pas 'o na bu mo'i lus dang mnyam pa'i gser dngul dgos zer/ der slob dpon kyi skad cig la sa 'og gi gter phyung ste de rnams la byin/ de nas slob dpon phyag rgyar bcas pas ri phug gcig tu bsnyen pa dang/ nye bar bsnyen pa dang/ sgrub pa rnams zla ba drug gi ring byas pa yar ngo'i tshes brgyad kyi tho rangs kyi dus su nam mkha' la hU~M gi sgra chen po grags/ badzra he ru ka sogs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang mngon sum du mthong/ sgrub pa chen po'i lam gyis phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob bo// sgyu 'phrul lam rim las// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug dang// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// ces bshad pa'i snga ma'o// slob dpon 'dis bskyed rdzogs gsum dang sngags rgyud gzhan gyis kyang 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad la/ yang dag ru lu gser phreng dang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi man ngag yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa dang/ khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag par grub pa sogs rim pa gnyis kyi bstan bcos kyang mang du mdzad nas mthar gyis sku lus de nyid kyis sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing du khyung gi rgyal po 'phur pa bltar bzhud do// 'di las bskyed rim gyi bka' rnams slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa dang/ o rgyan gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal zhi bas zhus/ de las rdo rje gdan pa chen po sau ri pas zhus shing de las slob dpon chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa 'khrungs pa yin no/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la sku rnam snang gi rigs 'jam dpal khros pa gsang rgyud la sogs gshin rje gshed kyi bka' rnams babs te/ slob dpon 'di yang rgya gar nub phyogs rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du yab sA d+hu sA s+t+r-i dang yum snang ba sgron me zhes bya ba'i sras su 'khrungs/ rig byed yan lag dang bcas pa la mkhas pa zhig ste slob dpon chen po

ro langs thal mdog la sogs pa las sngags phyi nang gi dbang bskur ba dang/ gdams ngag thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa thams cad kyang thob/ slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rje las dgra gdong 'jigs gsum sogs kyang gsan no zer/ gang ltar thun mong gi grub pa rnams nyams 'og tu chud cing zung 'jug gi go 'phang thob par nye ba na spyod pa la gshegs pas mu stegs kyi kha 'dzin mchog tu che ba'i rgyal po zhig glang po che la gzhon nas 'ongs pa dang zam pa gcig gi steng du 'phrad pa na lam bzur res ma byung bar slob dpon gyis sdigs mdzub bstan pas/ rgyal po glang po che dang bcas pa phyed tshal du bkas te zam pa'i g.yas g.yon nas lhung ngo// der rgyal po'i 'khor rnams kyi bzod par gsol zhing gsol ba btab pas slar gsos te nang pa'i bstan pa la bkod do// de yang ji skad du/ 'jig rten lha la phyag mi 'tshal// glang po byung yang lam mi bzur/ kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// rkang pa brag rir thogs med 'gro// zhes pa'o// ji zhig na 'phags pa 'jal dpal dbyangs dang mi gnyis pa'i zung 'jug gi go 'phang mthon por gshegs pa yin cing 'jam dpal ya mAn+ta ka mngon sum du snang bas dbang bskur zhing rgyud dang man ngag thams cad bstan/ sprul pa'i las gshin mang pos bskor ba byed cing srog snying phul/ ri ma la ya nas las bzhi tshang ba'i gser gyi glegs bam baiDUr+yas bris pa bton/ gzigs pa'i mod la thugs su chud de mu stegs 'dul ba'i sngags rgod las la sbyar bas mu stegs kyi rgyal khams rlag par mdzad/ glegs bam dngos rdo rje gdan gyi byang du mi snang bar rgyas btab bo// 'di la bram ze snying po grub par grags pa de ltar na slob dpon chen po dzi ta ri'i yab bram ze snying po'i zhabs yin par mngon zhing slob dpon de nyid kyang 'jam dpal gyi rig sngags grub pas rgyal po d+harma pA las bla mar bkur nas rang gi sras la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dbang bskur bas grub pa thob pa'i lo rgyus 'byung ngo// slob dpon 'di nyid kyi slob ma dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma nas lung bstan pa'i bram ze ye shes rdo rje dang byang chub rdo rje gnyis char las rgyud sde mang po'i bshad bka' byung zhing/ khyad par slob dpon 'di las don yod rdo rje che bas gshed skor mtha' dag zhus shing de las don yod rdo rje chung bas zhus pa sogs bod du grags pa'i skyo lugs kyi gshed skor gang du byung ba'i khungs 'ded sa de nyid yin no// slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub la gsung snang mtha'i rigs rta mchog rol pa sogs pad+ma gsung gi tan+t+ra rnams kyi bka' babs shing/ de la slob dpon 'di 'ga' zhig gis bi kra ma shI la'i gtor

ma'i slob dpon ba lin A tsar+ya yin/ 'phags pa klu sgrub min zer yang ba liM A tsar+ya'i mtshan la klu sgrub snying po zer ba srid kyang 'phags pa mi zer/ de'i phyir slob dpon 'phags pas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams su 'phags pa klu sgrub snying po zhes bkod 'dug pa'i phyir gtor ma'i slob dpon dang 'khrul bar mi bya'o// de nyid kyi rnam thar grags che ba ltar yin la/ 'on kyang slob dpon 'dis ma hA kA la'i rgyud brgyad dang/ lha mo nag mo'i rgyud dang/ ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa sogs rgyud kyi rnam grangs gzhan yang mang du spyan drangs/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams las zhal gyis gdams pa thob/ sgrub thabs mi gcig pa kho na'ang brgya drug cu spyan drangs par bshad/ thun mong gi dngos grub brgyad po re re la'ang mi 'dra ba du ma grub/ shrI bar pa tar lo nyis brgyar gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas sngags kyi spyod pas bzhugs shing mthar gyis rdo rje'i sku grub bo// slob dpon bi ma la mi tra la yon tan rin 'byung gi rigs bdud rtsi bam brgyad sogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bka' rnams babs te/ slob dpon 'di 'phags yul nub phyogs glang po'i tshal zhes bya ba sku 'khrungs/ rig pa'i gnas yan lag dang bcas pa thams cad thugs su chud/ sde snod 'dzin pa rnams las theg pa che chung gi mdo sde rnams kyang gsan cing mkhas par mdzad/ slob dpon bud+d+ha gu h+ya la sogs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po du ma las rgyud sde mtha' dag gsan cing bsgoms pas phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub nyams 'og tu chud/ sgyu 'phrul la khyad par du mkhas shing snying po'i 'grel pa khog gzhung gsal sgron dang/ bla ma'i 'grel pa mun sel dang/ le lag gi spyan 'grel dang/ brgyad cu pa'i bsdus 'grel dang/ shes rab spyan 'byed dang/ rim pa gsum pa dang/ phyag rgya bsam bstan dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ ro sreg gi las/ thig gi rim pa dang/ 'grel chung sogs bstan bcos mang po mdzad do// don grub kyi rigs phrin las phur pa'i rgyud rnams kyi bka' slob dpon pra b+ha ha sti la babs shing/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma saM b+ha bas kyang yang le shod du he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rig 'dzin mngon du mdzad pa'i skabs klu gyong po dang/ gnod sbyin rgod ma kha dang/ bar snang khams kyi glog ma sprin gsum gyi yid la mi bzod pa'i tshor ba skyes te mtho brtsams pa 'dul ba'i ched du bi d+yot+ta ma 'bum sde'i rgyud la brten nas sgrub pa mdzad pas badzra ku mA ra zhal bstan cing bar chad kyi mtshan ma rnams bcom/ ma mo bcu gnyis dang sa bdag mo bzhi sogs dam 'og tu bcug/ slar slob dpon pra b+ha ha sti la'ang kI la ya'i rgyud tshar bco brgyad gsan par grags shing phrin las

phur pa'i bka' rnams ma lus pa'i bdag nyid du gyur// de rnams slob dpon so sos rang gi nyams su blangs shing skal ba dang ldan pa'i gdul bya gzhan la'ang rgya cher bshad do// gnyis pa gter ma'i phyogs ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyi sgrub sde spyi bye brag rnams glegs bam du bkod pa re zhig mi'i 'jig rten du bstan pa'i yul ma gzigs nas mkha' 'gro las kyi dbang mo che la gtad/ des sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi spyi rgyud lnga dang/ dgos rgyud bcu rnams rin po che sna brgyad kyi sgrom bur bcug/ dgos rgyud rnams tha dad pa'i sgrom bur bcug nas dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi mchod rten bde byed legs tshal du mi snang bar rgyas btab bo/ dus phyis grub pa'i slob dpon chen po brgyad kyis mngon par shes pas shes te gnas der 'dus shing dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs bskyed de 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang dregs pa'i tshogs rnams la bden pa'i tshig dang mthun pa'i rdzas kyis bkrol/ gzhan don du dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang mo che mngon sum du byon nas sgrom bu rnams blangs te/ che mchog gi bse sgrom bi ma la yang dag gi dngul sgrom hU~M kA ra/ gshin rje'i lcags sgrom 'jam dpal bshes gnyen/ rta mgrin gyi zangs sgrom nA ga rdzu na/ phur pa'i g.yu sgrom pad+ma 'byung gnas/ ma mo'i bse sgrom d+ha na saM skr-i ta/ mchod bstod kyi mchod sgrom ram bu gu h+ya/ drag sngags kyi gzi sgrom zhi ba'i snying po rnams las so sor gtad de rang rang gi don la mkhas shing sngags kyi dngos grub brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ rin po che sna brgyad kyi sgrom bu las bde gshegs 'dus pa tshom bu gcig tu 'dus pa'i rgyud dang man ngag gi dka' rnams byung ba slob dpon pad+ma la babs pa yin no/ gnyis pa rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i skor rnams gsang ba'i bdag pos rgyal po dza'am lung bstan rdo rje la dbang bskur zhing bstan pa thams cad kyi don thugs su chud pa yin mod/ 'on kyang tshur mthong gi ngor gsang sngags la rang dgar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir mi'i rig 'dzin dge bsnyen li tsa bI dri med grags pa brten pa'i tshul gyis dbang bskur ba dang tshig gi bstan pa thams cad kyang zhus/ spyi mdo'i 'grel ba sogs bstan bcos kyang mdzad/ des sngar li tsa bI la brten pa'i dus kyi grogs slob dpon u ba rA dza dang rang gi sras shA' kra pu tri dang/ nA ga pu tri dang/ gu h+ya pu tri gsum la sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing gdams ngag kyang bstan/ u pa rA dza la shrI d+ha na'i gling du dpal ldan 'bras spungs sam mchod rten dpal yon can du dbang bskur zhing rgyud gtad do// grong khyer skyid pa'i 'byung gnas su rang gi sras gsum la dbang bskur/

de yang shA' kra pu tri ni in+d+ra b+hU ti chung bar grags pa de yin/ 'dis grub pa brnyes pa'i tshe slob dpon lA ba par grags pa yin zer/ lhan cig skyes grub kyi 'grel pa las kyang de ltar bshad de/ gang ltar 'khor lo sdom pa sogs rgyud sde 'ga' zhig in+d+ra b+hU tis lam srol dbye bar mdzad pas bram ze rin chen rdo rje sogs brgyud srol de'i rjes 'brang yin no// de yang rgya gar gyi bla ma phyis byon pa 'ga' zhig gis slob dpon lwa ba pa de rgyal po'i sras zhig yin/ yul yang o rgyan gyi nang tshan zhig yin ces gsungs pa ltar na in+d+ra b+hU ti chung pa yin kyang rung ste/ des thog mar sngags kyi slob dpon chen po zhig las dbang bskur ba nod cing gdams pa bsgoms pas ye shes rtogs par gyur pa na dus gzhan zhig tu o rgyan gyi d+hu ma s+thi ra mkha' 'gro ma'i grong khyer du song bas mu stegs kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis me tog gi phreng ba lag tu gtad pa de blangs pas sangs rgyas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bu me tog blangs pa ma legs/ dmu stegs kyi rjes su 'jug dgos na zer/ der slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shing bzhugs pas nam phyed tsam na mu stegs kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rdo char phab pa bskyed rim gyi srung 'khor bsgoms pa'i mtshams tshun la ma gnod/ bskyed rim gyi phan yon de 'dra na rdzogs rim gyi nus pa bstan par bya'o dgongs nas mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas rdo thams cad nam mkha' la chags so// deng sang yang o rgyan gyi yul slob dpon 'di'i sgrub phug gi steng gi nam mkha' la pha wang chen po rten med du yod pa dang/ brag me long ltar 'jam pa'i ngos la'ang pha wang mang po chags pa mngon sum gyi spyod yul du gyur pa yod/ lan cig rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo drung kho nar gzims nas bzhugs shing pho brang du phyin pa thams cad slob dpon la phyag ma byas na byin pa rengs 'gro ba kho na byung bas thams cad kyis phyag byas nas 'gro dgos pa byung/ gzim log pa'i yun ni lo grangs bcu gnyis yin te slob dpon gyi ni 'od gsal thun gcig go/ skabs shig o rgyan gyi yul gyi phra men ma lnga brgyas slob dpon la bar chad brtsam par 'dod nas btsal bas slob dpon gyi shul du lwa ba gcig las gzhan mi 'dug pas/ kye ma dge slong 'di'i sgyu ma la ltos/ rang gi lus lwa bar bsgyur nas 'dug na 'di dum bu so sor bgos nas bza' bar bya'o// zhes/ lwa ba de dum bu lnga brgyar byas nas zos so// der slob dpon gyis lus snang bar byas te de rnams dmod pa bor bas phra men ma lnga brgya po rnams lug ma mo lnga brgyar gyur/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du song nas dge slong dur khrod bdag pos bdag po cag rnams 'di ltar byas

pas lhas dgrol ba'i thabs 'tshal lo zer/ der rgyal pos slob dpon la zhus pas slob dpon gcer bu bzhengs nas rgyal po khyod kyi yul gyi sngags 'chang ma rnams kyis/ dge slong la nor lwa ba gcig yod pa'ang zos so// de bas na sngags 'chang ma rnams khug cig gsung/ der thams cad bkug nas re re la sdigs mdzub re bstan pas go brnyan sna tshogs su gyur nas lwa ba'i dum bu so sor skyugs so// de dag tshem bu byas pa cung zad ma 'grig/ da rung gsum yod pa khug cig gsungs pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na'ang gsum yod pa'ang bkug nas snga ma bzhin skyugs su bcug pas 'grigs nas sku la gsol ba rje btsun lwa ba par grags shing/ gzhan yang 'di dang rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti gnyis kyis grub pa thob pa'i rtags skye bo rnams la bstan pa'i lo rgyus dang/ slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rje thun mong gi dngos grub thob pa'i skabs shig o rgyan gyi yul du slob dpon 'di dang lhan cig par byon pas ri mu run+Da ka la rdzu 'phrul 'gran pa'i lo rgyus sogs shin tu mang bar yod cing rol pa'i rdo rjes kyang slon dpon 'di la phyag mdzad pa dang gdams pa zhus pa'i 'og tu mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin zhes grags shing/ phyag chen thig le'i skor rnams kyang 'di dus su o rgyan gyi yul du dar ba yin/ phyis o rgyan gyi yul der rgyal po dang slob dpon gnyis char gyis gdams pa bstan pas thams cad rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas o rgyan gyi yum de tsam du che ba'ang stongs su nye bar gyur skad/ 'di gong du smos pa'i rgyal po dza'i sras in+d+ra b+hU ti chung ba 'khor tshom bu dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par gyur par gsungs pa dang don gcig gam snyam mo// de ltar in+d+ra b+hU ti chung bas seng ha pu tra dang ku ku rA dza phyi ma gnyis la rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dbang bskur zhing rgyud bshad/ phyi mas slob dpon chen po ro lang bde ba la dbang bskur zhing bshad/ 'di sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs so// 'di yan chad kyi brgyud pa de rnams rang rang gi 'khor tshom bu khri phrag lnga nas gcig gi bar gyi thams cad kyang spros bcas kyi spyod pa tshogs kyi sgrub pas zung 'jug gi sku brnyes te mi snang bar gyur skad/ slob dpon des slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa la ut+tas ra'i tshal du dbang bskur zhing rgyud kyang bshad/ des kyang bde ba chen po'i lam gyis mchog gi dngos grub thob cing rnal 'byor rig pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos mdo'i zab lam gtan la dbab pa zhig kyang mdzad/ des slob dpon pra b+ha ha sti la g+ha dza ne'i yul gyi chu klung sin+d+hU'i 'gram du dbang bskur ba dang rgyud bshad/ 'di sngar smos pa bzhin rab tu byung ba'i mtshan shAkya 'od ces grags shing/ des slob ma

shAkya 'od chung ba dang/ shAkya bshes gnyen dang/ shAkya seng ge gsum la bstan/ bar pa 'di rnal 'byor rgyud la shin tu mkhas pas de nyid 'dus pa'i 'grel pa ko sa la'i rgyan ces bya ba yul ko sa lar brtsam shing khong nyid kyis bla ma bcu gcig tsam la zhus par bshad cing sku tshe'i smad du kha cher byon nas 'gro don cher mdzad/ phyi ma ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma sam+b+ha ba'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs te/ des lha'i bshos khang dgu thog tu slob dpon d+ha na rak+Shi ta la bshad/ 'dis mdo'i rnam grangs 'chad pa'i bstan bcos mdzad/ des o rgyan gyi rdo rje'i phug tu slob dpon hU~M mdzad la bshad/ 'dis rtsa rgyud la rgya bdun 'grel pa dang/ rnal 'byor sa'i sgron ma la sogs mdo'i bstan bcos mang po mdzad/ rgya gar dang ta sig gi mtshams a su ra'i brag phug tu phyag rgya mo ga ga sid+d+hi la brten nas sgrub pa mdzad pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku gyur/ de'ang lus mi snang ba ni bcud len dang/ thig le dbab bzung dang/ sgron ma rlung gi 'khor lo sogs 'jig rten pa'i lam las kyang 'byung mod/ 'di dag ni mthong lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes nye rgyu'i spyod pa la brten nas rnam smin gyi lus 'od gsal du gnas 'gyur pa min pas khyad par che bar shes par bya'o// slob dpon des bde ba gsal mdzad la grong khyer dpal yon can du dbang bskur zhing rgyud gtad/ 'dis slob dpon hUM ka ra la'ang gsan/ rig sngags grub pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i skur gyur/ mdo'i yig sna bco brgyad dang rnal 'byor gyi rim pa theg chen sgron ma sogs mdzad/ des skal pa mchog dang ldan pa'i thugs sras bzhi la bshad de/ ma ga d+ha ra mdo'i mkhan po d+harma bo d+hi la bshad/ 'dis mdo'i don bsdu ba dang/ shes rab sgron ma dang bkol mdo rnams mdzad/ shrI lan+dar mkhan po d+harma rA dza bA lar dbang bskur zhing rgyud rnams bshad/ bal po'i rgyal po ba su d+ha ra dang gtsug lag dpal dge gnyis la rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dbang bskur zhing rgyud kyi bshad pa bstsal/ phyi ma gsum pos slob dpon d+ha na rak+Shi ta las kyang gsan ces grags/ bshad ma thag pa'i brgyud pa de thams cad ni dbang bka' dang/ bshad bka' dang/ man ngag gi bka' thams cad 'dus pa'i brgyud pa yin no// yang slob dpon de gsum kas bru sha'i slob dpon che btsan skyes la yul dbus su dbang bskur zhing rgyud bshad/ bsgoms pas grub pa thob pa la phyis slob dpon d+ha na rak+Shi ta bru sha'i yul du spyan drangs shing mdo dgongs 'dus la sogs pa bsgyur bar brtsams pa na mos pa chung bas ma 'gyur te bal yul du byon/ ba su d+ha ra dang d+harma bo d+hi la bshad/ phyis bru sha'i yul du d+harma bo d+hi dang d+ha na rak+Shi ta'i drung du slob dpon che btsan

skyes kyis bru sha'i skad dang yi ge bsgyur ro//// gsum pa rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga'i skor ni/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes ri rab kyi byang phyogs dur khrod me ri 'bar bar mkha' 'gro dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ grub pa dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs la gsang ba sngags kyi chos ston pa de'i tshe 'phags yul nub phyogs o rgyan gyi yul d+ha na ko sha'i gling zhes bya bar ko sha zhes pa'i srog chags lus mi la gdong dred kyi rnam pa spar mo lcags kyis gtams pa kho nas gang zhing tsan+dan la sogs shing ljon pa mang pos bskor ba'i phyir de skad du grags so// zhes kyang byung/ yul der bde byed brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i lha khang chen po gcig la lha khang chung ngu stong drug brgya brgyad kyis bskor ba dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su rgyal po u pa rA dza dang btsun mo snang ba gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba gnyis la sras mo su d+harma bya ba rab tu byung nas yun ring por ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma zhig yul de nas dpag tshad tsam 'das par gser gyi bye ma bdal ba'i rgya mtsho'i gling zhig tu rtswa'i spyil bu chung ngu zhig la gnas te g.yog mo bde ba'i snying ldan ma bya ba dang lhan cig tu rnal 'byor bsgoms shing gnas pa'i tshe nub gcig dge slong ma'i rmi lam du mi dkar po dri ma dang bral ba zhig gis shel gyi bum pa oM A: hU~M swA ha'i yi ges rgyas btab pa gcig spyi bor lan gsum bzhag pas bum pa de las 'od 'phros pas khams gsum po gsal bar mthong ba zhig rmis/ de nas mi ring bar dge slong ma la rdzogs pa chen po lha yul du dar bar byed pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul sku lha'i bu sems lhag can rgyal ba'i sras su btsas so// de'i tshe dge slong ma nyid shin tu ngo tsha nas mi rigs pa chen por mthong ste// pha med bu 'di 'jig rten 'dre bas gzhan na su// 'jig rten bdud dam tshangs pa la sogs sam// rgyal po btsan nam dmu la sogs pa'i rigs/ khams gsum dag na 'dod ldan su zhig yin// gal te lha dang lha min sna tshogs gzugs// 'di ltar byung ba'i dpe ni sus mthong med// rgyal khams chos med 'di ni su la srid/ kye ma/ bdag ni khrims gtsang 'gro las rgyal 'dod pas// 'di ni log sred 'gro bas dpyas 'gyur sdig re che// zhes pa la sogs smre sngags mang du bton nas g.yog mo des 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras yin pas de ltar mi rigs so zhes smras kyang ma nyan par thal dong du bskyur/ de'i tshe sgra dang 'od la sogs pa'ang byung bar gyur to// gang gi tshe zhag gsum song ba na ci yang ma nyes par 'dug pa mthong nas sprul pa yin pas shes te bkur sti chen po dang bcas

pas spyan drangs pa na bar snang nas lha rnams kyis/ mgon po ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin snang mdzad 'jig rten mgon// bdag kyang rab tu skyabs pa dang// nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol// zhes ched du rjod par byed cing mkha' 'gro dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du mas rjed par byed do/ zhag bdun song ba na sras kyis yum la/ kye ma bdag gis pan+Di ta rnams la chos kyi gtam spob par 'tshal na yum bdag la ci bder gnang ba stsol cig/ zhes gsungs pa na yum gyis bu khyod ni shin tu gzhon gyi pan+Di ta rnams mkhas shing gzhung pas khyod kyis thub par dka'o// ces kyang bgyi bar gsol ba na/ sngar smos pa'i rgyal po'i mchod gnas su mkhas pa lnga brgya yod pa de dang chos kyi gtam gyis shig/ de nas sras kyi yul de nyid du byon nas rgyal po dang mjal nas lo rgyus snga ma bzhin bsnyad do// rgyal pos kyang khye'u 'di na gzhon pas pan+Di ta rnams dang chos kyi gtam 'ong bar dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mang po 'dug pas sprul pa yin kyang srid snyam nas mchod gnas rnams la tshul de bzhin bsnyad pas de rnams gsung ma mthun pa las mkhyen pa che ba gcig gis/ ltas shin tu bzang ba zhig kyang byung/ byis pa de yar thong dang sprul pa yin te 'ong gsungs nas mjal ba na pan+Di ta rnams la phyag mdzad cing 'gro gleng dang brgal brtag gi rim pa mang du mdzad pas pan+Di ta rnams kyi spobs pa bcom pas zhabs spyi bor blangs shing bkur sti rgya chen pos mchod nas pra dz+nyA b+ha ba zhes mtshan gsol/ rgyal po'ang shin tu ngo mtshar zhing dga' bas slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje zhes bya bar mtshan btags/ sngar yum gyis thal dong du bskyur yang ma nyes pa la ngo mtshar bas ro langs bde ba'am ro langs thal mdog tu gsol/ de nas byang phyogs ri bo nyi ma rab tu snang byed ces bya ba brag ri shin tu 'jigs pa yi dwags kyi tshogs mngon sum du rgyu ba zhig gi steng du rtswa'i spyil bur lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ sa lan bdun du g.yos shing nam mkha' las mu stegs kyis bstan pa nyams par byas so zhes pa'i sgra grag pa thos pas mu stegs kyi rgyal pos gshed ma btang nas slob dpon bkrong bar brtsams na nam mkha'i lam nas gshegs pa mthong bas rgyal po 'khor bcas mchog tu dad nas sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la zhugs so// de nas theg pa phyi nang gi sde snod rnams dang/ khyad par rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po shwa lo ka 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi thugs la bzhugs pa de

rnams rdo rje sems dpas mngon sum du zhal bstan nas rig pa spyi blugs kyi dbang gis mi slob pa'i ye shes mngon du mdzad pa'i tshul bstan/ tshig gi rgyud rnams yi ger 'god pa'i lung byin te ri ma la ya'i rin chen spungs pa rgyas pa'i rtse mor slob dpon nyid dang/ rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma 'jig rten bde ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang/ bde byed ser mo yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gsum gyis lo gsum gyi bar du tshig dang yi ge dkar chag du btab// rang byung rang bab kyi yi ge sprul pa'i sku dang bcas pa phyin ci ma log par legs par bkod nas mkha' 'gro ma mngon par 'byung ba'i phug tu bzhugs su gsol/ dus gzhan zhig tu rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar mtshams dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba dbus su mchod rten chen po yod cing gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang sems can rab tu gdug pa du ma'i gnas su gyur pa zhig tu byon nas mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'od zer la sogs dpag tu med pa la chos ston cing bzhugs pa na slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnon pos lung bstan te/ kye rigs kyi bu/ 'bras bu tshe gcig la sangs rgyas par 'dod na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du song zhig/ ces gsungs pas/ 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du byon nas slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje mjal zhing lo bdun cu rtsa lnga'i bar du chos nyan cing/ gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa mtha' dag pa bstsal nas chu bo dan tig bya bar slob dpon chen po zag pa med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad do// de'i tshe 'jam dpal bshes gnyis gyis/ kye ma kye hud kye ma blong// zhes pa la sogs gdung tshig lan gsum bton pas nam mkhar 'od phung gi dkyil nas slob dpon gyis sku mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas gser gyi za ma tog sen gang ba gcig phyag tu babs pas tshig gsum gnad du brdeg pa'i 'das rjes kyi gdams pa bzhag go/ de nas slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs las rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum du phyes te/ sems gnas rnams la sems kyi sde// bya bral rnams la klong gi sde// gnad gtso ba la man ngag sde gsum dang/ de las kyang khyad par du bsdus pa thig le rang gnad du dbab pa 'di las snyan brgyud dang bshad rgyud gnyis su phyes nas snyan brgyud rnams mchan du btang/ bshad rgyud snying thig gi bka' rnams re zhig gtad pa'i snod ma rnyed nas rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar pha wang rdo rje rgya gram gyis rgyas btab pa'i 'og tu sbas te mi snang bar byas/ slob dpon nyid rdo rje gdan gyi nub phyogs dur

khrod chen po so sa gling du gshegs shing der mi sdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang sems can dpag tu med pa dang spyod pa la gnas pa'i sgrub pa po yang mang du rgyu ba rnams la chos ston cing lo brgya rtsa dgu'i bar ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// slob dpon 'di'i slob ma ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs yin cing thog mar slob dpon dza lan+d+ha ri ba dang/ o rgyan gyi slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje dang/ rnal 'byor ma gu ne ru sogs bla ma mang po bsten nas gsang sngags kyi tshul rnams mang du gsan/ yo byad rnams rmugs 'dzin dang nor rgyun mas sbyor/ lan cig kong ka na'i slob dpon pA li ta pA da lo dgu'i bar brten cing 'dus pa'i rgyud tshar bco brgyad mnyan kyang de kho na nyid ma rtogs par bla ma la zhus pas de ni kho bos kyang ma rtogs so gsungs/ de nas rdo rje gdan gyi rgyab ku ba'i tshal zhes bya bar bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi spog chog dang bcas pas zla ba bcu gnyis/ drag shul spyod pa zla ba drug ste bco brgyad du bsgrubs pas de kho na nyid rtogs par 'dod na 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dris shig ces lung bstan byung bas 'o na 'jam dpal ri bo rtse lngar bzhugs pas der 'gro dgos dgongs te de phyogs su song song ba na nyi ma phyed tsam na khang pa dkar tsag tsag zhig gi 'gram na 'jam dpal bshes gnyen khyim btsun rgan po chos gos kyi thong byas pa bud med ngan ngon gcig dang lhan cig zhing rmo bar gzigs pas cung zad ma dad/ de'i 'gram zhig tu khyi mo dkar po ngan ma zhig kyang nyal nas 'dug/ der zas kyi dus la bab pas bsod snyoms slong ba zhig la/ yur ba nas nya zhig bzung ste khyi mo la byin/ des skyugs pa slob dpon la drangs pa rnam par rtog pas ma blangs bas/ khyim btsun na re/ 'dzam bu gling ba rnam rtog che/ zas bzang po drongs gsungs te gzhan zhig tu song ngo// der bud med des 'bras chan dang zho drangs pa gsol nas 'gro bar brtsams pas/ de ring nyi ma phyis pas grong du ni mi sleb/ sang nyin song zer ba bzhin bzhugs te gsang 'dus kyi rgyud bklags pas slob dpon rang nyid the tshom za ba'i gnas gar yod kyi thad der bud med des kyang mi dga' ba'i rnam 'gyur re byas pas/ 'dis gzhan sems shes par 'dug dgongs te the tshom bsal bar zhus pas ngas mi shes/ da ci'i khyim btsun de 'dus pa la shin tu mkhas/ phyi ma red na sleb 'ong bas de la the tshom chod zer ba ltar phyi ma red na khyim btsun chang gis bzi nas gom pa 'khyor bzhin du byung bas der sngags kyi spyod pa can du shes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas the tsom gcod par zhus pas dbang bskur dgos gsungs/ gzhan nas thob zhu?

pas/ nga'i chos ston pa la nga rang gis dbang bskur dgos gsungs nas khang pa zhig tu song/ srod kyi dus su slob dpon nang du bos pa la/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i drung na khyim btsun bud med khyi mo dang bcas pa snang ste dbang su la len gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor la 'tshal lo zhus pas 'o na longs shig gsungs te gsum ka khang pa gzhan zhig tu song dkyil 'khor yang mi snang bar gyur/ der slob dpon thugs skyo ste/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab gcig la sogs gdung pa'i lus kyis gsol ba btab pas slar yang sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor sprul te dbang bskur/ rdzogs pa chen po sems sde'i man ngag bshad pas rtogs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur/ 'jam dpal zhal lung zhes rim pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa 'di nyid slob dpon gis sdud pa po'i tshul mdzad pa yin/ des chos thams cad kyi gting sleb/ thog mar khyis skyugs pa'i zas dang khyim btsun gyi spyod pa sogs la ma dad pa'i rten 'brel gyis sku lus de nyid kyis mchog gi dngos grub ma thob kyang bar dor rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang mngon du mdzad pa yin zhes grags/ slar bsrung pa'i zhabs kyis kyang slob dpon 'di las gdams pa zhus pas grub pa thob bo// bstan bcos kyang grol ba'i thig le dang/ sgrub thabs kun bzang sogs shin tu mang bar mdzad/ slob dpon 'di'i rdzogs rim gyi man ngag sngon chad bod du 'gyur ba rnams sems sde kho na'i grub mtha' gtsang sing nge bar gnas shing rgyu mtshan des rjes 'brangs slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'ang rdzogs pa chen po'i don gyi brgyud par 'gro la/ 'ga' zhig gis slob dpon shrI sid+ha yang 'di nyid kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs su 'dod pa thos shing lo rgyus kyi bab 'gar brtag na de ltar yin du rung snyam pa'ang 'dug go/ dus de tsam na rgya nag po'i yul grong khyer sho khyam zhes bya bar khyim bdag dge ba'i yid can dang bud med snang ba gsal ba rab tu mkhyen ma zhes pa gnyis kyi sras slob dpon shrI siM ha zhes bya ba sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig lo bco lnga lon pa'i tshe slob dpon ha ri b+ha la las sgra tshad sogs thun mong gi rig pa rnams lo gsum du mnyan nas mkhas pa chen por gyur pa'i skabs shig nub phyogs kyi grong khyer gser gling bya bar 'gro ba'i lam bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs nam mkhar byon nas skal ldan 'bras bu nges par 'dod na rgya gar gyi dur khrod so sa gling du song zhig/ ces lung bstan pas slob dpon nyid yid tshim par gyur te da dung 'bras bu bla na med pa de nyid go sla ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud gzhan la'ang mkhas par bya snyam du dgongs te ri bo rtse lngar gdol pa'i rigs kyi

slob dpon b+he la kirtir sngags phyi nang gi chos rnams ma lus par gsan cing nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ rab tu byung nas dge slong sde snod 'dzin pa mdzad cing lo sum cu'i bar du 'dul khrims kyi brtul zhugs su gnas/ slar yang 'phags pa'i lung gis sngon bzhin bskul bas rgya gar du bgrod pa'i lam la dka' ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul zhig bsgrub par bya dgongs te lo gsum du sgrub pa mdzad pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i skur gyur/ de nas zhabs sa la khru gang tsam gyis ma reg par dur khrod so sa gling du byon nas slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen mjal zhing bla ma'i bya ba rnams byas/ rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab pas bla mas kyang dgyes bzhin du gnang/ lo nyer lnga'i bar la gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa rnams bstsal ba'i 'og tu slob dpon chen po nyid sku 'od phung du yal/ de'i tshe'i shrI siM has smre sngags kyi gdung dbyangs bton pas nam mkha' nas slob dpon gyis sku dngos su bstan te rin po che'i za ma tog sen gang ba gcig phyag tu gtad par sgom nyams drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'das rjes bab pas slob dpon nyid don gyi gdeng dang ldan par gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgya gar nub phyogs gser gyis brgyan pa'i gling du slob dpon mjal dpal bshes gnyen brdzus te skyes pa la 'jam dpal bshes gnyen phyi mar grags shing/ des slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la sngags phyi nang thams cad gsungs shing slob dpon Ar+ya de ba la'ang rdzogs pa chen po bstan pas zag bcas mi snang bar gyur skad/ de nas slob dpon shrI siM has rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas sngar sbas pa'i rgyud rnams bton te rgya nag tu byon cing rdzogs pa chen po man ngag gi sde la/ phyi skor/ nang skor/ gsang skor/ gsang ba bla na med pa bzhir phyes nas skor snga ma gsum spros bcas kyi don du bsdebs nas byang chub shing gi lha khang bya 'dabs su gter du sbas/ gsang ba bla na med pa'i skor mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan pa ltar bkra shis khri sgo'i ka bar smon lam gyis rgyas btab ste sbas// slob dpon nyi bsil byin zhes pa'i dur khrod chen por gdug pa'i mi ma yin rnams kyi bkur sti dang bcas pas ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'phags yul nub phyogs glang po'i sgang zhes bya bar yab khyim bdag bde ldan 'khor lo dang yum bdag nyid gsal rigs ma'i sras bi ma la mi tra zhes pa dang/ shar phyogs ka ma shrI la'i shar gyi grong khyer du yab gdol pa zhi ba'i lag pa dang/ yum dge ba'i sems can ma gnyis kyi sras ye shes mdo zhes bya ba gnyis shig bzhugs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon sum du byon nas/ kye rigs kyi bu gnyis/ khyed gnyis skye ba lnga brgyar pan+Di ta'i lus

blangs shing dam pa'i chos spyad kyang 'bras bu sngar yang ma thob/ da yang mi 'thob pas tshe 'di nyid kyis zag bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na rgya nag po'i byang chub shing drung gi lha khang du song zhig/ ces lung bstan pas bi ma la mi tras de nyid du lhung bzed blangs te byon pas slob dpon shrI sid+ha mjal zhing lo nyi shu'i bar la snyan brgyud phyi nang gsang gsum gyi gdams pa ma lus par bstsal mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gi dpe ni ma gnang ngo// der bi ma la thugs tshims te slar rgya gar du byon nas dz+nyA na su tra la ji ltar gyur pa rnams bsnyad pas khong nyid kyang 'bad rtsol chen pos rgya nag tu byon nas mkha' 'gros lung bstan pa bzhin dur khrod chen po bsil byin du slob dpon dang mjal/ lo gsum gyi bar bla ma'i bya ba ci rigs pas mnyes par mdzad cing mthar gser gyi man+Dal phul nas gdams pa gnang ba zhus pas lo dgu'i bar du snyan brgyud kyi gdams pa dpe dang bcas pa gnang/ de tsam gyis thugs tshims te 'byon par brtsams pa na slob dpon gyis rab tu tshim mam gsungs pas tshim mo zhus pa na/ bla mas gtad pa med do// gsungs pas dz+nyA na su tra rtog pa skyes te da dung rab tu zab pa'i gdams pa gnang bar zhus pas 'di la dbang bskur thob dgos gsung nas phyi spros bcas kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang nas gsang ba bla na med pa'i man ngag rnams kyang lo gsum gyi bar du gnang/ de nas nyams su blang bar zhus pas spros med kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang zhing ri bo ko sa la'i rtse mor 'khor 'das ru shan dbye ba'i spyod pa mdzad cing rab tu spros med kyi dbang dang/ rim pas shin tu spros med kyi dbang yang rdzogs par gnang/ de nas lo bcu drug tu nyams su blangs nas bsgoms/ slob dpon ni khyad par gyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas gnas shing dus gzhan zhig tu li yul gyi rgyal pos spyan drangs nas der bzhud pa'i zhag bdun na sgra dang ltas chen po byung bas ye shes mdos steng gi nam mkha' la slob dpon bzhugs pa mthong bas sku mya ngan las 'das par shes te smre sngags kyi gdung tshig bton pas/ gzer bu bdun pa'i zhal chems phyag tu bab pa dang/ snying thig gsang ba'i man ngag gi dpe rnams bkra shis khro sgo'i ka ba'i nang na yod pas de longs la dur khrod b+ha sing du song zhig/ ces lung bstan pa'ang thos/ der dz+nyA na sU tras gsang ba'i dpe rnams bton nas rgya gar gyi dur khrod b+ha sing du byon cing der 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gsang ba snying thig gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bzhin du bzhugs pa la de'i tshe bi ma la spyod pa la gnas par mkha' 'gro'i lung gis/ kye skal ldan/ sngar bas

zab pa'i snying thig gi gdams pa bzhed na dur khrod chen po b+ha sing gi nags su song zhig/ ces lung bstan pa bzhin du de nyid du byon pas dz+nyA na sU tra dang mjal zhing ches zab pa'i gdams pas rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab pas/ slob dpon gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa snang bar mdzad cing spros bcas dang spros med kyi dbang rnams bskur/ ri bo snang byed kyi rtse mor 'khor 'das shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa dang/ shin tu spros med kyi dbang rdzogs par mdzad pas thun mong ma yin pa'i rtogs pa 'khrungs// shangs kyi rtse mo yi ge a dkar po zag la khad pa gcig kyang byung/ de nas rab tu spros med kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang bas sems kyi de nyid rjen par mthong/ dbang de dag gi rim pa bzhin rdzogs pa chen po skor bzhi'i gdams pa dpe dang bcas pa ma lus par gnang/ lo bcu'i bar la zhun thar bcad cing de'i 'og tu dz+nyA na sU tra nyid 'od phung du yal bar bi ma las sme sngags dang gdungs dbyangs bton pas slar yang sku mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas rin po che'i za ma tog rin chen sna lngas rgyas btab pa gcig bstsal ba phyag tu bab pa las bzhag thab bzhi pa zhes pa'i 'das rjes thob pas tshig la lhag chad med cing don la 'khrul pa med pa'i gdeng thob par gyur to// de nas slob dpon bi ma la shar phyogs ka ma ru'i grong khyer du rgyal po seng ge bzang po'i bla mchod du lo nyi shur bzhugs shing/ de nas nub phyogs su grong khyer b+hir+Ya zhes par rgyal po d+harma pA la'i mchod gnas kyang mdzad/ de'i 'og tu rab tu snang byed ces pa'i dur khrod chen por phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa spyad cing gdug pa'i tshogs la chos ston cing bzhugs/ gsang ba mchog gi dpe rnams tshar gsum du bris nas/ tshar gcig o rgyan gyi yul rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma bdal ba'i gling du sbas/ tshar gcig kha che'i yul gser gling zhes pa'i brag skyibs su sbas/ tshar gcig dur khrod der mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs so// slob dpon nyid kyis mthar 'pho ba chen po'i sku grub pas 'phags yul du ci rigs par bzhugs shing bod du byon pa ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ro//// spyir 'phags pa'i yul gyi gsang sngags spyod pa rnams gsang ba bsrung ba la blo shin tu brtan pas dngos grub ma thob gyi bar gsang sngags spyod pa gzhan gyis mi shes shing gang gi tshe cho 'phrul chen po dang bcas mi snang bar gyur ba'am nus pa khyad par can bstan pa na/ a la la ho// de ni sngags kyi spyod pa can no// zhes slad kyis shes par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig yin la/ rgyu des sngags nyams su blangs pa thams cad la tha na dngos grub sna te ma thob pa med cing/ de'ang

bya spyod kyi rgyud rnams sngon du dar che ba tsam yin kyang mngon mtshan du spyod pa ni med/ phyis su bla med rnams dar ba nas de dag rim gyis nub pa ltar gyur cing/ bla med kyi rgyud rnams sngar nas gtan med pa ma yin kyang skal ba dang ldan pa re gnyis tsam gyis cung zad re nyams su blangs pas de thams cad kyang mod la mi snang bar gyur pa sha stag byung bas/ brgyud nas rim par 'dom pa dang rjes su gdams pa bzhag pa ni med do// de nas rgyal po dza'am in+d+ra b+hu ti bar pa'i skabs tsam du grub pa'i slob dpon ches che ba rnams kyis o rgyan gyi gnas d+hU ma s+thi ra sogs gnas rnams nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang bka' bgros te/ rgyud la la tshad ma dang/ la la'i don bsdus pa dang/ 'ga' zhig las rtog pa khol bton tsam re spyan drangs shing snod ldan re re tsam la gsang nas bshad pas bla med kyi lam rnams ches cher dar ba ltar gyur nas grub pa'i skyes bu phyogs thams cad nas mang po zhig dus skabs de byung yang/ thun mong du spyod pa ni ga la yin/ sngags kyi glegs bam dang bstan bcos rnams kyang thun mong gi gzhung ltar yongs khyab tu yod pa ma yin te/ dper na klu sgrub gyi sngags gzhung rnams slob dpon nyid slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa 'das nas yun ring por lon pa'i dus phyis shig kong+ka na'i bsrung ba'i zhabs kyi sgron gsal gyi glegs bam rnyed/ ma taM gi pas 'phags pa lha'i ye shes kyi sku mjal ba sogs las 'phags skor gyi 'dus pa dar ba'i mgo brtsams pa bzhin no// de bzhin du shin tu gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po'i skor rnams sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rjes bstan nas bzung skal pa mchog dang ldan pa'i slob dpon de dag la zhal nas snyan du chig brgyud ma gtogs glegs bam bstan pa'ang med de slob dpon re re'i mtshams su dpe rnams mi snang bar sbas pa'i phyir ro// shin tu zab pa'i man ngag rnams ni 'das rjes zhal chems kyi tshul du bzhag pa kho na yin te thun mong du phyogs tsam yang ma grags pas sngon gyi rgyud sde sangs rgyas thod pa dang/ 'phags skor rnams dang/ rdzogs pa chen po la sogs pa rnams brgyud thag nye mor 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan yang de yin la/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde mtha' dag pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi spyod yul las gzhan du ma gyur zhing/ de las cha shas tsam zhig mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas rnams su byung la/ de las mi yi yul du byung ba ni nyung ngu tsam zhig yin par mngon te de dag kyang phal mo che u rgyan nas 'phags yul du phebs pa mang zhing/ deng sang ni yul de'i mthil d+hU ma s+thi ra ste du ba'i gnas zhes bya bar grong khyer chung ngu zhig yod cing/ rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti'i pho brang sogs ni shul tsam las med/ yul de

kla klos dbang byed pa las phyi nang gi grub mtha' 'dzin pa ni su yang med/ bud med rnams ni sngon gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs su yod pas lta stangs dang/ ci rigs par rig sngags grub pas lus gzhan du sgyur ba dang/ las phran tshegs la dbang byed pa zhing gi mkha' 'gro ma 'ba' zhig yin/ gnas der d+harma gany+dzi sngags kyi rgyud sde bzhugs pa'i pho brang de yang mngon sum gyi spyod yul du med pas ltar snang du phal pa'i grong du gyur pa yin nam snyam zhing/ da dung sngags kyi rgyud sde 'phags yul du ma byung ba yang ci rigs pa yod par grub la/ de yang thun mong gi spyod yul du ma gyur bar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis mi mngon pa'i dbyings su bzung nas gnas so// der ma zad rgya gar na gtan ma grags pa'i rgyud mang po 'gro lding gi gling sogs na yod par mngon sum gyis grub pa la mtshon na mi'i yul gzhan dang gzhan sngags kyi gdul bya gyur pa rnams su'ang de ltar 'byung ba nges pa'i phyir mtha' gcig tu tshad gzung bar rlom pa ni byis pa nyer spyod kyi blo gros gyi na ba ste/ mdor na bsam bya ma yin par shes par bya dgos pa nyid de/ bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi ni tshad// bye ba phrag ni drug nges te// de bzhin rnal 'byor ma rgyud grags// bye ba phrag ni bcu drug grangs// theg chen las gzhan mdo sde rnams// dung phyur phrag brgyad gsungs pa yin// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// sa ya dang ni dung phyur lnga// 'di dag thams cad thub dbang po// sku gsum bdag nyid can gyis gsungs// zhes pa lta bus mtshon pas so// phyis yul dbus su bstan pa dngos gzhi nub pa ltar gyur kyang shar phyogs su mtha' 'khob kyi yul dang yul phran mang po'i spyi'i ming ko ki'i yul du grags pa dang/ lho phyogs su DA mi Do dwi pa dang/ d+ha na shrI'i gling dang/ tsan+t+ra dwi ba la sogs dang/ byang gi phyogs su gu dzi rA tha sogs ci rigs par theg pa che chung dang gsang sngags kyi bstan pa sngon nas dar ba ma nyams pa dang/ gsar du byung ba sogs da lta'ang bstan pa rnal ma bzhugs pa las gsang sngags pa rnams ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyi bka' srol 'dzin pa shas che zhing/ phal cher zhig ni grub thob chen po go rak+Sha'i rjes 'bras dzo ki sde tshan bcu gnyis ci rigs pa dang/ khyad par na tha pan+tha'i nang tshan na De shwa ra'i sde las rdo rje slob dpon chen po shAn+ta gup+ta thugs sras dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brang gi dzo ki kho na shin tu mang ngo// dus phyis 'phags yul lho phyogs kyi 'bigs byed ri bo'i khongs su b+haM dwa kyi yul du rgyal srid byed cing rig sngags grub pa'i rgyal po ma la b+ha dra zhes bya ba lho phyogs kyi rgyud phal cher la lung bsgyur ba zhig byung/ des zhi ba

spas pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa bla mar khur zhing bde bar bshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che gsar du spel bar byed la/ ma 'ongs pa na lho phyogs kyi rgyud ri b+hin+da'i nang du dam pa'i chos gsar du dar bar byed par rgyal bas lung bstan pa nyid yin no// zhes 'phags yul ba rnams sgrog par byed la/ rgyun de dag las deng sang gi bar du'ang bstan pa rin po che dar bar yod ces thos so//// de las ri kha ba can gyi khongs su bstan pa de nyid ji ltar byon cing bskyangs pa'i tshul ni/ ljongs 'dir rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar ba'i rgyud ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin kho na las te/ thog mar chos byar ma btub pa la sgo du ma nas dam pa'i chos byar btub pa'i snod du byin gyis brlabs shing/ gdod gtsug lag khang bzhengs/ de nas mdo dang sngags kyi grwa btsugs nas bstan pa dngos gzhi dar bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// de yang 'jam dpal rtsa rgyud du/ khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang// sa 'od de bzhin sa 'od bzang// de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang// rkang pa'i bgros shes bstan pa yin// ces bod kyi btsan po rnams lung bstan pa las bzhi bas 'od bzang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa khri srong lde'u btsan gyis bod du chos dar bar bzhed nas/ A \u0f84tsar+ya bo d+hi satwa shAn+ta rak+Shi ta spyan drangs te pho brang klung tshugs zhes bya bar bzhugs su gsol nas zla ba mang por rgyu'i theg pa'i chos mang du bshad pas bod kyi 'byung po rnams khros nas/ pho brang 'phang thang chus khyer/ dmar po ri la thog brgyab/ yul khams su mi ngas chen po btang/ sad dang ser ba cher byung bas bod rnams chos byas pas lan zer/ chos byar ma btub pas/ A tsar+ya'i zhal nas bod kyi 'dre srin gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba la da lta sa'i steng tsam na mthu che ba sngags kyi mkhan po pad+ma siM b+ha ba zhes bya ba spyan 'dren dgos gsungs te khong nyid re zhig bal por bzhud do// ji zhig nas rgyal pos sba gsal snang slob dpon gnyis spyan 'dren par brdzangs pa/ slob dpon chen pos mkhyen nas nyid dang A' tsar+ya bo d+hi sa twa dang/ bal po'i rdo bzo mkhas pa gcig bcas 'byon grabs yod pa dang 'dzom/ de nas bo d+hi sa twa sngon la phebs/ slob dpon gyis skyid grong nas tshur byon pas bod kyi lha 'dre rnams kyis kha char drag po phab pa dang/ ri phan tshun kha sbyar bas slob dpon ri'i khong seng du bzhud nas lha 'dre rnams ting nge 'dzin gyis bcings shing dam la bzhag/ de nas bzung lam gyi mi ma yin thams cad 'dul zhing byon/ 'o yug gi thad kyi chu tshad la nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba yod par snying rje bya'o gsungs te dgongs pa gtad pas chu khol pa 'jam nyil

gyis song/ ru mtshams su phebs/ gangs dkar 'jigs nas thag ring du bros/ gnam du phebs nas dmar thab mdzad pas thang lha khros nas gangs la thug chom dang glo bur du sprin nag 'khrigs pa las thog dang ser ba mi bzad pa byung ba na slob dpon gyis gangs la sdigs mdzub bstan pas gangs cher zhu/ snying drung gi klu gdug pa can chos la 'tshe ba zhig 'dul bar dgongs pa gtad pas klu phyi'i rgya mtshor bros/ der zhag gsum dgongs pa mdzad pas klu dang thang lha bcas dam 'og tu chug cing chos la bkod/ gzhan yang gnam mtsho dang jo mo gangs dkar la sogs pa'i lha srin rnams btul/ de lan le shod dang/
