'phan yul sogs nas rim bzhin byon nas 'byung po rnams dam 'og tu bcug pa dang/ sa dpyad nyes pa rnams kyang bcos/ ngam shod du phebs nas zung mkhar mdar rdo'i mchod rten lnga bzhengs/ pho brang dmar 'om bu tshad du bod rje dang mjal 'phrad mdzad/ phyag la ma 'chams par rgyal po'i na bza' la phyag mdzad pas na bza' tshigs pas btsan pos slob dpon gyi zhabs la phyag phul/ brag dmar mgrin bzang gi lhang khang la rab gnas zhal bsro mdzad par lha sku rnams ston mo'i sar spyan drangs pas nub mo lha khang stongs par song/ nang par lha khang du lha rnams bshos gsol zhing gtam mdzad pa dngos su mthong/ de'i nyin mo mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad rang sgra sgrogs shing 'phel bar gyur/ dbang po gsal ba'i byis pa 'ga' la pra sen phabs pas sngar mkhan po byang chub sems dpas chos bshad pa la 'khrug pa'i bod kyi lha klu mi srun pa thams cad kyi ming dang spyod tshul gnas la sogs par smras pas de rnams bsdigs shing gzir bas dam 'og tu bcug cing chos la bkod/ so so'i srog sngags dang cho ga rnams blangs/ des kyang ma thul ba rnams sbyin sreg gis btul ba sogs mdzad/ de 'dra ba lan gnyis mdzad/ ma dros gzi can la sogs pa'i klu rnams btul/ rgyal po dang grogs po byas nas lha khang bzhengs pa'i gser phye 'dre'u khal bcu bzhi phul/ skabs der be har dang yar lha sham po'ang btul/ de tsam na rgyal blon rje 'bangs skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la sngags 'og ma dang bla med ci rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang/ phur pa 'bum sde dang man ngag lta phreng sogs gsungs/ de dag gi tshe dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i gzungs ma mchims bza' lha mo btsan dang/ mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal gnyis kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis mthus bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' sleb/ khong gnyis nyid la'ang lhun gyis grub pa'i rtogs pa 'khrungs nas grub pa mo chen mor gyur/ bsam yas gtsug lag khang gis cho ga mdzad pa na thig skud 'then par lcog ro bu chung

sman dang lha bu sman gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyis bkug ste thig sna ba byas/ dus gzhan zhig tu slob dpon gyis/ btsan po khyod kyi yul 'di bzang por bya/ ngam shod kyi bye ma tshal dang ne seng du bya/ gra dol yul gsum sogs chu med pa rnams su chu dbyung/ gram pa thams cad zhing sar bya/ bai shra ba Na las nor blangs te nor gyi 'byung khungs su bya/ gtsang po sbubs su 'jug/ rgya hor gyi rgyal po thams cad bod kyi dbang du 'du bar bya'o// zhes pa la sogs bka' mchid bstsal ba na/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhus pas/ snga dro tsam dgongs par bzhugs pa na/ brag dmar gyi skam sa gcig tu chu rdol/ brag dmar mtsho mo 'gul sngon bye thang yin pa ne sing du song/ brag zla ba'i gdong du nags chen po skad cig la byung/ zung mkhar la phu chu med par chu klung chen po nar gyis byung ba sogs lhag ma rnams kyang bka' bzhin 'byung nges pa la sems can spyi mthun gyi las kyi rgyu byas/ nag phyogs kyi blon po rnams kyis bar chad brtsams pas rkyen byas te lhag ma rnams ma grub bo// 'on kyang 'di skabs shig tu dpal bsam yas mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang yang 'byongs te rab tu gnas par mdzad/ cho 'phrul dang ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung/ rje 'bangs skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la gsang sngags phyi nang gi chos bsam las 'das par gsungs/ 'on kyang lkog chos kho na las mngon mtshan du bstan pa ni ma yin no// 'on kyang sngon du rgyal brgyud mnga' thang 'phel ba'i sbyin sreg mdzad 'phro la lus/ lha klu dam bzhag lan gsum pa'ang ma grub pa dang/ bod kyi blon po smon lam log pa rnams kyi 'bras bu la brten nas bod kyi bde skyid la sked nyag 'ong/ chos 'khor chen po gcig tu 'byongs te bar skabs su 'khrug pa chen po 'ong/ klu dang rgyal po 'di phugs zhe brnag/ rgyal brgyud kyang khrims la mi gnas pas sil bur 'thor ba 'byung bar 'dug gsungs te ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pas drag sngags kyang mang du gsungs/ chos dang drag sngags kyi dpe mang po gter du sbas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa kho nas chos dang nor gyi gter kha brgya rtsa brgyad dang phra mo grangs las 'das pa yul tha dad du sbas nas phyi ma'i dus su skal ba dang ldan pa rnams dang 'phrad pa'i smon lam kyi rgyas btab par mdzad do// spyir slob dpon chen po bod yul du bzhugs yun sogs la 'dod pa mi 'dra ba du ma 'byung yang gcig tu tshad gzung bar nus pa ma yin te/ rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gang ltar byas kyang rung mod/ dus yun thung ngu tsam la'ang yul thams cad du byon pa dang/ de dag tu dngos su chos ston pa dang/ gter kha mang po sbas pa dang/ yul so sor byon pa dang/ sgrub gnas so sor bzhugs pa dang gshegs

pa sogs mdzad pa mtha' yas par de lta bu ston pa'i long med snyam pa dang/ dus thung ngu las ma bzhugs par 'dod pa dang/ yun ring po bzhugs pa sogs 'gal lo snyam du mi sems te zung 'jug grub pa chen po 'di lta bu rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir ro// dus skabs de dag tu gzhan yang 'phags pa'i yul nas slob dpon rgyal ba'i gshes gnyen dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lha dang/ sbyin pa'i ngang tshul sogs sdom brtson sde snod 'dzin pa chen po rnams dang/ bi ma la mi tra dang/ shAn+tiM gar+b+ha la sogs rdo rje 'dzin pa mang du spyan drangs te/ mdo sngags kyi bstan pa dngos gzhi btsugs shing thog mar bod kyi mi la rab byung btub bam mi btum nyams sad pa'i phyir rba khri gzigs rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/ mtshan dpal dbyangs sam rba rat+nar yang grags/ de nas rim bzhin rba gsal snang/ bai ro tsa na/ rgyal ba mchog dbyangs/ rma rin chen mchog la sogs pa drug rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/ ye shes dbang po sogs su ming spos/ de la sad mi drug tu grags pa byung/ de nas bod la rab byung btub par dgongs te blo gsal ba sum brgya tsam rab tu byung/ ska cog sogs kyis 'dul ba lung sde bzhi bsgyur te gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i lugs kyi bshad pa dang/ lag len btsugs shing bstan pa'i gzhi bzhengs/ rba rat+nas/ sangs rgyas ye shes dang/ ska ba 'od mchog dang/ de'i mkhan bu gtsang g.yo smar gsum rnams la bshad cing/ phyi ma 'di gsum gyi glang dar gyis bstan pa bsnubs pa'i tshe 'dul ba dre'u khal gcig bkal nas khams su bros phebs pa rma lung an chung gnam rdzong ngam/ dan tig shel gyi yang dgon du bsgoms shing bzhugs pa las/ phyis bla ma rmug gsal 'bar gyis rab tu byung bar zhus pas smar gyis mkhan po dang g.yos slob dpon mdzad de rab tu byung/ mtshan shAkya dge ba rab gsal du btags/ de las dbus gtsang gi mi bcus khams su 'ongs nas tshig gsum rim nod kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rgyun las deng sang gi bar du 'dul ba'i lag len dang bshad pa'i rgyun brgyud de dar ba 'di yin no// mngon par gong 'og rnams ni pan+Di ta dzi na mi tra dang lo tsA ba ska ba dpal brtsegs sogs kyis bsgyur bshad mdzad cing/ de dag gi slob ma sna nam zla ba'i rdo rje dang lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje dang/ dbas ye shes rgyal ba gsum la bshad cing/ phyi mas khams su byon nas bshad pa sogs las/ da lta'i bar du shin tu dar bar gyur to/ mdo sde'i phyogs 'khor lo bar pa sher phyin kyi skor rnams rlang khams pa go chas 'bum thugs la bzung ba sogs rgya gar du gang bzhugs rnams bsgyur bshad nyan gsum gyis dar ba mdzad/ 'khor lo tha ma'i mdo ji

snyed pa rnams kyang ska cog dang bai ro sogs kyis bsgyur cing bshad nyan kyis gtan la phab cing/ sde snod gsum po de dag gi dgongs 'grel bstan bcos kyi skor yang phal che ba de skabs bsgyur ba yin te/ de la brten pa'i bshad sgrub gnyis ga'i srol deng sang gi bar du byung ba yin no/ gsang sngags la bya spyod rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams ci rigs par nyan bshad mdzad mod kyi/ 'on kyang mchog tu spel ba ni rnal 'byor bla med kyi skor rnams so// de la yang bskyed rdzogs gsum la/ bskyed pa ma hA yo ga la rgyud sde dang sgrub sde gnyis kyi dang po tan+t+ra chen po bco brgyad de dag gi spyi 'am rtsa bar gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba snying po'i skor sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad rnams slob dpon bi ma las rma rin chen mchog la bshad cing bsgyur/ rmas gtsug tu rin chen gzhon nu dang kye re mchog skyong gnyis la bshad/ de gnyi gas zhang rgyal ba'i yon tan dang dar rje dpal gyi grags pa gnyis la bshad/ de gnyis kyi snga mas dbus gtsang du lan mang po bshad cing khams su'ang byon te bshad pa mdzad/ zhang gi brgyud pa rnams la bka' ma mchims phu ma'am man ngag brgyud par grags so// yang slob dpon pad+mas gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra la gsungs shing man ngag lta ba'i phreng bar grags pa'ang bstan/ gnyags kyis sog po dpal kyi ye shes la bshad cing/ de dang zhang gnyi gas gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po che la bshad do/ yab slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas gangs te ser dbas 'jam dpal dang/ bran ka muk+ti sogs la sgyu 'phrul lam rnam bkod sogs gsang snying gi skor rnams bshad/ de bzhin du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i lugs kyi bshad srol dang/ bi shwa mi tra'i 'grel pa rnams la brten pa'i nyan bshad dang sgrub pa'i srol ka dang/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor ku ku rA dza dang hU~M ka ra'i bka' srol gyi gzhung 'grel rnams dang o rgyan gyi rgyal po'i grub thob brgya byin sdong po'i mnyam sbyor 'grel chen sogs la brten pa'i 'chad nyan dang sgrub pa'i srol dar bar mdzad cing he ru ka dang rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i yi dam skal ldan gzhan rnams la bstsal pas btsan pos rta mgrin grub pas rta skad 'dzam gling khyab par thos pa sogs byung// gnyis pa sgrub sde'i skor la/ spyir gshed skor rnams ni slob dpon shAn+tiM gar+b+has bod du dar bar mdzad/ bdud rtsi'i skor slob dpon bi ma las gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra sogs la bstan cing dar ba yin la/ gzhan rnams ni phal cher slob dpon pad+ma kho nas dar zhing rgyas par mdzad do// bye brag tu btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis gsol ba btab pas dpal kyi mchims phu'i bre dgu dge 'ur skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i rje 'bangs

brgyad la sgrub sde chen po brgyad kyi phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i rim pa rnams rdzogs par mdzad cing so so'i me tog phog pa'i lha'i sgrub thabs dang man ngag gnang ba nyams su blangs pas lha so so'i zhal gzigs/ mnga' bdag btsan pos che mchog grub pas ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes shing sgom byung gi shes rab klong rdol bas bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma'i bstan bcod mdzad/ nam mkha'i snying pos yang dag grub cing nyi zer la bcibs/ sangs rgyas ye shes kyi 'jam dpal grub cing brag la phur ba thebs/ rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis dbang chen grub cing dbu gtsug nas rta mgo 'byin cing rta skad sgrogs/ mkhar chen bzas phur pa grub cing shi ba slong nus/ dpal gyi ye shes kyis ma mo grub pas ma tshogs las la khol/ dpal gyi seng ges mchod bstod grub pas sde brgyad mngag gzhug tu khol bai ro tsA na drags sngags grub pas ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan cing rdzu 'phrul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/ gzhan yang slob dpon chen pos dbang dang gdams ngag dang rjes su gdams pa las mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra/ cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan/ ska ba dpal brtsegs/ 'bre dpal gyi blo gos/ sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms/ 'bre rgyal ba'i blo gros/ rlang khams pa go cha/ gtsug ru rin chen gzhon nu/ rma rin chen mchog/ gnyan dpal dbyangs/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje la sogs nam mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro ba dang/ chu la byi'u zul gyis 'gro ba dang/ ri brag la mi thogs par 'dzul ba dang/ lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du skye bo mang po la ston nus pa dang/ lus de nyid kyis zung 'jug gi go 'phang brnyes pa sha stag byung zhing/ 'tshe rgyal dang 'brog bza' la sogs bud med grub pa thob pa'ang mang du byung ngo// sgrub sde phyi ma gsum la 'jig rten sde gsum zhes bod du slob dpon chen pos lha 'dre rnams dam la btags nas dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa kho na yin par 'dod kyang/ ma mo rbod gtong la dbyings dang ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro shas che zhing bka' nyan srid pa'i dman mo dang mkha' 'gro'i rigs su gtogs pa'ang du ma yod pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor yin cing/ 'di la 'jig rten gyi dman mo lnga bcu la sogs srid pa'i ma mo rnams bkod pa ni/ phyi snod 'jig rten dang/ nang rtsa thig rlung gsum/ gsang ba sems kyi 'byung 'jug dang rten 'brel las rgyud gsum dregs pa'i ma mo ltar snang ba'i rnam shes kyis bsdus pa rnams don du ma skyes kun tu bzang mo'i dbyings mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor las mi 'da' bar gdod nas gnas pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang thabs la mkhas par de ltar bstan pa yin te/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// stong pa nyid ni

mkhas pa yi// ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir// dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni// zhes gsungs shing/ de dang mthun par sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams su bkod pa'i ma mo'i nges pa yang/ de nyid las/ dbang po gshin rje ma chu mo// gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma// srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste// zhes pa dang/ ma dang chung ma srin mo dang// bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang// pha yi sring mo de dang ni// zhang po yi ni chung ma dang// chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni// de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma// chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang// ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang// ma yin spun zla'i bu mo dang/ rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang// spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo// pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang/ khu bo yi ni chung ma dang// bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang// slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang// rang pha'i sring mo'i bu mo dang// de nyid kyi ni rang rig skyes// spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang// bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang// bu mo'i khyo yi ma dang ni// bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang// bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad// pho nya sum cu drug rnams so// zhes dang/ yi dwags dmyal mos mnar med la// thig nag mo dang me mdag mo// tsha ba mo dang rab tsha mo// ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che// mar nag tu 'tshir ri gnyis 'tshir// zhes pa la sogs thugs kyi 'khor lor bkod pas mtshon/ 'jig rten 'khor ba'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa ni mnyam pa chen po'i don la spyod pa'i sngags kyi tha tshig ste/ dgyes rdor las/ 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya la// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa zhes// 'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol tu// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// zhes gsungs pa'i don la bsam dgos shing/ de bzhin du 'jig rten mchod bstod dang dmod pa drag sngags kyang sngon gyi tshe 'og min du dpal chen pos rU tra sogs gdul bya gdug pa can rnams la sbyor sgrol gyi phrin las rmad du byung ba'i chos bstan cing 'jig rten khams kyi gdug pa can rnams dus gcig tu btul/ rang rang gi srog gi snying po dang/ sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba dang/ las kyi tshogs dang/ cho ga'i rtog pa rnams blangs/ dkyil 'khor du bcug/ dbang bskur/ rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags/ lung bstan phog/ zas kyi pha 'bab byin/ las kyi gnyer gtad nas 'gro ba tha dad pa dang/ rigs dang/ skye gnas dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ spyod pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ tshul dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa dang/ tshig gi lam tha dad pa rnams tshul bzhin du mkhyen nas de dang de'i yul la 'tshams pa'i sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor bstan nas thun mong gi las tshogs dang dngos grub rnams sgrub pa'i phyir 'di tsam du ma zad 'jig rten pa'i sngags rgyud du ma gsungs pa

yod cing/ de dag rang ngos nas myang 'das kyi lam mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang byang chub sems kyis zin pas de la bstan pas sgo du mas sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa la ma rmongs par grub pas rnam mkhyen gyi rgyud grung por 'gyur ba la dgongs nas thams cad mkhyen pas bstan pa yin te gsang sngags thabs lam rmongs pa'ang 'di rigs su dgongs pa ma yin na gang la ngos 'dzin/ de ltar yang phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las kyang/ lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs sems can thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags kyi sgra smras pa'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang/ rlung chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du khas bub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgyel to// de'i tshe de dag rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang tshig ste thal bar gyur pa mthong ngo// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho yi// snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di// bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de dag byin gyis brlabs te lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad stsol zhig dang/ de bstan pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa dang/ lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal la smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing// nam mkha' lta bur chags med la// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa// gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang// de bzhin gsang sngags sgrub pa dang// brtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang gzugs// dus dang yul dang cho ga shod// de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rnams la byin gyis brlabs pas de rnams langs te/ kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid// kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab// des ni bdag cag thams cad kyang// mgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan/ sems zhi tshegs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su// cho

ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni dag dbul lo// zhes gsol te/ de nas 'khor gyi gnod sbyin dang/ sha za dang/ ma mo dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ srin po dang/ rig sngags 'chang ba dang/ mi'am ci dang/ dri za dang/ klu dang/ 'byung po dang/ sring mo bzhi la sogs pa rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po rnams phul te/ spyi dang bye brag gi sgrub thabs dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ cho ga'i rtog pa rnams gsungs so// de lta bu gdod nas grub pa'i rgyud gzhung du 'byung bzhin 'jig rten pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor yod pa'i gzhung de bod mar 'gyur ba'i rnam rtog 'di snga phyi kun tu byung bar mngon la/ slob dpon chen pos bod kyi ljaungs su lha 'dre de dag dam la yang skyor gyis tshul gyis btags shing gtso bo gtso bo rnams sngon smos pa'i cho ga de dag gis dkyil 'khor du bcug pa yod srid kyang de tsam gyis rgyud gzhung de bod kho na'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/ bya rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas gtsang gi lha rnams yod pas de kho na'i rgyud du mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i skor rnams ni/ mdo mkhan d+harma bo d+hi dang/ ba su d+ha ra dang/ bru sha'i slob dpon cha btsan skyes gsum kar gyis gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes la bshad de bod du byon pa yin no// rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga la sde gsum gyi dang po sems klong gi sde gnyis ni/ yul snye mo bye mkhar du 'khrungs pa'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa na btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis bskul ba bzhin 'jigs pa chen po brgyad sogs bzod du med du med pa'i dka' ba lnga phrag bcu las bdun gyis lhag pa khyad du bsad nas rgya gar gyi yul du brtol bar d+ha na ko sha'i tsan+dan bsil byed kyi nags su slob dpon shrI sid+has rdzu 'phrul gyis bkod pa'i ke'u tshang chen po dgu brtsegs dang nye bar sleb/ der chu len gyi rnal 'byor ma la phrin brdzangs kyang lan ma byung bar bai ros lta stangs mdzad pas chu snod sa la 'byar/ rnal 'byor mas rang gi brang phyes nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bstan cing des grogs byas te slob dpon dpal gyi seng ge dang mjal/ gser gyi man+Dal phul te rtsol med kyi theg pa gsung bar zhus pas brtag par bya gsungs/ nang par gsang ba'i rtsis rgya btab nas zab mo'i gnad rnams bstan par bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang shin tu ma gsang na rgyal po'i chad pas srog gi nyen du 'gyur bas nyin par pan+Di ta gzhan rnams las rgyu 'bras kyi chos nyon/ mtshan mo man ngag gi chos bstan par bya'o gsungs te gzhan gyis mi rtog pa'i thabs dang rten 'brel rnams mdzad/ slob dpon gyis mtshan mo man ngag sems sde bco brgyad rnams dar dkar po la ra dkar mo'i 'o mas bris shing bstan srung rnams la chad tho

blangs te shin tu gsang ba'i rgyas btab bo// da dung yang bai ro'i thugs ma tshim ste bzhugs pas rgyud sde drug cu'i dbang dang man ngag thams cad dang/ 'bras bu rang chas su ston pa klong gi sde dkar nag khra gsum rnams bstan pas chos thams cad kyi gting mthar phyin/ da dung ma tshim pa ltar mdzad pas slob dpon gyi zhal nas/ chos kyi dbyings la zad med kyang// de bzhin nyid ni gcig shes na// ma lus de la yongs su rdzogs// de las yod na sid+d+hi kan// ces gsungs nas/ gdams pa btsa' lugs gsum/ sbyin pa'i gnas bzhi/ mi sbyin pa'i gnas bzhi rnams gsungs/ du ba'i gnas kyi dur khrod chen por slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje dang yang mjal nas rdzogs pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i don brgyud thob cing de nyid du rtogs grol dus mnyam kyi dngos grub chen po mngon du brnyes so// 'di slob dpon gyi ye shes kyi sku yin kyang rung ste skye 'chi med pa'i zung 'jug gi skus mkha' khyab tu bzhugs pa'i phyir dus snga phyi sogs so skye ltar mi bsam ste mchog gzigs rnams kyi spyod yul yin pas so// de nas bai ros rkang mgyogs kyi grub pa la brten nas bod du byon nas btsan po la nyin mo rgyu 'bras thun mong ba dang/ mtshan mo rdzogs pa chen po lkog chos kho nar gsungs/ sems sde snga 'gyur lnga bsgyur/ de tshe rgya gar bas gdams ngag bod du shor ba la phrag dog gis bod rnams the tshom bskyed pa'i phra ma dang/ chos la gnag pa'i btsun mo dang blon po rnams kyi dbang las slob dpon tsha ba rong du byon dgos pa byung/ rgyal rong brag la mgon po'i dgon par g.yu sgra snying po rjes su bzung ba sogs 'gro ba rnams smin grol la bkod/ tsha rong stag rtse mkhar du gsang ston ye shes bla ma la rdzogs pa chen po'i skor rnams gsungs/ stong khung rong gi brag dmar dgon rdzong du spang rgan sangs rgyas mgon po la gsungs/ dbus su gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra dang li bza' shes rab sgron mar gsungs pa ste rim pa lngar grags shing/ phyi ma 'dis bai ro li yul du spyan drangs te/ mthar bal bo b+ha sing gi nags su zung 'jug gi skur gyur to// gnyags gyis sog po dpal gyi ye shes/ gra dpal gyi snying po/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje/ 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu sogs las rim bzhin brgyud pa gcig dang/ yang sog pos gnubs chen la brgyud pa'i lugs gcig dang/ yang rtsangs shwa ka rdor gyis spang rak+Shi ta/ ya zi dar ma shes rab/ zer mo dge slong/ mar pa shes rab 'od/ de nas zur sgro phug par brgyud de byung ba yin no// yang bai ro'i slob ma spang sangs rgyas mgon po'i slob rgyun las 'ja' lus grub pa sha stag byung ba ni/ spang rgan po'i slob ma ngan lam byang chub rgyal mtshan yin/ de ni yul dbu ru ngan lam ral gsum pa

dge slong lo drug cu rtsa bdun lon pa zhig gis rgyal mo stag rtse mkhar du byon/ spang mi pham mgon po la gdams pa zhus pas gnang ste da yul du ma 'gro/ wa seng ge brag la sgom gsungs/ slob dpon gyi bka' bzhin nyan te der byon nas bsgoms pas lo brgya dang bdun cu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i tshe phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de la slob ma zad dam rin chen dbyig bya ba mdo khams stod pa zhig byung/ des ngan lam la gdams pa zhus/ brag de nyid du bla ma dang 'bral ba med par sgom bzhin bzhugs pas/ lo brgya dang bzhi bcu zhe bzhi lon pa'i tshe phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de la yar klung 'phyos nas khu 'gyur gsal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i slob ma rten dge slong yin pa/ lo lnga bcu rtsa bdun lon pa gcig byung/ za dam rin chen gyis mdags ngag gnang bas yul du log pa'i bsam pa spangs/ wa seng ge brag nyid du bzhugs nas bsgoms pas khu 'gyur gsal lo brgya dang bcu bdun lon tshe/ phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de ltar slob dpon gsum ka wa seng ge brag ces bya bar sbrul gy-i lo gcig par gcig rting la gcig sku na bun nam 'jam tshon yal ba bzhin du gshegs so// de la slob ma byang chub grags zhes bya ba// yul nyang g.yu 'brug stod pa rten dge slong lo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa zhig byung/ khu 'gyur gsal ba la gdams pa zhus nas yar log/ bsam yas mchims phur sgom gyin bzhugs tsa na/ dbu du zhwa'i nyang shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dge slong bgres po gcig bzhugs 'dug pa dang mjal/ khong na re/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo nga rgan yang gdams pa khyed che bar 'dug/ rjes su gzung bar 'tshal zhus pas/ nyang byang chub grags kyis khong la gdams pa rnams byin/ phug po che dang yang rdzong du bzhugs/ rang gi slob ma dang yang slob dag la 'byung bzhi zad par gyi sprul bsgyur bstan/ mthar rang nyid gtsang rgyam nye du kha'i phung po ri bo che la da lta rang 'dug pa'i 'phro la ri zur na yar sku lus sprin chad pa bzhin du phung po lhag med du gshegs so// der nyang shes rab 'byung gnas kyis mchims phu dpal gyi nags khrod/ sgrags kyi yang rdzong/ phug po che rnams su bzhugs/ der rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa mngon du shar nas/ phug po che lha ri'i rtse mo la yod pa'i shug pa rkang gcig par na bza' dang/ phreng ba dang/ ka pA li rnams gzar nas/ sku nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon dengs pa bzhin song ngo// de la slob ma yul lo mo ba/ rus sba yin pa gcig byung bas slob dpon sba sgom du grags/ de rang gi yul na yod pa'i tshe 'khrug pa yod pas/ yum na re/ bu 'di sring mo drug gi ming gcig po yin/ slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas la 'chol/ ma shi ba rang gis cho ga

zer lo bcu drug pa gcig nyang la bcol nas yod tsa na/ sngar gyi nyang byang chub grags pa de phug po che dang/ yang rdzong dang/ mchims phu rnams su sha pa gcig khrid nas byon pas/ nyang sha ba can zhes kyang grags/ phug po cher phyi ma'i res byon tsa na/ ngas khyod gnyis la ltas mo gcig bstan gyi ltos shig gsungs/ der slob dpon shes 'byung dang/ sba sgom gnyis kyis g.yas g.yon nas bltas tsa/ slob dpon dbus na yod pa de mi snang bar song/ der ngo mtshar skyes nas yod tsa na/ rlung 'tshub khru gang ba gcig tu gyur nas phar bskyil tshur bskyil byas/ de mer song/ de'ang chu gtor gtong ba'i 'khar gzhong gcig tu 'phos nas chur ltem gyis song/ des tshub cig gi ngang la slob dpon rang du krong gis song/ de ltar 'byung bzhi zad par gyi skye mched la dbang bsgyur nas 'di skad du/ 'byung ba'i snyigs ma dwangs nas dwangs ma ma yal ba'i bar du de ltar 'ong ba yin/ shes rab kyis sgom rgyu med pa'i don mthong yang/ brda' la yengs pa med par bskyangs na de ltar du rang dbang thob pa la tshegs med/ ma yengs par skyong ba gal che ba yin gsungs/ de nas re zhig na sba sgom gyis bal bu'i nag la shing 'thu bar phyin pas/ khong rang gi 'jag spyil me dmar bun bun 'dug pa mthong/ slob dpon ni me mi 'bud me shor ba yin nam snyam bltar phyin pas/ 'jag spyil sngar bzhin las me mi snang/ slob dpon la de ci tsug yin dris pas/ ngas me'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ nga'i bla ma nyang byang chub grags pa'i de mi dran nam gsungs/ yang skabs shig slob dpon gyi bzhugs sar chu ltem me 'dug pa mthong/ mthar slob dpon gyis/ nga mi 'dug na lha ri'i rtse mo la ltos shig gsungs/ re zhig na slob dpon ma byung nas ri la skyo sangs la bzhud pa yin gyi sang dgongs 'byon du 'ong snyam tsa na yang ma byon/ bltar phyin tsa na/ dbu zhwa dang/ bo d+hi tse'i 'phreng ba la sogs pa shugs pa la gzar/ slob dpon phung po lhag med du gshegs so// 'di ni rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po la nam mkha' dang/ mkha' 'gro'i 'chi lugs/ me dpung dang rig 'dzin gyi 'chi lugs zhes pa'i ya gyal gcig yin no// sba sgom lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi lon tsa na nyang shes 'byung gis gdams pa btab pa yin// sba sgom 'di rten dge bsnyen du bzhugs/ mtshan ye shes byang chub du grags/ rtogs pa khyad par can mnga'/ rdo la 'dam rdzab ltar mdzad/ brag la sku'i par 'debs/ dgung lo dgu bcu rtsa brgyad lon pa'i tshe sku snyun pa med par gshegs/ jo mo gang mos phyi rol gyi mi rnams la pur mjal ma btang bar mchod khang du pur me la sbyangs pas/ 'od rdza ma tsam zhig nam mkha' la 'gro ba phyi rol gyi mi kun gyis mthong/ shul du gdung

rus gcig kyang ma byung ngo// de'i slob ma ni 'dzeng ste/ yum mtshar dgu skyid de zhes bya ba yar klung thang chung ba'i ma jo yin/ thang chung btsad po'i bu che bas phab nas 'dzeng 'khrungs/ lo bcu drug lon pa'i dus/ 'grul zla kha shas dang bcas dol gyi gdong snar tshang la phyin tsa na/ dol gyi 'tsher chung na mi mang po spungs 'dug bltar phyin pas dam pa rgya gar dang mjal/ zla ba bcu bzhir dam pa'i phyags phyir 'brangs/ gtsang gi gnas gzhi bzangs can du sleb tsa na/ dam pas snam bu gcig gnang nas/ khong dang thung 'dug pas khyod rang yul du log/ dgas po nas kham bu khyer la shog/ dol du 'gro ba'i zla bor 'dug go gsungs/ der 'dzeng gis lam du zhugs pa na/ dam pa tshur breng gis byon/ 'dzeng gis bden pa gnyis la 'jus te/ ci yang ma yin gnas gyur pa// gnas gyur pa la gnyis 'dzin med// ces gsungs na mgo thug lan gnyis brgyab pas/ sems had de ba la shes pa bkra gsal ba zhig byung/ kha nang na chu khyil le snang/ de ni dam pas byin gyis brlabs/ rdo rje zam pa dang mjal ba'i lung bstan par 'dug ste/ dus phyis las ma go gsungs/ dam pas brten 'brel 'ga' tsam dang/ sngags kyi gnad mang du gnang/ rgyang ru tshal mar yi ge drug pa'i gdams ngag gnang nas bsgrub pas byin rlabs chen po byung/ yang chu bo chen po 'di'i shar phyogs na tsan dan gyi nags yod/ de na khyod kyi bla ma yod gsungs nas lung bstan/ de nas dbus su byon/ a khu dpal 'bal la khrag 'thung dang be har/ gnubs shangs po che la kr-i ya dang kha 'bar ma'i gtor chen zhus/ khong gis gtsang du ba ri ba la 'bul ba skyel du btang bas/ ba ri la'ang 'jam dpal dang khyung sgrub zhus/ dge bshes spo la snga 'gyur rigs zhus/ de nas sum cu rtsa lnga lon pa'i tshe ngam shod rgyud lcang tshigs su byon/ phug po che'i la kha na dge bshes btsan kha bo che rgya gar nas byon ma thag pa gcig jo mo bas spyan drangs nas/ chos dang bza' ba dang ltas mo yod zer/ nang par snga bar byon tsa na/ bud med gcig na re/ khrab nas lam zur 'di nas yar phyin na/ slob dpon sba sgom bya ba lto ster ba la yangs pa zhig yod zer/ phyin pas rnal 'byor pa tsho gcig gis kyang sleb nas tsha ba drangs/ phye zangs kyi khyem bu re yang gtong gi 'dug/ de tshor byin zin nas/ de na gsar bu gcig kyang 'dug gsungs nas chu bum pa gang len du bcug/ chu gtor mdzad nas phug chung zu rar khrid/ tshod ma ge ru pho pa gang byin/ de nub kyang bza' byin nas brag rtsa gcig tu nyal/ nang par 'gro dgos sems tsa na/ yang lto byin nas nga'i nye gnas btsun chung gcig yod pa zo thang du gser len du song ba char ches pas ma byung/ shing gcig thus gsungs/

der nags khrod nas shing khur che ba gcig bskyal bas/ sba sgom mnyes nas phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag dang/ rdzogs pa chen po skor bdun rang chas bya ba bshad/ der nyer gnas kyang byung/ nged ma sleb pas slob dpon 'og brgyal sems tsa na khyed kyi go bcad 'dug pa da dung zhag 'ga' tsam bzhugs zer/ yang yar klung lan cig bskor nas byung/ der sba sgom gang zag khyad par can du shes nas yul du ma phyin par 'on dang zangs ri yan chad du bsod snyoms byas/ sgye gcig nyos/ nas sgye gang dang bcas pa slob dpon sba sgom la phul bas/ khyod kyis nga'i g.yog byas pa yin pas des rung/ 'di la khyod rang gi rgyags gyis/ nga la man ngag rdo rje zam pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma'i don rtogs nas tshe gcig lus gcig la phung po lhag med du sangs rgyas pa'i brgyud pa breng ma chad pa gcig yod/ da gong phan chad su la'ang ma smras pa yin/ da khyod la sbyin no gsungs/ nas nan gyis phul nas 'di slob dpon rang la bsngos pa yin/ gdams ngag thugs la gdags par zhu/ rgyags rnyed de 'ong byas pas/ phyag g.yon pas sbyi bo nas bzung g.yas pas ltag khung nas rtab rtab byed cing/ 'or che dam tshig can du 'dug/ gdams ngag gis phan thog par gda' gsungs/ der lo chung gi sngags pa gcig la gshin rje dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhig byin pas/ sran nas khal brgyad byung/ lo mo dang 'phrun du bsrung skyob zhar re tsam byas pa chos rgyags ldang ba rnyed/ der rdo rje zam pa'i byin rlabs zhu ba la tshogs kyi yo byad ma tshogs pa'i ngang/ slob dpon gyis/ byin rlabs da lta bya/ phyi nas bar chad 'ong gsungs/ gangs par du grogs po gcig la pir mo gcig bcol ba'i rin slong du phyin pas/ ma jo'i sham thabs zhig thob/ de'i snam pa tsho phral nas btsongs/ chang phud dang/ gtor ma dang/ nas bre lnga sha gzugs gcig rnams la bsten nas/ mar me'i dod nyin par bya'o gsungs nas grol lam dbang bzhi rdzogs par bskur/ gdams ngag ma lus pa gnang/ phyi nas kyang byin brlabs lan bzhi tsam zhus/ nas dang gser la sogs pa'i 'bul ba lan lnga bskyal/ re zhig na/ snang ba 'di kun rdzun pa'i chos can yin gsungs nas/ chu rdo gcig la phyag char gyis brgyab pas grub mo yan chad thim gyis song/ yang sku lus phyir shigs kyi mdzad pas brag la 'dal gyis thal nas rjes wal le byung/ phug chung rong nas lta stangs kyis shug pa'i gdung mang po bkug/ jo mo'i mchod khang phug pa'i shing yin gsungs/ de lta bu'i slob dpon las rdo rje zam pa'i skor ma lus pa thob cing gzhan yang jo bo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam brkyang khug sogs kyang thob/ de bzhin du yu mo la sbyor drug/ khams pa lung pa la thun brgyad ma/ sne'u zur pa'i

slob ma la dmigs pa skor gsum/ shod bu lo tswa ba la 'grel chung/ dge bshes dgrol sgom la nA ro'i thabs lam zhus shing/ rdo rje zam pa phar la bshad/ so snyun gdangs la sgron sprul dang rgyab sha/ rdza bor ba la bdud rtsi thigs gsum/ ri khrod rlung chung la rna brgyud tshig gsum/ rlung ngam chen po la do ha'i man ngag/ lab sgron la gcod yul/ rgyal ba sbo ston la sde skor bdun pa/ gnubs shangs chen la ba ri pa'i kr-i la'i chos bco lnga/ ding ri kun dga' la gdams pa sna tshogs sogs thos pa shin tu mang/ dwags po lha rje la chos drug dang skyes sbyor zhus/ rtogs pa nyams bsdur bas shin tu mnyes/ spyan snga rnal 'byor gyi gra sa ru spyod pa byas pas brtul zhugs can du grags/ grogs mched kyang a tsa ra stag sham can dang/ bla ma dbu 'dren pa dang/ bla ma thud kha 'bar/ bla ma drod 'byor/ zhang 'gro smyon la sogs de tsa na'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang po sha stag dang 'grogs/ gtsang du gcer bu lo lnga byas/ gzhan yang snang ba la thog rdzis shin tu che bas dgun 'khyags pa'i rum/ dbyar chu bo'i gzhung/ ma nges pa'i g.yang rong zab mor mchong ba dang/ mgo brdeb pa dang/ mtshon brdeg pa la sogs te spyod pa tshan po che ma byas bya ba med pas dpa' bo 'dzeng chung du grags/ so mang btsan la phyag rgya chen po btab pas 'khrul snang ye shes su gnas gyur/ ri khrod rlung chung pa dang/ dngul mo rgya le lcam la yi ge bzhi pa dang rdzogs chen btab pas 'khrul zhig chen por gyur te mthar phung po lhag med du dengs/ de bzhin du ma jo dad pa can dang/ khams pa snying rus can zhig la rdo rje zam pa bstan pas ma jo mon kha zer mo'i mtsho dang/ khams pa kong po mtsho rdzong du nam mkha' dang mkha' 'gro'i 'chi lugs kyis phung po lhag med du song/ ras pa sgom stag sho ras/ rgya ras/ rlung ras sogs la gdams pa btab pa tsam gyis bde drod 'bar/ de bzhin du chos nyid bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs grol du song ba shin tu mang/ 'dzeng d+harmA bo d+hi nyid kyis gsungs nas kyang/ nga'i gam du lo tsA ba yang bzhi tsam byung/ rab byung dang/ ston chen dang/ sgom pa sgom ma yus po che rang mthong can mang zhig byung/ tshul bzhin nyams su len pa a cang che ste/ dwags por nyams len en re byed pa'i nya ma bcu gcig tsam dang por 'chi dus thebs pa/ 'chi khar gnad gcod med pa/ ro la 'ja' zug pa byung ba yin/ nga'i gdams pa 'di la bal ma bal las byed pa dang/ pha ma sri'u gso ba 'dra ba'i nyams len lo lnga drug gcig byas na/ phung po lhag med du song nas shul du mi'i lus po mi yong nges gsungs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa rgya mtsho lta bu la dbang 'byor bas re sku lus 'ja' ru 'khyil/ res zhabs sa la mi reg par gshegs/ snang sems ro

gcig tu 'dres pas thag ring po'i sa yang yud tsam la 'khor/ gzhan sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thogs med mnga' bas ma 'ongs pa thams cad lung ston/ lha'i mig dag pas jo sras ma rdo rje skyid kyi bu nam phyed na gnyid log pa rgya mthongs nas mar rbab tu 'chor la khad pa gzigs/ snang ba la nyin mtshan med pas nub mo sbur ma'i khrod du rgya khab ltung ba bde blag tu gzigs pa sogs yod/ phyi res gtsang du lo bdun bzhugs nas slar phug po cher byon pas/ slob dpon sba sgom gyis/ nam mkha' 'di khong du chud par gyis/ de rten med du rtogs nas sgom med kyi gzar chen thebs pa yin gsungs pas nges shes gting nas 'drongs/ de nas dwags po zhu ru bzhugs shing bla ma zhal gdams la gu ru zhi ba sde skor mdun pa'i gdams pa zhus/ de'i lta zur dgon par brda' bzhi lo gsum bskyangs pas chos thams cad la byan tshud/ spros bral gyi dgongs pa nam mkha' lta bur song/ lar dka' thub la shin tu bzod pas/ phug po cher rdo rje zam pa zhus nas bdud rtsi'i dka' thub mdzad/ rims kyis rdzi bar ma nus/ gnubs shong po che'i drung du bla ma'i bran gyi dka' thub byas par gar phyin du bla mas thugs la 'dogs/ dam pa rgya gar gyi drung du rtog dpyod kyi dka' thub byas pas chos thams cad la rang byan tshud/ skyid khung du phur pa'i bzlas pa la dka' thub byas pas 'jig rten gyi lha 'dres ci smras nyan/ jo bo bka' gdams pa'i sa ru zhi dul gyi dka' thub byas pas gar phyin du gzhan gyis byams/ yi ge bzhi la mi sdod pa gsum gyi dka' thub byas pa bde drod 'bar nas gcer bu lo lnga byas/ de la nges shes skyes nas phag mo mngon 'byung la sgrub pa'i dka' thub byas pas 'gur mo'i nub phyogs su rje btsun mi'i zhal gzigs/ brda' mang po gnang/ gnubs yul rong du rmi lam sbyangs pas snang ba thams cad rmi lam du shes/ gzho stod ti sgro'i shel phug tu khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i zhal mthong/ mi ma yin cig gis bsnyen bkur cher byas/ btsun gzugs gcig nam mkha' la 'phur nas phar 'gro tshur 'gro byed pa mthong/ btsal bas ma rnyed mi yin min ma shes gsungs/ dwags po zhu ru a dzi bsgrubs pas nyi ma dro khar zhal gzigs/ dam bsre byed snyam tsa na jo mo phya le byon nas/ bud med can zer nas 'od cig tu yal/ lha zur du bcud len gyi sgrub pa byas pa tshe dpag med zhal mthong/ chos mang po'i rnam gzhag rgyud la shar/ o dkar brag tu sgrub pa mdzad pas bde mchog yab yum zhal gzigs/ lan cig 'gro snying 'dod pa zhig byung nas/ mor 'gar grong mo che'i mdun du byon/ chu'i rdzing mo zhig la thub chod byas mchongs pas/ 'khyags pa chag nas chur bying/ skyengs pa'i rnam rtog

cing shar tsa na/ chu la rlangs pa nam mkha' mi mthong ba tsam byung/ mi rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas dgun grang bdo ba la de tsam tshugs pa/ lcags bsregs chu la btsud pa 'dra ba byung zer/ rang la 'khyags pa'i snang ba ni byung gsungs/ yang lan cig jo mo dang gnyis kyis shing 'thur phyin pas shing khur che ba gcig rnyed/ de khur nas mtha' chen po gcig gi khar sleb pa dang/ 'di ni rmi lam du 'dug snyam nas mchongs pas bya babs pa bzhin du song/ jo mo na re bla ma khyed mi'ang cig mi 'dug/ dam pa rgya gar dran zer/ de yan du gdams pa mang du ma 'phel/ grong chog mdzad cing gsang spyod bskyangs/ de nas thag ring nas slob ma mang du byung nas 'phel/ re zhig na bal bu dor las spyan drangs/ gdams ngag gsungs pas/ nyi ma snga dro dang po la 'ja'i gdugs dang re mig mang po byung/ chos thon nas ri logs la skyo sangs la byon/ 'ja' de bla ma grongs pa'i rtags mi dga' ba min nam zhus pas/ nga'i bla ma sba sgom gyis 'bar ston shes rab grags spun gnyis la gdams pa 'di gnang ba'i dus kyang/ ngams shod lung pa dang/ phug po che'i ri logs khengs pa tsam byung ba yin/ gdams pa 'di la rtags 'di 'ong gsungs/ yang bla ma 'di 'dzin na bzhugs pa'i dus su slob ma jo sras 'dzeng gi drung du byon pas/ mchod rten rtsa ba'i gad rtsa gcig na bzhugs 'dug/ de nas dben khang du phyin tsa na bla ma 'dzeng ni ma mthong/ 'od phub tsam zhig 'dug/ rtsar nya tsa na 'od de mi 'dug nas de tsug lags zhus pas/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i rtags yin mi la ma smra gsungs/ yang a jo dngos grub la mdze byung bas/ ngas bzlas grogs byas mdze ni ma sos/ ngas phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong dgod bro gsungs/ de ltar chos tshul gzhan la grags pa'i ro snyoms dang/ chos drug dang/ gcod yul dang/ rim pa lnga la sogs pa'i gdams pa'i don gyi thob bya gang yin pa nyams 'og tu chud pa'i 'dzeng sgom d+harmA bo d+hi 'di dgung lo brgya dang gnyis lon pa'i dus zhig snyun pa ltar bstan pas/ 'khor rnams kyis bla ma grongs kyi dogs tsa na/ zhal nas mdang rmi lam bzang/ nga mi 'chi rgya'i po ra'i steng na 'dug pa la nyi zla gnyis shar byung/ rus pa'i spyil po mang po'i steng na bud med mang po 'dug pas/ bla ma 'dzeng khyod lo bzhi na shog zer ba gcig rmis gsungs/ yang re zhig na/ ngas lo mang po lon te nga la'ang tig pa bshad rgyu med gsungs/ de ni rtog dpyod la 'dzin pa dag pas nang du dgongs pa zad sar 'khyol ba'i rtags yin no// der 'khor rnams kyis dge rtsa gcig mdzad par zhus pas/ 'dus byas kyi dge rtsa la thugs mi gtod/ bcud len cig mdzad par zhus pas kyang/ bcud len byas na lo bcu tsam

tshe bsring nus te/ dus ngan gyi tshe ring ba la dgos pa med gsungs/ gzhan la skyo ba yang dag bskul nas sku gshegs so// pur sbyangs pas nam mkha' 'jas gang/ mchod rten dang ring bsrel yang mang du byon don/ 'di ni tshogs pa bskyangs pas snyigs ma 'ja' lus su ma dengs kyang/ don gyi ka dag chos zad kyi sa la mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtags mtha' dag tshang zhing snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i dar rgyas kyang 'di'i ring nas che bar byung ste dngos kyi slob ma yang/ slob dpon kun bzang dang/ 'dzeng jo sras dang/ btsan thang pa nyang d+harma sid+ha dang/ slob dpon gser lung pa dang/ bla ma du rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ gzig ye shes dbang po dang/ g.yag ston zla ba 'od zer la sogs mang du byon no// dgung lo yang brgya dang bcu bdun lon tshe gshegs pa yin/ 'di jo 'brom dang/ phya pa chos kyi seng ge dang/ rje btsun mi la dpon slob dang snga phyir thog mnyam pa tsam yin no// de la 'dzes jo sras ni/ sngags pa'i rigs la btsas pas chung ngu nas yig rtses la sbyangs/ 'ol kha'i lha bris pa la sgyu 'phrul la sogs rnying ma dang/ dgyes rdor dang mtshan brjod zhus/ slob dpon lha ris pa 'da' khar gzhung chen po 'di tsam zhig shes kyang 'chi khar pa a ro thun bdun las ma byung/ khyod rang kyang gzhung ma bslabs par gdams ngag la nan tan gyis/ dwags po na khyed rang gi bla ma 'dzeng bya ba gcig yod 'dug pas der song zhes lung bstan/ gang bar du rdzogs chen lhun grub mkhan slob dpon zem gyi sar dbyar dgun thog drug bsdad kyang thugs la ma btags/ gdams ngag gi spros pa ma chod nas slob dpon 'dzeng la dpal lung du rdo rje zam pa tshar gsum zhus/ byin rlabs mdzad nas/ khyed rang re zhig gtsang du song la gzhung slob/ gtsang nas 'khor tsa na a mis dgon pa gcig tu sdod cig gsungs/ der gdams pa mi gnang ba dgongs nas/ gzhan su shes dris pas/ gra phyi'i jo sras zhang la skyabs bya bas shes gsungs/ de la zhu bar sems tsa na khong grongs/ yang dwags po rang du log nas 'dzeng la zhus pas kyang ma gnang/ slob ma gcig la zhu bsams nas/ sho skyam du slob dpon ngu'i spyan sngar phyin tsa na/ re ba tsam bcos nas 'dis mi 'ongs da dung dwags por song la zhus gsungs/ yang dwags por byon nas zhus pas/ cis kyang 'dod na gdams pa la nan tan byed dgos pa yin gsungs nas rdzogs par gnang/ dbyar dgun thog 'ga' slob dpon gyi drung du bsdad/ lo drug tsam lon nas phran tshegs rnams kyang rdzogs/ gzhan la byin rlab mdzad pa'i las slob kyang byas/ thod pa'i slob ma rog po dga' dang/ ma jo bzlo ba la sogs pa lnga bcu tsam gyis rdo rje

zam pa zhus pas jo sras kyis shod/ khyed tshos nyon gsungs nas slob dpon gyi khri kha nas gsungs/ dpon slob gnyis lo ngo bco brgyad tsam du 'grogs/ gdams ngag gi bka' phog nas brgyud 'dzin bskos so// de ltar 'dzeng d+harma bo d+hi dang/ jo sras 'dzeng chung smyon pa gnyi ga'i slob ma slob dpon kun bzang yin te/ de ni khu bo pha jo dbus pa phag mo gru pa'i slob ma sgom chen po zhig yin/ ma zi bza' des chog bya ba ma jo smyon ma bsam 'grub bya ba la chos thob pa gnyis ka la rmi lam gyi ltas bzang po dang bcas te 'khrungs/ lo brgyad dgu la slob dpon kor ston rA dza las slob gnyer cung zad byas/ bco lnga lon pa'i tshe khong grongs nas slob dpon du ba'i gam du lo lnga tsam zhi byed zhu zhing bsdad nas zhabs tog 'grub tshad byas/ gser lung dgon par slob dpon du dang 'jal ba'i tshe/ bco lnga'i zla ba'i rum na skar ma gnyis thim pa rmis/ 'dzeng chen po la rdo rje zam pa tshar gcig zhus/ de nas 'dzeng jo sras spung ring du spyan drangs nas rdo rje zam pa tshar bdun zhus/ dwags por dgun thog bzhi phyin/ rdo rje zam pa tshar phyed pa gcig dang bcu bzhi thob/ jo sras dang lo brgyad 'grogs nas rdo rje zam pa tshar bdun zhus/ phyi nas sho ru tshar gnyis/ gser lung du tshar gcig/ gzhan la gsung 'phror mjal ba dang dril bas 'dzes mes dbon gnyis la rdo rje zam pa tshar sum cu rtsa lnga thob/ gnyis ka'i gdams pa bka' babs nas gzhung bshad che chung gnyis kyang mdzad do// 'di la sras sprul sku 'od 'bar seng ge bya ba byung/ de ni blo rno ba/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste/ lo bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje zam pa gsungs/ des brgyud 'dzin jo mgon la gnang/ des bya med tshul rin la gnang ngo// yang 'dzeng gis yar klungs btsan thang pa nyang d+harmA sid+ha la rdo rje zam pa bshad pas byin rlab bzhugs/ rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ dur khrod dgon par bzhugs te 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad/ mthar dgung lo don bdun pa la gshegs/ 'di nas brgyud pa'i gzhung bshad kyang yod do// de'i slob ma badzra pA ni/ de'i slob ma bla ma lha'o// yang 'dzeng gis gser lung pa la bshad/ des slob dpon rang grol/ des sras po chos rin la bshad do// yang 'dzeng gis du rdo rje rgyal mtshan la bshad/ des ngu ston dad pa brtson 'grus/ de'i slob ma zhig gis byas pa'i gzhung bshad kyang yod/ yang 'dzeng gis gzig ye shes dbang po// des mkhan po la kha pa/ des slob dpon mgon skya ba/ des slob dpon go ri ba/ des so ston la bshad de so ston gyi gzhung bshad kyang snang ngo// yang 'dzeng gis spung ring pa g.yag ston zla ba 'od zer/ des klog ston dge 'dun skyabs/ 'di nas brgyud pa'i

gzhung bshad kyang yod/ yang spung ring g.yag ston gyis lo brgya la nye ba thub/ des 'on nag stod pa gla ru ban de la bshad nas kyang dar/ yang 'dzeng gis skye tshe ye shes dbang phyug la bshad/ des gzigs ye shes dbang po/ des mkhan chen ngur pa/ des du ston badzre shwa ra/ des mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ des mkhan chen gzhon nu shes rab/ de slob dpon gzhon du grags pa/ des mkhan chen sangs rgyas bzang po/ des bla ma brtson 'grus dbang phyug/ des mtha' bzhi grags pa rin chen/ des slob dpon shwakya rgyal po/ 'di sku gzhon nu'i tshe khrab la khar rab tu byung/ lo dus la bsnyen par rdzogs/ mdzod dang 'dul ba la byang bas skyor lung du gra skor mdzad/ thugs dam 'phel bar bzhugs pa la/ sku na ha cang mtho bas spyan mi gsal yang/ gzhan gyis spyan tshab byas te rjes su brjod nas gsung ba sogs thugs bskyed shin tu che/ dgung lo brgyar nye bar bzhugs nas gshegs pa'i rjes thugs las ring bsrel zad pa med par 'byon pa byung/ 'dis 'gos lo gzhon nu dpal la gsungs pa yin no// rdo rje zam pa'i lo rgyus bshad zin to//// gsum pa man ngag sde'i mchog tu zab pa snying thig gi skor rnams slob dpon chen po bi ma la mi tra dgung lo nyis brgyar nye ba na bod du rgyal pos bstan pa btsugs pa'i skabs su gyur cing/ der nyang ting 'dzin bzang po bya ba ting nge 'dzin thun gcig gis lo bdun du mi g.yo zhing sha'i spyan gyis gling bzhi cig car du gzigs pa zhig bzhugs pas lung bstan cing bskul bas btsan pos lo tswa ska cog gnyis gser gyi skyes dang bcas pa spyan 'dren du brdzangs pas gdul bya'i dus la bab par gzigs te byon par rgya gar bas phrag dog gis dbyen bcos pas bod rnams the tshom par ngo mtshar ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dad par mdzad/ rgyu 'bras kyi chos spyi dang/ bye brag g.yu sgras lo tsA byas te sems sde phyi 'gyur bcu gsum bsgyur/ shin tu zab pa'i man ngag snying thig ni btsan po dang nyang ting 'dzin bzang po gnyis la lkog tu gsungs pa las gzhan snod du rung ba ma gzigs nas dpe rnams bod yig mdzad nas mchims phu'i dge gong du sbas/ slob dpon 'di lo bcu gsum bod du bzhugs nas phyis rgya nag ri bo rtse lnga gshegs/ thub pa'i bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar sku lus de nyid kyis bzhugs shing lo brgya brgya na ljongs 'dir sprul pa re byon nas snying thig gi bstan pa gsal bar mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes so// bi ma la rgya nag tu gshegs nas lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga nas nyang ting 'dzin bzang po zag pa zad pa'i phung por gyur/ rdo rje legs pas khams su ser ba phab pa'i nas rnga mo'i rgyab brgya phul ba la brten

nas dbu ru zhwa'i lha khang bzhengs/ gdams pa'i dpe rnams de nyid kyi ke'u tshang rim gsum gyi sgo'i ka ba'i khong du sbas/ snyan brgyud rnams 'bro rin chen 'bar ba la bshad/ de lha sa brag lha'i phug tu 'ja' lus su yal lo// nyang ban chen po 'od du dengs nas lo brgyad lon cing nyang mi dar ma dang dus mtshung par dbu ru gzhol ma dge mchog gi bu gnas brtan ldang ma ba lhun grub rgyal mtshan ces bya ba/ ngo bo bi ma la'i sprul par grags kyang rnam par shes pa lkog tu gyur pa rnams la gnas brtan dkyus ma'i ngang tshul du snang ba gcig la rdo rje legs pas lung bstan nas snga sbas pa'i gter rngams phyung/ dbas blo gros la tshig rgyud kyang mnyan nas chos nyid yid dpyod du ma lus par nyams su blangs/ man ngag rnyed nas bco lnga pa la bshad/ rgyud bzhag pa'i snod 'tshol du byon pa na/ nyang stod nas lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug ces bya ba rnyed/ de la gdams pa rim pa bdun du btab/ de dang nye bar kha rag sgom chung la'ang btab pas khong yang des grol/ lce btsun la dpe rnams dag par bris la khra'i zla ba la skyol cig gsungs/ phyis zhig lce btsun gyis 'bul ba shin tu mang po dang bcas byon pas snye thang du mal dro'i nyang bka' gdams pa bya ba dang 'phrad/ des ldang ma gshegs pa'i gtam bshad pas/ 'bul ba rnams gnas gzhi gcig 'dug pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul/ nyang bka' gdams pa na re/ ldang ma de gnas brtan yin pa tsam las gang zag bzang por sngar sus kyang ma rig/ sku gshegs pa'i dus nam mkha' 'jas khengs/ sku gdung dang ring bsrel dpag tu med pa byon pas thams cad ngo mtshar zhig 'gyod pa skyes gda'/ khyed kyang 'bul ba 'di tsam 'khyer lugs gyis gdams ngag khyad par can yod mchi bas bdag la stsol zhig zhus pas gdams pa byin/ des gzho'i ti sgro brag la lo gnyis bsgoms pas phung po lhag med du song ba yin no// de la lce btsun chen po ni/ yul nyang ro gnyan tsho'i lce thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i bu gzhon nu nas chos mang po la thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa zhig yin/ gnas brtan ldang ma ba dang ri gzar rgod po lung du mjal/ kha rag tu gdams pa gsung pa'i dus btab ste rdzogs par thob/ slob dpon gshegs nas gter dpe rnying pa rnams lang gro 'chad pa stag 'dra'i chu mig gi rtsa dang/ 'u yug dang/ jal gyi phu ste gter kha gsum du sbas/ 'u yug nas shangs man chod kyi ri rgyud rnams la 'pho zhing bsgoms pa'i tshe/ rmi lam na a tsa ra gcig byung nas/ bdag ni bi ma mi tra mkhas pa ste// skal ldan snying po'i yang bcud don 'dod na// mchims phu brag dmar dge gong yang 'debs la// gsang ba snying tig

snying dang 'dra ba yod// de dag khyer la 'u yug phyi gong du// sus kyang mthong ba med pa lo bdun sgoms// zag bcas phung po snang ba ma yin no// zhes gsungs pa thos nas mchims phur byon/ bud med dung so 'khor ma g.yu'i smin ma can zhig gis dpe rnams byin// slar 'o yug phyi gong rdza'i ra bar bzhugs pas bi ma la dngos su byon/ zla ba phyed du dbang khrid gdams pa rdzogs par gnang nas slob dpon bi ma la rgya nag tu gshegs/ de nas lce btsun gyis lo bdun bsgoms pas phung po lhag med grub/ sprul pa'i sku zhang ston la gdams ngag rdzogs par byin nas/ lo brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga na nam mkha' la 'ja' 'od kyi phung po gcig tu gshegs so// gter sbas pa'i lo sum cu na rong snar mda' lce sgom nag pos kha shas bton nas rang nyams su longs shig/ gzhan mang po la'ang bshad/ de bzhin du lang gro 'chad pa ltag nas shangs pa ras pa zhes bya bas kyang bton nas dar rgyas byung zhes grags/ de la zhang ston ni/ yul yar 'brog do nang du 'khrungs/ mtshan bkra shis rdo rje zhes bya ste/ lo bcu gcig par bla ma lce sgom la gdam pa mang du zhus/ de nas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar mkhas grub kyi bla ma mang du bsten nas/ sde snod gsum dang/ rgyud sde gsar rnying gi phyogs thams cad la sbyangs pas mkhyen rab kyi pad+mo rgyas/ nyang stod khu yul na yod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha' las bla ma dang/ thugs rje chen po/ sgrol ma la sogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing lung bstan thob/ rdo rje legs pa mi dkar zhwa dkar can du byas pas dngos grub byin gyi 'dong zer nas khrid/ nyang smad pa tshab tu lha gsol ba mang pos bza' btung byin pa dngos grub de la zer ram snyam tsa na/ mi dkar des dngos grub gzhan du yod kyi 'dong zer 'od kyi lam sna byas nas byon/ khang stong gcig tu nyal bas 'dir mi rung zer/ brag phug cig tu byon tsa na khang stong 'gyel/ kho'i sprul pas bza' btung yang byin/ 'o yug mda' na 'khrug pa chen po yod pa yang rdo rje legs pas bsgribs nas dmag gis ma mthong/ der brag seng ge 'dra ba'i rtser sleb tsa na kho stor/ phyir log go snyam na yang ma thar/ cha ma phyed pa'i ngang las bltas tsa na brag phug kha byang bstan gyi sgo rtswas 'gags pa mthong/ de brus pas dang por sbrul dang sbal pa shig shig snang/ de nas kha byang rnyed dus mi dkar des sgron me btegs byung bas/ dar cig nag dwangs dang skad shin tu mi srun pa zhig byung/ khos brda' sbyar bas/ ngas a ce bos kyi zer ba'i mod/ e ka tsa Ti spyan gcig khrag tu khol ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing bltar mi bzod pa tsam du byung/ khos 'di ni lung bstan pa de'o byas pas/ tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad thong/ lo gsum du su la'ang ma

bshad zer/ brag phug gi sgo rtsa nas g.yu gnyis rnyed pa las rgyu byas/ tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad btang/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga la dbus su byon/ mchims phu nas bi ma la'i chos gter yang thon/ dngos dang zhal mjal nas rjes gnang thob/ slar shang rta nag tu byon pa'i zam khar lce btsun chen po dang mjal/ gsang ba snying thig gi gdams pa rdzogs par thob/ sku na mthon por song nas brgyud 'dzin gyi slad du sras nyi 'bum bskrun/ ngas tshogs pa ma bskyangs na phung po lhag med 'ong ba yin gsungs/ lus shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag la dbang thob pas res 'ga' rgyal ba rigs lngar gsal/ sku lus la grib ma gtan mi mnga'/ rdzogs pa chen po'i chos gsung dus 'ja' gur 'khyil pa sogs ngo mtshar gyi ltas mang po yong/ dgung lo bdun cu don gcig pa me pho phag gi lo sa ga zla ba'i nyer gnyis la shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' las sgra chen po lan bdun grags shing/ sa chen po 'di lan gsum g.yos/ 'ja' dang/ 'od dang/ sil snyan gyi sgra dang/ dri zhim gyi ngad la sogs pa gdod ma'i sa la mngon par byang chub pa'i rtags ma lus pa bstan te gshegs so// de'i phyi nub pur sbyangs pas gdung chen lnga dang/ ring bsrel kha dog lnga pa sku lnga'i rgyal tshab du bzhag me tog gi char dang 'ja'i gur la sogs pas 'gro ba mang po dad pa'i gnas la sbyar zhing rang bzhin gyis bstan la gnas pa byung ngo// de'i slob ma sras nyi 'bum ste/ yum rgyal mo g.yang de'i lhums su zhugs pa'i dus nyi ma mang po dus gcig la shar ba byung bas yab kyis sems can gyi ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar lung bstan nas nyi ma 'bum du btags/ lo lnga nas rim pa yab las gsang ba snying tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ dgung lo bcu pa la che sar bton dus rgyud bcu bdun la bshad pa mdzad pas bu slob kun ngo mtshar skye ba byung/ lo nyi shu'i bar du bsgrub pa kho na la nan tan mdzad/ de nas rjes thob sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'grogs nas rngog rgyal rtse'i sar gsar ma'i rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa la gsan pa mdzad/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa la jo mo rgya gar dngos grub gyi rten du bzung/ nyi shu rtsa bdun la 'khon grags pa rgyal mtshan dang/ bla ma stag so ba bsten nas rgyud gsum gdams ngag dang bcas pa dang/ bde mchog ma la gyo lugs mkhyen par mdzad/ kha rag gi 'brug ston grags pa la bde mchog dang/ rje btsun ma rwa lugs/ ye shes mgon po sogs zhus/ zhang g.yu brag pa ngang gzhung gi rngog rdo rje seng ge la sogs te mkhas grub gyi bla ma mang po bsten nas mdo rgyud du ma la thos bsam phyogs med mdzad/ tshig don chen mo zhes bya ba'i bstan

bcos kyang mdzad de dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa drug la gshegs/ pur sbyangs pas gdung rigs lnga byon/ 'ja' tshon gyi gur phub/ cho 'phrul zla ba la khug chos me tog skyes pa sogs byung ngo// 'di sgra thal 'gyur nas phyag rdor gyi sprul pa badzra pha lar lung bstan pa la ngos 'dzin par grags so// de'i slob ma gu ru jo 'ber ni gcung po zla ba 'bum gyi sras yin/ lo bdun man chod lkugs pa 'dra bar yod pa la brgyad nas shes rab me ltar 'bar/ bco brgyad kyi bar du khu bo nyi 'bum dang 'grogs/ gsang ba bla med kyi dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas rdzogs par mdzad cing/ rgyud kyi bshad pa la thos pas sgro 'dogs gcod pa dang/ man ngag gi don la bsgoms pas nyams su blangs pa la brtson/ bcu dgu nas nyi shu'i bar sa skya lo tswa ba la rgyud gsum man ngag dang bcas pa dang/ bde mchog mal gyo lugs nyan/ dbu tshad la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud par byas/ de bzhin du khro phu lo tswa ba la mi tra dzo ka'i gdams pa dang/ chu mig pa la tshad ma bsdus pa/ bal po grags 'bum la do ha dang phyag chen kha 'thor sogs mkhas grub du ma la sde snod dang rgyud lung mang po lo sum cu rtsa drug tshun mnyan pas rig pa rno zhing thos pa shin tu mang bar grags/ bsgrub pa mdzad res yi dam gyi lha zhal mthong ba yin te thugs sgam pas mi gsung/ lha sar jo bo la mchod pa phul dus 'od kyi thig le'i khong nas 'phags pa lag na pad+ma dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal gzigs/ tho reng zhig tshe dpag med kyi zhal mthong bas/ nged cag la tshe ring rgyud med kyang kho bo legs par byung ba de'i byin rlabs yin gsungs/ de ltar tshad med pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag gis 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon du gyur nas drug bcu pa la gshegs/ zhag bdun du 'ja'i dra bas 'brel/ sku gdung la oM AHhU~M dang ring bsrel mang po byon to// de'i slob ma 'khrul zhig seng ge rgyab pa yin te/ g.yo ru gra'i phu so gad phreng gi grong du nyi ma rtse shar la 'ja'i gur phub cing 'khrungs/ lo dgu nas rigs sad de dag snang dang mos gus dpag med shar/ bcu pa'i tshe snang ba 'di rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu la sra zhing 'thas 'thas 'dra ba mi bden snyam pa dang/ bcu gnyis pa la 'khor ba la skyo ba tshad med par skyes nas chos 'ba' zhig las gang gis kyang mi phan par nges shes rnyed/ bcu gsum gyi tho rangs nyi zla dus gcig la shar ba'i rmi lam sad dus/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong/ tshe gcig gis grol ba snying tig gi don sgoms shig gsungs/ de nas bzung snying rje phyogs med du rgyas/ 'gro ba kun la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes shar/ rkyen re la brten nas gzhan la mtho 'grogs dang

khyad gsod mi byed pa'i dam bca' byas/ lus kyi srin bu ngag snying rje chen pos mi 'dor zhing/ longs sprang dang dman pa kho na la byams pa sogs theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pa'i rtags khyad par can mnga'/ bco brgyad la snang ba bden med du rtogs pas smyon pa khrog langs pa lta bu song ste/ pha mas lha gsol ba'i yo byad bsags pa gtor zhing/ pho gdon rgyal po mchod/ mo gdon bsen mo mchod/ ces byas pas/ khyod 'dra ba'i bu skye ba zer 'thabs/ nyi shu la mkhan po lde'u sgang pa dang/ slob dpon bskras sgang pa las rab tu byung/ nyi shu tsa lnga lon tshe sri zhal gyi seng ge rgyab tu byon/ seng ge rgyab pa bar pa la tshal pa'i chos skor/ bla ma tsa ri ba las seng ge mjing bsnol/ ras pa dri med 'od/ lha ri dpal/ gzhon nu 'bum/ ston 'char byang yon/ jo sras su grags pa rnams la/ gsang sngags gsar rnying zhi byed/ gcod yul/ phyag chen mang du nyan/ khyad par thugs rjes chen pos lung bstan bzhin gu ru jo 'ber las rdzogs pa chen po thos pas rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ khro bo ma la sogs pa'i ri khrod dang lung stong rnams su lo mang po'i bar du sgrub pa kho na la gzhol bas dgongs pa ka dag gi sar gshegs/ skal ldan mang po smin grol la bkod nas/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa la theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu thob pa'i rtags khyab par ba rnams mngon du bstan nas gshegs so// de'i slob ma grub chen me long rdo rje ni/ sgrags kyi phur rnal 'byor pa bsam yas kyi sras su btsas/ lo dgu na grub thob za lung pa dang/ mkhan po se lung pa las rab tu byung/ de dus gshin po'i dge rtsar yum rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum kho na sgrogs pas lo bcu drug gi dus sgrags kyi phu'i zhogs steng bya bar brgyad stong brgya rtsa mdzad pas gnas lugs kyi don rtogs/ zangs mtshor bsgoms pas nyams 'bar zhing mngon shes phra mo 'ang shar/ de nas phyogs med 'grims te/ mtshur bu'i do bo ras pa sogs bla ma mang po bsten/ sha 'ug ltag sgo dang/ mkhar chu la sogs pa'i gnas chen mang por byon/ nas bre gang gis zla ba gcig dang zhag nyi shu'i 'tsho ba byas pa sogs dka' thub la shin tu bzod pa gcig yin/ dka' ba spyad pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ lo bco brgyad pa'i tshe seng ge rgyab pa sangs rgyas dbon po mjal nas man ngag snying tig thob/ da man ngag gis 'tshengs bsams pa'i spob pa skyes te bsgoms pas sngon 'gro'i dus rang nas zhag drug tu rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nyin mtshan med par mthong/ dngos gzhi'i dus brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams rmi lam du mjal nas byin gyis brlabs/ nyi shu rtsa gsum par sangs rgyas ras pa la rdo rje pho mo la sogs pa'i gter chos du ma gsan nas

bsgrubs pas/ rdo rje phag mo mngon sum du mjal/ brag la gsang rdor bsnun pas thim gyis song/ rta mgrin/ sgrol ma/ spyan ras gzigs/ slob dpon chen po/ kun tu bzang po/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ bi ma la/ za lung pa/ sangs rgyas ras pa/ 'gro mgon phag gru rnams zhal gzigs/ dung lung du mkha' 'gro'i sgra shin tu snyan pas skye rgyud chod pa'i lung bstan/ ka ba can du phag mo dmar mo/ grub thob za lung pa nam mkha'i klong du mjal/ ngar chung na bzhugs pa'i tshe rmi lam na phag mo gtso 'khor lnga mthong/ der mnal sad tsa nas/ 'od kyi phag mo dngos su gzigs/ skyabs gnas rdzong du rdo rje sems dpas rmi lam du rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang bskur/ spyir bla ma mang po bsten cing khyad 'phags kyi bla ma bcu gsum bzhugs/ bka' drin 'gran zla bral ba grub thob za lung pa/ mtshur phu'i ngo bo ras pa/ 'khrul zhig seng ge rgyab pa gsum las snying por don rnyed pa yin/ 'di brtul zhugs shin tu che bas zhig po'i spyod pa blang dor med pas gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig la sgra ji bzhin par spyon nus/ rgod phrug nam mkha' la lding ba mthong bas rig pa brtul zhugs kyi ngar thogs nas nam mkha'i lam la 'gro ba dang/ brag la 'dam ltar byed pa byung/ mkhan pa ljongs dang/ mkhan pa gling dang/ seng ge rdzong dang/ mkhar chu rnams su sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan btsugs shing 'gro don mdzad/ tshe tshad sum cu rtsa bdun yin pa la/ slob dpon kun dga' zhes pa'i skal ldan zhig gis gsol ba thebs pas/ dgung lo drug cu rtsa gcig pa la dur khrod la bar gshegs pa'i tshe 'od chen po sgra dang bcas pa nub phyogs su yal ba kun gyis mthong/ pur gyi rnam pa sbyang dus/ nam mkha'i lam nas pur khang la 'od lnga'i snam bu brkyang pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i ltas dpag tu med pa byung zhing/ sku lnga thob pa'i rtags kyi gdung yang rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin byon to// 'di grub thob o rgyan pa dang dus mtshungs/ u rgyan pa bcu phrag lhag bcas kyis bgres la sku tshe yang ring ngo// me long pa'i slob ma ni rig 'dzin ku mA rA dza ste/ g.yo ru 'on par gsar rdzid kha ces bya ba'i grong rdal du 'khrungs/ thar pa rgyan du btags/ chung ngu nas dad pa dang snying rje dang shes rab la sogs te 'phags pa'i nor gyi khyad chos mang po mnga' bas klog yig ma bslabs par mkhyen/ lo bdun pa la kong po 'or shod mtho stengs dgon pa'i bla ma dgyes rdor ba las/ kyai rdo rje dang bde mchog gi dbang zhus/ lo dgu pa'i tshe mkhan po gtsang pa las yongs rdzogs kyi dge bsnyen blangs/ spyan ras gzigs 'khor ba dong sprugs kyis chos skor la sbyangs/ bcu gnyis pa la phag mo gru'i mkhan po yer ba pa dang slob dpon

mnga' ris pa las rab tu byung/ mtshan gzhon nu rgyal por btags/ 'dul ba bslabs/ rin po che grags ye ba la log lnga'i bar du nA ro chos drug la sogs pa dang/ mtshar stengs pa la brtag gnyis nyan/ dpon sangs shel bzo rig pa bslabs/ yi ge drug pa bzlas pas shel gyi khang bu gcig na thugs rje chen po zhal 'dzum pa mthong/ khyung nag shag dar la rnying ma'i rgyud lung man ngag mang du zhus/ ngang phug tu me long rdo rje dang mjal/ phyag rgya chen po'i khrid zhus pas sems car mthong du ngo 'phrod/ de nas grub chen ba mon gyi mkha' 'gro gling la gshegs pa'i phyags phyir byon/ rdo rje phag mo'i chos skor sogs zhus nas bsnyen par mdzad pas/ tshes bcu'i nub cig u rgyan pad+ma dang mjal/ e ma rigs kyi bu/ rtag tu chos gyis shig gsungs/ de nas mtshur phur byon nas gnyan ras dang/ dar ma mgon po la karma pa'i chos skor rnams zhus/ de nas la stod ding ri dang/ spu trar byon pas/ grub chen u rgyan pa dang/ rje karma pa rang byung rdo rje dgung lo bdun pa rab tu byung ma thag pa dang mjal/ u rgyan pa las gdams pa mang du nod/ de nas lo 'ga' na o rgyan pas gnyan ras la snying tig zhus pa'i zla la tshang bar thob/ rgya sman pa nam mkha' rdo rje las gsang skor gnad kyi ngo sprod dang/ skal ldan pa chos kyi seng ge las gsang ba gnad kyi me long sogs rdzogs chen gsang ba'i skor zhus/ slar mkhar chur grub chen me long rdo rjer gsang ba snying tig dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa legs pa thob/ 'bul rgyu gzhan med pas lus ngag gi zhabs tog dang/ dbyar ril po gnyis su ri mo mdzad/ nas khal bzhi bzhi gnang ba'i gnyis gnyis kyis shog bu nyos/ mtshan mo dpe rnams bris/ phyed pos mar me dang gsol ba mdzad pas/ dka' thub kyi mthus shig nad drag po zhig byung/ thugs dam yang khyad par can 'khrungs/ bla ma mnyes nas 'gro don gyis shig pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob/ dbang gral du bla ma'i dbu'i bar snang la mgon po phyag bzhi pa dang/ sgo'i thad na e ka dza TI mthing mo zhing dbyug dang spyang mo bsnams pa bongs nyis thog tsam pa/ phyi ngos na las kyi ma mo khrag ral can lag pas khrag bcus nas 'thung ba rnams mthong/ lo brgyad du bla ma 'du 'bral med par bsten/ u rgyan gyi sgrub gnas snyug tshal sbug tu dgun thog cig bzhugs pas rdo rje phag mo zhal gzigs/ de nas shes rab phyogs med du rgyas/ re zhig yar klungs mtshar stengs kyi ri khrod btab nas bzhugs/ de nas bla ma 'da' bar mkhyen nas mkhar chur byon tsa na/ bla ma'i sras gnyis sa skyags su 'dzom/ slar log nyi shu lnga'i dus mchod btsugs/ tsa ri la byon pas krig

mo lha'i ne'u gsing gi rdo sku la 'ja' tshon sna lnga zug pa sogs byung/ de nas mtshur phur chos rje rang byung rdo rje gdan drangs te snying tig gi gdams pa rnams phul/ shangs su byon nas lce sgom nag po'i brgyud pa slob dpon sgom pa la gsang skor snyan brgyud rnams dang/ bsam gtan mig gi sgron me zhus/ ding ri sna dmar du dbon po byang sgrub la yang dgon pa'i ri chos rnams nyan/ u rgyan pa rin chen dpal dang yang mjal/ mar lam bla ma bkra lung ba las gshin rje dgra nag la sogs pa zhus/ slob dpon ye mgon la sogs pa bshes gnyen mang dag las gsang skor dang/ rgod tshang ba'i khrid kyi skor/ a ro'i khrid mo che don skor la sogs pa bod na grags pa che ba'i rdzogs rim phal mo che khong du chud/ chos phyir dka' spyad bzod pas tsa ri gsar ma bgrod nas rnying ma'i g.yu mtsho 'gram du gcig pur zla ba brgyad bzhugs/ cho 'phrul chen po byung ba gshis thog tu ro snyoms pas gzhi bdag dbang du 'dus nas khad par gdan drangs bsnyen bkur byas/ dzam b+ha las nor bu byin/ mtsho nang du 'od lnga'i lbu ba sel po tsam zhig thim 'gro ba gzigs/ thugs nges 'byung dang skyo shas kyis rgyud brlan pas dus rtag tu sham po la sogs gangs khrod dang lung stong 'ba' zhig tu lhags skyob tsam la brten nas bzhugs pas slob ma'i tshogs mang po 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad/ sprul pa'i skur gdon mi za ba karma pa rang byung rdo rje dang/ rgyal ba klong chen pa gnyis rdzogs pa chen po'i slob ma'i gtso bor gyur pas bstan pa 'di spel ba'i phrin las la mu dang mthar ma son/ de skad du 'bri gung pa chos rgyal rin chen phun tshogs kyis/ chos 'di'i bstan pa'i bdag po kun mkhyen klong chen pa yin/ rgyal ba rang byung rdo rje'i dus 'phrin las rgya che/ zhes gsungs pas mtshon no// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shin tu goms pas snying rje chen po'i dbang gis grong dang yul 'khor mang po dag la'ang thabs la mkhas pas thar pa'i sa bon 'debs pa kho na lhur mdzad cing/ kong po nas e la thug gi bar 'jigs pas nyan pa'i lam phrang la 'gro ba dag gi dbugs 'byin pa dang/ ri dwags dang nya la sogs pa'i sems can nyam chung ba de dag thugs shin tu brtse bas bdog pa la 'phangs sems med pas ri rgya dang/ lam rgya dang/ chu rgya la sogs pa mdzad nas bde 'jam la bkod/ gang du bzhugs pa'i lung pa dang/ yul grong thams cad kyi sad ser yams nad la sogs pa zhi bar mdzad cing phan pa 'ba' zhig lhur len/ snying tig gi gdams pa rdzogs rim gzhan dang ma 'dres par rang skad kyi grub mtha' bslang ste 'chad nus pa dang/ shangs la sme ba a'i ri mo can mnga' ba

sngags bdag gza' dang dam can rnams kyis bka' la nyan cing mi dang mi lab pa bzhin du yod pa dang/ mngon par shes pas gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dul lugs mkhas pa dang/ gzhan rgyud byin gyis rlobs nus pa dang/ rjes su bzung pa'i skal ldan kun la 'das dus rtags khyad par can 'byung ba sogs slob dpon bi ma la'i sku'i bkod par grags shing/ thal 'gyur las dge slong dpal ldan zhes lung bstan to// de ltar don gyi 'gro don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang nas bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa chu mo lug gi lo'i ston zla 'bring po'i nyi shu lnga la sgra dang 'od dang/ gur khyim la sogs pa'i rtags ngo mtshar ba dang bcas sku gshegs pas/ nye gnas sgom dar la sogs pa drung na yod pa rnams kyis mo gus chen pos gdung ba bskyed pas slar bzhengs te skyil mo krung bcas/ zhal 'dzum pa'i ngang nas khyed rnams mya ngan ma byed/ nga shi ba min gsungs nas gdams ngag gzhal ta ci rigs pa byon/ zhag bcu gsum sku tshe slar la bsrings/ der tshes bdun gyi nyin gshegs pa'i phyi na ji ltar bgyi/ bla ma kun mkhyen pa gdan 'dren nam zhus pas/ khong 'o brgyal du ma 'jug/ da gzod chos kyi zhun thar ma chod pa yod na der song/ kha ta mang po sngar nas byas zin/ cal col ma smra gsungs/ drang srong tsog pu'i 'dug stangs dang/ chos sku'i gzigs stangs kyi ngang las 'dzum par mdzad de/ tshe brgyad kyi tho rangs kha na gdod ma'i grong khyer ga na ba der gshegs so// nyi shu lnga la pur bzhu bas dbu thod ril por byon pa'i nang na rigs lnga'i tshom dkyil dang/ snyan gong g.yas na rje btsun ma mthing ga tshon gang pa/ gdung rigs lnga dang/ ring bsrel la sogs pa byon cing 'ja'i gur gyis khor khor yug du dkrigs so/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po karma pa rang byung rdo rje ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten du dngos su byon pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i glus bskul nas sems can rnams la tshad med pa'i snying rjes gzigs te stod lung du rgan rgon gnyis kyi bu shi ba'i ro la grong 'jug gi rnam pas gshegs tsa na/ shi mi gson la blta ba ltas ngan yin zer nas mig khab kyis gtsags/ dal 'byor gyi chos bco brgyad tshang ba'i lus las gzhan du gyur pas slar 'phos te/ rnal 'byor pho mo gnyis kyi bur srid pa bzung/ sngon gnas rjes su dran pa la sgrib byed skra'i rtse mo tsam yang med pas mngal gyi dri mas gtan nas ma gos pa rgya gar na shAkya thub pa dang/ bod du skyes bu chen po 'di las med par grags/ rgya bod gnyis kar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i srog shing gcig pur bzhugs/ bsam yas mchims phu dang

g.ya' ma lung sogs nas tshe tshu'i gter bzhes nas gong ma rgyal po'i tshe bsrings/ bi ma la mi tra rang gi mdzod spur thim pa gzigs pa'i mod la snying thig gi dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon du gyur/ 'on kyang gsang sngags bla ma la bsten pa'i mig ltos tsam ston pa'i slad du bcom bskyungs nas rig 'dzin ku mA rA dza las gsang ba snying tig gi man ngag yongs su rdzogs pa gsan/ 'di ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma las brgyud pa gcig 'ong thang ba la dgongs pa'i tshe slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pa zhal gzigs/ man ngag snying tig dngos su thob kyang tshig brgyud la nan tan du bya ba'i phyir sho'i rgyal sras legs pa spyan drangs nas tsa ri dgon gsar du rdzogs par gsan/ slar slob ma rnams la rtsal du bton nas gsungs/ bka' las/ chos 'di lta bu nub tu 'phangs pas g.yung ston rdo rje dpal gyis gtsang/ ye rgyal bas khams kong/ ye shes rgyal mtshan pas hor dang rgya nag/ sprul sku bas dbus su dar bar gyis zhes sman lung pa shAkya gzhon nu sogs la rjes su gdams/ sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis// rgya mtsho'i bar du spel bar byed// ces pa de yin par grags/ kun tu bzang po thugs kyi klong na rang gsal te dgongs pa'i gter mdzod chen po la dbang bsgyur nas karma snying tig ces grags pa'i gdams pa yang byung/ 'di dag kyang bstan pa'i chu mgo gcig yin no// rgyal ba gnyis pa dpal bsam yas pa kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang po'am/ klong chen rab 'byams ni/ g.yo ru gra'i cha stod grong du ngan lam btsan po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba ma smad pa'i rigs kyi yon tan can no// rus ni rog ste sad mi bdun gyi nang tshan dz+nyA na in+d+ra rak+Shi ta'am/ bod skad du ye shes dbang po bsrung/ slob dpon chen po'i dngos slob dge slong rgyal ba mchog dbyangs dang gdung gcig pa'i rabs nyer lnga pa/ mes po lha srung zhes bdud rtsi'i bcud len grub pas lo brgya dang lngar 'tsho ba de'i sras slob dpon bstan pa srung zhes rig gnas dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor la rang byan chud pa zhig/ 'brom ston rin po che rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyi gdung las byon par 'brom bza' ma bsod rnams rgyan zhes bya ba dang 'dus pa las skye ba'i myu gu bzung ngo// de'i tshe yum la seng ge chen po gcig gi dpral ba na nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas srid pa gsum lhag ger gsal ba zhig rang nyid la thim par rmis so// de nas rab byung lnga pa'i phur bus spre'u spo zla'i tshes bcu'i nyin mngal gyi chu 'dzin las rnam par grol/ gzhon nu don grub la lha'i dbang pos bya ba bzhin du nam grub re ma tis ngas bsrung ba yin zhes lag tu blangs/ slar yum la gtad nas mi snang bar song/ 'di ltar byang chub

sems dpa' ni 'phags pa'i nor gyis gdod nas phyug pas dad pa dang/ snying rje la sogs pa'i yon tan bsgrib med du gsal/ lo lnga nas bri klog legs par mkhyen/ yab las bka' brgyad bder 'dus/ phur pa/ rta mgrin bla ma'i las gzhung sogs sgrub phrin mang du gsan/ sman rtsis la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud/ dgu pa'i steng du nyi khri dang brgyad stong brgya tshar bton pas lhag med du thugs la 'dzul/ bcu gnyis pa'i tshe bsam yas pa mkhas po bsam 'grub rin chen dang/ slob dpon kun dga' 'od zer las rab byung gi dngos po brnyes/ mtshan tshul khrims blo gros su grags/ dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la legs par sbyangs pas lo bcu bzhi par bshad pa'i ba dan bzung chog pa byung/ bcu drug par slob dpon bkra shis rin chen la lam 'bras dang/ chos drug gnyis/ phag mo'i chos drug/ bde mchog dril bu pa/ phyag rdor 'khor chen la sogs pa'i dbang khrid gdams pa mang du nyan/ slob dpon dbang ye/ ston tshul/ khro phu pa la sogs par/ bya spyod/ rnal 'byor/ rdo rje gur/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas thod pa/ rdo rje phreng ba/ dus kyi 'khor lo sogs pa'i sngags rgyud mang po dang/ rin po che za lung pa sogs la zhang tshal pa'i gdams sgor/ rgod tshang pa'i lam khrid/ gcod yul/ zhi byed snga phyi bar gsum la sogs pa mang du nyan/ bcu dgu par gangs ri'i khrod na tshad ma smra ba'i rig gra chen po rngog legs pa'i shes rab kyis legs par bskrun pa'i gnas gsang phu ne'u thog gi ma la ya'i nags klung chen por zhugs nas gling stod gdan rabs bco lnga pa slob dpon btsan dgon pa dang/ gdan rabs bcu drug pa bla brang pa chos dpal rgyal mtshan gnyis las/ byams pa'i chos lnga/ tshad ma sde bdun/ phar phyin/ dbu ma la sogs mtshan nyid theg pa'i lung rigs kyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba mngar por gyur pa dag lo drug gi bar du lhag ma ma lus par zos pas blo gros chen po'i lus kyi stobs lhag par rgyas/ dpang lo blo gros brtan pa la mdo ting nge 'dzin rgyal po la sogs pa'i zab chos mdo lnga/ shes rab snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pas mtshon pa'i lung phran mang po sogs nang pa'i gzhung/ sgra dang snyan dngags dang/ sdeb sbyor dang/ zlos gar la sogs pa'i phyi rol pa dang thun mong du gyur pa'i gnas thams cad la thos bsam mthar phyin pa'i sna zhags ring por brkyangs/ shes rab kyi lha 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ mtsho ldan ma/ mi g.yo ba/ phag dkar rnams la sgrub pa mdzad pas kun kyang zhal gzigs/ khyad par sgra dbyangs lha mo phyag mthil du bzhag nas gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa zhag bdun du bstan cing lung bstan thob/ lhag pa'i lha de dag gis

kyang thogs pa med pa'i blo gros kyi dngos grub chen po'i gnas gang yin pa'i dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa'i 'phyang 'phrul dang/ rin po che'i tog gis rnam par dpyangs pa/ brgal ba dang/ brtag pa dang/ rigs pa'i thal 'gyur gyi sgra chen pos sa 'di g.yo ba tsam du gyur nas/ rgol ba ngan pa'i khyu mchog ra gcig pa'i brtul zhug 'dzin pa rnams sgrub pa dang/ sun 'byin pa'i rkang pa mchog gis rnam par brdzi ba dang/ rnam par 'thag pa dang/ rnam par nyam nyes par byas nas cang mi smras pa'i gnas la bkod pa bsam yas lung mang pa'am/ klong chen rab 'byams zhes pa'i mtshan gyi rnga bo che mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ mi ma yin gyi gnas su'ang grags pa gsal ba nyid do// de ltar lung dang rigs pa'i gnas rgya chen po la mi 'jigs pa'i nyams brtas par gyur na'ang/ 'di ltar skyes bu chen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la gang nye ba'i phyogs la 'jug par rtsom ste/ phyogs bral gyi gnas su lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu'i rnam par thar pa la yid gzhung pas/ bla ma dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma la mdo dang/ rgyud dang/ man ngag mang du zhus nas thos pa dang bsam pa'i blo gros cher bskyed/ gangs ri'i khrod na gzhung lugs dang man ngag mang du gnas pa la phyogs dang ris su bcad pa spangs te bung ba gzhon nus sbrang rtsi'i snying po la bya ba bzhin du/ dan phag pa/ slob dpon gzhon nu don grub myos mthing ma ba sangs rgyas grags pa sogs bla ma bzhi la mdo sgyu sems gsum/ rnying ma rgyud 'bum gyi gtsos mang dag gsan pas snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i grub pa'i mtha' chen por gcig tu 'jug pa'i rten 'brel shar/ phyis gsang ba'i snying po la snying tig dang mthun pa'i TI ka phyogs bcu'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nyi zla'i sprin gyi snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ spyi'i khog dbub gnyis mdzad/ gsang snying 'grel ba spar khab gyi lugs ltar 'chad pa mi legs kyi/ rong zom kyi lugs ltar legs pa yin zhes gsungs/ lar g.yung 'grel dang bcas 'di gsum rang bshad sgroms che bar snang/ slob dpon gzhon rgyal la sogs par dbu ma tshig 'jug la sogs 'phags skor rnams tshang ba dang/ gzhon rdor la spyod 'jug dang bslab btus la sogs pa/ jo bo'i yi dam skor sbyor drug/ chos drug/ mkhan po la khro phu pa'i skor/ kha rag chos skor/ sgrub thabs rgya mtsho/ chos chung brgya rtsa/ 'dul ba lung la sogs shin tu mang ba rje rang byung rdo rje la sbyor drug gegs sel dang bcas pa/ nA ro chos drug/ sku gsum ngo sprod/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho/ spyan ras gzigs rgyal po lugs/ gsang 'dus/ sam+bu Ti/ ma hA mA yA/ gshin rje gshed dmar nag sogs chos bka' rgya

tshe bsring nus te/ dus ngan gyi tshe ring ba la dgos pa med gsungs/ gzhan la skyo ba yang dag bskul nas sku gshegs so// pur sbyangs pas nam mkha' 'jas gang/ mchod rten dang ring bsrel yang mang du byon don/ 'di ni tshogs pa bskyangs pas snyigs ma 'ja' lus su ma dengs kyang/ don gyi ka dag chos zad kyi sa la mya ngan las 'das pa'i rtags mtha' dag tshang zhing snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i dar rgyas kyang 'di'i ring nas che bar byung ste dngos kyi slob ma yang/ slob dpon kun bzang dang/ 'dzeng jo sras dang/ btsan thang pa nyang d+harma sid+ha dang/ slob dpon gser lung pa dang/ bla ma du rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ gzig ye shes dbang po dang/ g.yag ston zla ba 'od zer la sogs mang du byon no// dgung lo yang brgya dang bcu bdun lon tshe gshegs pa yin/ 'di jo 'brom dang/ phya pa chos kyi seng ge dang/ rje btsun mi la dpon slob dang snga phyir thog mnyam pa tsam yin no// de la 'dzes jo sras ni/ sngags pa'i rigs la btsas pas chung ngu nas yig rtses la sbyangs/ 'ol kha'i lha bris pa la sgyu 'phrul la sogs rnying ma dang/ dgyes rdor dang mtshan brjod zhus/ slob dpon lha ris pa 'da' khar gzhung chen po 'di tsam zhig shes kyang 'chi khar pa a ro thun bdun las ma byung/ khyod rang kyang gzhung ma bslabs par gdams ngag la nan tan gyis/ dwags po na khyed rang gi bla ma 'dzeng bya ba gcig yod 'dug pas der song zhes lung bstan/ gang bar du rdzogs chen lhun grub mkhan slob dpon zem gyi sar dbyar dgun thog drug bsdad kyang thugs la ma btags/ gdams ngag gi spros pa ma chod nas slob dpon 'dzeng la dpal lung du rdo rje zam pa tshar gsum zhus/ byin rlabs mdzad nas/ khyed rang re zhig gtsang du song la gzhung slob/ gtsang nas 'khor tsa na a mis dgon pa gcig tu sdod cig gsungs/ der gdams pa mi gnang ba dgongs nas/ gzhan su shes dris pas/ gra phyi'i jo sras zhang la skyabs bya bas shes gsungs/ de la zhu bar sems tsa na khong grongs/ yang dwags po rang du log nas 'dzeng la zhus pas kyang ma gnang/ slob ma gcig la zhu bsams nas/ sho skyam du slob dpon ngu'i spyan sngar phyin tsa na/ re ba tsam bcos nas 'dis mi 'ongs da dung dwags por song la zhus gsungs/ yang dwags por byon nas zhus pas/ cis kyang 'dod na gdams pa la nan tan byed dgos pa yin gsungs nas rdzogs par gnang/ dbyar dgun thog 'ga' slob dpon gyi drung du bsdad/ lo drug tsam lon nas phran tshegs rnams kyang rdzogs/ gzhan la byin rlab mdzad pa'i las slob kyang byas/ thod pa'i slob ma rog po dga' dang/ ma jo bzlo ba la sogs pa lnga bcu tsam gyis rdo rje

zam pa zhus pas jo sras kyis shod/ khyed tshos nyon gsungs nas slob dpon gyi khri kha nas gsungs/ dpon slob gnyis lo ngo bco brgyad tsam du 'grogs/ gdams ngag gi bka' phog nas brgyud 'dzin bskos so// de ltar 'dzeng d+harma bo d+hi dang/ jo sras 'dzeng chung smyon pa gnyi ga'i slob ma slob dpon kun bzang yin te/ de ni khu bo pha jo dbus pa phag mo gru pa'i slob ma sgom chen po zhig yin/ ma zi bza' des chog bya ba ma jo smyon ma bsam 'grub bya ba la chos thob pa gnyis ka la rmi lam gyi ltas bzang po dang bcas te 'khrungs/ lo brgyad dgu la slob dpon kor ston rA dza las slob gnyer cung zad byas/ bco lnga lon pa'i tshe khong grongs nas slob dpon du ba'i gam du lo lnga tsam zhi byed zhu zhing bsdad nas zhabs tog 'grub tshad byas/ gser lung dgon par slob dpon du dang 'jal ba'i tshe/ bco lnga'i zla ba'i rum na skar ma gnyis thim pa rmis/ 'dzeng chen po la rdo rje zam pa tshar gcig zhus/ de nas 'dzeng jo sras spung ring du spyan drangs nas rdo rje zam pa tshar bdun zhus/ dwags por dgun thog bzhi phyin/ rdo rje zam pa tshar phyed pa gcig dang bcu bzhi thob/ jo sras dang lo brgyad 'grogs nas rdo rje zam pa tshar bdun zhus/ phyi nas sho ru tshar gnyis/ gser lung du tshar gcig/ gzhan la gsung 'phror mjal ba dang dril bas 'dzes mes dbon gnyis la rdo rje zam pa tshar sum cu rtsa lnga thob/ gnyis ka'i gdams pa bka' babs nas gzhung bshad che chung gnyis kyang mdzad do// 'di la sras sprul sku 'od 'bar seng ge bya ba byung/ de ni blo rno ba/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste/ lo bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje zam pa gsungs/ des brgyud 'dzin jo mgon la gnang/ des bya med tshul rin la gnang
