ngo// yang 'dzeng gis yar klungs btsan thang pa nyang d+harmA sid+ha la rdo rje zam pa bshad pas byin rlab bzhugs/ rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ dur khrod dgon par bzhugs te 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad/ mthar dgung lo don bdun pa la gshegs/ 'di nas brgyud pa'i gzhung bshad kyang yod do// de'i slob ma badzra pA ni/ de'i slob ma bla ma lha'o// yang 'dzeng gis gser lung pa la bshad/ des slob dpon rang grol/ des sras po chos rin la bshad do// yang 'dzeng gis du rdo rje rgyal mtshan la bshad/ des ngu ston dad pa brtson 'grus/ de'i slob ma zhig gis byas pa'i gzhung bshad kyang yod/ yang 'dzeng gis gzig ye shes dbang po// des mkhan po la kha pa/ des slob dpon mgon skya ba/ des slob dpon go ri ba/ des so ston la bshad de so ston gyi gzhung bshad kyang snang ngo// yang 'dzeng gis spung ring pa g.yag ston zla ba 'od zer/ des klog ston dge 'dun skyabs/ 'di nas brgyud pa'i

gzhung bshad kyang yod/ yang spung ring g.yag ston gyis lo brgya la nye ba thub/ des 'on nag stod pa gla ru ban de la bshad nas kyang dar/ yang 'dzeng gis skye tshe ye shes dbang phyug la bshad/ des gzigs ye shes dbang po/ des mkhan chen ngur pa/ des du ston badzre shwa ra/ des mkhan chen bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ des mkhan chen gzhon nu shes rab/ de slob dpon gzhon du grags pa/ des mkhan chen sangs rgyas bzang po/ des bla ma brtson 'grus dbang phyug/ des mtha' bzhi grags pa rin chen/ des slob dpon shwakya rgyal po/ 'di sku gzhon nu'i tshe khrab la khar rab tu byung/ lo dus la bsnyen par rdzogs/ mdzod dang 'dul ba la byang bas skyor lung du gra skor mdzad/ thugs dam 'phel bar bzhugs pa la/ sku na ha cang mtho bas spyan mi gsal yang/ gzhan gyis spyan tshab byas te rjes su brjod nas gsung ba sogs thugs bskyed shin tu che/ dgung lo brgyar nye bar bzhugs nas gshegs pa'i rjes thugs las ring bsrel zad pa med par 'byon pa byung/ 'dis 'gos lo gzhon nu dpal la gsungs pa yin no// rdo rje zam pa'i lo rgyus bshad zin to//// gsum pa man ngag sde'i mchog tu zab pa snying thig gi skor rnams slob dpon chen po bi ma la mi tra dgung lo nyis brgyar nye ba na bod du rgyal pos bstan pa btsugs pa'i skabs su gyur cing/ der nyang ting 'dzin bzang po bya ba ting nge 'dzin thun gcig gis lo bdun du mi g.yo zhing sha'i spyan gyis gling bzhi cig car du gzigs pa zhig bzhugs pas lung bstan cing bskul bas btsan pos lo tswa ska cog gnyis gser gyi skyes dang bcas pa spyan 'dren du brdzangs pas gdul bya'i dus la bab par gzigs te byon par rgya gar bas phrag dog gis dbyen bcos pas bod rnams the tshom par ngo mtshar ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dad par mdzad/ rgyu 'bras kyi chos spyi dang/ bye brag g.yu sgras lo tsA byas te sems sde phyi 'gyur bcu gsum bsgyur/ shin tu zab pa'i man ngag snying thig ni btsan po dang nyang ting 'dzin bzang po gnyis la lkog tu gsungs pa las gzhan snod du rung ba ma gzigs nas dpe rnams bod yig mdzad nas mchims phu'i dge gong du sbas/ slob dpon 'di lo bcu gsum bod du bzhugs nas phyis rgya nag ri bo rtse lnga gshegs/ thub pa'i bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar sku lus de nyid kyis bzhugs shing lo brgya brgya na ljongs 'dir sprul pa re byon nas snying thig gi bstan pa gsal bar mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes so// bi ma la rgya nag tu gshegs nas lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga nas nyang ting 'dzin bzang po zag pa zad pa'i phung por gyur/ rdo rje legs pas khams su ser ba phab pa'i nas rnga mo'i rgyab brgya phul ba la brten

nas dbu ru zhwa'i lha khang bzhengs/ gdams pa'i dpe rnams de nyid kyi ke'u tshang rim gsum gyi sgo'i ka ba'i khong du sbas/ snyan brgyud rnams 'bro rin chen 'bar ba la bshad/ de lha sa brag lha'i phug tu 'ja' lus su yal lo// nyang ban chen po 'od du dengs nas lo brgyad lon cing nyang mi dar ma dang dus mtshung par dbu ru gzhol ma dge mchog gi bu gnas brtan ldang ma ba lhun grub rgyal mtshan ces bya ba/ ngo bo bi ma la'i sprul par grags kyang rnam par shes pa lkog tu gyur pa rnams la gnas brtan dkyus ma'i ngang tshul du snang ba gcig la rdo rje legs pas lung bstan nas snga sbas pa'i gter rngams phyung/ dbas blo gros la tshig rgyud kyang mnyan nas chos nyid yid dpyod du ma lus par nyams su blangs/ man ngag rnyed nas bco lnga pa la bshad/ rgyud bzhag pa'i snod 'tshol du byon pa na/ nyang stod nas lce btsun seng ge dbang phyug ces bya ba rnyed/ de la gdams pa rim pa bdun du btab/ de dang nye bar kha rag sgom chung la'ang btab pas khong yang des grol/ lce btsun la dpe rnams dag par bris la khra'i zla ba la skyol cig gsungs/ phyis zhig lce btsun gyis 'bul ba shin tu mang po dang bcas byon pas snye thang du mal dro'i nyang bka' gdams pa bya ba dang 'phrad/ des ldang ma gshegs pa'i gtam bshad pas/ 'bul ba rnams gnas gzhi gcig 'dug pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul/ nyang bka' gdams pa na re/ ldang ma de gnas brtan yin pa tsam las gang zag bzang por sngar sus kyang ma rig/ sku gshegs pa'i dus nam mkha' 'jas khengs/ sku gdung dang ring bsrel dpag tu med pa byon pas thams cad ngo mtshar zhig 'gyod pa skyes gda'/ khyed kyang 'bul ba 'di tsam 'khyer lugs gyis gdams ngag khyad par can yod mchi bas bdag la stsol zhig zhus pas gdams pa byin/ des gzho'i ti sgro brag la lo gnyis bsgoms pas phung po lhag med du song ba yin no// de la lce btsun chen po ni/ yul nyang ro gnyan tsho'i lce thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i bu gzhon nu nas chos mang po la thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa zhig yin/ gnas brtan ldang ma ba dang ri gzar rgod po lung du mjal/ kha rag tu gdams pa gsung pa'i dus btab ste rdzogs par thob/ slob dpon gshegs nas gter dpe rnying pa rnams lang gro 'chad pa stag 'dra'i chu mig gi rtsa dang/ 'u yug dang/ jal gyi phu ste gter kha gsum du sbas/ 'u yug nas shangs man chod kyi ri rgyud rnams la 'pho zhing bsgoms pa'i tshe/ rmi lam na a tsa ra gcig byung nas/ bdag ni bi ma mi tra mkhas pa ste// skal ldan snying po'i yang bcud don 'dod na// mchims phu brag dmar dge gong yang 'debs la// gsang ba snying tig

snying dang 'dra ba yod// de dag khyer la 'u yug phyi gong du// sus kyang mthong ba med pa lo bdun sgoms// zag bcas phung po snang ba ma yin no// zhes gsungs pa thos nas mchims phur byon/ bud med dung so 'khor ma g.yu'i smin ma can zhig gis dpe rnams byin// slar 'o yug phyi gong rdza'i ra bar bzhugs pas bi ma la dngos su byon/ zla ba phyed du dbang khrid gdams pa rdzogs par gnang nas slob dpon bi ma la rgya nag tu gshegs/ de nas lce btsun gyis lo bdun bsgoms pas phung po lhag med grub/ sprul pa'i sku zhang ston la gdams ngag rdzogs par byin nas/ lo brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga na nam mkha' la 'ja' 'od kyi phung po gcig tu gshegs so// gter sbas pa'i lo sum cu na rong snar mda' lce sgom nag pos kha shas bton nas rang nyams su longs shig/ gzhan mang po la'ang bshad/ de bzhin du lang gro 'chad pa ltag nas shangs pa ras pa zhes bya bas kyang bton nas dar rgyas byung zhes grags/ de la zhang ston ni/ yul yar 'brog do nang du 'khrungs/ mtshan bkra shis rdo rje zhes bya ste/ lo bcu gcig par bla ma lce sgom la gdam pa mang du zhus/ de nas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar mkhas grub kyi bla ma mang du bsten nas/ sde snod gsum dang/ rgyud sde gsar rnying gi phyogs thams cad la sbyangs pas mkhyen rab kyi pad+mo rgyas/ nyang stod khu yul na yod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha' las bla ma dang/ thugs rje chen po/ sgrol ma la sogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing lung bstan thob/ rdo rje legs pa mi dkar zhwa dkar can du byas pas dngos grub byin gyi 'dong zer nas khrid/ nyang smad pa tshab tu lha gsol ba mang pos bza' btung byin pa dngos grub de la zer ram snyam tsa na/ mi dkar des dngos grub gzhan du yod kyi 'dong zer 'od kyi lam sna byas nas byon/ khang stong gcig tu nyal bas 'dir mi rung zer/ brag phug cig tu byon tsa na khang stong 'gyel/ kho'i sprul pas bza' btung yang byin/ 'o yug mda' na 'khrug pa chen po yod pa yang rdo rje legs pas bsgribs nas dmag gis ma mthong/ der brag seng ge 'dra ba'i rtser sleb tsa na kho stor/ phyir log go snyam na yang ma thar/ cha ma phyed pa'i ngang las bltas tsa na brag phug kha byang bstan gyi sgo rtswas 'gags pa mthong/ de brus pas dang por sbrul dang sbal pa shig shig snang/ de nas kha byang rnyed dus mi dkar des sgron me btegs byung bas/ dar cig nag dwangs dang skad shin tu mi srun pa zhig byung/ khos brda' sbyar bas/ ngas a ce bos kyi zer ba'i mod/ e ka tsa Ti spyan gcig khrag tu khol ba/ mche ba gtsigs shing bltar mi bzod pa tsam du byung/ khos 'di ni lung bstan pa de'o byas pas/ tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad thong/ lo gsum du su la'ang ma

bshad zer/ brag phug gi sgo rtsa nas g.yu gnyis rnyed pa las rgyu byas/ tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad btang/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga la dbus su byon/ mchims phu nas bi ma la'i chos gter yang thon/ dngos dang zhal mjal nas rjes gnang thob/ slar shang rta nag tu byon pa'i zam khar lce btsun chen po dang mjal/ gsang ba snying thig gi gdams pa rdzogs par thob/ sku na mthon por song nas brgyud 'dzin gyi slad du sras nyi 'bum bskrun/ ngas tshogs pa ma bskyangs na phung po lhag med 'ong ba yin gsungs/ lus shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag la dbang thob pas res 'ga' rgyal ba rigs lngar gsal/ sku lus la grib ma gtan mi mnga'/ rdzogs pa chen po'i chos gsung dus 'ja' gur 'khyil pa sogs ngo mtshar gyi ltas mang po yong/ dgung lo bdun cu don gcig pa me pho phag gi lo sa ga zla ba'i nyer gnyis la shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' las sgra chen po lan bdun grags shing/ sa chen po 'di lan gsum g.yos/ 'ja' dang/ 'od dang/ sil snyan gyi sgra dang/ dri zhim gyi ngad la sogs pa gdod ma'i sa la mngon par byang chub pa'i rtags ma lus pa bstan te gshegs so// de'i phyi nub pur sbyangs pas gdung chen lnga dang/ ring bsrel kha dog lnga pa sku lnga'i rgyal tshab du bzhag me tog gi char dang 'ja'i gur la sogs pas 'gro ba mang po dad pa'i gnas la sbyar zhing rang bzhin gyis bstan la gnas pa byung ngo// de'i slob ma sras nyi 'bum ste/ yum rgyal mo g.yang de'i lhums su zhugs pa'i dus nyi ma mang po dus gcig la shar ba byung bas yab kyis sems can gyi ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar lung bstan nas nyi ma 'bum du btags/ lo lnga nas rim pa yab las gsang ba snying tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ dgung lo bcu pa la che sar bton dus rgyud bcu bdun la bshad pa mdzad pas bu slob kun ngo mtshar skye ba byung/ lo nyi shu'i bar du bsgrub pa kho na la nan tan mdzad/ de nas rjes thob sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'grogs nas rngog rgyal rtse'i sar gsar ma'i rgyud man ngag dang bcas pa la gsan pa mdzad/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa la jo mo rgya gar dngos grub gyi rten du bzung/ nyi shu rtsa bdun la 'khon grags pa rgyal mtshan dang/ bla ma stag so ba bsten nas rgyud gsum gdams ngag dang bcas pa dang/ bde mchog ma la gyo lugs mkhyen par mdzad/ kha rag gi 'brug ston grags pa la bde mchog dang/ rje btsun ma rwa lugs/ ye shes mgon po sogs zhus/ zhang g.yu brag pa ngang gzhung gi rngog rdo rje seng ge la sogs te mkhas grub gyi bla ma mang po bsten nas mdo rgyud du ma la thos bsam phyogs med mdzad/ tshig don chen mo zhes bya ba'i bstan

bcos kyang mdzad de dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa drug la gshegs/ pur sbyangs pas gdung rigs lnga byon/ 'ja' tshon gyi gur phub/ cho 'phrul zla ba la khug chos me tog skyes pa sogs byung ngo// 'di sgra thal 'gyur nas phyag rdor gyi sprul pa badzra pha lar lung bstan pa la ngos 'dzin par grags so// de'i slob ma gu ru jo 'ber ni gcung po zla ba 'bum gyi sras yin/ lo bdun man chod lkugs pa 'dra bar yod pa la brgyad nas shes rab me ltar 'bar/ bco brgyad kyi bar du khu bo nyi 'bum dang 'grogs/ gsang ba bla med kyi dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas rdzogs par mdzad cing/ rgyud kyi bshad pa la thos pas sgro 'dogs gcod pa dang/ man ngag gi don la bsgoms pas nyams su blangs pa la brtson/ bcu dgu nas nyi shu'i bar sa skya lo tswa ba la rgyud gsum man ngag dang bcas pa dang/ bde mchog mal gyo lugs nyan/ dbu tshad la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud par byas/ de bzhin du khro phu lo tswa ba la mi tra dzo ka'i gdams pa dang/ chu mig pa la tshad ma bsdus pa/ bal po grags 'bum la do ha dang phyag chen kha 'thor sogs mkhas grub du ma la sde snod dang rgyud lung mang po lo sum cu rtsa drug tshun mnyan pas rig pa rno zhing thos pa shin tu mang bar grags/ bsgrub pa mdzad res yi dam gyi lha zhal mthong ba yin te thugs sgam pas mi gsung/ lha sar jo bo la mchod pa phul dus 'od kyi thig le'i khong nas 'phags pa lag na pad+ma dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal gzigs/ tho reng zhig tshe dpag med kyi zhal mthong bas/ nged cag la tshe ring rgyud med kyang kho bo legs par byung ba de'i byin rlabs yin gsungs/ de ltar tshad med pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag gis 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon du gyur nas drug bcu pa la gshegs/ zhag bdun du 'ja'i dra bas 'brel/ sku gdung la oM AHhU~M dang ring bsrel mang po byon to// de'i slob ma 'khrul zhig seng ge rgyab pa yin te/ g.yo ru gra'i phu so gad phreng gi grong du nyi ma rtse shar la 'ja'i gur phub cing 'khrungs/ lo dgu nas rigs sad de dag snang dang mos gus dpag med shar/ bcu pa'i tshe snang ba 'di rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu la sra zhing 'thas 'thas 'dra ba mi bden snyam pa dang/ bcu gnyis pa la 'khor ba la skyo ba tshad med par skyes nas chos 'ba' zhig las gang gis kyang mi phan par nges shes rnyed/ bcu gsum gyi tho rangs nyi zla dus gcig la shar ba'i rmi lam sad dus/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong/ tshe gcig gis grol ba snying tig gi don sgoms shig gsungs/ de nas bzung snying rje phyogs med du rgyas/ 'gro ba kun la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes shar/ rkyen re la brten nas gzhan la mtho 'grogs dang

khyad gsod mi byed pa'i dam bca' byas/ lus kyi srin bu ngag snying rje chen pos mi 'dor zhing/ longs sprang dang dman pa kho na la byams pa sogs theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pa'i rtags khyad par can mnga'/ bco brgyad la snang ba bden med du rtogs pas smyon pa khrog langs pa lta bu song ste/ pha mas lha gsol ba'i yo byad bsags pa gtor zhing/ pho gdon rgyal po mchod/ mo gdon bsen mo mchod/ ces byas pas/ khyod 'dra ba'i bu skye ba zer 'thabs/ nyi shu la mkhan po lde'u sgang pa dang/ slob dpon bskras sgang pa las rab tu byung/ nyi shu tsa lnga lon tshe sri zhal gyi seng ge rgyab tu byon/ seng ge rgyab pa bar pa la tshal pa'i chos skor/ bla ma tsa ri ba las seng ge mjing bsnol/ ras pa dri med 'od/ lha ri dpal/ gzhon nu 'bum/ ston 'char byang yon/ jo sras su grags pa rnams la/ gsang sngags gsar rnying zhi byed/ gcod yul/ phyag chen mang du nyan/ khyad par thugs rjes chen pos lung bstan bzhin gu ru jo 'ber las rdzogs pa chen po thos pas rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ khro bo ma la sogs pa'i ri khrod dang lung stong rnams su lo mang po'i bar du sgrub pa kho na la gzhol bas dgongs pa ka dag gi sar gshegs/ skal ldan mang po smin grol la bkod nas/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa la theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu thob pa'i rtags khyab par ba rnams mngon du bstan nas gshegs so// de'i slob ma grub chen me long rdo rje ni/ sgrags kyi phur rnal 'byor pa bsam yas kyi sras su btsas/ lo dgu na grub thob za lung pa dang/ mkhan po se lung pa las rab tu byung/ de dus gshin po'i dge rtsar yum rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum kho na sgrogs pas lo bcu drug gi dus sgrags kyi phu'i zhogs steng bya bar brgyad stong brgya rtsa mdzad pas gnas lugs kyi don rtogs/ zangs mtshor bsgoms pas nyams 'bar zhing mngon shes phra mo 'ang shar/ de nas phyogs med 'grims te/ mtshur bu'i do bo ras pa sogs bla ma mang po bsten/ sha 'ug ltag sgo dang/ mkhar chu la sogs pa'i gnas chen mang por byon/ nas bre gang gis zla ba gcig dang zhag nyi shu'i 'tsho ba byas pa sogs dka' thub la shin tu bzod pa gcig yin/ dka' ba spyad pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ lo bco brgyad pa'i tshe seng ge rgyab pa sangs rgyas dbon po mjal nas man ngag snying tig thob/ da man ngag gis 'tshengs bsams pa'i spob pa skyes te bsgoms pas sngon 'gro'i dus rang nas zhag drug tu rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nyin mtshan med par mthong/ dngos gzhi'i dus brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams rmi lam du mjal nas byin gyis brlabs/ nyi shu rtsa gsum par sangs rgyas ras pa la rdo rje pho mo la sogs pa'i gter chos du ma gsan nas

bsgrubs pas/ rdo rje phag mo mngon sum du mjal/ brag la gsang rdor bsnun pas thim gyis song/ rta mgrin/ sgrol ma/ spyan ras gzigs/ slob dpon chen po/ kun tu bzang po/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ bi ma la/ za lung pa/ sangs rgyas ras pa/ 'gro mgon phag gru rnams zhal gzigs/ dung lung du mkha' 'gro'i sgra shin tu snyan pas skye rgyud chod pa'i lung bstan/ ka ba can du phag mo dmar mo/ grub thob za lung pa nam mkha'i klong du mjal/ ngar chung na bzhugs pa'i tshe rmi lam na phag mo gtso 'khor lnga mthong/ der mnal sad tsa nas/ 'od kyi phag mo dngos su gzigs/ skyabs gnas rdzong du rdo rje sems dpas rmi lam du rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang bskur/ spyir bla ma mang po bsten cing khyad 'phags kyi bla ma bcu gsum bzhugs/ bka' drin 'gran zla bral ba grub thob za lung pa/ mtshur phu'i ngo bo ras pa/ 'khrul zhig seng ge rgyab pa gsum las snying por don rnyed pa yin/ 'di brtul zhugs shin tu che bas zhig po'i spyod pa blang dor med pas gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig la sgra ji bzhin par spyon nus/ rgod phrug nam mkha' la lding ba mthong bas rig pa brtul zhugs kyi ngar thogs nas nam mkha'i lam la 'gro ba dang/ brag la 'dam ltar byed pa byung/ mkhan pa ljongs dang/ mkhan pa gling dang/ seng ge rdzong dang/ mkhar chu rnams su sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan btsugs shing 'gro don mdzad/ tshe tshad sum cu rtsa bdun yin pa la/ slob dpon kun dga' zhes pa'i skal ldan zhig gis gsol ba thebs pas/ dgung lo drug cu rtsa gcig pa la dur khrod la bar gshegs pa'i tshe 'od chen po sgra dang bcas pa nub phyogs su yal ba kun gyis mthong/ pur gyi rnam pa sbyang dus/ nam mkha'i lam nas pur khang la 'od lnga'i snam bu brkyang pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i ltas dpag tu med pa byung zhing/ sku lnga thob pa'i rtags kyi gdung yang rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin byon to// 'di grub thob o rgyan pa dang dus mtshungs/ u rgyan pa bcu phrag lhag bcas kyis bgres la sku tshe yang ring ngo// me long pa'i slob ma ni rig 'dzin ku mA rA dza ste/ g.yo ru 'on par gsar rdzid kha ces bya ba'i grong rdal du 'khrungs/ thar pa rgyan du btags/ chung ngu nas dad pa dang snying rje dang shes rab la sogs te 'phags pa'i nor gyi khyad chos mang po mnga' bas klog yig ma bslabs par mkhyen/ lo bdun pa la kong po 'or shod mtho stengs dgon pa'i bla ma dgyes rdor ba las/ kyai rdo rje dang bde mchog gi dbang zhus/ lo dgu pa'i tshe mkhan po gtsang pa las yongs rdzogs kyi dge bsnyen blangs/ spyan ras gzigs 'khor ba dong sprugs kyis chos skor la sbyangs/ bcu gnyis pa la phag mo gru'i mkhan po yer ba pa dang slob dpon

mnga' ris pa las rab tu byung/ mtshan gzhon nu rgyal por btags/ 'dul ba bslabs/ rin po che grags ye ba la log lnga'i bar du nA ro chos drug la sogs pa dang/ mtshar stengs pa la brtag gnyis nyan/ dpon sangs shel bzo rig pa bslabs/ yi ge drug pa bzlas pas shel gyi khang bu gcig na thugs rje chen po zhal 'dzum pa mthong/ khyung nag shag dar la rnying ma'i rgyud lung man ngag mang du zhus/ ngang phug tu me long rdo rje dang mjal/ phyag rgya chen po'i khrid zhus pas sems car mthong du ngo 'phrod/ de nas grub chen ba mon gyi mkha' 'gro gling la gshegs pa'i phyags phyir byon/ rdo rje phag mo'i chos skor sogs zhus nas bsnyen par mdzad pas/ tshes bcu'i nub cig u rgyan pad+ma dang mjal/ e ma rigs kyi bu/ rtag tu chos gyis shig gsungs/ de nas mtshur phur byon nas gnyan ras dang/ dar ma mgon po la karma pa'i chos skor rnams zhus/ de nas la stod ding ri dang/ spu trar byon pas/ grub chen u rgyan pa dang/ rje karma pa rang byung rdo rje dgung lo bdun pa rab tu byung ma thag pa dang mjal/ u rgyan pa las gdams pa mang du nod/ de nas lo 'ga' na o rgyan pas gnyan ras la snying tig zhus pa'i zla la tshang bar thob/ rgya sman pa nam mkha' rdo rje las gsang skor gnad kyi ngo sprod dang/ skal ldan pa chos kyi seng ge las gsang ba gnad kyi me long sogs rdzogs chen gsang ba'i skor zhus/ slar mkhar chur grub chen me long rdo rjer gsang ba snying tig dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa legs pa thob/ 'bul rgyu gzhan med pas lus ngag gi zhabs tog dang/ dbyar ril po gnyis su ri mo mdzad/ nas khal bzhi bzhi gnang ba'i gnyis gnyis kyis shog bu nyos/ mtshan mo dpe rnams bris/ phyed pos mar me dang gsol ba mdzad pas/ dka' thub kyi mthus shig nad drag po zhig byung/ thugs dam yang khyad par can 'khrungs/ bla ma mnyes nas 'gro don gyis shig pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob/ dbang gral du bla ma'i dbu'i bar snang la mgon po phyag bzhi pa dang/ sgo'i thad na e ka dza TI mthing mo zhing dbyug dang spyang mo bsnams pa bongs nyis thog tsam pa/ phyi ngos na las kyi ma mo khrag ral can lag pas khrag bcus nas 'thung ba rnams mthong/ lo brgyad du bla ma 'du 'bral med par bsten/ u rgyan gyi sgrub gnas snyug tshal sbug tu dgun thog cig bzhugs pas rdo rje phag mo zhal gzigs/ de nas shes rab phyogs med du rgyas/ re zhig yar klungs mtshar stengs kyi ri khrod btab nas bzhugs/ de nas bla ma 'da' bar mkhyen nas mkhar chur byon tsa na/ bla ma'i sras gnyis sa skyags su 'dzom/ slar log nyi shu lnga'i dus mchod btsugs/ tsa ri la byon pas krig

mo lha'i ne'u gsing gi rdo sku la 'ja' tshon sna lnga zug pa sogs byung/ de nas mtshur phur chos rje rang byung rdo rje gdan drangs te snying tig gi gdams pa rnams phul/ shangs su byon nas lce sgom nag po'i brgyud pa slob dpon sgom pa la gsang skor snyan brgyud rnams dang/ bsam gtan mig gi sgron me zhus/ ding ri sna dmar du dbon po byang sgrub la yang dgon pa'i ri chos rnams nyan/ u rgyan pa rin chen dpal dang yang mjal/ mar lam bla ma bkra lung ba las gshin rje dgra nag la sogs pa zhus/ slob dpon ye mgon la sogs pa bshes gnyen mang dag las gsang skor dang/ rgod tshang ba'i khrid kyi skor/ a ro'i khrid mo che don skor la sogs pa bod na grags pa che ba'i rdzogs rim phal mo che khong du chud/ chos phyir dka' spyad bzod pas tsa ri gsar ma bgrod nas rnying ma'i g.yu mtsho 'gram du gcig pur zla ba brgyad bzhugs/ cho 'phrul chen po byung ba gshis thog tu ro snyoms pas gzhi bdag dbang du 'dus nas khad par gdan drangs bsnyen bkur byas/ dzam b+ha las nor bu byin/ mtsho nang du 'od lnga'i lbu ba sel po tsam zhig thim 'gro ba gzigs/ thugs nges 'byung dang skyo shas kyis rgyud brlan pas dus rtag tu sham po la sogs gangs khrod dang lung stong 'ba' zhig tu lhags skyob tsam la brten nas bzhugs pas slob ma'i tshogs mang po 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad/ sprul pa'i skur gdon mi za ba karma pa rang byung rdo rje dang/ rgyal ba klong chen pa gnyis rdzogs pa chen po'i slob ma'i gtso bor gyur pas bstan pa 'di spel ba'i phrin las la mu dang mthar ma son/ de skad du 'bri gung pa chos rgyal rin chen phun tshogs kyis/ chos 'di'i bstan pa'i bdag po kun mkhyen klong chen pa yin/ rgyal ba rang byung rdo rje'i dus 'phrin las rgya che/ zhes gsungs pas mtshon no// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shin tu goms pas snying rje chen po'i dbang gis grong dang yul 'khor mang po dag la'ang thabs la mkhas pas thar pa'i sa bon 'debs pa kho na lhur mdzad cing/ kong po nas e la thug gi bar 'jigs pas nyan pa'i lam phrang la 'gro ba dag gi dbugs 'byin pa dang/ ri dwags dang nya la sogs pa'i sems can nyam chung ba de dag thugs shin tu brtse bas bdog pa la 'phangs sems med pas ri rgya dang/ lam rgya dang/ chu rgya la sogs pa mdzad nas bde 'jam la bkod/ gang du bzhugs pa'i lung pa dang/ yul grong thams cad kyi sad ser yams nad la sogs pa zhi bar mdzad cing phan pa 'ba' zhig lhur len/ snying tig gi gdams pa rdzogs rim gzhan dang ma 'dres par rang skad kyi grub mtha' bslang ste 'chad nus pa dang/ shangs la sme ba a'i ri mo can mnga' ba

sngags bdag gza' dang dam can rnams kyis bka' la nyan cing mi dang mi lab pa bzhin du yod pa dang/ mngon par shes pas gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dul lugs mkhas pa dang/ gzhan rgyud byin gyis rlobs nus pa dang/ rjes su bzung pa'i skal ldan kun la 'das dus rtags khyad par can 'byung ba sogs slob dpon bi ma la'i sku'i bkod par grags shing/ thal 'gyur las dge slong dpal ldan zhes lung bstan to// de ltar don gyi 'gro don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang nas bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa chu mo lug gi lo'i ston zla 'bring po'i nyi shu lnga la sgra dang 'od dang/ gur khyim la sogs pa'i rtags ngo mtshar ba dang bcas sku gshegs pas/ nye gnas sgom dar la sogs pa drung na yod pa rnams kyis mo gus chen pos gdung ba bskyed pas slar bzhengs te skyil mo krung bcas/ zhal 'dzum pa'i ngang nas khyed rnams mya ngan ma byed/ nga shi ba min gsungs nas gdams ngag gzhal ta ci rigs pa byon/ zhag bcu gsum sku tshe slar la bsrings/ der tshes bdun gyi nyin gshegs pa'i phyi na ji ltar bgyi/ bla ma kun mkhyen pa gdan 'dren nam zhus pas/ khong 'o brgyal du ma 'jug/ da gzod chos kyi zhun thar ma chod pa yod na der song/ kha ta mang po sngar nas byas zin/ cal col ma smra gsungs/ drang srong tsog pu'i 'dug stangs dang/ chos sku'i gzigs stangs kyi ngang las 'dzum par mdzad de/ tshe brgyad kyi tho rangs kha na gdod ma'i grong khyer ga na ba der gshegs so// nyi shu lnga la pur bzhu bas dbu thod ril por byon pa'i nang na rigs lnga'i tshom dkyil dang/ snyan gong g.yas na rje btsun ma mthing ga tshon gang pa/ gdung rigs lnga dang/ ring bsrel la sogs pa byon cing 'ja'i gur gyis khor khor yug du dkrigs so/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po karma pa rang byung rdo rje ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten du dngos su byon pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings nas ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i glus bskul nas sems can rnams la tshad med pa'i snying rjes gzigs te stod lung du rgan rgon gnyis kyi bu shi ba'i ro la grong 'jug gi rnam pas gshegs tsa na/ shi mi gson la blta ba ltas ngan yin zer nas mig khab kyis gtsags/ dal 'byor gyi chos bco brgyad tshang ba'i lus las gzhan du gyur pas slar 'phos te/ rnal 'byor pho mo gnyis kyi bur srid pa bzung/ sngon gnas rjes su dran pa la sgrib byed skra'i rtse mo tsam yang med pas mngal gyi dri mas gtan nas ma gos pa rgya gar na shAkya thub pa dang/ bod du skyes bu chen po 'di las med par grags/ rgya bod gnyis kar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i srog shing gcig pur bzhugs/ bsam yas mchims phu dang

g.ya' ma lung sogs nas tshe tshu'i gter bzhes nas gong ma rgyal po'i tshe bsrings/ bi ma la mi tra rang gi mdzod spur thim pa gzigs pa'i mod la snying thig gi dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon du gyur/ 'on kyang gsang sngags bla ma la bsten pa'i mig ltos tsam ston pa'i slad du bcom bskyungs nas rig 'dzin ku mA rA dza las gsang ba snying tig gi man ngag yongs su rdzogs pa gsan/ 'di ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma las brgyud pa gcig 'ong thang ba la dgongs pa'i tshe slob dpon sangs rgyas gnyis pa zhal gzigs/ man ngag snying tig dngos su thob kyang tshig brgyud la nan tan du bya ba'i phyir sho'i rgyal sras legs pa spyan drangs nas tsa ri dgon gsar du rdzogs par gsan/ slar slob ma rnams la rtsal du bton nas gsungs/ bka' las/ chos 'di lta bu nub tu 'phangs pas g.yung ston rdo rje dpal gyis gtsang/ ye rgyal bas khams kong/ ye shes rgyal mtshan pas hor dang rgya nag/ sprul sku bas dbus su dar bar gyis zhes sman lung pa shAkya gzhon nu sogs la rjes su gdams/ sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis// rgya mtsho'i bar du spel bar byed// ces pa de yin par grags/ kun tu bzang po thugs kyi klong na rang gsal te dgongs pa'i gter mdzod chen po la dbang bsgyur nas karma snying tig ces grags pa'i gdams pa yang byung/ 'di dag kyang bstan pa'i chu mgo gcig yin no// rgyal ba gnyis pa dpal bsam yas pa kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang po'am/ klong chen rab 'byams ni/ g.yo ru gra'i cha stod grong du ngan lam btsan po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba ma smad pa'i rigs kyi yon tan can no// rus ni rog ste sad mi bdun gyi nang tshan dz+nyA na in+d+ra rak+Shi ta'am/ bod skad du ye shes dbang po bsrung/ slob dpon chen po'i dngos slob dge slong rgyal ba mchog dbyangs dang gdung gcig pa'i rabs nyer lnga pa/ mes po lha srung zhes bdud rtsi'i bcud len grub pas lo brgya dang lngar 'tsho ba de'i sras slob dpon bstan pa srung zhes rig gnas dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor la rang byan chud pa zhig/ 'brom ston rin po che rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyi gdung las byon par 'brom bza' ma bsod rnams rgyan zhes bya ba dang 'dus pa las skye ba'i myu gu bzung ngo// de'i tshe yum la seng ge chen po gcig gi dpral ba na nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas srid pa gsum lhag ger gsal ba zhig rang nyid la thim par rmis so// de nas rab byung lnga pa'i phur bus spre'u spo zla'i tshes bcu'i nyin mngal gyi chu 'dzin las rnam par grol/ gzhon nu don grub la lha'i dbang pos bya ba bzhin du nam grub re ma tis ngas bsrung ba yin zhes lag tu blangs/ slar yum la gtad nas mi snang bar song/ 'di ltar byang chub

sems dpa' ni 'phags pa'i nor gyis gdod nas phyug pas dad pa dang/ snying rje la sogs pa'i yon tan bsgrib med du gsal/ lo lnga nas bri klog legs par mkhyen/ yab las bka' brgyad bder 'dus/ phur pa/ rta mgrin bla ma'i las gzhung sogs sgrub phrin mang du gsan/ sman rtsis la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud/ dgu pa'i steng du nyi khri dang brgyad stong brgya tshar bton pas lhag med du thugs la 'dzul/ bcu gnyis pa'i tshe bsam yas pa mkhas po bsam 'grub rin chen dang/ slob dpon kun dga' 'od zer las rab byung gi dngos po brnyes/ mtshan tshul khrims blo gros su grags/ dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la legs par sbyangs pas lo bcu bzhi par bshad pa'i ba dan bzung chog pa byung/ bcu drug par slob dpon bkra shis rin chen la lam 'bras dang/ chos drug gnyis/ phag mo'i chos drug/ bde mchog dril bu pa/ phyag rdor 'khor chen la sogs pa'i dbang khrid gdams pa mang du nyan/ slob dpon dbang ye/ ston tshul/ khro phu pa la sogs par/ bya spyod/ rnal 'byor/ rdo rje gur/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas thod pa/ rdo rje phreng ba/ dus kyi 'khor lo sogs pa'i sngags rgyud mang po dang/ rin po che za lung pa sogs la zhang tshal pa'i gdams sgor/ rgod tshang pa'i lam khrid/ gcod yul/ zhi byed snga phyi bar gsum la sogs pa mang du nyan/ bcu dgu par gangs ri'i khrod na tshad ma smra ba'i rig gra chen po rngog legs pa'i shes rab kyis legs par bskrun pa'i gnas gsang phu ne'u thog gi ma la ya'i nags klung chen por zhugs nas gling stod gdan rabs bco lnga pa slob dpon btsan dgon pa dang/ gdan rabs bcu drug pa bla brang pa chos dpal rgyal mtshan gnyis las/ byams pa'i chos lnga/ tshad ma sde bdun/ phar phyin/ dbu ma la sogs mtshan nyid theg pa'i lung rigs kyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba mngar por gyur pa dag lo drug gi bar du lhag ma ma lus par zos pas blo gros chen po'i lus kyi stobs lhag par rgyas/ dpang lo blo gros brtan pa la mdo ting nge 'dzin rgyal po la sogs pa'i zab chos mdo lnga/ shes rab snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pas mtshon pa'i lung phran mang po sogs nang pa'i gzhung/ sgra dang snyan dngags dang/ sdeb sbyor dang/ zlos gar la sogs pa'i phyi rol pa dang thun mong du gyur pa'i gnas thams cad la thos bsam mthar phyin pa'i sna zhags ring por brkyangs/ shes rab kyi lha 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ mtsho ldan ma/ mi g.yo ba/ phag dkar rnams la sgrub pa mdzad pas kun kyang zhal gzigs/ khyad par sgra dbyangs lha mo phyag mthil du bzhag nas gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa zhag bdun du bstan cing lung bstan thob/ lhag pa'i lha de dag gis

kyang thogs pa med pa'i blo gros kyi dngos grub chen po'i gnas gang yin pa'i dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa'i 'phyang 'phrul dang/ rin po che'i tog gis rnam par dpyangs pa/ brgal ba dang/ brtag pa dang/ rigs pa'i thal 'gyur gyi sgra chen pos sa 'di g.yo ba tsam du gyur nas/ rgol ba ngan pa'i khyu mchog ra gcig pa'i brtul zhug 'dzin pa rnams sgrub pa dang/ sun 'byin pa'i rkang pa mchog gis rnam par brdzi ba dang/ rnam par 'thag pa dang/ rnam par nyam nyes par byas nas cang mi smras pa'i gnas la bkod pa bsam yas lung mang pa'am/ klong chen rab 'byams zhes pa'i mtshan gyi rnga bo che mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ mi ma yin gyi gnas su'ang grags pa gsal ba nyid do// de ltar lung dang rigs pa'i gnas rgya chen po la mi 'jigs pa'i nyams brtas par gyur na'ang/ 'di ltar skyes bu chen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la gang nye ba'i phyogs la 'jug par rtsom ste/ phyogs bral gyi gnas su lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu'i rnam par thar pa la yid gzhung pas/ bla ma dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ma la mdo dang/ rgyud dang/ man ngag mang du zhus nas thos pa dang bsam pa'i blo gros cher bskyed/ gangs ri'i khrod na gzhung lugs dang man ngag mang du gnas pa la phyogs dang ris su bcad pa spangs te bung ba gzhon nus sbrang rtsi'i snying po la bya ba bzhin du/ dan phag pa/ slob dpon gzhon nu don grub myos mthing ma ba sangs rgyas grags pa sogs bla ma bzhi la mdo sgyu sems gsum/ rnying ma rgyud 'bum gyi gtsos mang dag gsan pas snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i grub pa'i mtha' chen por gcig tu 'jug pa'i rten 'brel shar/ phyis gsang ba'i snying po la snying tig dang mthun pa'i TI ka phyogs bcu'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba nyi zla'i sprin gyi snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ spyi'i khog dbub gnyis mdzad/ gsang snying 'grel ba spar khab gyi lugs ltar 'chad pa mi legs kyi/ rong zom kyi lugs ltar legs pa yin zhes gsungs/ lar g.yung 'grel dang bcas 'di gsum rang bshad sgroms che bar snang/ slob dpon gzhon rgyal la sogs par dbu ma tshig 'jug la sogs 'phags skor rnams tshang ba dang/ gzhon rdor la spyod 'jug dang bslab btus la sogs pa/ jo bo'i yi dam skor sbyor drug/ chos drug/ mkhan po la khro phu pa'i skor/ kha rag chos skor/ sgrub thabs rgya mtsho/ chos chung brgya rtsa/ 'dul ba lung la sogs shin tu mang ba rje rang byung rdo rje la sbyor drug gegs sel dang bcas pa/ nA ro chos drug/ sku gsum ngo sprod/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho/ spyan ras gzigs rgyal po lugs/ gsang 'dus/ sam+bu Ti/ ma hA mA yA/ gshin rje gshed dmar nag sogs chos bka' rgya

gsang phu'i chos grwa sogs gtsug lag khang dang chos sde rnams la bstod pa'i tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gsum mo// gnyis pa khyad par nang gi bstan bcos kyi skor la/ dang po rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i skor la/ byams chos lnga'i spyi don gyi 'grel pa/ sa lam gyi rnam gzhag rin po che'i them skas rtsa 'grel dang bcas pa/ mngon rtogs rgyan gyi lus rnam gzhag gi gsal byed rgyan gyi snang ba/ 'dul ba kA ri ka'i gsal byed 'od kyi snye ma/ dbu ma thal 'gyur gyi gnas gsal ba rab tu mi gnas pa'i don bsdus/ bslab bya rgyal sras lam bzang sogs legs bshad rgya che ba'i chos sde nyi shu rtsa gsum/ gnyis pa 'bras bu sngags kyi skor la/ chos spyod thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rgyud kyi bshad 'grel byang chub ljon shing/ rgyud sde spyi'i don bshad rdo rje 'byung ba/ dam tshig gsum bkod kyi rnam bshad nyi ma'i 'od zer/ sgrub phrin skor la'ang gnas brtan bcu drug gi cho ga gzhan phan nor bu/ sgrol ma man+Dal bzhi pa'i cho ga bde legs kun 'byung/ sman bla'i cho ga yon tan phreng rdzogs/ spyod rgyud sgrub thabs zla ba'i nor bu/ rnam snang sgrub thabs ngan song kun sbyong/ kun rig rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du slob ma 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs sdug bsngal kun spyod/ shAka thub sgrub thabs 'od zer kun 'byung/ byams pa'i sgrub thabs pad+ma brtsegs pa/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal/ dbyangs can ma/ phag mo/ mi g.yo ba/ dzam b+ha la/ de dag rnams la dkar ser dmar sngon sogs so so'i sgrub thabs/ dmar po skor gsum/ 'od zer can/ nor rgyun ma/ aM gu li/ dug sel can/ rnam rgyal sogs dang/ dbang phyug khyab 'jug sogs 'jigs rten pa'i sde/ gzhan bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med gsar rnying thams cad kyi rtsa gsum chos srung nor lha bcas/ rgyal ba sras bcas kyi sgrub thabs skor chos sde brgyad cu rtsa lnga/ gsum pa nges don gsang ba'i bstan bcos la/ dang po zab gsang rgyud sde'i dgongs bcud rdzogs rim skor la/ bde mchog rim lnga'i zab don snying po'i yang zhun/ gsang 'dus rim lnga'i zab don 'od gsal 'khor lo/ sbyor drug bsdus don de nyid 'dus pa/ lam 'bras bsdus don rim gnyis 'khor lo/ chos drug snying po 'od gsal rnam sbyang sogs chos sde nyi shu lhag tsam/ gnyis pa 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i skor la/ ngal gso skor gsum dang/ mdzod chen bdun bcas pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad zin la/ bi ma la'i snying tig zab pa pod bzhi dang man ngag brgya bcu dgu brjod bya che bas 'thor ba bsdus pa lta bu bla ma yang tig gam/ yang zab yid bzhin nor bu/ skye ba snga ma la mkha' 'gro'i snying tig rjod byed tshig gi gter la dbang ba/ da res mchims phur brjod bya'i don la dbang bsgyur nas/

rgyas par bkral pa'i zab cing rgya che ba shog skya/ yang zab rnams shog 'dra/ shin tu yang zab rnams shog ser te skor gsum du phab pa'i mkha' 'gro yang tig/ gnyis ka'i don rgyas pa bkral ba zab mo yang tig/ snyan brgyud thig le gsang skor dang/ snying tig rnam pa gsum du bsdus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bcu phrag bzhi lhag bcas te/ kun dril bas sde tshan brgya phrag gnyis dang drug cu rtsa gsum tsam mo// de dag kyang mdo tsam smos pa ste/ gzhan du chos 'byung rin po che'i gter mdzod ces bya ba dang/ chos spyod rab tu gsal ba dang/ shi gson gyi bsngo ba rin chen phreng ba dang/ rgyu la khams 'dus pa me tog phreng ldan dang/ rkyen la khams 'dus pa ka tha sum cu/ rgyu rkyen gnyis ka la khams 'dus pa dus la mngon par skyo ba'i rabs la sogs pa shin tu mang la/ dus de dag tu bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus nyung ba'am/ mkhas rmongs kyi bstan bcos la bye brag mi phyed pa'i shugs kyis nub pa'ang shin tu mang ba yod mchi ste gsung rab kyi dkar chag rin po che'i mdzod khang zhes bya ba la shes par bya ba ni phyi mtha' 'di'i gtan tshigs tsam mo// babs lugs chen mor sgra mkhas dpal 'dzin du lung bstan pa la sngon gyi bla ma rnams kyis ngos 'dzin par 'dug ste/ go rim gyi nges pa ltar na blo gros mchog tu ngos bzung na 'thad la/ ku ma rA dza dang gnyis kyi bar la lo brgya brgya'i gtan tshigs mi 'grub snyam du'ang dogs par mi bya ste/ lo brgya ni spyir bstan pa 'di yid dpyod dang 'dres pa'i tshe de'i gsal byed re 'byon pa la dgongs kyi/ gzhan du ni gnas skabs de dang de'i gdul bya'i rten 'brel kho na las ltos nas sprul pa sgyu ma lta bus don mdzad pa'i phyir ro// don la kun tu bzang po 'jig rten du byon nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pas 'di'i gsung rab tshig bzhi pa yan chad la'ang ces spras su bya ba yin no// de la gsung gi bdud rtsi myangs pa las byung ba'i slob ma'i gtso bo dag smos pa ni/ zhog thar gling pa mkhas grub bde legs rgya mtsho/ mkhas grub chos kyi grags pa/ mkhas grub khyab gdal lhun grub ste grags pa thob pa'i mkhas grub gsum/ mdo khams pa 'dan sgom chos kyi grags pa/ rgyal sras bzod pa/ bla ma dpal mchog pa/ gu ru ye shes rab 'byams/ gzhon nu sangs rgyas te thugs kyi sras lnga/ sprul sku dpal 'byor rgya mtsho/ slob dpon sangs rgyas kun dga'/ slob dpon blo gros bzang po// stag mgo bya bral chos rje ste/ bstan pa spel ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi/ pha rgod rtogs ldan rgyal po/ rnal 'byor pa 'od zer go cha/ rig 'dzin 'od gsal rang grol/ bya btang bsod nams 'od zer grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa bzhi/ gzhan yang sne gdong gong ma dang mtshams sbyor ba'i sangs rgyas

dpal rin dang/ grags pa dpal/ glu mkhas bsod nams seng ge la sogs bstan 'dzin gyi bshes gnyen du ma byung/ phyis chos rgyal 'bri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs la zhal bstan cing/ rang gi sras sprul sku zla ba zhes dbu gtsugs rta mgos mtshan par ston pa de'i skye ba yin par lung bstan/ dbu zhwa bskon te byin gyis brlabs pa las dngos kyi slob mar gyur te gsung rab rnams la 'dzin skyong spel ba'i gces spras dpag tu med pa mdzad/ de las pad+ma'i rgyal tshab shAn ta pu ri pa'am/ gter chen shes rab 'od zer la brgyud/ dpal ri theg pa mchog gi gling bskrun nas bstan pa'i sbyin bdag zhabs drung 'phyong rgyas pa la sems nyid ngal gso rtsa 'grel par du brko bar bskul/ bstan pa 'di la bshad sgrub byed dgos par gdams pas don gyi brgyud 'dzin yin pa yang zhal gyis bzhes so// dus phyis rig pa 'dzin pa mkhyen brtse'i 'od zer la sa mo yos kyi lor dpal gyi mchims phur ye shes kyi sku lan gsum bstan cing shing rta chen mo sogs gab pa'i man ngag thams cad 'dis gsal zhes glegs bam zhig kyang gtad/ gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa thams cad bstsal nas chos tshul rgya mtsho dang khyad par kun mkhyen bla ma nyid kyi gzhung lugs dang gdams pa mtha' dag la rang byan tshud/ shin tu nye brgyud kyang rung ste 'phags pa lhas ma taM gi pa rjes su bzung ba bzhin no// man ngag snying gi thig le'i skabs kyi gtam bshad zin to//// da ni mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi bstan pa spyi'i babs tshul la/ gangs ri'i khrod 'dir snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa dang por gnyags la babs/ bar du gnubs la babs/ tha mar zur la babs zhes 'chad pa'i dang po slob dpon gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra ni/ yul yar klungs shel pa'am 'phyos/ rus las ming du chags pa gnyags stag sgra lha snang dang/ sru bza' sgron skyid gnyis kyi sras su byung/ mgrin pa na sme ba rdo rje rgya gram yod/ mtshan rgyal ba'i blo gros su btags/ mkhan po bo d+hi sa twa las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/ mdo sngags kyi chos mang po'i 'gyur byed spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ slob dpon chen po dang/ bi ma la dang/ bai ro dang/ g.yu sgra snying po kun la bsten pas bka'i chu bo bzhin 'dus pa yin/ dkyus bshad gzhung gi chu bo 'grel Ti ka stong thun dang bcas pa/ snyan brgyud gdams ngag gi chu bo gnad yig dmar khrid dang bcas pa/ byin rlab dbang gi chu bo skur thabs ngo sprod dang bcas pa/ phyag bzhes phrin sgrub kyi chu bo bstan srung drag sngags dang bcas pa'o// de la slob dpon chen pos bdud rtsi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor du smin par mdzad pas yar klungs shel gyi brag phug rdo ba skam po'i khong nas grub chu bton/ 'di las

brgyud pa'i sgyu 'phrul kyang yod dgos te/ gtso bor phur pa las mngon rtags brnyes pa yin/ btsan po khri srong gshegs pa'i phyi zhig na btsun mo tshe spong bza' bsam sbyor mi srun pas lo paN phal cher dbu 'phang smad/ gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras yar 'brog tu bzhugs pa la/ rang gi pha sbun gnyags dge ston dgra langs te 'di mu stegs kyi sngags mkhan yin no zer g.yo can gyi kha smras byas/ bse zhos byugs pa'i b+han+d+ha nang dmar ba yod pa de brkus nas skye bo blun por gyur pa dag la ston cing/ b+han+d+ha'i nang gri rtse drud nas 'di ni zag zog gi las so zhes dbyen bcos/ skye bo rnams the tshom sel ba'i ched du/ gang du bzhugs sar rin po che'i rnyed pa sprul pas mi rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul du shes nas kho'i ngag la yid mi gtod kyang/ da dung bya ba mang po bsogs nas sku la brdo ba'i thabs sna tshogs byed pa mkhyen nas gshegs/ kong po mchims yul gyi phu na phebs tsa na/ lung stong gcig na ra ma bdun 'gro zhing 'dug/ g.yog po glal mig 'og btsan bya bar 'di ded cig gsungs pas/ kho na re/ ra la bdag po yod mchi 'dis ci 'tshal zhus pas/ lung stong gi ra la bdag po ga na 'ong ded cig gsungs/ der bdag po mchims bya rog gis shes te rkun khag phab/ ra la bdun 'jal dgos zer/ bdun 'jal sprad tsa na/ da dung ma tshims par dben pa bshigs/ lcags kyis tho ba bzung nas 'ded du byung/ gnyags kyis bros nas gtsug lag khang gi nang du chud/ sgo bcad pas them pa la tho bas brdeg cing btsun chung gi mgo la de'u thebs zer/ der yang bzhugs su ma ster bas/ dbus su gtad de byon tsa na/ 'gro sras chung bya ba sha ba gcig ded nas byung ba phrad/ kho'i rta drogs/ sha ba shor bas/ kho yang khros te gsod du byung ba la 'bros pa'i 'dun pa gcig gtad pas khos ma mthong nas thar/ dus de tsam na lha sras mu ne btsan po yum dmar rgyan gyi dug gis bkrongs pa'i 'dad kyi tshogs dbur slob dpon bi ma la rgya nag nas rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs pa dang mjal/ gser phye long mo gang phul bas/ lo tsA ba dpon g.yog skyid dam gsungs// yar 'brog sgang du skyid bgyi ru// dge la ston gyis ma ster ro// mchims yul gting du skyid bgyi ru// bya rog dmyal bas ma ster ro// bod yul dbus su skyid bgyi ru// 'gro sras chung gis ma ster ro// zhes zhus pas/ lo tsA bar brnyas na bstan pa la shin tu gnod par dgongs nas/ phur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gsham sngon gnyis thugs nas phyung ste bshad/ lho brag g.yar chu sna'i brag phug tu lo paN lhan cig pas seng phur nyi shu rtsa gcig la bsten nas bsgrubs pas phur bu phan tshun 'khrol ba tsam du grub/ der gnyags kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang nas phur bu gdengs te bya

rog la'o byas pa/ stod khams kyi bya rog thams cad tshogs byung/ slar mchims bya rogs la'o zhes bsgril bas/ mchims nas bya rog zung zhig byung/ gnyags khros nas bya rogs gcig la gdengs pas mod la shi'o// der bi ma las mngon spyod kyi mthus gsad pa grub kyis/ da chos nyid kyi mthus gso ba e 'grub gsos shig gsungs pas/ slob dpon dza lan+d+ha ri pa dang/ slob ma nag po spyod pa bzhin gnyags kyis slong ma nus/ bi ma las bye ma gcig btab pa'i mod la bya rog sos te dengs par gyur to// rtogs pas bdag ma bsgral bar/ drag shul gyi las brtsam pa grub kyang nyes pa che'o gsungs nas gnas lung gi cho ga mdzad/ der mchims lha g.yag dkar du brdzus nas byung ba sngun la bsgral/ de nas mchims bya rog/ bla sbyang rab 'bring tha gsum/ bran dang khol po/ 'og rta sgo khyi gnag gi gnyen mtshams dang bcas pa phur pa gdengs mchog gi mthus bsgral nas rabs bcad/ de nas pha spun gnyags dge ston la btab pas 'di ltar drag po mthu'i las ni rnam pa zhe sdang rdo rje'i rten 'brel la lhag par ltos pa zhig la/ slob dpon bi ma la'i thugs rjes gnyags la snying rje chen po'ang skyes/ dgongs pa chos nyid du gyur pas ye ma thabs/ der slob dpon bi ma la'i las 'dir grogs mngon spyod kyi mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed na thebs gsungs pas 'tshol du byon/ dus de tsa na mgar byed pa la sog por 'bod pas/ sog po beg tse zhes bya ba khro bo'i dbyibs su yod pa gcig rnyed/ de'i gzugs mgo bo rgya mdud du 'dril zhing/ ro smad zur gsum pa'i rnam par shar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan rtags thams cad tshang bar gzigs/ gnyags kyis kho bo'i phyi na mar byon/ kho mgar byed pa'i sbud pa 'bud grogs mdzad kyi rgyu mtshan nyid kyi chos bshad pas kho'i rna lam du ma byung/ kr-i yog sde gsum bshad pas res 'ga' tsam nyan cing gzhan tho ba chems chems brdung skad/ nang rgyud sde gsum bshad kyin lcags kyi lcug ma snyod pa rnams khyur mid byas pas/ kho ya mtshan skyes te 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ci las byung zer/ da lta bshad pa'i chos de nyams su blangs pa las byung smras pas/ kho shin tu dad de lag cha thams cad phul nas slob mar byas/ lha dpal gyi ye shes su ming spos/ de bzhin du 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu yang phur pa sgrub pa'i mtshan ldan du shes nas dpon slob gsum kas bsgrubs pas/ de dge ston gyi tshor te gsod du 'gro ba'i sta gon brtsams pa na/ gzhan dag gis ban+der brnyas pa mi rung zer nas bshol btab kyang ma nyan/ nang par 'gro rgyu'i nub bud med mang pos mtha' bskor nas mgo bcad pa rmis/ de chung ma la bshad pas nan gyis bshol btab kyang ma nyan par rta la

zhon nas song ba na/ bya chen po zhig 'phur byung nas rta 'drogs/ sha khams khrag thig tu gyur te srung mas dngos su bsgral bar grags/ der sog po dpal ye snying bton nas slob dpon la phul bas/ sdig pa ci yang mi bya zhing// dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad// rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul// sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ gsungs/ mdor na skyob pa'i lha bya khrar sprul pa dang/ bla spyang bran khol 'og rta sgo khyi gnyen mtshams tshud chad bsgral zhing rabs bcad/ de bzhin du 'gro sras chung ne thang la rta khyung 'tsho ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang bkug ste gdab las kyis tshar bcad/ 'gro lha spyang ki sngon por byas pa dang/ bla spyang bran khol thams cad sngar bzhin kha dag par byas/ de'ang gnyags lo tsA chen po 'di sangs rgyas dngos dang mtshungs pa'i paN grub rnams la bsten pas/ sgra tshad mtshan nyid/ sngags phyi nang kun la mkhyen pa shin tu che bar grags/ lo tswa ba chen por bstan nas dam pa'i chos mang por bsgyur/ mdo sgyu sems gsum ka'i bstan pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur cing nyan bshad kyi sgo nas slob ma khyad par can mang du bskrun pas bka' drin bsam gyis mi khyab/ mthar snyan brgyud rdo rje'i zam pa dang/ man ngag sde las dngos grub chen por brnyes te stong gsal 'od kyi phung por gshegs so// de la slob ma'i gtso bo ni phur pa mkhan po dag dpal brgyad du 'dren pa yod de/ 'dir sog po dpal gyi ye shes/ gra dpal gyi snying po/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje/ 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu/ gnyan dpal dbyangs/ mtshur nag ye shes dpal/ u pa do gsal/ thang dpal gyi rdo rje/ dgye 'phags pa shes rab/ b+hu su ku mchog rnams te/ dbon brgyud rnams las kyang phrin las rgya cher byung ngo// sog po dpal gyi ye shes ni yul yar 'brog pa yin/ slob dpon chen po'i dus nas dngos grub brnyes tshar ba gcig thun mong ba'i snang ngor mgar gyi tshul du bzhugs/ gnyags lo chen po de mkhyen pa shin tu che bas slob dpon rnams las kyang rang nyid mkhas snyam pa lan gsum skyes pas srog la 'bab pa'i do gal tshar gsum byung bar grags/ de la rgyu 'bras mi bslu ba'i bden pa las bdag gir mdzad pa'i tshul ston pa la bab pa'i skabs shig na/ gnyags la sku dgra lan gsum du langs pa'i res gcig yul nye 'khor gyi gnyags dmar pha spun gyis mi sha mkhon tu byas nas slob dpon btson du bzung/ sog po dpal ye de don la grub pa'i spyod pa 'ba' zhig yin gyi rnam par gcan zan gyi gnya' nas 'dzin pa sogs rtul phod par ston pas/ skabs 'dir bla ma'i phyir du lus srog 'dor ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gnyan po la 'tshal bas btson srung gnyis bkums/ slob dpon btson dong nas spyan drangs pa

sogs sku dgra lan gsum btul zhing thugs las gsum bzung bas/ rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum par sprul nas rjes su bzung ba 'di tsam don la gnas so// des gnubs chen la rjes su gdams pa'o// de la snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bar tu gnubs la babs te/ gnubs chen sangs rgyas rin po che 'di/ btsan pa'i khri srong lde'u btsan nas/ khri bkra shis brtsegs pa dpal gyi bar ci rigs par byung bar 'dod pa dang/ yang ral pa can gyi dus su byung nas/ khri bkra shis brtsegs pa'i bar bzhugs par 'dod pa dang/ yang snga ma btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan dang/ phyi ma ral pa can gyi dus na byung ngo zhes gtan tshigs yod de/ rgya bo cher/ rgya gar mkhas pa bi ma mi tra dang// u rgyan mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// bal po'i mkhas pa ba su d+ha ra dang// bod kyi mkhas pa dz+nyA na ku mA ras// bdag la gnang ba'i man ngag 'di rnams yin// ces pas btsan pos khri srong gi dus su byung bar rtsod pa med la/ sku tshe'i tshad brgya dang bcu gsum la gtan tshigs bsgrigs nas byon pa'i dus phyir bsring ba dang/ dus gnubs dang/ yul sgrags la gzugs brnyan gnyis par bcos pas snga phyi gnyis par byung ste snying po med do// 'dir ni gnubs kyi ban chung sangs rgyas ngas// lo ni brgya dang sum cur lon// zhes phyi mtha'i tha tshig min pas skabs kyi 'phros don la'ang byung bas tshe'i rig pa 'dzin pa brnyes/ mnga' bdag dpal 'khor btsan gyi bar du bzhugs par snang ngo// de la yab gnubs rigs gsal ba'i dbang phyug dang/ yum mchims mo bkra shis mtsho zhes bya ba'i bur btsas/ mtshan rdo rje khri gtsug tu grags/ lo bdun par 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu las bri klog sbyangs/ mkhan po bod+hi sa twa las rab tu byung/ slob dpon ba su d+ha ra bsam yas su byon pa dang mjal nas gser srang gsum gyi 'bul bar byas te man ngag 'ga' zhig thos/ slob dpon 'byon khar slar bal yul du shog ces pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob pas rgya bal la 'gro ba'i blo chung ngu nas skyes/ spyir rgya gar la lan bdun byon pa'i snga res dang po lo bcu gsum pa yin/ ces zer/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs las sgrub chen bka' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob cing dngos grub brnyes/ re zhig na yul gzhis btsongs pa'i rin gser zho lnga bcu byung ba bsnams te rgya bal la gtad de byon/ slob dpon ba su d+ha ra las/ rgyud dang man ngag mang du thos/ des mdo lung gi mkhan po chos rgyal skyong dang/ drag sngags kyi mnga' bdag ram bu gu h+ya'ang bsten/ rgya gar dang/ bal po dang/ bru sha'i yul na gnas pa'i mkhas pa mang zhig bsten/ rgya gar du mkhan po chos rgyal skyong las mdo lung 'ga' zhig dang/ khyad par bru sha'i mkhan

po che btsan skyes las mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen par mdzad/ bsam yas su lo tswa ba chen po'i grar bzhugs shing dam pa'i chos kyang bsgyur/ dben pa 'ba' zhig brten dgongs pa la/ spyir dus 'di tsam na rgyal khrims zhig cing/ phyogs ris kyi 'khrug pa dar ba'i skabs su gyur pas gnubs chen yab sras la 'o brgyal chen po byung/ khyad par sku che snga ma la rgya gar du shan pa ma ru tse bya bar 'khrungs nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i 'dul zhing lhag ma ma lus par rdzogs par mdzad pa dang/ bod 'dir dpon sras kyi bstan pa nyams par byed pas mtshon snga phyir bstan pa la gnod byed mang du 'byung ba de dag drag sngags kyis tshar bcad nas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir rgyal ba'i phrin las kyis bskul ba las rnam pa'i rkyen yul ba'i khengs log snga phyi bar gsum du byung nas rigs kyi sras gnyis bkrongs pas/ ji skad du/ nyon mongs bod yul dbus su langs// 'tsho ba'i zas rnams 'bangs kyis phral// ces dang/ bdag 'dra gnubs kyi ban chung yang// snying nas chos bzhin bya sems skyes// zhe sdang dgra bos byed ma ster// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// zhe sdang de ma thag tu bskyed// dkar po'i che ba 'don bsams nas// ngan sngags yig sna sna tshogs bslabs// zhes pa ltar rgya bal gyi yul nas gshed skor rgya mtsho'i drag sngags rnams spyan drangs pa yin te/ bla ma bcu gcig zhabs nas btegs/ 'on kyang mkhas pa bzhi la gtugs// slob dpon dpal gyi seng ge dang// rgya gar khrag 'thung nag po dang// phung byed shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang// bal po ba su d+ha ra bzhi// mkhas pa bzhi yi thugs brtol nas// zab pa'i man ngag thugs la btags// zhes dang/ de dag kyang gnad du bsdus pa la bal po'i slob dpon nyid las byung ste/ 'di skad/ slob dpon bal po'i rgyal po yis// yang le shod kyi brag phug tu// gnubs kyi ban chung 'dir shog gsungs// bam chen ro yi dbang bskur nas// lha ru 'jam dpal tshe bdag gtad// ces pas mtshon no// de ltar slob dpon 'di rgya gar du byon pa'i re zhig rdo rje gdan la tshogs gsog mdzad pas/ nam mkha'i klong nas gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa zhig rang gi thad khru gang gi sar byung ste lan gnyis su ma zin/ gsum pa'i tshe phyag g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyi bar du chags pa'i mod la de phyag na rdo rje dngos kyi skur gyur/ dbang bskur/ byin gyis brlabs/ sangs rgyas ye shes su ming gi cod pan dpyangs/ dbang rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu pa 'bral med du 'chang ba da lta rong byams chen gyi thugs ka na yod par grags/ rgya bal gyi ru mtshams rdo rje rtse lnga'i brag phug tu slob dpon pad+ma las kyang sdom pa nod pa sogs rgyud dang man ngag mang po thugs su chud/ dur

khrod dang/ mtsho gling dang/ mi ma yin drag po rgyu ba'i gnas su sgrubs pa mdzad pas/ 'jam dpal ya mAn+ta ka la sogs te yi dam gyi lha dpag tu med pa'i zhal gzigs/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ yi dwags drag po dag dang yang gtam 'dre zhing mchod par byed/ nus pa shin tu che bas lha srin kun gyis stangs phul/ dur khrod phu lung nag por e ka tsa Tis zhal bstan/ bram ze mo'i thod pa dngos grub kyi rdzas su byin/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis mon nag kha khra'i thod pa'ang dam tshig gi rdzas su spras/ mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub/ bod yul dbus kyi gnas sgrags kyi yang rdzong du sgrub gnas kyi mthil mdzad/ de bzhin du nyug gi rdo rje sgrom bur zla ba dgus sems nyid btsan sa zin/ gtsang gi phung po ri bo che dang/ g.yung gi rdza lhun mo sogs zhabs kyis bcags/ drug cu re gcig par sgrags su khengs 'og byung bas gshin rje'i gshed kyi drag sngags rnon pos grong khyer mang po brlag par mdzad/ de skad du/ bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ sgrub khang ya ma'i mkhar la byas// sgrags la nag po'i rtse mo ru// nye 'byed rlung gi 'khor lo bskor// sgrags kyi grong khyer sum cu rtsa bdun brlag/ ces 'byung ngo// slar gnubs yul rong du bros/ der yang bzhugs su ma ster bas snye mo bye mkhar bzung/ gnas der yang dmag gi chom pos bskor zhing sku srog la bsdo bar nyen pa na/ mkhar gyi rtse nas lha 'dre gnyen po dpang du gsol/ tshigs su bcad pa'i bden pa bdar/ chos gos brdabs pas dam can chos skyong rnams mngon sum par byung ste/ bdag cag gi mthu rtsal gyis ri rab thal bar brlag/ nyi zla cha lang rdeb/ gnam sa bla 'og bsgyur nus kyang/ tshe rabs snga ma'i lan chags brdol bas sngon chad grogs byed du ma ster/ da ni bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zer bas chos gos kyi chag nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bton/ dam can rnams kyi srog snying drangs/ dmag mi yod pa'i ri logs la dril zhing bsdigs pas/ ri las me dpung chen po byung ste dmag rnams thams cad bsregs shing brlag par byas/ slar rab tu 'gyod nas bsam gtan mig gi sgron ma sdig sbyong du mdzad par grags/ sku dgra thul rjes lo gsum gyi bar la dbul zhing phongs/ sog po dpal gyi ye shes las sems phyogs dang sgru 'phrul la sogs pa gsan/ sgrags yang rdzong du de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gzhol/ mnga' bdag ral ba can gyi bar yan chod du rgya gar dang bod kyi bar du 'byon bzhud kyi ngang du yod pa la/ dar mas bstan pa bsnubs pa thugs kyis ma bzod nas slar yang drag sngags spu gri reg chod mang po tshags su btsud nas mngon spyod kyi thugs rjes mtshams sbyar bar dgongs pa la/ sdig spyod rgyal

po lha lung dpal gyi rdo rjes bsgral zin pas drag sngags 'chol gyi dogs nas gter du sbas/ mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi bstan pa'i rgyun slob ma'i tshogs la mi nub par spel nas mthar rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i lam nas lhun 'grub 'od kyi phung por mya ngan las 'das so// 'di la rgyud 'dzin gyi slob bu sras kyi dam pa gcig/ thugs zin gyi sras bzhi dang lngar byung ba las/ sras kyi dam pa yon tan rgya mtsho ni skye ba snga ma yab sras su 'brel/ 'dir gnubs khu lung du btsas/ skye ba snga ma'i phung po rgya gar d+ha na d+ha las gnod sbyin mo'i rkang mgyogs bsgrubs nas grub kyang gshog pa bcag pas ma nus/ slar rkang mgyogs cig shos bsgrubs pas khos thu ba'i nang du d+ha na d+ha la khur nas mtshan gang gcig la khu lung yon tan rgya mtsho'i rtsar bskyal/ der yon tan rgya mtsho'i skye ba snga ma rang gi gcung por gyur pa la rjes su brtse bas dbang bskur/ yon bdag la thun mong dngos grub byin pas mi rabs bdun tshun chad dar bar grags/ yon tan rgya mtsho la sgrub gnas grong du mi rung gsungs nas mkhar gdongs yon mo'i gtsug rum lta bu'i sa gnad bstan te/ bstan srung gshin rje dmar nag dang/ ma gshin gyi skor sogs byin nas rgya gar du gshegs/ der yon tan rgya mtsho lo sum cu lon pa'i tshe khyi ra la 'khyams pa slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes sngar gyi shugs la nag por bzhugs pa dang mjal bas/ rus gcig pa dang/ skal ba can dgongs nas chos sgor bcug ste rjes su bzung/ lta ba sgang dril ba/ gab pa mngon du phyung/ gsang ba khong lto ltar phyung/ star ga gegs sel gyi tshul te bzhi ka bshad pas gdams ngag thams cad rdzogs par grags/ 'dila'ang khengs log byung ste gshed ma brgyas bskor ba'i tshe yang 'bar ba lta stangs kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon sum du grub pas/ spyan g.yas pa nas me 'bar/ g.yon pa nas chu 'brub pas sprul pas glags blta ba'i skabs ma rnyed par rang rang gi lag cha 'chor ba'i ngang du 'bros dgos pa byung/ spyir yi dam mang po'i zhal gzigs/ dam can bran du khol/ chos nyid kyi bden pa mngon du gyur pas dngos grub chen po gnyis ka brnyes pa zhig yin te/ rnam thar rgyas pa yi ge'i lam du 'dren par mi nus pas so lugs kyi yig cha sogs la shes so// thugs zin gyi sras bzhi ni/ so so ye shes dbang phyug la lta ba skang dril te bshad/ pa gor blo chen 'phags la gzhung 'grel Ti ka dang sbyar nas bshad/ dan yon tan mchog la star ga gegs sel gyi tshul du bshad/ sru legs pa'i sgron ma la tshig sdeb sbyor legs par bshad/ bzhi ka tshang ba ni yon tan rgya mtsho yin no// 'di la sras ye shes rgya mtsho dang/ pad+ma dbang rgyal gnyis byung/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i sras lha rje hU~M chung/

'dis rje btsun mi la la drag sngags bstan pas mthu chen gyi grags pa thon pa de byung/ yon tan rgya mtsho yab sras kyi slob ma nyang shes rab mchog/ 'di bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la mkhas par grags shing dog la gshongs kyi gtsug lag khang yang bzhengs/ ha'o sgol gyi brag la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal gzigs/ brag la rdo rje brgyab pas 'jim pa la byas pa bzhin thim gyi song ba sogs grub pa brnyes pa'i lo rgyus mang du yod/ de'i slob ma chos lung shes rab 'byung gnas yin/ bla ma'i thugs zin cing/ bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la mkhas pa'i grags pa thob// de dag las brgyud pa phal mo cher rong lugs sam/ rus las btags te nyang lugs kyang zer ro// yang so ye shes dbang phyug gi slob ma ngan thung byang chub rgyal mtshan/ kong btsan shes rab ye shes/ ra thung shes rab tshul khrims te gsum ka yin gyi breng chags su mi 'dren zhes 'gos gzhon nu dpal ba bzhed/ yon tan rgya mtsho yab sras dang/ so ye dbang gnyis ka'i slob ma nyang shes rab mchog/ de'i slob ma ye shes 'byung gnas/ de'i slob ma lha rje zur po che ste zur po che ni stong tshab 'phags pa rin po che la'ang thug pas/ gnubs chen dang zur po che'i bar na bla ma gcig yod pa yin no// da ni tha ma zur la babs pa'i rnam gzhag bshad par bya ste/ de la zur po che shAkya 'byung gnas kyis bstan pa phyi dar la snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i rtsa ba btsugs/ zur chung ba shes rab grags kyis yal ga brkyangs/ zur shAkya seng ges lo 'bras rgyas par mdzad pas zur mes dpon rnam gsum zhes grags la/ spyir zur ces bya ba'i gdung 'di dang po rgya gar nas lhags pa zhig ste/ 'phags pa'i yul du 'od gsal lha dbang gzhon nu gtsug tor can/ de'i sras man+da zangs zhu can/ de'i sras mdo khams su byung ba zur rgyal ba gsum sgrags/ de'i sras zur bshes gnyen stag sgra can/ de'i sras zur rin chen rgya mtsho/ de'i sras mtsho bzang mig po che/ deb sngon du lha rje zur po che 'di'i sras su 'chad cing/ gzhan du a tsa ra'i sras su 'dod kyang/ 'dir zur pa'i rabs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi yi ge zhig mthong ba de nyid btsan par bgyis te mig po che la zur a tsa ra/ zur kha can lag can/ zur bzang shes rab 'byung gnas te sras gsum byung bas tha chung sher 'byung gi sras lha rje zur po che/ zur ston bla ma/ zur sgom rdo rje 'byung gnas/ zur sgom chung dang bzhir byung la/ che ba a tsa ras rgya gar la byon pa'i sras nyi ma'i snying po/ slar bod du byon nas thag lung par bzhugs pa'i sras zur thag pa sgom chen/ de'i sras zur chung shes rab grags pa yin zhes smra'o// de la lha rje zur po che ni dpal chen po 'jig rten du mngon sum byon pa yin te/

yul mdo khams kyi sa'i cha yar rdzong ngam g.yar mo zhes bya bar yum yon bdag mo bde ba lcam zhes bya ba'i sras su 'khrungs/ lhums su zhugs pa'i tshe yab kyi mnal lam du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa phyag tu byung ba dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs yum la thim pa sogs byung bas sprul pa'i skur shes nas mtshan shAkya 'byung gnas su btags/ yab las bri klog mkhyen par mdzad/ sgyu 'phrul gyi skor dang man ngag phran tshegs zhus/ bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal las tshig gsum rim nod kyis lo dus la bsnyen par rdzogs/ 'di sprul pa'i skur 'dug pas mtshan spo mi dgos gsungs/ mes po rin chen rgya mtsho'i drung nas mtshan nyid sde gsum/ kr-i ya/ rnam 'joms/ rnam snang/ sgyu dra/ dpal mchog dang po rnams dang/ gsang sngags nang gi man ngag thab lam la sogs pa'ang mkhas par mkhyen/ de yang gsung las/ rtsa rlung rta ru zhon/ gtum mo gos su gyon/ gdams ngag skyo grogs su khrid/ dad pas sna drangs te mdo khams kyi sa cha brgal nas 'dam gyi phyogs su nye bar sleb ces gsungs pa ltar/ khams nas 'dam du sleb pa'i tshe lam cha ma 'tshal ba la sprin gseb nas lha'i bu gnyis kyis lam bstan te dbus phyogs su brtol/ yar klung na mo lung du kr-i ya la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ theg pa chen po gsang ba bla na med pa'i rigs sad de/ spang len rtsol byas kyi lam 'di ni 'ching ba'i rgyur 'dug/ tshegs chung la bya sla ba gsang sngags bla med kyi lam zhig dang mjal bar shog dgongs pa'i nub/ nags tshal can gyi ri la sgom zer ba zhig byung/ der gtsang po la lam rgyus bcol nas gtsang la gtad de byon/ gsang sngags kyi chos la mkhas grub brnyes pa su yod dris pas nags tshal gsum sgril bya ba na yod zer/ der sngar gyi rmi lam dran nas byon/ dge gong gi lce shag mchog la bdud rtsi sman sgrub la sogs pa zhus/ spyir zur chen la bla ma mang du bzhugs te/ khyad par du chos lung gi nyang ye shes 'byung gnas las zur pa'i me tog phog pa'i chos sgyu 'phrul dang sems phyogs rnyed pa yin/ tho gar nam mkha' sprel lde la mdo dang par khab/ rdzogs chen man ngag dang bcas pa/ yul gser kyi gnyan nag dbang drag dang/ lce shAkya rgyal mtshan las gsang dbang dang thabs lam/ nyang stod kyi 'dre khro chung la ka dag dang lhun grub/ sgyu 'phrul lam rim/ mchims phu'i rog shAka 'byung dang ldan ma sher tshul las yang dag/ zhu ston bsod nams shAkya las mdo yongs rdzogs/ stong tshab byang chub/ rgya ston glo gros/ bka' sdod ye shes snying po rnams la'ang mdo lung/ dbang sgrub/ rgyud 'grel phrin las dang bcas pa gsan zhing/ bla ma de dag kyang rta la sogs pa'i bdog dgu'i 'bul ba dang/ 'khor gsum yang dag gi mchod

pas mnyes par byas pa 'ba' zhig go/ tshul de lta bus mkhas pa mang po'i man ngag blangs/ dgongs pa nyams 'og tu chud/ sde snod dang/ rgyud sde'i grub mtha' kun la mkhas shing byang chub par byas nas/ rtsa rgyud dang bshad rgyud sdebs/ rtsa ba dang 'grel pa sdebs/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs su sdebs/ sgrub thabs chog yig la sogs par sdebs nas lag len du thebs par byas/ nags tshal can gyi ri la dpal yang dag gi sgrub pa kho na la gcig tu gzhol bas bskyed rdzogs bzlas gsum gyi gdeng chen po stobs su gyur/ mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa mdud grol nas shes rab phyogs med du rgyas/ slob ma mang du 'dus pa la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul gyi 'chad nyan kyang mdzad/ rgyun du g.yeng ba'i las thams cad rnam par spangs/ che thabs dang 'du 'dzi bshigs/ byang chub phyi dus la mi re ba da lta nyid kho nar mngon du mdzad pa'i brtson 'grus drag po rgyud la brten nas bsgrubs pas re zhig na gtor len tu rnal 'byor pa'i rnam pa can zhig byung/ de la cung zad byin pas khos ril bo thob/ rtsigs pa'i drung na phar 'gro ba dang/ zur po che 'di snyan pa dang yon tan mnga' ba zhig 'dug ste/ rog shAka 'byung gi rgyun gtor tsam yang mi 'dug zer/ de nye gnas kyis thos nas bla ma la zhus pas bos shog gsungs 'bod du phyin pas phu gcig na ka pA la nas zan 'brul za zhing snang/ 'dod do byas kyang yang ma nyan par rog shAka 'byung mchims phur tshe la dbang thob nas yod pa yin/ zur po che la chos len mi thong gyis shig zer/ rkang pa sa la ma reg par song/ der bzang sgom shes rab rgyal po dre'u'i khal dang bcas chos len du btang bas/ bsam yas su slebs te dris tsa na su la'ang bshad rgyu mi gda'/ slar rgan mo zhig gis de dang po tsa na mchims phu'i ri 'di la yod pa yin zer/ rdzi'u gcig gis/ ri 'di la yod yod 'dra/ skabs re tsa na rnga dang/ ru lu'i sgra ngas kyang thos zer/ der bzang sgom gyis rtswa phang phung yod pa zhig tu kha la phog/ dad gus kyis gsol ba btab pas/ sgra chen po dang bcas brag phug gi sgo de mthong/ der mos gus chen po dang bcas phug par thal gyis song bas/ gsang ba'i sgrol ging bco brgyad kyis 'du bar 'ong ba 'di sgrol zhig zer/ der bla ma rog gis 'di las can yin pas mi rung gsungs/ lo rgyus zhus pas/ nga rog shAka 'byung/ slob ma zur shAka 'byung/ mtshams sbyor shes rab rgyal po/ rten 'brel bzang gsungs/ der bzang sgom la sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor/ yang dag gi bdag gzhan dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis/ yang phur sgrags ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbang bskur/ dpe dang bka' lung rjes su gdams pa thams cad thob ste bsam yas rgal

bar sleb pa'i dus su/ khal gyi steng na khye'u dar gyi ber thod can zhig mthong bas slar log ste dris pas/ tshangs pa dung thod can 'go ba yin gsungs nas gsol ka'ang gnang/ slar gdams pa bla ma zur chen la gsang ba'i ngang nas phul/ slob dpon kun gyis sgom sgrub lo du mar mdzad cing 'chad nyan bskyangs pas 'gro phan che bar byung na'ang/ zur chen po dben pa 'ba' zhig la thugs gtod pas/ 'di yang dge sbyor gyi g.yeng bar 'dug pas bo dong mnga' bdag brag la 'gro gsungs te der gcig pur sgom sgrub la zhugs tsa na/ bu slob rnams kyang rjes su 'brangs byung bas/ khyod rnams nga'i rtsa bar yong don byang chub thob pa re ba yin na sgom sgrub min pa gzhan gang gis kyang phan mi thogs/ 'jig rten gyi g.yeng ba rgyab tu zhog la sgrub pa la 'bungs/ nga yang sgrub pa kho na byed gsungs te/ dpon slob kun so sor sgrub pa mdzad/ de nas re zhig na mkha' 'gro'i lung gis sa smad la phebs nas 'gro don che bar bskul bas/ rta nag gi lung par byon/ 'ug pa'i tshang yod pa'i brag phug kha shar bstan gcig tu yang dag lha dgu'i sgrub pa mdzad pas/ dpal chen po yang dag lha dgu'i zhal mngon sum du mthong/ de ltar bzhugs gnas kyi ming las bla ma 'ug pa lung ba zhes kun tu grags/ der bsgrub rgyags kyang dkon shing 'byon pa'i lung bstan kyang byung nas smad phyogs su ljongs bsgyur bar chas pas gzhi bdag ze re ze btsan bya bas gzugs bstan te bzhugs par zhus pa na/ nga la gnas gzhan du 'gro ba'i lung bstan yang byung/ rgyags kyang med pas 'gro gsungs pas/ dpon slob rnams kyi 'tsho ba bdag gis 'bul/ cis kyang bzhugs par zhu zhus pas/ re zhig bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes/ rta nag gi phyug po zhig la nad drag po byung nas/ mo lung la tshogs gtor thong/ bla ma 'ug pa lung pa la byin rlab zhus zer bas/ nad pas bla ma'i drung du phyin pas zhal mthong ba tsam gyis bder song/ byin rlab zhus/ tshogs 'khor byas ma thag tu nad las grol/ de bzhin du nad gdon gyis mnar tshad la byin rlab dpag tu med pa byung bas skye bo rnams dad de sku bsod chen po skyes/ bla ma'i dgongs pa la/ thun mong gi bsod nams 'di mchog sgrub pa'i bar chad chen po yin/ ri bo dgu 'dus la sgom du 'gro dgongs nas gshegs tsa na/ gzhi bdag des bsgrub rgyags ni phul yod/ cis kyang bzhugs par zhu zer bas/ khyod kyi 'tsho ba 'di gzhi dag po zhig kyang dka'/ 'du 'god kyis g.yeng bar 'gyur bas da lan 'gro gsungs pas/ khong gdong mchi mas gang nas cis kyang mi bzhugs nas bdag la'ang thugs rjes dgongs 'tshal zhus nas srog snying phul/ bla mas dge bsnyen gyi gdams pa phog nas

bstan pa bsrung bar bsgos/ mar lam jo mo sna dmar kyang dam la bzhag/ de nas g.yas su thar du byon/ zur chung pa la nga la ri bo dgu 'dus su sgom zer ba'i lung bstan byung ba de brag rgya bo 'di yin par 'dug gsungs nas dpon slob thams cad sgrub pa la bzhugs so// de'i tshe lha rje zur po che la slob ma rtse mo bzhi/ rtsa lkog dang lnga/ sgom chen brgya rtsa brgyad yod pa'i rtse mo bzhi ni/ lta dgongs kyi rtse mor gyur pa zur chung shes rab grags/ sgyu 'phrul gyi bshad pa'i rtse mo me nyags khyung grags/ mkhyen rgya'i rtse mor gyur pa zhang 'gos chung/ sgom sgrub gyi rtse mor gyur pa bzang sgom shes rab rgyal po/ rtse lkog ni chos kyi steng du pho ze'i rtse mor gyur pa rtsags bla ma'o// yang rtse lkog brgyad du 'dren pa'ang yod do// de bzhin du gru sgom sba 'gying/ yul sgom nag mo/ lce sgom shAka rgyal/ zur sgom rdo 'byung/ g.yu sgom jo 'bar/ sba sgom bsod nams snying po la sogs te sgom chen brgya rtsa brgyad do// de thams cad kyang nam mkha' la 'gro ba sogs rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'ba' zhig tu grags/ des nas re zhig bla ma'i drung du bud med gsum byung nas/ g.yas ru shangs kyi mda' shangs chu'i shar na lung pa dbyibs zla gam/ phu na brag snying 'dra ba mda' na thang ma traM bsgral ba'i pags pa lta bu/ ri dbyibs glang po che'i sna 'dra ba la brag seng ge'i ya thod lta bu/ rdza gsum nas chu gsum 'bab pa sku gsum gyi don rnyed pa zhig yod kyi der bsgoms nas skye ba 'di nyid la 'tshang rgya zhing/ 'gro don yun ring bar 'gyur ro zhes lung byin pas/ zur chung pa la brag rgya bo sgrub gnas kyi pha phogs su mdzad/ bla ma 'khor dang bcas pa mar byon/ sa dmigs mkhyen nas zhang mo yon tan rgyan gyis sbyin bdag byas/ des phul ba'i phug par bla ma bzhugs/ zur chung pa sogs sgom chen brgya lhag tsam yod pa lung pa'i phu mda' thams cad du sbyil po dang/ brag skyibs dang/ lhags skyobs la brten nas sgrub pa mdzad/ yul mi tsho bdun gyis zhabs tog byas shing/ yon bdag gi rtsa ba sram pa bon grong pas byas/ bla ma sangs rgyas dngos su 'dzin to// der lo mang por sgrub pa mdzad/ zhi ba zhe gnyis dang/ khrag 'thung lnga bcu'i zhal mthong/ khyad par du yang dag gi lha tshogs mi dang mi phrad pa bzhin gzigs nas gsung gleng mdzad/ gau ri brgyad la sogs pa bran du khol/ mi ma yin rnams kyis las gang bcol nyan pa byung/ der bla ma'i zhal nas/ ngas 'ug pa lung gi sa rdo ri brag thams cad zhi khro'i lha tshogs su mthong/ khyad par dben ser mo'i lho ri 'di rgyal ba rigs lngar rgyun du mthong bas zhi ba'i lha khang bzhengs gsungs te sta gon mdzad/ sa'i dpyad gzigs nas sa dgra ngan pa dag bcos/ lho ri sdig nag thur du rgyug pa 'dra ba'i

rwa dbrag tu zur po che dpal chen po'i skur bzhengs nas zhabs g.yas pa bzhag sar zhabs rjes kyang byung/ der he ru ka'i sku 'bum phrag yod pa'i mchod rten dang/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga rtse mo bzhi dang rtse lkog lngas mchod rten re re yang bzhengs/ klu dung skyong gnas pa'i chu mig la zangs bkab nas kha bcad/ de'i steng du gtsug lag khang gi rmang bting/ che chung nyang stod rtsis kyi lha khang dang mnyam pa byed rgyu la/ rdo bzo bas cung zad bskum zer/ de bzhin du bzo bo phal cher bsod nams ma yin pa 'du byed la spro bas/ shing thams cad khod mi snyoms shing/ ring thung du gnas pa la sogs phyag rdzas dron pa'i thabs 'ba' zhig byas kyang/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba la goms pa'i snying stobs la ser sna dang 'jur bu'i rnam rtog gis rdzi bar nus pa ma yin pas nor rdzas la rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur gzigs/ ka chen ya gcig bregs thal te ma snyogs pa/ zhabs kyis bsgril bas ring thung snyoms pa'i grub rtags bstan/ de la rdo rje'i rtags sbyar nas yod/ de bzhin du ka ba kyog por gyur pa rnams zhabs kyis bsgril pas mda' ltar 'khrongs pa dang/ log sgrub bzod pa sogs tshad med pa'i thugs rje dang nus pa mthong bas/ bzo bo rnams slar 'gyod pa chen po skyes/ lha khang tshar ba'i shing lhag rnams la rtsigs pa med par ka ba bzhis btegs pa'i sgo khang khyad 'phags zhig byas par 'gyod tshangs rgya phugs zhes grags la de slar mgon khang du mdzad/ de ltar gtsug lag khang dbu rtse ka ba bzhi pa rnam snang kun tu zhal gyis gtso byas pa'i zhi ba'i lha tshogs/ khyams stod ka ba brgyad kyi sar sgo srung rta bdud gnyis/ glo 'bur lho byang gnyis na yum chen mo dang/ mar me mdzad la mchod lha bzhi bzhis bskor ba/ mgon khang na legs ldan/ dpal ldan lha mo/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin rnams 'bur sku byas/ khyams stod ka ba brgyad kyi sar bla ma brgyud pa'i gyang ris/ skor khang la pad+ma brgya ldan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gsum/ khyams smad ka ba nyi shu'i sar sangs rgyas stong rtsa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med pa nye sras kyis bskor ba/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags/ sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyob/ rigs gsum mgon po/ ma la ya'i zhing bkod/ srid pa'i tsakra la sogs pa gyang ris su mdzad/ de ltar skya bzo grub nas/ da ni nga'i lha khang thang ka yan chod gser gyis 'byug pa yin/ gser 'grong ri tshugs po la 'don gsungs nas dgongs pa mdzad pas/ nam phyed na gzhi bdag btsan de rta pa nag po gcig tu byas nas byung/ zur po che la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas

lha khang gi thog kha yan chod gser du byugs nas/ nged kyi gser 'dzad pas/ lha'i sku rnams khyab nges zhig 'bul zer bas de bzhin du mdzad/ rab tu gnas pa'i tshe rgyal ba zur che chung gis kun rig rnam snang gi dbu gtsug nas zhugs thugs kar thon/ thugs ka nas zhugs dbu gtsug tu thon pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa zad mi shes pa bstan pas bzo bo rnams snying thag pa nas dad par gyur te/ bla ma'i lha khang ri rab btsam la/ mchod rten gyi 'degs byed zer/ bsam yas mchod rten sdon mo la dpe byas/ bkra shis sgo mang lha khang gi byang phyogs su dad bzhengs kyis phul/ bla ma'i mtshan gdan sa la chags pas dpal 'ug bya lung zhes yongs su grags/ lha rje zur po che'i ring la dbu brnyes/ zur chung pas srol btod/ zur shAkya seng ges dar rgyas su mdzad zer ba de gdan rabs 'dis snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa la bya ba brlab po che mdzad pa'i rnam gzhag yin no// de nas 'chad nyan la sogs pa'i 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad/ re zhig na dpon slob kun gyis yang dben ser mo'i yang dag gi lo sgrub mdzad pas mar zad de mchod me ma byung bas/ chu mig zhag bdun du mar khur byin gyis brlabs nas mar khu 'dzad med blangs chog pa byung/ der thog mar 'chad nyan pa rnams bshad pa la gtso bor 'don pas dang po tsa na phrin las shes pa nyung ste/ khong rnams chos rar 'gro gleng byed pa'i tshe phrin las shes shing 'gro gleng med pa dag mi shes pa'i phyogs su phul bas/ rgyun gtor lhan cig tu gtong ba'i tshe phrin las shes pa tshos gyer du ma nyan/ der bla ma'i zhal nas/ gang la mthar phyin pa gcig gis grol ba yin/ gcig gis gcig la khyad gsod mi rung/ theg pa dgu'i grub mtha' rang sa na yod kyi/ theg pa'i kha 'dzin pa ma yin/ gsungs pa thams cad la don kyi go ba khyad par can skyes nas zhi dul du gnas pa byung/ de'i dus su bla ma'i zhal nas/ slob ma rtse mo bzhi la/ lam nyams su len pa la gang gal che/ khyed bzhi po go ba re zhog gsungs pa la/ zur chung pas/ sngar zhen gyi bag chags tshan po che 'di/ ma bsgoms na mi 'dzad pa gcig 'dug pas/ nyams len la blo thags chod pa gal che/ 'phral gyi sgrib pa dri ma 'dra ba 'di/ da lta nas dag dgos pa 'dug pas/ nang dang nub tu dge sbyor byed pa gal che/ ji srid gnas lugs mngon du ma gyur gyi bar du bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog dgos pa 'dug pas/ dge ba phra ba la brtson pa gal che zhus/ de bzhin du gzhan gsum pos kyang rang sa'i go ba re zhus pas/ bla ma mnyes pas/ dam pa'i lha chos byed pa la// lam lta sgom spyod pa gsum du gda'// lta ba zhes ming du btags pa de// lta rgyu byung na lta

ba min// lta rgyu med pa'i don la blta// chos nyid brjod med lam du 'khyer// zhes pa la sogs pa lta sgom spyod pa'i lam khyer gyi mgur gsungs pas slob ma kun mos pa mchog tu 'phel/ de nas bla ma zur po ches 'ug pa lung du tshogs pa bskyangs shing rgyud kyi bshad grwa dang sgom grwa chen po mdzad/ zur chung bas yang dben sngon mor yang dag gi sgrub pa mdzad cing bzhugs tsa na/ shangs kyi sgrub khang gdong la rgyu'i he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa krong nger 'dug pa gzigs/ sgrub pa thon nas bla mar lo rgyus zhus pas/ bla ma'i zhal nas/ zur chung pa dpal chen po la grub pa thob pa yin/ nga la rig 'dzin nam mkha'i snying pos kyang he ru ka'i sku bzhengs nas bod 'bangs la gnod pa'i gdon mthu bo che thul zhing 'gro don 'byung ba'i lung bstan kyang yod pas de'i slad du 'gro zhes gsungs/ nye gnas la 'o cag lha khang bzhengs pa'i yo byad sdogs shig/ nged tshos sa gdul bya yi gsungs/ brag seng ge'i ya thod kyi khar bzhugs/ gtor ma bshams/ bla ma dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas stangs stabs mdzad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon sum pa'i skur mthong ba byung/ de nas 'gram rdo bslang ba'i dus su zur chung ba sku lus speg cing zhal rod ngan pa la brnyas nas/ gzhan kun gyis 'gram rdo chen po re bzhag gin/ da zur chung bas gyad rdo gcig 'jog thang zhes zur za bar byas pas/ zur chung pa na re/ dpon slob rnams tsha ba la gshegs shig/ nged kyang da lta 'dod de zer ste ma byon/ khong rnams kyis tsha ba zin nas thon pa dang/ gyad kyi rdo theg pa lta ci smos/ sgul ba'ang mi nus pa'i pha wang chen po brgyad rmang gi phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du bzhag nas/ de la rdo dkar gyis zur chung pa'i gyad rdo lags bya ba bris pa mthong bas/ gra pa rnams spobs pa smad cing gzu bor gyur pa dag mos par gyur to// der nag phyogs kyi lha 'dre byed pa mi srun pas lha khang brtsigs pa'i 'gal rkyen dang mtho 'tshams pa'ang zur chung pas gyad rdo bzhag pa phyin chad nas zhi bar grags/ shing sgrigs ran pa'i tshe ka ba bzhi kyog por byung ba bla ma'i zhal nas 'di zur chung pas srongs shig gsungs pas/ rlung khug pa gcig gi ngang la dgye ba dang gug pa'i rten 'brel cig mdzad nas mda' bzhin du bsrangs/ thog phub zin pa tsam la/ ngas lha bzo ba bkug pas khugs yong gi 'dug gsungs/ zhag gnyis pa la lha bzo shes pa 'ga' zhig chos zhu ru byung/ ma mkhyen pa ltar mdzad nas/ khyed rnams yon tan mkhan gyi rigs sam gsungs/ bdag cag rnams ni lha bzo mkhan te sku drung du chos zhur bcar ba lags zhus pas/ rten 'brel bzang/ ci

'dod pa'i chos kyang 'ong/ dus kyi snyigs ma la 'gro don chen po 'ong bas dpal chen pa'i skur bzhengs pa yin/ khyod rnams kyis de bzhin du 'tshal zhes gsungs pas/ khong rnams kyang dang ba shin tu ston par gyur nas dpal yang dag gi bum dbang sngon la bskur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ring bsrel dang/ bram ze skye ba bdun pa'i sha/ dur khrod brgyad kyi sa rdo chu shing/ rin po che'i rigs/ rgya bod rig 'dzin gyis bsgrubs pa'i chos sman rnams bsres pa'i lde gu sta gon byas/ sku tshad ji tsam bgyi zhus pas/ thog dpangs dang bstun par gnang/ der 'bras bu'i he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug pa mtshar ba dang/ rngams pa dang/ bzhad pa ci lta bu zhig byung yang/ bla mas zhal mthong ba ltar ma byung bas skyor cig gsungs/ lan mar po bskyar dgos pa byung/ res gcig na/ da nga dang 'dra ba gcig shes sam gsungs/ shes mchi zhus pas/ do nub gsol ba thob la/ sang nga la blta ru shog gsungs/ sang zur chung pa dang bcas lha bzo rnams kyis drung du phyin pas/ nye gnas don yod rdo rje la gtor tshogs shoms gsungs/ yang dag gi las gzhung bsrangs/ tshogs 'khor mdzad nas da ltos shig gsungs te lta stangs mdzad pa'i mod la he ru ka dngos su gyur nas/ dbu sprin dang na bun gyi mtshams na lhag ge pa/ zhabs g.yas 'ug pa lung gi he ru ka'i brag gdong dang/ g.yon btsad po pur khang gi ri rtser bzhag pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis/ mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'dril ba/ rdo rje'i gshogs pas bar snang gang ba/ 'jigs shing rngams pa gcig mthong ba dang/ lha bzo ba rnams zil ma bzod par dran med du brgyal/ brgyal sangs tsa na dgongs pa glod nas bla ma zhal 'dzum lhag ge 'dug/ da shes sam gsungs/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sku zhig gsal bar mthong/ de nas gang yang dran pa med par song bas/ da bzhengs rgyu zhal gsum phyag drug pa gcig bstan par zhus pas/ de yang zab ste/ gdul bya'i dbang gis zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'byon/ zhes gsungs nas de ltar bzhengs pa'i tshe/ lte ba man chad snga ma mthong bas mtshon par nus la/ yan chad da dung skyor cig gsungs nas lan grags mang por bskyar dgos pa byung bas/ zhal nas khyed tsho sgrib pa ma dag pa yin/ 'jim pa legs par sbyor la 'dir zhog/ chu mig pha gi nga'i bdud rtsi ka pA la gang gtor ba las byung ba'i sgrub chu yin pas khrus gyis/ lha khang gi phyi la skor ba lan bdun skor la shog/ de bar du nang 'dir su yang ma 'ong/ ngas dpal chen po la gsol ba 'debs pa yin gsungs/ khong rnams de ltar byed pa'i ring la nang na 'phros dir dir 'dug khrus dang bskor

ba tshar nas nang du phyin tsa na/ sku drung na su yang med/ bla ma dgongs pa la bzhugs/ 'jim pa rnams zad/ dpal chen po lte ba yan chod rang byon du shar 'dug pas/ bu slob dang lha bzo ba kun ngo
