tha'u sogs pas kyang bdog pa rgya cher byin pas zur pa'i bstan srid la phan pa rgya cher btags la/ khyad par rgyal ba zur po che'i sku chos kyi dum bu bzhugs pa'i 'jam dbyangs kyi gser sku shin tu mtshar ba bzhengs nas dpal 'ug bya lung gi rten gtsor mnga' gsol/ bshad grwa dang sgom grwa'i tshugs kha chen po zin par byas/ bdog pa la 'phangs pa med pas bstan pa'i rim gro lhur len/ mthong na mi mthun pa med pa'i gzi byin gyis hor gyi mi chen the mur dar kyang dad par gyur nas tshe dbang zhu ba la sogs pa'i dang ba ston nus pa'i sems dpa' chen po'i ngang tshul la gnas pa de dang/ sa bzang lo chen rgyal ba g.yung/ 'jam dbyangs bsam 'grub rdo rje/ sa skya pa'i gdung brgyud/ zur pa'i

dbu che grags pa che ba rnams kyis mtshon bod dbus gtsang gi mkhas btsun bzang gsum thams cad la gtugs nas mtshan nyid sde gsum/ gsang sngags gsar rnying thams cad kyi gzhung dang man ngag la legs par sbyangs/ khyad par du mngon rtogs rgyan/ spyod 'jug/ dus kyi 'khor lo/ kun byed rgyal po/ sgyu 'phrul lam rim/ gsang ba snying po/ 'grel pa spar khab rnams nan tan du sbyangs pas mkhas grub chen por grags/ dus phyis mdo dbang zur lugs kyi bstan pa'i bdag po 'di kho na yin/ sgrol chen bsam rdor las mdo dbang gsan pa'i tshe/ rgya bod kyi na bza'/ thab chas/ nas khal lnga bcu sogs kyis sna drangs pa'i 'bul ba byas te lung lag len phyag bzhes thams cad mtha' chod par mdzad/ gtad rgya kho na'i don du'ang gos yug chen dang gser gyi 'bul bas mnyes par mdzad/ shAkya thub pa dang/ he ru ka rigs lnga gzigs snang du shin tu gsal ba gzigs/ 'dus pa mdo'i lha thems/ gtad rgya'i 'grel pa sogs mang du mdzad/ mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi bstan pa la bya ba rgya chen po mdzad cing/ sgrol ma pa'i sras sangs rgyas rin chen dang/ gnyal pa bde legs pa la sogs te bstan pa'i gsal byed du gyur pa'i slob ma mang dag bskrun nas dgung lo sum cu so brgyad la gshegs/ gnyal pa bde legs kyi chog khrigs kyang yod do//// yang sgrol chen pa'i sras pha rgyud ltar byas na/ sras sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes grags pa de nyid yab kyi lnga bcu rtsa drug pa lcags pho stag la gnas gsar du 'khrungs/ mi rnams kyis khyed kyi sras 'dis phan ni mi thogs/ de tsam gyi gtsigs kyis ci bya zer bas/ 'gro ba la phan thogs pa gcig 'ong gsungs/ dgung lo drug pa la gsang ba snying po'i rgyud thugs su tshud/ zur shAka 'byung ba'i spyan sngar byon/ nga'i bla ma'i sras zhes gces par bskyangs pas rgyud bzung ba de g.yengs/ yang lo brgyad lon pa na bskyar te bzung/ chos brin rnams yab kyis bslabs pas lo bcu bzhi par gzhan la dbang skur ba'i slob dpon pher pa byung/ yab las sgyu 'phrul gyi chos skor rnams thugs su chud par mdzad/ da nga rab tu byung nas mtshan nyid kyang sbyang/ gsar ma'i rgyud sde'ang slob pa yin zhus pas/ re zhig mi rung/ gzod rab tu byung bas chog gsungs/ der ma gcig zhig bdag gir bzung bas sras kha shas 'khrungs/ dge bsnyen gyi rten la bslab sbyangs rdzogs par mdzad/ slar chos 'khor sgang du chig rdzogs mdzad/ sku shin tu btsun par bzhugs/ sgyu 'phrul la mkhas par gyur pas dgung lo bzhi bcu skor la gsang ba snying po la Ti ka che ba gcig dang/ lam rnam bkod la'ang rnam bshad chen po zhig mdzad/ de bzhin du phrin las shar

ba brgyad las/ khro bo la mngon par rtogs pa rgyas pa zhig mdzad pa dang/ gnas lung la'ang cho ga rgyas pa zhig mdzad/ yab dang thugs sras thub pa rdo rje sogs la man ngag mang du mnyan cing nyams su bstar/ dgung lo bcu bdun pa la 'gos lo ye bzang rtse ba rjes su bzung ste/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang/ sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe dbang/ dong sprugs kyi dbang/ tshe bdag dang/ yang dag me gcig gi dbang/ sna bo pa'i lugs kyi rta mgrin dang/ zla rgyal ma'i lugs kyi rjes gnang/ phur pa sa lugs kyi dbang drag po'i rjes gnang dang bcas pa/ sems sde bco brgyad kyi rig pa'i rtsal dbang/ gsang snying rgyud 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ lam rnam par bkod pa'i Ti ka gnyis kyis mdzad pa'i thog nas bshad pa rgyas pa/ gzhan sgyu 'phul gyi khog gzhung bzhi bcu la sogs pa'i gzhung chung bzhi bcu tsam/ mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa dang/ de'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun 'dus dang/ gnubs chen gyi mdo 'grel mun pa'i go cha/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad cu pa dang/ bla ma gnyis/ yang dag rtsa ba'i lung rnams kyang gnang/ snying thig spros bcas la sogs pa'i dbang bzhi dang/ me long bas mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas khrid yig/ rdzogs chen a ro'i man ngag kyang khrid du mdzad/ de bzhin du byang sems ye rgyal ba nas brgyud pa'i thugs rje chen po'i smar khrid kyang gnang ste/ rgyu mtshan de la brten nas 'gos lo ye bzang rtse bas/ gsang sngags rnying ma zhes grags pa'i phyogs la lhag par mos pa thob cing/ chos spangs pa'i sgribs pas ma spags tsam mo// zhes thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i mthar thug don dang ldan par song ba yin zhes nges pa brten pa'i tha tshig go/ de ltar chos rje sangs rgyas rin chen pas bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa lcags mo glang gi lo la dbus su phebs/ gangs po ri'i bsam gtan gling du dbang grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis zhabs nas btegs/ 'dus pa mdo la sogs pa'i dbang mang po dang/ gsang snying la sogs pa'i bshad pa dang lung mang po byin/ brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa lcags mo phag gi lo la gtsang du sku gshegs/ zur chung pa 'khrungs gnas dus 'di yan chad la lo bzhi brgya dang bcu bdun song//// bdag nyid chen po 'gos gzhon nu dpal ni yab 'gos ston 'byung gnas rdo rje dang/ yum srid thar skyid gnyis kyi sras su chu sprel la 'khrungs/ spyan g.yas mkhan chen las rab tu byung/ karma pa de bzhin gshegs pa las byang sdom dang/ chos drug gsan/ rngog byang chub dpal las rngog chos rnams gsan/ khyad par paN chen ba na rat+na las bla med kyi rgyud sde phal mo che'i dbang bskur ba rnams zhus/ mtshan brjod dang dpyid thig/ dbang mdor bstan/ dpe med 'tsho'i sbyor drug rtsa 'grel rnams zhus shing

bsgyur/ rje 'di nyid kyis sgrol chen sangs rgyas rin chen dgung lo bdun cu pa la sa mo phag gi lor sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang/ sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe dbang/ na rag dong sbrugs tshe bdag/ yang dag me gcig rta mgrin/ lha mo dang zla rgyal lugs/ phur pa 'khor lugs/ sems sde bco brgyad kyi rigs pa'i rtsal dbang sogs snga 'gyur rgyud sde'i dbang bka' thams cad ma tshang ba med pa gsan/ bshad pa'i bka' gsang ba snying po rgyud dang 'grel pa so sor bshad pa dang/ lam rnam bkod kyi Ti ka khong nyid kyis mdzad pa dang/ gzhan yang khog gzhung gsal sgron sogs rgya bod kyi gzhung chung bzhi bcu skor gyi bshad lung rnams dang/ mdo dgongs 'dus dang de'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun 'dus rig pa dang/ gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa mun pa'i go cha/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad bcu pa dang/ bzhi bcu pa dang/ bla ma gnyis/ yang dag rtsa ba'i lung rnams kyang gsan/ snying thig la rtsa ba'i dbang spros bcas spros med bzhi'i dbang bskur ba dang/ grub thob me long rdo rjes mdzad pa'i khrid yig gi steng nas khrid dang/ a ro'i lugs kyi rdzogs chen man ngag gi khrid kyang gsan zhing mdor na gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po lta bur gyur zhing rje nyid kyis kyang gsang sngags rnying ma zhes grags pa'i phyogs la lhag par mos pa thob cing/ chos spangs pa'i sgrib pas ma spags tsam mo// zhes gsungs pa'ang bod kyi mkhas rlom phyogs lhung can 'ga' zhig la dgongs pa yin te/ don du'ang rje 'di ni grub mtha' phyogs su ma lhung ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa yin cing bstan bcos rnams kyang tshad mar gyur pa'i legs bshad che ba yang mngon sum gyis grub bo// rje 'dis karma pa chos grags rgya mtsho la sems 'grel skor gsum sogs chos bka' dbang khrid mang po phul/ zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang po bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i mkhan po dang sgru 'phrul gtso bor gyur pa'i gsar rnying gi rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i dbang bka'/ bshad dka'/ man ngag gi khrid sogs bsam gyis mi khyab par gnang/ rje zhwa dmar nas kyang bka' drin che ba'i bla ma gcig pur mdzad/ gzhan yang bka' gter gyi bstan pa sgo du ma nas spel bzhin par dgung lo dgu bcu tham pa lcags glang lor skur gshegs so//// zhwa dmar bzhi pa spyan snga rin po che tre shod khang dmar du/ yab ldong dgon pa skyabs dang yum dbra bza' bsod nams sgrol ma'i sras su 'khrungs/ zur mang dgon rje bdun pa chos grags rgya mtsho dang mjal te rab du byung/ mtshan chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang por gsol/ mkhan po go shrI grags dpal pa dang/ pan sgar pa las kyang chos gsan/

dgung lo nyer bzhi pa la 'gos lo chen po yid bzang rtse bas mkhan po mdzad de bsnyen par rdzogs/ dus kyi 'khor lo/ bde dgyes/ gsang 'jigs sogs gsar ma'i rgyud sde rnams dang/ sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po'i dbang bka' dang bshad pa'i bka' thams cad sogs snga phyir gsan pa mtha' yas pa mdzad/ ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyi gdungs rigs lo chen bsod nams rgya mtsho las kyang gsar rnying gi chos mang du gsan/ rje 'gos las phur pa'i dbang gsan tshe mnal lam du slob dpon pad+ma zhal gzigs shing gdam pa'ang bstsal/ gsar rnying gi chos tshul mtha' dag gdul bya rnams la ston bzhin pa'i ngang nas dgung lo don gsum pa la gzugs sku brtul/ don dam nges 'byed dbu ma chen po'i lha khr-id rgyal tshab chen po'i chos nga la brten cing/ chos skad mthar thug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i gtam gtso bor bzhed pa rje 'di kun mkhyen chen po klong chen pa/ karma pa bdun pa/ kun mkhyen dol bu chen po sogs mthun no//// de nyid kyis 'bri gung zur pa rin chen phun tshogs la bstsal ba ste/ 'di ni dbur stod 'bri gung sku gnyer sgang zhes bya bar skyu ra'i rigs su sku bltams/ dgung lo brgyad kyi steng du spyan snga rin po che chos kyi grags pa las rab tu byung/ bcu gsum par rtsis thang bsam gtan gling du dkar po bas khrag 'brug gi zhig gsos mdzad pa'i rab gnas la spyan drangs pa'i tshe ngo mtshar ba'i cho 'phrul ci yang byung/ yangs pa can dang/ klung shod/ gzho stod til gro sogs gnas chen rnams su sgrub pa la snying por mdzad/ ti grol bzhugs pa'i skabs shed 'phags yul gyi grub thob rdo rje mgon po byon nas dza bi ra'i b+hu rlung gi man ngag sogs gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa bstsal/ mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan bzhin sku rten dkar chag tu bsgyur zhing yangs pa can du gter gyi kha byang babs pa bzhin gu ru rin po che'i sku gsung thugs bcud dam chos dgongs pa yang zab shog ser rigs lnga til gro'i DA ki'i tshogs khang chen mo nas spyan drangs/ dus gzhan zhig tu zangs mdog dpal rir byon nas gu ru rin po che he ru ka'i rnam par mjal zhing ga Na tsakra'i 'du bar longs spyad cing/ rtsa ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas dbang bskur zhing gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa thams cad bstsal te he ru ka'i sku slob dpon pad+mar gnas 'gyur bas zhal gyi man ngag kyang mang du gnang nas slar rang gnas su phebs/ bka' gter gnyis kyi bdag por gyur/ mdo sgyu sems gsum la bshad srol thun mong ma yin pa dang/ bka' brgyad lugs dgu/ snying thig ya bzhi/ gter kha gong 'og sogs la rtsal du bton cing 'chad nyan gyi phrin las shin tu rgya che zhing mnga' ri paN chen rin

po che'i phyag srol ltar bka' mas khog dbub/ gter ma'i man ngag gis brgyan pa zhigs phyag len du 'debs par mdzad do// des rang grol nyi zla sangs rgyas la sgyu 'phrul skor rnams gsungs/ des 'khon rigs slob dpon tshe dbang nor rgyas la bshad cing des khong nyid kyi sras 'khon ston dpal 'byor lhun grub la bshad de/ rje 'di nyid yab slob dpon de dang/ yum rgyal mo 'dzom gyi sras su lcags bya lor 'khrungs/ chung ngu nas dam pa'i bag chags sad cing nges 'byung gi thugs yang dag pa skyes/ dgung lo bcu lon pa'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho las rab tu byung/ skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed/ thugs rje chen po'i sgom lung sogs gsan/ de sogs gsar rnying gi bla ma 'ga' las ci rigs pa'i chos tshul rnams thams cad gsan/ sgra'i ri mo dang snyan dngags/ sum rtags/ gso rigs sogs la'ang bslabs sbyangs dpyis phyin par mdzad/ khyad par yab rdo rje 'dzin pa las sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po dang/ de'i 'grel pa g.yung ston gyis mdzad pa dang/ kun mkhyen klong chen pa'i phyogs bcu mun sel sogs sgyu 'phrul skor gyi 'grel Tika rnams la sbyangs par mdzad pa na sgro phug pa chen po'i bag chags sad pas lam 'di nyid la brten pa'i mkhas grub 'gran zla med par gyur/ dgung lo bco brgyad par gnubs nam mkha'i snying po'i rnam 'phrul rig 'dzin chen po nyi zla sangs rgyas kyi drung du rdzogs chen klong gsal snying thig gi dbang khrid man ngag dang bcas pa gsan pas chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs rdzogs pa chen po rang rig chos kyi skur ngo 'phrod cing gting sleb/ gzhan yang bka' gter gyi chos shin tu mang ba gsan/ khyad par don tig 'gro ba kun grol dang/ theg mchog rin po che'i mdzod la bshad lung gsan/ mdo phyogs kyi gzhung lugs chen po kun la'ang gsan bsam mthar phyin par mdzad cing chos gra chen po rtses dang du gzhung lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i gra skor mdzad/ brag dgon spyan snga gzhon nu chos dpal las rdo rje phreng ba sogs gsar rnying gi chos rgya che ba gsan/ dgung lo so bzhi par rgyal khang rtse ba dpal 'byor rgya mtsho dang chos kyi rje dge 'dun rgyal mtshan pa mkhan slob las bsnyen par rdzogs pa'ang mdzad nas mtshan dpal 'byor lhun grub tu gsol/ dge lugs phyogs kyi sngags skor rnams kyang gsan/ gsang phu dang se ra byes kyi 'chad nyan slob dpon pa'ang mdzad/ rgyud gsang ba snying po la sngar bshad srol ches dar yang phyis nyag phra bar gyur pas rje 'di nyid mkhyen pa che ba'i grags pas/ brag sna chos rje u rgyan bstan 'dzin ched gnyer gyis byon te g.yung 'grel kyi steng nas zhib par gsan cing le'u lnga pa yan gyi zin bris kyang mdzad/ khyad

par zur 'khor lo'i mgon po chos dbyings rang grol rjes su bzung zhing gsang ba snying po g.yung 'grel las nyin re chos thun gnyis re dang/ gzhan yang snying thig gi skor rnams sogs mtha' yas pa gsan/ rje'i bslab ston ltar zur chen gyis chos gra chen po rtse dang du gra skor gyi bstan pa'i rnam gzhag mdzad pas snga 'gyur la rgyud bshad med de 'ong snyam pa'i phrag dog can rnams kha rog ste 'dug go/ 'di tsam nas 'du 'dzi'i g.yeng ba spangs te/ yul di wI ko Ti'am pha wang kha'i nags khrod du dben pa brten cing bzhugs/ phyag na pad+ma lnga pa chen pos kyang zhabs la gtugs te/ gsar rnying gi dbang lung khrid man ngag gi skor mtha' yas pa gsan/ bla chen 'ga' zhig gis ltar grub mtha' gtsang gtsang mo yin rgyu pa'i mtshan nyid pa skam po'i rigs kyi shan ma shor ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mtshan nyid dang ldan pas zin pa'i rjes de 'dra'i rigs la zer ba yin/ de nas dgung gi grangs don drug pa la rje lnga pa chen pos zhabs brtan gyi gsol 'debs mdzad pas da ste yun ring e sdod mi shes zhes zhal gyis ma bzhes shing rnga yab pad+ma 'od kyi gzhal yas su 'gro dgos pa zhes gsungs la/ me glang zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes bcu gcig la ngo mtshar ba'i ltas dang bcas gzugs sku chos kyi dbyings su thim par gyur/ rje 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos kyang phyag rdzogs dbu gsum gyi lta ba spyi khyab tu ngo sprod pa'i khrid yig dang/ dbu ma'i lta khrid dang/ tha snyad rig pa'i skor yang mang po yod/ rje de'i thugs kyi sras slob ma ni zur chen chos dbyings rang grol yin te 'di nyid zur gyi rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i gdungs rabs ma chad pa las/ yab rig 'dzin chen po ku mA rA dza'i rnam 'phrul zur chen gzhon nu don 'grub dang yum mkha' 'gro'i rigs las mtshan ldan yid 'dzin gnyis kyi sras su shing 'brug lor sku bltams/ drung pa dkon mchog rin chen pa'i sku skye bar ngos 'dzin mdzad/ rim gyis yi ge 'bri klog dang 'phags yul gyi yig rigs rnams kyang dka' tshegs la ma ltos par thugs su chud/ yab las nyer mkho'i sgrub skor rnams kyang bslab/ dgung lo dgu par byang ba rig 'dzin ngag gi dbang po mjal zhing zhal nas sku skye bas snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa la phan thogs chen po zhig yong zhes lung bstan/ lha ris dang rtsis skor rnams dang drag sngags kyi skor 'ga' zhig kyang mkhyen par mdzad cing dgung lo bcu gnyis tsam nas snang gsal rin po che ngag dbang ye shes grub pa'i zhabs su bcar te bka' brgyad bder 'dus skor dang/ mkha' 'gro snying thig bka' gter gnyis/ bla ma nor bu rgya mtsho/ kar gling zhi khro dgongs pa rang grol sogs kyi dbang lung dang/ nyams khrid mthar phyin pa gsan/ gzhan

yang ci rigs pa'i gter chos rnams gsan/ zhi khro'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang mtshan chos dbyings rang grol du phog/ phyag chen lnga ldan dang gcod khrid sogs sku nyams su bstar/ zir pa stag mgor lo gsum phyogs gsum mdzad cing gtso bor rdzogs chen mkha' 'gro snying thig gi ka dag dang lhun grub gnad du bsnun pas chos thams cad kyi rdzun phugs rdib/ rang rig gdod ma'i mgon po'i rang zhal mngon du gyur pa'i rtogs pa brnyes shing 'od gsal du longs sku'i zhing khams nyul ba'i rtsal 'byongs par gyur/ dgung lo bcu bdun pa la rdo rje 'chang pha wang kha pa dpal 'byor mtshan can gyi drung du byon te bla ma sku 'das kyi bar la rim gro ba mdzad cing mnyes pa gsum gyis bsten/ bla mas kyang thugs dgyes pas rjes su bskyangs nas bka' gter kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho lta bu bum pa gang byo'i tshul gyis gnang/ gtso bor dpal snying po'i rtsa rgyud rtsa ba dang/ 'grel pa spar khab/ bod 'grel g.yung Tika rnams sbyar ba'i gsung bshad mdzad pa nyin re rtsi bzhag thun gnyis re bstsal/ zin dka' se pa la re zeg rgyab i chog zhus pas/ rgyang tsam ma song bar zin bris byas na 'jag chen po ma yong bas re zhig nas nged kyis tshod byed gsungs// gzim chung thog khar skyong sbyang gnang nas shog bu sum cu tsam song nas rje'i bka' bzhin zin bris kyang mdzad pas le'u lnga pa yan chad song/ de man chad kyi zin bris 'phro can du lus/ chu khyi lor dgung lo nyi shu bzhes par slar yang dge bsnyen nas bzung bsnyen rdzogs kyi bar du bsgrubs par mdzad/ snying 'grel phyogs bcu mun sel sogs la gzigs rtogs dang/ 'dus pa'i 'grel pa sgron gsal la bzhi sbrags kyi bshad pa/ rim lnga gsal sgron/ bde mchog sbas don kun gsal/ nor bzang gi dus 'khor spyi don sogs dang/ gsang 'dus bskyed rdzogs sogs kyi bshad pa zhus shing thugs la nges par mdzad/ shing byi lor chos grwa chen po dpal gyi rtses ngang du dgun chos chen mo'i thog gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi bshad pa mdzad pas ston chen tshig la rton pa rnams kyi spobs pa bcom zhing snying po'i bstan pa la bya ba cher mdzad pas gzu bor gnas pa rnams bsngags par brjod cing byang ba rig 'dzin chen pos kyang legs dar dpyangs/ rje pha wang kha pa las kyang klong gsal snying thig gi dbang lung man ngag gi khrid rnams zhib par gsan zhing bsgoms pas nyams rtogs bogs sngar las kyang cher 'khrungs/ b+hai ra ba'i 'khrul 'khor sogs gsar ma phyogs kyi drag sngags kyang mang du gsan/ dge 'bri gnyis 'gras che zhing 'bri gung zur pa rat+na'i zhabs sogs kyis rA hu la'i las sbyor mdzad pas dga' ldan khri pa mang po steng grib kyis gshegs pa la rje dkon mchog chos 'phel khyab

'jug gi 'jigs pa las grol ba'i srung 'khor kyang mdzad/ kaH thog pa stag bla pad+ma ma ti lha sar byon nas snying po'i 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun ser sogs gsan cing khong gis lho brag gsung sprul la'ang de'i bshad lung phul ba sogs chos rgyun de ka ma chad par byung ba 'di'o// tshur kaH thogs pa las dgongs 'dus po ti'i lung dbang dang rgyud dgu bcangs thabs bcas pa dang/ las byang me tog phreng mdzes sogs kyang gsan// lhag par bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i sa ra ya Na'i sgrub pa mdzad/ 'di skabs tsam nas rgyal mchog lnga pa chen pos bla mar bkur zhing zil gnon sogs chos bka' rnams gsan zhing drag sngags kyi skor sogs zhi rgyas dbang drag gi phrin las rab 'byams kyi lung phyag khrid thams cad phul zhing thugs nyams su bstar/ kar gtsang mchod yon gyis dge lugs spyi dang bye brag dge ldan pho brang ba la sdang zug che bas tsi kum par sde gzar gyi skabs su las sbyor mtha' yas pa mdzad pas/ rgyal dbang lnga pa'i phrin las dus bab dang rje 'di nyid kyi byin rlabs lhag par myur bas dge ldan pho brang gi lung las bod khams yongs la khyab pa de byung/ snum zan grong pa'i rkang 'thung 'khrig pa'i klung// khe nyin gsher gyis don chen 'grub pa'i zhugs// 'bar min ma babs las kyi rta gdong mes// sgar gtsang srid sde'i chu bo skem de mtshar// zhes lnga pa chen pos dge phyogs rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi nus pa mngon du ma gyur bar 'os med kyi rje 'di pas bstan pa spyi la sman yon chen por gyur pa'i ched du brjod par mdzad do// gzhan yang phur pa lugs gsum dang bka' brgyad lugs gsum/ rdzogs pa chen po klong gsal snying thig sogs kyi nyams khrid rnams gsan pa sku nyams su bstar bas rdzogs pa chen po'i nyams myong ma 'khrul pa thugs rgyud la 'khrungs shing 'khor 'das re dogs dang bral ba'i gdeng 'khrungs so// zhes zhal gyis bzhes/ gnas gsar ba mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan dang yang chos kyi dga' ston stob res mdzad/ byang ba rig 'dzin ngag gi dbang po'i sprul pa'i sku snga 'gyur bstan pa'i nyi ma rig 'dzin pad+ma phrin las ngos 'dzin par mdzad cing thub bstan rdo rje brag gi gdan sar bkod nas/ bka' gter gyi chos mtha' dag bstsal zhing bstan pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol/ sku tshe'i mthar 'gro dgon skye med zhing gi gdan sa gung thang du bzhugs/ dar sding rig 'dzin chen po 'phrin las lhun grub la snying po'i rgyud kyi bshad pa gnang/ tshur yang bka' brgyad sogs dbang lung mang du gsan pa dang/ rgya bod hor gsum gyi bla ma skye sbrul sogs chos don gnyer rnams la bka' gter gsar rnying gis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi dngos

po ci rigs par sbyor bar mdzad nas sa bya lor rad gung grangs re drug lon pa na ngo mtshar gyi ltas dang bcas pa pad+ma 'od kyi zhing khams su gshegs so// rje 'di nyid la thugs sras slob ma'i tshogs bgrang gis mi spyod par bzhugs kyang/ gtso bor gyur pa ni rgyal mchog lnga pa chen po ste zhing khams gzhan du gshegs pa'i tshe yang ye shes kyi skus rjes su bzung bar gsungs shing rnam thar rgyal ba mchog gi zhal gsum mar/ legs byas 'di mthun rigs rtsal kun tu bzang// mngon sum rang ngo 'phrod min de srid du// skye bar mgon po khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes// mdzad nas 'bral pa med par rjes 'dzin shog/// ces gsungs pas kyang mtshon par nus so// 'dis gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes kyi rnam 'phrul gnyos ston chen po phrin las lhun 'grub la gsang ba snying po'i bshad rgyun spar khab dang g.yung Tika gnyis ka'i steng nas bstsal zhing/ de las bai ro dang g.yu sgra'i thugs bskyed dus su smin pa rig 'dzin 'gyur med rdo rje sku mched kyi bka' drin las deng sang gi bar du rgyun ma chad par byung ba yin no//// yang sgro phug pa chen po'i slob brgyud 'phyong rgyas rgya sman pa sangs rgyas grags zhes bya ba ni/ rus gnya' yul rgya sman stag rtse sar 'khrungs/ gzhon nu'i dus dzam+b+ha la bsgrubs pas zhing chung zhig yod pa de'ang chus khyer/ bya bral la byon pas spu gu dor phyug po mdzes khyer ba zhig gi ro khur mi ma 'byung bar 'dug/ snying rje drag po skyes te rtog med mdzad nas ro las byas pas mal 'gram nas gser mang po byung/ des dzam+b+ha las dngos grub byin par 'dug/ slar log te gra phyi khang dmar du khyung po khro bo thug/ khong yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyag phyir bsgrub pa mdzad pas/ yang dag mar me dgu pas zhal gzigs/ de nas gtsang du byon/ gsang bdag sgro phug pa'i slob ma bya chen po'i dbon po zhig la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul la sogs pa'i gsan pa mdzad/ der phyug po zhig gi nas khal brgya tham pa phul/ cha rkyen gyis mi 'thogs par byung bas sgro phug pa'i slob ma nyang nag mdo bo/ de'i slob ma lha rjes mda' seng gi las sgyu 'phrul nyan/ mkhas pa chen por gyur nas/ rang yul du rdo thog thel btab/ gnyal pa zhig po'i slob ma rgya 'ching ru pas kyang rdo thog pa'i zhabs la gtugs te thos pa mang du mdzad/ khyad par du 'di la slob ma mkhas shing grub pa'i dpa' bo skyi chos kyi seng ge bya ba zhig byung/ des gong ma se chen gyi spyan sngar byon pas/ rgyal pos nus pa brtag pa'i phyir thub chod mdzad de mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas sgo brtsigs te lo gcig bzhag/ lo dus na phye ste bltas pas/ rdo rje phur bu'i skur gyur 'dug pas ngo mtshar chen po skyes/ rdo thog

pa la dar ring chen mo la sogs pa'i dngos po tshan chen gnang/ 'ja' sas bcad pa'i dgon gzhis kyang mang du yod de dar rgyas shin tu che ba byung/ da lta ni ming du grags pa'i rjes shul tsam ste bstan pa'i 'phel 'grib 'di yang skyo ba bskul ba'i rang bzhin no/ skyi chos kyi seng ge'i slob ma ni/ sman lung pa shAkya 'od de/ 'di ni 'phyong po'i kha ru'i nyang ston chen por sras lnga byung ba yar klung sprul sku mched lngar grags pa'i che shos yin/ yul yar klung dgon pa sman lung yin pas de skad du grags/ tshigs gnyis pa chos ldan pa'i gdan sa da lta chos ldan zhes pa'i dgon rol 'di ka yin/ mtshan dngos mgon po rdo rje zhes bya ba ste grub pa shin tu brnyes pas gyang la sku rgyab gtad pa'i rjes thim gyis song ba da lta'ang yod/ sngar 'dir chos gra chen po chags par snang ste rgyud 'bum gyi ras ma'ang shin tu mang bar mthong/ sman bsgrub mdzad pas yul 'di sdig pa dang grog sbur kyang dkon pa yin zhes thos/ srung ma shin tu nus pa che bas da lta dgon shul kyang bsrung bar snang ste/ lha 'dre rnams dam tshig la shin tu gnas pa zhig go/ tshigs 'og ma gsum la skal ldan pa/ dur khrod pa/ dbang rgyal ba zhes grags/ de las 'dir tshigs dang po sman lung pa shAkya 'od kyis skyi chos kyi seng ge la mdo sgyu 'phrul rnams legs par bslab// phyis glan shAkya 'od po'i sras glan mkhas pa bsod nams rgyal la'ang gsan nas/ gsang ba snying po'i khog dbub dang/ Ti ka rgyud don rnam nges la sogs pa yig cha mang du mdzad/ 'di'i slob ma dwags po'i sangs rgyas gong la ba yin/ de la dwags po nyid du slob ma bla ma gnyen la sogs pa mang du thon zhing/ gtso bor go 'jo ba dag po'i bla mar gyur nas khams su shin tu dar bar gyur ro// yang sman lung pa la dbon shAkya 'bum pas gsang ba snying po'i bshad pa mkhas par bslab/ de la mkhas grub chos dpal yab sras gnyis kyis kyang gsang snying gi bshad pa legs par nod/ sman lung pa'i brgyud pa de dag ni gter kha gong 'og la'ang gnas dus der chos kyi bdag por gyur ba zhig go/// skyi chos kyi seng ge'i gdan sa ba rgya ye shes mgon pos kyang skyi dang glan chos rgyal gnyis ka la gtugs nas mdo dang sgyu 'phrul mkhas par mkhyen/ de'i dbon po rdo rje rgyal mtshan ces bya ba gzhon nu la gsang phur byon nas tshad ma rnam nges mkhas par sbyangs/ de nas phu bo rgya ye shes mgon po las mdo dang sgyu 'phrul legs par bslabs nas/ 'grel pa spar khab gzhung du byas pa'i Tika dang/ dbang gi cho ga la sogs pa mdzad/ des rang gi dbon po bla ma tshul rgyal ba la gsungs/ de la ri gdong pa shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis gsan/ 'dis dwags

por sku rabs dpon g.yog dang sngags pa rnams la bshad pas re zhig na dwags po'i phyogs na'ang dar ba yod zer/ shes rgyal gyi slob ma zhang mkhar bsod nams bzang po/ de'i slob ma slob dpon bkra shis rgya mtsho/ 'di la rdo rje rgyal mtshan pa'i snying Tika gi thog nas bshad lung dang/ phur pa lha nag la sogs pa 'gos gzhon nu'i zhabs kyis gsan to//// yang khams lugs su grags pa ni/ gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa slob dpon nyi 'od seng ges mdzad pa slob dpon bai ra tsa nas khams 'o rdu byams chen gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/ khyad par phyogs der snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa yongs su grags par byung ba'i thog ma lta bu ni kaH thog pa yin cing/ de la kaH thog pa dam pa bde bar gshegs pa zhes kyang bya/ bla mar shar pa spobs pa mtha' yas sam shes rab seng ge zhes grags pa'i bdag nyid chen po de ni bskal pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas byang chub mchog gi go 'phang mngon du byas pa zhig snying po mchog gi bstan pa dang gdul bya mang po zhig gi don mdzad pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i gnad gsang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sras mo dang/ 'od srung gi dus su rgyal po kr-i ka'i sras mo bdun gyi che bar skye ba blangs shing de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur du mas mnyes par byas pa'i 'og tu bdag cag gi ston pa'i drung du gnas brtan chen po b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang/ de'i rjes su mu stegs kyi pan+dita phyis sangs rgyas par gyur pa zhig dang/ sing+ga la'i rgyal po rigs su 'khrungs nas na lan+da'i mkhan po rgyal ba'i lha las rab tu byung zhing dus skabs der mu stegs zhi ba pa zhig gis bstan pa la gnod pa cher byas pas slob dpon gyis thog mar grub mtha' de la bslabs nas nyams 'og tu chud pa dang gzod rtsod pas btul te nang par chug/ yang mu stegs kyi mkhas pa 'ga' zhig dang rtsod pa'i tshe 'jam dpal dbyangs gi mdun gyi nam mkhar byon pas rtsod pa'i spobs pa bcoms/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa gsungs nas lho phyogs su byon pa sogs slob dpon chen po zhi ba lhar gyur pa dang/ dga' rab rdo rje'i slob ma tog rtse bar gyur nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhung mdzad pa dang/ bod kyi ljongs su sad mi bdun gyi nang nas rma rin chen mchog tu gyur nas gsang ba snying po'i rgyud la sogs pa bsgyur nas nyan bshad byas pa dang/ 'phags yul nub phyogs bA ra nA si'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ bla mchod pan+Dita dang/ bar la phra ma bcug pa'i blon po'i lce bcad pas da lta ljags cung zad mi bde ba yin gsungs pa dang/ ri dwags kr-i Sh+Na sA ra dang/ drang srong gang+gA ra ri'i drung du ne tso zhig tu gyur pa la drang srong gis rig

sngags bslabs pas shes shing nus pa'ang thob/ dus gzhan zhig tu ri de'i shar phyogs kyi mtsho zhig la gnas pa'i klu sems can la byams pa zhig yod/ de'i lho phyogs su nag po'i phyogs kyi klu gdug pa can zhig kyang yod de des sems can la gnod pa rtsom pa'i snga rol du klu dkar po'i steng du dmag drangs nas 'jigs pa'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pas 'ongs pa na klu dkar pos ne tsho la skyabs su song bas/ des gdugs pa'i klu'i phyogs su bltas te rig sngags bzlas shing gshog pa brdabs pas gdug pa'i lag 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa de nyid du brlag par gyur to// de'i 'og tu 'phags yul nub phyogs su rgyal rigs kyi pan+Di ta rten rab byung la sngags kyi nus pa thob pas DA ki rnams la dbang bsgyur bar rat+na shI la zhes pa dang/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rje rigs kyi pan+Di ta gzhon nu seng ge zhes sngags la mkhyen pa che ba zhig dang/ de'i 'og tu pan+Di ta chen po su ma ti kIrti'am mtshan gzhan bal po pan+te par grags pa dpal nA ro pa'i dngos kyi slob mar gyur cing/ bka' bab dang po phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes la rang dbang brnyes shing rgyud sde thams cad la mkhyen pa che/ khyad par bde mchog la grub pa thob/ lho brag mar pa lo ts+tshas kyang nA ro pa'i 'og tu bka' drin che ba'i bla mar mdzad/ sku tshe'i mthar mi nyag rgyal pos spyan drangs te rgyal khams der phebs te rgyal po la dbang bskur ba du ma sogs dang phan pa rgya chen po mdzad/ de nas kyi tan gyi rgyal pos kyang spyan drangs te sngon du chos ma dar bas rgyal khams thams cad chos la bcug cing/ rgyal srid chos bzhin byed du bcug/ rgyal po'i gtsos dra ma rnams la bde mchog gi dbang bskur mdzad cing yi dam du phog pa thams cad kyi bsgoms pas dngos grub sna re ma thob pa med par grags/ de nas rgya mtsho'i gling zhig tu byon pa na sgra dang 'od la sogs pa'i ltas chen po byung nas gshegs pa'i tshul bstan/ de nas bar do gzhan ma byung bar yab kyi spyi bor bzhugs nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa yin gsungs te/ bdag nyid chen po 'dir sku skye ba bzhes pa yin no// dam pa 'di mdo khams bu 'bor sgang du gtogs pa 'bri chu'i 'gram du rje phag mo grub pa dang yum mched du gyur pa ste rje phag gru rme shod 'bal mor da lta gser khang du brjod pa der 'khrungs pa yin pas rje 'di yang de dang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khrungs pa yin te 'ong/ gang ltar gdung rus sga yab gtsang pa dpal grags/ yum gtsang mo rin chen rgyan gnyis kyi sras su chu pho stag gi lor 'khrungs/ 'di rje khams pa chen po 'am phag gru lo bcu gsum pa'i chu stag de yin/ bcu bdun la dbus su byon/ 'phan yul du bla ma byang chub seng ge las rab tu byung/ mtshan shes

rab seng ger gsol/ nags kyi mkhan chen las smad 'dul gyi rgyun las bsnyen par rdzogs shing 'dul phyogs la mkhas par sbyangs/ zur sgro phug pa chen po'i thugs sras 'dzam ston 'gro ba'i mgon po bya ba las/ sgyu 'phrul gsang snying gi skor dang sems phyogs sogs gsan pas de dang de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ rje sgro phug pa dang kaH thog pa'i bar la bla ma gcig bzhugs pa de yin/ lnga pa chen po'i gsan yig tu kaH thog pa rang gis sgro phug pa la thug par gsungs/ 'dzam ston pa zhes pa ni yul gyi ming nas btags pa ste/ rje karma pa dus mkhyen gyi rnam thar la dpyad na kam po gnas dang nye ba zhig yin par grub cing/ der nyid kyi slob ma rtogs ldan zhig gis skye ba ngos bzung ba la 'dzam skye ba gsum pa zhes grags pa dang/ gzhan yang 'dzam ston sangs rgyas bya ba dang/ 'dzam gyi spang phug tu bzhugs pa'i btsun pa zhig gis rje dus mkhyen/ spyan ras gzigs su mthong bas 'dzam yul tsam na sgom bzang bar grags pa sogs kyi lo rgyus byung ba dpa' bo gtsug lag pas kyang de dang mthun par bkod 'dug cing/ da lta 'ga' zhig gi 'dam spang phug ces brjod pa'i yul de yin no// rwa lo'i slob ma kam lo tswa las bde mchog rgyud chen bcu sogs dang/ cog ro lo tswa las phag mo phyi ma dang sdom 'byung/ kam chos kyi ye shes las dgyes pa rdo rje'i skor/ 'gos lo tsa ba'i slob ma ldong ston rdo rje snying po dang bo d+hi zhang ston las 'dus pa/ de gnyis ka'i slob ma la stod dpal gyi dbang phyug las sgron gsal gyi bshad pa dang gshed skor/ rje dus mkhyen las 'khor lo bde mchog gi dbang bskur gyi rim pa dang/ phyag rgya chen po/ nA ro chos drug gi man ngag la sogs pa rnams gsan/ rje dbu se'i thugs kyi sras mchog tu mdzad cing spyir yang bdag nyid chen po 'di'i skye ba du mar 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pas shes bya thams cad la chags thogs spangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen par bzhugs shing mdo sngags spyi dang khyad par rdo rje theg pa snga phyir bod kyi ljongs su 'gyur ba tsam la gsan bsam ma mdzad pa med pa lta bu dang/ 'dzam ston rin po ches/ khyod kam po'i gnas su song nas sgrub pa la gzhol na phung po 'od du dengs pa gcig 'ongs/ kaH thogs tu song na bstan pa mthar rgyas pa gcig 'ongs te mchi gsungs pas bstan pa kho na thugs la bcangs te kaH thog ces pa'i sa cha 'tshol nas byon pa zhig la thog mar ka thil du sleb cing der phyugs 'tsho ba'i byis pa rnams la kaH thog gang du yod dri bar mdzad pas phu ya ki yin zer/ der phyugs rnams gdul bya'i rten 'brel dang/ rdzi bu rnams slob ma'i rten 'brel du

dgongs/ de nas sa yul yi ge ka 'dra ba'i thog sa mo yos kyi lor dgon pa 'debs pa'i gtsug lag khang bzhengs pa na bon kyi tha tshig la gnas pa'i rdo gnyan rmad bus gzugs dngos su bstan nas sgo sna tshogs kyis bar chad brtsams pa la rje dpon slob gsum gyis rjes 'ded du phyin pa na pha wang zhig la thims/ de chos rje gtsang ston gyis chos gos kyis bcings nas khrid/ dam pas phyag lcag gis brab nas ded/ lung pa'i shod kyi chu khar bskyal ba dengs sang mngon sum gyi yul du gyur pa dang/ bon po brgyad kyis ngan sngags bsgrubs pa dpal lha mos bsgrub khang gi brag brdibs nas sleb pa de'i steng dam pa'i phyag gis rgya gram bris pas pha wang brgyad sleb bya ba yin/ de la sogs pa grub pa'i rtags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pas chos gzhi btab nas bzhugs/ shar a mdo'i yul tshun chad/ lho tsha ba rong dang glo mon tshun gyi slob ma rnams 'dus pa la gtso bor rdzogs pa chen po dang/ sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po'i bshad pa'i bka' dang dbang bka' bsgrub pa sogs rgya bod kyi 'grel pa gzhung che chung thams cad la dpal ldan zur ba'i bka' srol gyi rgyun dang mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa la sogs rtsal du bton nas gsungs/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal sgyu dra sogs dang mdo phyogs su'ang rgyal ba byams pa'i gzhung chen po rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sogs shin tu mang bar bshad cing mdor na mdo khams kyi ljongs su gsang sngags kyi bstan pa gzhi bzhengs su btings pa yin/ dgung lo don gcig par chu pho bya ba'i tha skar can gyi zla bar gzugs sku brtul ba'i tshul bzhengs/ skyes bu chen po 'di nyid la 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gshegs bzhugs mi mnga' bar dus thams cad du mi dang mi lab pa bzhin bzhugs shing mdzad pa thams cad lung ston pa zhig yod la/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa dang/ bde ba can dang/ sman gyi bla ma'i zhing khams sogs ni rtag par gzigs/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro dang/ bde mchog lha drug cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang nam bzhed la gzigs shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga sogs las chos gsan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang chos kyi gtam mdzad pa dang sku'i skye ba 'di nyid kyi 'og tu bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros snying po zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing sa brgyad pa'i mngon rtogs brnyes pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa skar ma bkram pa lta bu la bde bar gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba'i lung bstan brnyes shing mdor na skyes bu 'di nyid kyi spangs rtogs ni thun mong gi snang ngor sprul pa'i sku 'jig rten du bzhugs pa

la dgongs pa dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang dbyer med pa ste so skyes bsam par mi nus so// de nyid kyi rgyal tshab gtsang ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las 'phags pa'i yul du mnga' bdag mai tri pa'i thugs sras rgya gar phyag na zhes bya bar gyur cing slob dpon de las dbang bzhi rten can zhus nas bsgoms pas phyag rgya chen po'i bka' bab cing rtogs pa mngon du gyur/ glang chen smyon pa sdigs mdzub bstan pas bzlog pa sogs nus pa thob/ mthar sku lus de nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob/ de'i 'og tu kaM lo tswa ba ye shes mchog ces bya ba sngags rgyud thams cad la mkhas shing khyad par tsakra sam+bar la brten nas grub pa brnyes pa zhig dang/ de'i rjes su gtsang kha'i phyogs su sde snod 'dzin pa chen po zhig dang/ de'i 'og du chos kyi rje nyid yin par gsungs shing 'khrungs pa'i yul ni bu 'bor sgang gi bye brag gtsang zhal zhes pa de nyid yin nam sems te/ yul las mtshan du chags pa gtsang ston zhes brjod pa'i phyir dang/ rje nyid kyi gsungs las/ ban sdom rdo rje rgyal mtshan nga// bu 'bor sgang du skyes pa yin// bla ma dam pa bsten pa yin// gdams ngag bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yin// sgrub la brtson 'grus chung ba yin// dkar po'i grogs kyis btags pa yin// mi ngo bsrung la g.yel ba yin// sbas yul mthil du rgas pa yin// zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro// dgung lo bcu bdun par bla ma bde bar gshegs pa mjal nas chos gsan/ dpon slob lhan gcig par mi nyag tu byon/ der man ngag thams cad kyang gnang/ nyi shu rtsa gcig par 'bri ti ra mdo'i dgon du byon nas bzhugs/ nyer gsum la kaH thog tu byon nas bsgoms pas dus gzhan zhig tu bla ma bde bar gshegs pa'i nyams snang du/ lung mdo chen po zhig chus gang ba'i nang du 'od chen po bltar mi bzod pa zhig 'dug pa la ci yin gsung bar skyes bu chen po khyod kyi slong ma bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa la gnas pa'i gdan yin zer ba byung/ de khyod yin gsungs/ de tsam na dpal he ru ka dang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor rnams gzigs/ dpal lha mo dang nag po chen po yang dus rtag tu gzigs/ dgung lo nga drug pa la kaH thog gi gdan sar phebs/ mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi bstan pa bla ma'i bka' srol bzhin bskyangs/ 'di skabs su sems dpa' chen po spom brag pas kaH thog gi rin po che gtsang ston pa de snyan pa shin tu che bas ci 'dra zhig yin nam dgongs pa btang bas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu'i 'od sngon po'i gzhal yas khang chen po zhig gi nang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lha tshogs mang po bzhugs

pa gsal ba dang/ rin po che gtsang ston pa bzhugs pa'i thad nas 'ja' 'od kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzigs pas 'di sangs rgyas yin par 'dug dgongs nas de nub tshogs mchod cig mdzad par gsang sngags rnying ma'i he ru ka mang po zhal gzigs/ mnal lam du rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i ri chen po dpag par dka' ba zhig gi dngos su sman sna tshogs skyes pa la mi mang po sman thu zhing 'dug/ ri de'i rtse mo na 'od sngon po'i gzhal yas khang chen po zhig gi dbus su bla ma kaH thog pa 'od kyi rang bzhin du bzhugs 'dug/ dung dkar po chen po 'bud mi med par rang grag tu grags pa las/ dung dpag tu med pa 'phros te thams cad kyang rang grags tu phyogs thams cad khyab par ti ri ri 'gro ba gzigs/ khong gi snyan pa phyogs med du 'gro bar 'dug gsungs/ de'i phyis su kaH thog tu byon nas rin po che gtsang ston las sgyu 'phrul gyi dbang bskur ba zhus pas mkhyen pa'i ye shes phyogs med du sad par gyur/ kaH thog pa thugs dam rdzogs pa chen po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe nam mkha' ltar ci yang mi snang ba dang/ nub gsum la zhi khro'i lha tshogs dpag tu med pa gzigs pa sogs dag snang bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar gsungs/ de yang rin po che 'di nyid kyi thugs rgyud kyi yon tan rnams gtsang ston rin po che'i byin rlab kyis sad par mdzad la/ de nyid kyi yon tan rnams kyang spom brag pas gzigs pas dpon slob de dag gi mngon rtogs ci 'dra yin soms shig/ lan gcig mi bskyod pa'i zhing khams gzigs pa zhig la 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams kyis chos rje 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i snying po zhes pa'i sgra ti ri ri sgrogs shing sku skye ba de'i 'og tu bde ba can du de ltar 'gyur ba yin gsungs/ yang zhing khams de nyid lan gcig gzigs par ston pa mi bskyod pas rigs kyi bu nor bu'i snying po khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab tu 'gro ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'ang gsan/ dgung lo dgu bcu bzhes pa me pho byi ba'i lor sprul pa bsdus so// de nyid kyi rgyal tshab byams pa 'bum ni/ 'phags pa'i yul du grub chen dza lan+d+ha ri pa'i thugs sras grub pa'i 'khor lo sgyur ba spyod 'chang dbang po yin te/ rje btsun mi tra dzo kis slob ma so ma dzo ki la/ khyod bod du 'gro na lan gcig kaH thog tu 'gro dgos pa yin gsung/ ci'i phyir zhus pas/ slob dpon shAn+ta de ba dang slob dpon badzra pA ni bod la skye ba bzhes nas gdul bya dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad la/ de'i gdan sar da lta'ang slob dpon kah+na pa chen po sku skye ba der bzhes nas gdul bya dpag tu med pa'i don

mdzad nas da lta'ang bzhugs so// zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhan yang/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po d+harma pA la'i sras ma hI pA lar 'khrungs shing grub pa'i slob dpon mang po bsnyen bkur gyis mnyes par mdzad/ bA ra nA sIr bram ze'i rigs kyi dge slong dA na kIrti zhes pa bram ze chen po'i slob ma phag mo zhal gnyis ma la thugs dam mdzad pa zhig dang/ ma ga d+har tshogs dpon gyi rigs su 'khrungs pa rten dge slong A nan+da shrI zhes pa bde mchog lhan skyes la brten nas dngos grub brnyes shing rdo rje gdan gyi mkhan po mdzad nas bstan pa la bya ba mdzad/ de'i 'og tu rje byams pa chen por sku skye ba bzhes pa yin no/ dam pa rin po che dang chos kyi rje gnyis car las mdo sngags kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho tsam gsan bsam bsgom gsum mdzad de mthar phyin pa ni chos kyi rje las mdzad pa ste/ dam pa rin po che/ bu khyod las byung ba'i byams pa 'bum// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi rje sku ma bzhugs pa'i 'og tu dgung lo zhe brgyad pa la gdan sar bzhugs shing sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gtso bor gyur pa'i mdo sngags kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho lta bu'i dga' ston spel/ mchog gi sprul sku karma pa chen po 'bri rgyal dam pa chos phyug tu sku 'khrungs shing byang chub sems dpa' spom brag pa dang sha 'bam du thog mar mjal ba zhig la khong gi bka' bzhin kaH thog tu phebs nas byams rin po ches mkhan po dang/ spyan snga mang phu ba bsod nams 'bum pas las slob mdzad de karma pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bsgrubs te thub pa'i rgyal tshab tu mnga' gsol/ mtshan chos kyi bla mar gsol zhing sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gyi dbang dang gdams pa'ang gsan/ dgung gi grangs don bzhi'i bar bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas chu byi lor gzugs sku'i bkod pa bsdus shing de'i 'og tu dpal ldan 'bras spungs su byang chub sems dpa' ka ma la shrI zhes par gyur nas gdul bya'i don mdzad/ de'i rjes su bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po'am kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis phyi mtha'i bar bzhugs shing sems can mtha' yas pa'i don mdzad do// de nyid kyi rgyal tshab spyan snga ba chen po bsod nams 'bum pa dgung grangs sum cu bzhes par gdan sar bzhugs/ mdo sgyu 'phrul rdzogs chen gtso bor bton cing bstan pa bskyangs/ re gcig pa la gshegs/ de nyid kyi rgyal tshab dbu 'od ye shes 'bum shing pho stag la sku 'khrungs/ nyer dgu la gdan sar phebs/ mdo sgyu sems gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i mdo sngags kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor zhing dus skabs der chos kyi rje sa skya pan+tita dang 'phags pa rin po che khu dbon hor rgyal pos gdan

drangs te phebs/ lam bar 'dzin du rnam rgyal lha khang bzhengs/ kaH thog pa'ang der phebs/ sa skya pa bzhugs pa'i phyogs thams cad dngul gyis gzhi dang sa 'dzin gyi rang bzhin du gyur/ cig shos kyi phyogs su de dag gis dben par gyur pa na/ der lha khang la gsar rnying gnyis rab gnas dus gcig mdzad rgyur kaH thog pa'i zhal nas rab gnas kyi thog ma'i bgegs skrod de nged rnying ma bas byed/ ye shes pa gzhugs pa sogs rab gnas dngos gzhi de khyed gsar ma mdzad par zhu gsungs/ der kaH thog pas bgegs skrod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas lha khang phyi nang bsgyur/ sa skya bas ye shes pa dbab pas slar rnal du gnas par mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar bstan/ kaH thog pas 'phags pa rin po che la sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang bskur ba mdzad cing hor yul du theg/ slar chos kyi rje hor yul du gzugs sku bsdus/ 'phags pas bod du phyir byon skabs skyes su mchod rten li ma thog tshad gsum dang ting chen po bdun tshar sogs kaH thog tu dbul bar mdzad pa lta'ang yod/ de dag gi tshul sa skya pan+Di'i rtog pa brjod pa snyan ngag gi bstan bcos chen po dge dbang gnyis pa rin spung sa spyod ngag dbang 'jigs med grags pas mdzad pa skal bzang legs lam du/ 'bri chur sgras bod bdud kyi rtsi// btung ba thams cad legs byas su// 'gro ba'i rgyud gyis nyer 'tsho rnams// bde dang 'byor pa phyugs gzigs nas// kye ma ma la srid pa yi// rnam 'gyur yid 'ong rtsom pa las// rten 'byung tshogs ni rgya che ba// brtag par bya de rgyal gyur gsungs// de nas rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi 'degs 'jog re la chos 'khor mtshan ma brgya// 'god bzhin spro bas rgyal ba'i gong 'phang la zhon 'dzin du byon la de bzhin du// gsang sngags rnying ma'i snying po rnal 'byor grub pa yongs mdzad shar gyi kaH thog pa// dbu 'od ye shes 'bum ste gzi byin nyi ma 'bum phrag 'gongs dang lhan cig tu// brten pa lha yi snang brnyan 'ga'// gsar du bsgrubs la kaH thog pas// bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i drag shul gyis// lha sku rnams kyang ring du song// dam tshig sems dpa' de yar ba// gang du sa skya paN chen mthus// skad cig la bkug ye shes kyi// sems dpa' brjid ldan lhag gnas bstsal// thabs shes bdag gi nga yir med// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan las// mchog chos grub pa'i rol rtsed kyis// phreng ba mnyam nyid bsham mo che// theg pa rim pa dgu yi mgon// de yis 'phags par sgyu 'phrul dbang// bskur ba'i dril chen sgra bzhin du// rna ba brgyud mar dbyangs su len// dngul gyi sa gzhi sa 'dzin can// yangs shing dar ba'i ku mud dang// 'khrul las zla

ba'i 'jig rten ni// dga' ba 'khyil ba'i thad brgyud do// zhes pa la sogs kyis rjod byed snyan cing mdzes pa'i rgyan dang/ brjod bya don gyi lus rdzogs par gyur pas snyan dngags smra ba gzhan gyis cha tsam yang bsgrun du med pa nyid du mthong ngo// rje dbu 'od pa'i rgyal tshab byang chub dpal pa dgung lo zhe bzhi par gdan sar byon/ 'di'i dus su bar khrod dang/ spang khrod/ dam phug rnams su phung po 'od skur dengs pa mang du byung/ lha khang bzhengs skabs su las byed rnams kyis phyugs lug mang po bsad nas sha lpags pa so sor phral ba la drung nas se gol zhig gtogs par mdzad pas thams cad co dir gyis mkha' spyod du song bar grags/ dgung lo re bzhi pa la gzhan don du gshegs/ de'i rgyal tshab bsod nams bzang po dgung lo nga gsum pa la gdan sar phebs/ gzhi sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gyis bzung zhing 'di skabs tsam nas nyang dang chos dbang sogs gter chos sngon ma sngon ma rnams cung zad re dar bar byung/ re gsum pa la gzhan don du gshegs/ rgyal tshab kun dga' 'bum pas kyang sngon bzhin du bstan pa bskyangs/ de nas dbang phyug dpal ba dgung grangs so brgyad par gdan sa mdzad cing 'di skabs bshad pa bag tsam re las sgrub pa kho na gtso bor mdzad cing thugs dam la rtse gcig tu bzhugs pa la/ dus gzhan zhig tu 'jang rgyal po dmag dpung chen po byung bar nye gnas kyis dmag byung bas ci tsug drag zhus par khong nyid kyi thog tu rtsam pa mang po lugs shig gsungs// de bzhin du byas pas kha ba chen po bab nas dmag rnams phyir log/ slar zhabs su btud de gser gyi thub pa'i sku dang/ ba so las bcos pa'i gan+d+ho la'i bkod pa/ da lta'i gtsug lag khang gi rtse'i gany+dzir che ba 'di rnams phul/ de nyid dgung grangs nga gsum pa la gzugs sku bsdus// rgyal tshab blo gros 'bum pa zhe gsum pa la gdan sa mdzad/ 'di'i slob ma chu gsor nam mkha' 'bum sogs grub brnyes mang po byung/ zur 'ug pa lung dang gsang sngags gling rnams su bar skabs su bstan pa nyag phra bar gyur pa la mdo sgyu 'phrul sogs dar bar mdzad cing dbus gtsang khams gsum du bstan pa la phyag rjes che/ re lnga par gzhan don du gshegs/ rgyal tshab blo gros seng ge dgung lo so drug par gdan sa mdzad/ bka' ma snga dar rnams kyis gzhi bzung nas gter ma'i skor yang 'di skabs ka dar rgyas su mdzad pa yin/ drug cu pa la gshegs/ rgyal tshab byang chub blo gros kyis kyang sngon gyi rgyun de ka dang khyad par sgyu 'phrul sde bzhi dang lam rnams bkod la'ang bshad pa mdzad/ ri rtsibs dang bar khrod sogs su spang ba bsam gtan gyi sde'ing shin tu rgyas/ de nyid kyi rgyal tshab

byang chub seng ge dang byang chub rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis kyang bka' gter gyi 'chad nyan sgom gsum shin tu rgyas par mdzad/ byang chub rgyal mtshan gyi slob ma bu 'bor mkhas grub dz+nyA na ke tu ni gnyags ye shes gzhon nu'i rnam 'phrul du lung gis bstan cing mdo sngags spyi'i lam rim thams cad la mkhas/ khyad par mkhas grub chen po bra'o chos 'bum las 'dus pa mdo dang sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang bshad pa sgrub thabs sogs ma lus par gsan/ bla ma de las rmog ston rdo rje dpal bzang gis 'dus pa mdo zhus shing/ de las sems dpa' chen po dar lung pa rdo rje rnam rgyal gyis zhus/ rgyun de las 'dus pa mdo khams lugs su grags pa dbus su bab pa yin te slar 'chad do// mkhas grub ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsang ba snying po rtsa 'grel rnams dang/ mdo dgongs 'dus/ rdzogs chen sems klong man ngag gi sde gsum so so'i bka' srol gyi rtsa ba rnams slar yang nyi ma ltar gsal bar mdzad cing bshad sgrub kyis bstan pa khyab gdal du spel/ zhi khro dang phur ba bka' ma'i 'grel pa/ gsang ba snying po la 'grel pa/ sa bcad/ bsdus don/ lam rnam bkod la Ti ka dang mchan bu/ spar khab dang thugs thig la mchan 'grel/ dam tshig gsal kra la 'grel pa gsal ba'i me long/ zhi khro'i phyag rgya bcing thabs kyi yi ge/ dam pa rin po che'i theg pa spyi bcing gi 'grel pa/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnam bshad sogs bstan bcos shin tu mang bar mdzad/ rje de nyid kyi slob ma kha ba dkar po ba nam mkha' rgya mtsho/ kun dga' zla ba/ phyogs med byang sems/ lab ston nam mkha' rin chen sogs mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa kho na'ang mang du byon pa las kha ba dkar po bas gsang snying spyi don dang/ sa bcad/ bsdus don/ lam rnam bkod la Ti ka sogs mdzad/ mkhas grub chen po nyid sku tshe'i mthar 'phags mtsho ri khrod du sgrub pa kho na la gzhol zhing bzhugs nas bu 'bor dang kha ba dkar po/ 'jang yan chad kyi gdul bya dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad nas mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang mo ches khyod drug cu re bzhi'i dus 'di nas tshe 'phos nas byang gi phyogs su 'gro don rgya cher mdzad/ de nas bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' bde ba'i myu gus sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs shing dag pa'i bskal pa yon tan bkod par bde ba'i snying po zhes bya bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa'ang thob/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis zhal gzigs shing thun mong gi spyod yul du'ang bla gos nyi zer la bkal ba sogs mkhas pa dang grub pa'i rnam thar la bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'di yan chad kaH thogs bla rabs bcu gsum zhes rigs

gsum mgon po'i rnam 'phrul zam mi 'chad du byon cing/ snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bshad sgrub gnyis ldan gyis bskyangs pa yin no// yang dam pa bder gshegs gyi slob ma rong po thos chog rnam gsum zhes/ shes rab rgyal mtshan dang/ shes rab dpal ba/ shes rab rdo rje gsum ste dbang rnon cig car gyi gdul bya ji bzhin par nges shing dam pa rin po che'i chos gsungs pa'i sgra thos pa tsam gyis chos thams cad kyi gting sleb pa'i grub pa'i dbang phyug chen por gyur/ khong gsum nyid kyis shar rgyal mo rong du bstan pa spel ba las da lta'i bar bstan pa rin po che ma nyams shing dar ba 'di ka byung ba yin no// yang ka dam pa'i slob ma'i mchog lung bstan bu bzhir grags pa las/ 'bru tsha sgang pas bum rong bzhag gsum kha ba dkar po yan chad du dgon gnas brgya rtsa brgyad btab par grags shing bstan pa khyab gdal du spel ba'i phyag rjes che/ tsa sde spyan snga nam mkha' rdo rjes go 'jo tsa sde dgon pa 'debs par mdzad/ khong gi slob ma drung thugs rje ye shes/ ston pa dbang 'byor sogs las sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gyi skor rnams dbus su babs pas khams lugs zhes pa de byung/ rmog ston 'jam dpal seng ges 'bri rgyud du dgon pa mdzad cing bstan pa dang sems can gyi don rlab bo che bsgrubs/ khong las grub thob rmog rabs bcu gsum du grags pa'i rgyud rnams byung/ grub thob ma Ni rin chen gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi bdag por ngos bzung zhing khong nyid kyi sras mo kun grol 'bum dang lhan cig kaH thog tu sngags kyi lung bstan mdzad kyang ma Ni rin chen rab byung gi brtul zhugs las ma 'das pas rten 'brel cung zad phyugs/ 'on kyang gong ma rnams gsum gyi gdung 'bum sogs kyi zhabs tog mdzad pa'i las zin ma thag de nyid du bla gos kyis gshog pa ltar mdzad nas nam mkha' la bya bzhin 'phur nas phar ka'i ri rtser bab/ der zhabs rjes kyang yod/ de nas ra gcog tu bzhugs shing ring por ma thogs par sku 'od phung du yal lo// bla rabs bcu gsum gyi rjes su drung rabs bcu gsum byon nas rim gyis bka' gter gyi bstan pa bskyangs mod/ 'on kyang bka' ma rnams phyis rim gyis nyag phra ba bzhin gyur/ smos ma thag pa'i bla rabs rnams kyi dus dge 'dun khri phrag bco brgyad du longs pa'i bstan pa dar rgyas byung zhing rgyu mtshan nyid kyi bshad gra dang 'chad nyan kyang yod par 'dug cing/ slob gra dang bsgom gra sogs so sor byung/ mdor na shar rgyal mo rong/ lho tsha ba rong dang mon/ nub kong po sogs dang dbus gtsang man chad du snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bshad sgrub gnyis

ka'i phyogs nas khyab che bas dbus gtsang du bar skabs su mdo dang sgyu 'phrul sems phyogs sogs kyi bstan pa nyag phra bar gyur pa'ang 'di ga'i rgyun gyis gsos shing deng sang gi bar du dbang gi chu bo dang/ bshad pa'i srol/ man ngag gi rgyun/ lung gi brgyud pa rnams ma chad par yod pa 'di ka yin no// de'ang 'dus pa mdo dang sgyu 'phrul gnyis kyi dbang lung man ngag brgyud pa'i chu bo bab lugs phyogs gcig ni/ dam gtsang byams gsum nas/ tsa sde spyan snga ba nam mkha' rdo rje/ drung thugs rje ye shes/ ston pa dbang 'byor/ rje btsun dpal 'bar ba nam mkha' rdo rje/ ston pa mgon rgyal/ yang khrod tshul khrims rgyal mtshan/ bra'o chos kyi 'bum pa/ bu 'bor ba mkhas grub ye shes rgyal mtshan/ bzhag bla mkhas grub ye shes 'bum pa/ de las mon kaH thog pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ kaH thog pa rnam grol bzang po/ kaH thog pa chos kyi seng ge lha bro ba chos kyi dbang po nas rim par/ rje sman lung pa blo mchog rdo rje nas deng sang gi bar du rgyun ma chad par byung ba yin no// yang mdo dbang khams lus zhes pa ni/ bar skabs der/ sgrol chen bsam 'grub rdo rjes/ zur yang dben pa shAkya 'byung gnas lcam sring gnyis la gnang ba las/ zur mo dge 'dun 'bum las brgyud pa ste/ zur mo 'di don la rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma yin mod/ rnam pa gzhon dus nas 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral bas sku btsun/ bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la sbyangs pas mthar son/ gnas lugs rtogs shing ting 'dzin gyi sgo du ma las dbang 'byor pas mkhas shing grub pa mo chen mo gyur te nyang smad rtse rgyal kyi sgom khang du bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad/ des yang dben gsang sngags gling pa zur ston shAkya bshes gnyen la dbang bskur/ des kaH thog gi mkhas grub bra'o chos 'bum la/ des bshes gnyen dkon mchog bzang po des kaH thog pa rmog ston rdo rje dpal bzang po la dbang bskur/ 'dis glan lugs kyi dbang chog du ma du ma khrig nyid gzhir byas pa la 'gos rtsi lung pa'i phyag bzhes gro ston dpal ldan grags kyi chog khrigs kyis kyang brgyan/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro dang sems sde a don bco brgyad kyi sgos bka' yang sbyar te dbang mchog sprang rtsi'i chu rgyun mdzad/ mdzad pa po 'chi med kyis brnyes pa'i rig 'dzin grub par grags shing skyes mchog dam pa yin nges su ma zad/ skul ba po'ang bshes gnyen 'gran zla dang bral ba mang pos mdzad pas 'gangs che zhing/ sgrub rdzas thun mong bco lnga'i dbang gnyal ba'i chog khrigs su cad pa 'dir 'byung ba dang/ sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i zab dbang gsum gyi bka' dbus gtsang du bar skabs su chad pa kaH thog lugs 'dir bzhugs pas

sos shing/ sems sde a don bco brgyad kyi dbang rgyun 'dis bzung bas bstan rgyun la phan pa chen po'i sgor gyur pa yin no// rmog ston gyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po dar lung pa rdo rje rnam rgyal/ des khyung tshang pa 'khrul zhig blo gros dpal ldan la/ des dbang ston karma gu ru la/ des sngags 'chang kun bzang dpal 'byor la/ des gsang bdag phrin las lhun grub la/ des dwags ston chos rgyal bstan 'dzin la dbang skur zhing/ des gter chen chos kyi rgyal po 'gyur med rdo rje la khams lugs brgyud pa'i chu bo bab pa yin no// yang rog shes rab 'od las kyang mdo sgyu'i bshad bka' shin tu \u0f84dar ba byung ste/ shes rab 'od 'dis dang por rog ston btsan po la so lugs kyi mdo dang sgyu 'phrul dang sems phyogs gsan/ lhab dres ma gong pa la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul skyo lugs/ lhab kyi zur chos pa slob dpon yam chos dngos grub la mdo dang/ sgyu 'phrul zur lugs/ yang sgro phug pa'i slob ma gnubs ston/ des kha rag snying po/ des yam shud/ yang kha rag snying pos sras pad+ma 'bar/ des rog shes rab/ yang/ so dar ma seng ge la sgyu 'phrul mchan mang zhes sngar mchan bus Ti ka 'chad pa'i srol yod pa de gsan/ yang chu bar gyi glan shAkya bzang po las brgyud pa dang/ lha rje nya ri ba'i slob ma nyang nag mdo bo las brgyud pa ste/ mdor na bla ma 'dis lugs tha dad pa mang po gsan cing/ sgyu 'phrul gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi stong thun dang/ lam rnam bkod kyi Ti ka brtsams/ des snye mdo thams cad gzigs pa zhes grags par bshad cing/ des kyang snying Tig dang/ lam rnam bkod la mchan bu zhib par mdzad/ rog gi gdung brgyud rnams la'ang dbang dang rgyud kyi bshad pa shin tu dar bar byung ngo// de bzhin du gtsang stod mang dkar du yang stod zur pa zhes grags pa rim par byung nas bshad sgrub legs par mdzad/ des la stod lho byang thams cad du'ang me mched pa bzhin gyur pas/ byang du me ston 'byung gnas 'od ces pa dang/ snar ston seng ge 'od ces pa dang/ byang tar la mo pa yon tan dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa yang tho re long yod la// gzhan yang ngan phag tu sgyu 'phrul gyi bshad pa rim par byung bas rgyal ba klong chen pas der gsan par mdzad do// da ni gangs ri'i khrod 'di tsam na phul du byung ba'i pan+Di ta chen por grags pa rong pa chos kyi bzang po'i gtam brjod pa la dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ de la rong ban dpal gyi rin po che'i sras/ rong ban rin chen tshul khrims zhes bya ba des rgyu'i dus kyi mngon byang lnga'i cho ga byas pa las/ phyogs kyi glang po'i shes rab/ dbyigs gnyen zhabs kyi thos pa/ tsan+d+ra go mi'i

brjod pa/ chos kyi grags pa'i brgal brtag/ slob dpon dpa' bo'i rtsom pa ste/ phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i ngo bor byang chub pa'i skye ba'i myu gu gtsang smad ru lag gi sa'i cha snar lung rong du bzung ngo// de ni bstan pa snga dar gyi zhabs su slob dpon smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti zhes bya ba'i pan+Di ta gcig byon nas mdo khams kyi sa'i char rgyud 'ga' zhig gi 'gyur yang bcos/ tha ga na'i mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi 'grel pa dang/ 'jam dpal gsang ldan la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs mang por bsgyur/ sgra'i bstan bcos 'ga' zhig kyang mdzad nas myang ngan 'das pa gang gi de ma thag pa'i sku skye ba yin par grags/ bka' 'gyur mdo mangs kyi lung rgyun la smr-i ti dang breng chags su 'dren pa ni dpyad gzhir 'dug/ yang a tsa ra phra la ring mo zhes bya ba'i pan+Di ta gcig khams su byon/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa la sogs bsgyur bshad mdzad nas 'das pa de nyid kyi skye ba yin par yang grags/ sku gzhon nu nas lhun gyis grub pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' bas nyang smad du 'gar ston tshul khrims bzang po la gsan pa mdzad/ yab kyis rgyags skyel du byon pas/ mched grogs dag na re/ khyed kyi bu 'di blo bred/ tho co che bas nged cag kyang sun par byed na da res 'khrid par 'thad ces zer/ yab kyis slob dpon la khong rnams de skad mchid na 'khrid par bya'am zhus pas/ 'gar ston chen pos/ de skad ma zer/ chos thams cad khos go nas yod pa yin gsung skad/ lo bcu gcig pa la mtshan nyid gsan/ chos dbar la byis pa'i rtse sar yang slob dpon gyi gsung tshad shar re 'ong bas/ chos thams cad tshar re gsan pa kho nas tshigs gcig kyang ma nor bar thugs su chud pas 'jam dpal gyi sprul par grags/ bcu gsum lon pa'i tshe gsan pa rdzogs pa dang 'dra bar byung zhing/ shes bya thams cad la ma rmongs pa byung/ nyid kyi zhal nas kyang/ bdag thos pa chung ba yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad ma thos pa med do// thos pa che ba yang ma yin te chos thams cad tshar re las ma dgos so gsung skad/ skyes bu chen po 'di ni shes rab myur la zab pa/ rgya che la dri ma dang bral ba'i spobs pa mchog tu dge bas mdo rgyud dang bstan bcos la sogs pa'i rgya gzhung brling po sngar ma gzigs pa mtha' dag tshar re re'am/ gnyis tshun chad gzigs pas tshig dang don gyi cha ma lus pa thams cad thugs la zin cing mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par grags pas/ thog ma nyid nas ha cang ma 'bad par saM skr-i ta dang/ skad rigs kyi bye brag gzhan mang po la'ang ma rmongs shing/ phyi nang gi rig pa'i gnas dang/ gtsug lag thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i blo gros gyi

tsher ma rno bas/ bod kyi skad nyid la'ang 'di ni don 'di tsam la 'jug go zhes ston pa'i khyad par phra mo'ang gzhan las ches lhag/ tshad ma'i bstan bcos dang/ rig byed kyi bstan bcos dang/ don du 'gyur ba'i tshigs bcad dang/ snyan dngags la sogs pa'ang dbyug pa can gyi gzhung kho na la ma ltos par rig pa de ston pa'i gzhung lugs rgya chen po mang po'i don mkhyen pa yin/ byis pa'i dus a tsa ra 'dug tshad la dgyes shing de dag dang brda' 'phrod pas bi brta'i pu ta la brtags pa tsam gyis mkhyen pa la tshegs ma byung/ tha na dud 'gro'i brda' dang skad kyi rim pa'ang mkhyen par grags/ smra sgo la sogs pa'i 'grel pa dang bstan bcos kyang mang du mdzad/ blo gros kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pas spyir chos la mos pa'i mi rnams dang/ chos kyi gang zag dang/ khyad par du rdo rje theg pa la zhugs shing/ gsang sngags kyi las dang dngos grub sgrub par 'dod pa dag la phan gdags pa'i dgongs pa zab mo mnga' bas/ phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams pas nan tan tu 'doms shing phan thogs par mdzad/ mngon par shes pa'i cha dang ldan zhing sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang gnas skabs mkhyen pas/ 'gro ba phal pa blo bsgyur shing/ chos la gnas pa rnams de'i 'gal zlar gyur pa las ldog pa'i phyir/ 'byar zhing 'grig pa'i bstan bcos zhal sgo'i chu skyes las phyung ste phan 'dogs pa la rtag tu skyo ba mi mnga'/ chos kyis blo ma bsgyur ba'i tha mal ba dag la sair sna spangs nas bdog pa gtong ba dang/ log sgrub bzod pas snying rje'i yul du mdzad nas zhi bde la 'god/ sdom pa'i gnas dang thugs dam la nor bu rin po che dang srog gi dbang po ltar gces spras mdzad cing gzhan yang del 'god/ dam pa'i chos rtsom pa na glegs bam bsdu zhing gzigs pa la sogs pa'i rtogs dpyod kyi sgro 'dogs mi dgos par/ chos kyi tshig don la thogs rdug med par 'jug pa'i spobs pa'i gter chen po brgyad grol zhing bstan bcos rnams kyang don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ brjod pa ma 'dres pa sha stag 'byung bas/ ston pa drang srong chen po'i gsung gi gsang ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir gzhan mkhas par grags pa gang gis kyang rtsod mi nus shing/ des mdzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi man ngag rnams la slob pa'i rgyud du byung ba'i gang zag/ lung ma thob kyang yi ge las byung ba bzhin sbyar ba las byin rlab ma byung ba med ces grags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku nyid du'ang gleng/ gnas lnga rig pa'i pan+Di ta mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa jo bo a ti sha dang bdag nyid chen po 'di mjal ba'i tshe/ jo bo'i zhal nas/ rgya gar gyi A tsar+ya nag po spyod pa de nyid tshe

'phos pa jo bo 'di kho na yin te/ kho bos 'di dang chos gtam bya ba ga la thub ces rtsod med du grags par gsungs/ spyir gtam du'ang/ 'dul ba mtshur ston dbyig gi mkhas// chog sgrigs bzangs kyi ye grags mkhas// sgra dang tshad ma rong pa mkhas// thams cad 'dzom pa a pho rang// chos grags rang zer skad/ spyir bla ma mang po las mdo sngags so so'i brgyud pa'i bring chags mthud pa tsam yod mod kyi/ khyad par du snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i chos skor las/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i gdams pa rnams ni sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms/ mkhar chen dpal gyi dbang phyug/ dom a tsa ra dpal me tog/ sgro rdo rje gzhon nu/ zhang zhung yon tan grags/ rong ban yon tan/ rog ban tshul khrims rin po che las nyid kyis gsan to// bai ro tsa na'i man ngag rnams/ bai ros g.yu sgra/ des bla chen dgongs pa gsal/ des grum shing glag can/ des gnubs dpal brtan/ des ya zi bon ston/ des kun mkhyen rong zom la bshad de sems sde'i brgyud pa gcig go/ yang klong thang sgrol mar a ro ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i skyes bu zhig byung ste/ de la rgya gar bdun brgyud dang/ rgya'i slob dpon bdun brgyudakyi gdams pa mnga' zhing// des cog ro zangs dkar mdzod khur dang/ ya zi bon ston/ des nyid la'o// 'di la rdzogs chen khams lugs shes zer/ yang bi ma las nyang ting 'dzin bzang po la gsungs pa dang/ bi ma las rma rin chen mchog dang/ gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra la gsungs pa'i man ngag kyang// gnyis kas khu byang chub 'od/ khyung po dbyig 'od la brgyud nas rim gyis rong zom la mnga' bas gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po 'gran zla spangs pa zhig ste 'di nyid la'ang bstan pa'i chu mgo gcig gnas so// gsang snying 'grel pa rong lugs kyi mgor/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems// zhes yod pas dkon cog 'grel zhes ming du thogs la/ kun mkhyen chen po'i 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun sel theg rgyal gyi lugs su bkral zhing zhal gsal/ kun mkhyen rong pa'i 'grel pa 'di dbyings che bar bkral bas sgrom che zhing kha dam par snang ste/ bod 'grel gyi gtso bo 'di gnyis yin pas shes na blo gros la nus pa chen po ster ba yin no// deng sku gzhon nu'i tshe mdo ston seng ge bya ba la snga 'gyur gsan pa'i tshe/ re zhig na mnal lam du/ gsang ba snying pos zan byas/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi tshod ma byas nas gsol gyin 'dug pa rmis/ de slob dpon la brjod pas/ shin tu ngo mtshar che/ chos de khong du chud pa'i rtags yin/ khyod kyis 'grel ba re gyis gsung skad/ der bla ma'i dgongs pa rdzogs

par bya ba'i phyir/ bslab pa rin po che gsum la brten pa'i man ngag gsum mdzad de/ lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i don gyi nges brjod dam tshig mdo rgyas/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa ston pa 'grel pa tshul bzhi yan lag bco lnga pa/ lhag pa shes rab gyi bslab pa ston pa rdzogs pa chen po'i lta sgom man ngag/ mnyam sbyor gyi 'grel pa/ de bzhin du ngan song sbyong rgyud/ 'jigs byed la sogs pa'i 'grel pa dang man ngag mang po/ de dag gi nang nas kyang theg pa chen po'i tshul la 'jug pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa gzhung gting zab la go don slongs che ba brjod kyis mi lang ba dang/ mdor na mdo sde dang/ rgyud sde dang/ bstan bcos kyi bye brag la thugs su mi chud pa bya ba shes bya la srid pa ma gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas la rang gir mdzad de tha na 'jig rten pa'i zhing las dang/ phyugs skyong ba dang/ dkar she ji ltar bsgrub pa tshun chad kyi bstan bcos kyang mdzad pas/ dus de'i tshe bod ru bzhi'i mkhas pa thams cad kyi dang por brtsad pa'i bya ba lhags pa'ang/ slar slob dpon chos kyi grags pa'i brtul bzhugs kyis gang dang gang gi spobs pa'i 'khri shing nyam nyes par byas nas nga rgyal gyi gdeng ka la brkyang nul bya ba'i skabs byung ba yin te/ 'di ltar shab kyi yang mkhyen bla ma/ mar pa do pa/ 'u yug pa mda' ston/ mdo'i khyung po hU~M snying/ se khrom rgya mtsho 'bar/ mtshams ston go cha/ spang ka dar chung/ 'gos lhas btsas/ rgya rgyal tshul la sogs pa'i mkhas pa thams cad kyis bod du skyes pa'i gang zag gis bstan bcos 'di tsam rtsom pa zhes dpyas gdags/ sun 'byin pa'i rig pa bsams te/ khyu mchog rA brdar ba la phyogs pa bzhin du skyes bu chen po de'i gam du song song ba na/ lung gi 'thad pa dang/ rig pas dpyad bzod pa dang/ gtan tshigs dang bla mas nye bar bstan pa dang mi 'gal zhing sgra skyon dang/ don skyon la sogs kyi 'gal zla'i phyogs thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i mkhyen rabs kyi spobs pas tshar bcad/ bstan bcos re mthong zhing/ de'i don la ro myangs pas thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas bsti stang du mdzad/ ri mor mdzad/ bla mar mdzad pa sha stag yin zhes grags/ de skad du go rub lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab ces bya ba thos pa mang po'i gzungs 'dzin pa de nyid kyis kyang dang por dpyas gdags/ bar du bla ma rong pas mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po'i tshul la 'jug pa'i po ti gzigs pas gus pa chen po skyes/ tha mar zang zing mang pos bsnyen bkur te mi 'chab par byas nas/ rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab/ 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i chos mang du gsan/ gsang rgyud kyi skabs

na mar pan+Di ta chen po'i zhal nas/ 'o skol la da lta rgya dpe yod par gyur na 'di ltar 'gro ba yin te/ rgya dpe med pas da lta bcos su med gsungs pa la/ go rub lo tswa bas de blo la bzung ste phyis jo bo kr-iSh+Na zhes bya ba'i pan+Di ta las rgya dpe byung nas de la mnyan pas/ rong pa pan+Di ta'i gsung bzhin byung nas shin tu mos pa thob par gyur te/ kr-iSh+Na pa las byung ba'i rgya dpe gcig rong pa nyid la phul nas/ slar yang gsan skad/ de bzhin du mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lo tswa ba dang/ mkhas par grags pa'i blo rtsal can mang pos kyang zhabs la btud/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI warma dang/ many+dzu shrI dz+nyAn dang/ u pA ya shrI mi tra dang/ bud+d+ha A kar b+ha dra dang/ de bA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang/ pa ra me shwa dang/ a mo g+ha badzra la sogs pa pan+Di ta mang po bsten nas/ de dag gi lo tswa ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dang/ gshin rje dgra nag gi rgyud dang/ 'jam dpal gsang ldan dang/ bde mchog rtsa rgyud la sogs pa mang du bsgyur/ 'gyur shin tu bzang bas gsang 'gyur gyi dper 'os/ rgya gar gyi pan+Di ta kun na re/ d+harma b+ha dra khyod chos mang po rtsoms la 'gro ba rnams skyobs shig/ khyod kyi yon tan gzhan lta zhog/ sgra tshad kyi lugs 'di'i gsum cha tsam las mi shes pas kyang rgya gar na chos rtsom pa yin na/ khyod ci'i phyir mi brtsam zhes gsungs skad/ de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan yang/ gcom bskyungs pa dang/ khengs pa snyol pa lhur mdzad pas/ rgyal ba klong chen pas rgya 'grel las mngon par 'phags par brjod pa'i rang nyid kyi 'grel pa bzang po dkon mchog 'grel lta bu'i gsham du'ang/ mkhas dang 'phags chen rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung la'ang/ sgro skur dpyad par byed na bdag gzhung cis mi smos/ zhes 'phags chen lag na rdo rjes bsdus pa'i rgyud la'ang mun pas sprul pa'i shes rab kyis gzhung brtag byed pa yod na/ bdag gi 'grel pa smos ci 'tshal zhes slob dpon zhi ba lha'i rnam par thar par bskyangs nas ngang gis dge ba byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa can du ston/ grub pa'i rnam thar la gzhal na/ brag chen gzar po me long lta bu'i ngos la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi spyod pas gshegs pa dang/ brag la phur pa 'debs pa dang/ nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang/ bod kyi lha 'dre phal mo che'i gnas dang spyod pa thugs su chud pa'i mngon par mkhyen pas mnga' ba sogs mang du yod mod kyi/ 'di lta bu'i lta ba mchog tu gyur cing/ so so yang dag rig bzhi'i sa thob pa dag la skye bo phal pa yid brtan par byed pa'i mngon rtags gyi na ba yi ge'i lam du 'dren pa ngo mtshar ba ma yin no// de ltar sprul pa'i skur rtsod pa med pa'i pan+Di ta chen po de la gnas skabs de tsam

byon pa'i mkhas pa thams cad kyi mngon par bstod cing spyi bos btud par gyur la/ dgung lo brgya dang bcu dgu bzhugs te sku la snyun pa med pa'i ngang nas gshegs par grags/ bod gangs can gyi rgyud 'dir 'di dang mnyam pa'i mkhas pa ni su yang ma byung zhes 'gos lo chen pos kyang bsngags shing yongs su grags pa'o// rjes su slob pa la sras brgyud dang slob brgyud gnyis las/ dang po ni/ sras gzi brjid 'bar/ 'bum 'bar gnyis las sras brgyud yun ring po'i bar byung ba kun kyang rdo rje phur pa las dngos grub brnyes pa sha stag yin/ slob brgyud ni/ go rub lo tswa ba dang/ mar pa do pa/ 'gos la sogs pa'i lo tswa ba chen po bcu bdun/ g.yag rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs te grub thob chen po sum cu rtsa lnga/ ma gcig zha ma'i ming po rje 'khun bu pa la sogs pa sgom chen rnal 'byor gyi dbang po brgya brgyad cu/ yol ba'i lcags dge bsnyen rdo rje dbang phyug dang/ yang khyer bla ma la sogs pa gdugs thogs pa lnga brgya la sogs pa'o//// de ltar sngon rabs pa rnams kyi yi dam kyi gtso bor yang phur kho nas bzung ba yin pas yang dag gi skor des shes la/ rdo rje phur pa ji ltar dar ba'i gtam cung zad brjod de/ de la rigs 'dzin gyi slob dpon u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam+b+ha wa'i zhabs la brgyud de/ phur pa rgyal po lugs su grags pa dang/ jo mo lugs dang/ lcags lugs dang/ yang sna nam mam rong lugs dang/ lha nag dang/ lha khra ste sku mdog las grags pa sogs rnam grangs tha dad mod/ de dag kyang ngo bo gcig la man ngag gi ldog cha dang/ bka' babs kyi khyad par las de dang der grags pa'o// de la dang po ni bsam yas 'byongs nas slob dpon chen pos btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan dang jo mo mkhar chen bza' dang/ spyan 'dren pa mi gsum la gnang bas de skad du grags//// jo mo lugs ni/ slob dpon gshegs khar nyung la 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i dum bu stod las byang chub sgrub pa dang/ smad las dmod pa lam khyer bcud du dril ba 'di jo mo mkhar chen bza' la gsungs/ des lho phyogs mon kha sna rings seng ge rdzong gi brag phug tu mtshan ma rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor zhal phye nas bsgrubs pas zhag nyer gcig na phur bu thams cad bzhad cing/ 'od 'phro ba dang/ 'phar g.yo byed pa dang/ der jo mo'i dgongs pa la/ phur pa grub na gdab las bya/ zer ba yin te dngos la gdab pa'i yul du gyur pa ni med 'on kyang pha mes kyi za 'dre la gdab bo snyam du dgongs nas bsnyen phur dril bas/ phur pa nam mkha' la deng nge song/ pha yul gyi khang ltag na pha mes kyi za 'drer gyur pa zhig gnas pa'i rten skyer pa'i phung po'i steng du babs nas/ skyer phung

tshigs/ za 'dre mnyam pa nyid kyi glong du bsgral/ slar phur pa de jo mo'i dpon brgyud rnams kyis bcangs/ gdengs pa tsam gyis chog pa byung bas/ mkhar chen bza' 'dre 'dul gyi brgyud par grags/ jo mor rang gi ming po mkhar chen dpal gyi dbang phyug la bshad nas rim par dar ro//// lcam lugs su grags pa ni/ cog ro bzas slob dpon dngos la thugs kyang/ dbang bla ma la ma zhus yi dam la zhus pas yid dam slob dpon gyi thugs kar bsdus te dbang skal chad/ slar jo mo 'tsho rgyal la rjes su gnang nas jo mos cog ro bza' la gdams pa las brgyud pa'o//// yang/ sna nam lugs su grags pa ni rong zom chen po las brgyud pa'i lugs kho na ste brgyud pa sngar bshad ma thag pas shes la/ 'dir kha cig tu/ rong zom chen po'i mes po rong ban yon tan rin chen nam/ dpal gyi rin chen des slon dpon chen po dngos la thug/ dgung lo sum brgya 'tsho zhes zer/ de'i sras rong pa pan+ti ta'i yab rin chen tshul khrims kyis kyang lo phyed gnyis brgyar bzhugs pa las brgyud pas rong lugs zhes bshad pa yin par shes so//// phur pa lha nag tu grags pa ni/ u rgyan yab yum nas 'bre a tsa ra sa le/ lang lab byang chub rdo rje nas rim par/ yar 'brog pa gu rub yang dag ces bya bas phur pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud la brten nas lha thams cad nag por mdzad pas de ltar grags la/ 'di la 'bre a tsa ra sa le byas na lam lab kyi bar dang de gnyis phyi thag ring bas brgyud pa ltag mi 'phrod 'bre a tsa ra nu ru zhes bya bas tshe'i grub pa thob pa yin ces zer ba'ang 'dug ste/ ming gi khyad par du byas kyang 'gal ba ni chung mod/ 'on kyang bla ma 'phags pa rin po che la smad las sgrol dbang gi rgyun ma rnyed nas/ sprang po la 'dug kyang zhu'o zhes btsal bas/ 'tsho rgyal gyi dngos slob a tsa ra gu ru bya ba tshe'i rig 'dzin thob pa zhig bsil ba tshal la sogs pa'i gnas nges med du rgyu ba la yod zer ba thos/ der glo bo lo tsA ba la gser mang po bskur nas sgrol dbang gi rgyun thob pa yin ces zer ro//// phur pa sa lugs su grags pa ni/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs kyi slob ma 'khon klu'i dbang po las rim par brgyud de/ chos dang rigs brgyud gnyis ka zam ma chad pas sa skya pa rnams la grags pas de skad du grags pa'o//// yang phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud la brten pa phur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gsang ba'i rgyud drug dang/ ki lA ya tan+t+ra bcu gnyis nas bsdus pa gsham sngon can gyi skor gnyags las brgyud tshul sngar bshad zin to// de lta bu'i yi dam las mngon rtags brnyes pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig byung bas thams cad

bsnyad par mi nus la/ khyad par du gyur pa la lang lab byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba de gzhon nu nas pha ma dang bral/ pha tshan rnams kyis rje btsun mi la la ji ltar byas pa bzhin du shin tu nyam thag par gyur pas/ 'bre a tsa ras thugs kyis ma bzod nas phur pa'i man ngag las gnad du zab pa'i skor byin te sgrub pa byas nas pha spun rnams rtsad bcad/ de la grags pa chen po 'phel na'ang sngon gyi sbyin 'bras dbul bas 'khor re'i lug rdzi byed cing yod tsa na/ dge bshes rwa lo tswa ba de mnga' thang dang 'byor pa shin tu rgyas/ bod kyi bla dpon che dgus dbang med du 'dud dgos pa yin/ de ltar ma bgyis na khong gis gshin rje'i drag sngags kyis sgrol bar grags/ de la dum pa rgya zhang khrom gyi gshin rje'i skor rdza'i zom gang gter nas phyung ste/ tshe bdag sdig pa snyings 'dzings la sogs pa phyed tsam las ma bshus pa rnams/ rA lo'i sngun du son pas/ rang nyid kyi gshed skor la lhan thabs su byas/ de la rgya gar gyi khungs dang 'gyur bcos/ de bzhin du bum thang gi gter kha mang po'i khrod nas kyang mthu gtad ser gsum/ rnam sras/ dzam b+ha la/ tshogs bdag la sogs pa man ngag zab dgu byung bas gsar 'gyur gyi gshin rje las mtha' mang la myur bar song/ mar pa'i sras dar ma mdo sde la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu gsum dang/ gnyan lo tsA ba sogs rang mnyam gyi lo tsA ba bcu gsum bsgral ba'i sngags mkhan de/ 'khor re'i sar chos 'khor la byon pas lang lab kyis phyag ma btsal/ mi blun po gcig yin par 'dug dgongs pa la/ slar lang lab kyi mtshan nyid thos nas/ 'o na kho la do nub gyi tshe las med kyi spur zer/ drag shul gyi las brtsams pas/ dgug 'dren gyi bden bdar dang po'i tshe khong dpon slob la rtsang phur gyi char babs nas/ tho phyi'i gra pa rnams smas/ bar pa la phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor za gsod dang bcas pa'i lcags phur gyi char babs/ tha ma'i tshe me dpung dang 'ur sgras gang ste nam mkha' la bltas pas/ lcags bsregs lta bu'i rdo rje gzhon nu ri do chad tsam pa rA lo'i thog tu rngams rngams 'cha' 'cha' ltar 'dug pas skrag par gyur te/ bzod gsol byas/ phyag dang 'bul bas bsnyen bkur/ gshin rje mkhan po phur pa la rdugs zer ba de nas byung/ phur pa'i stod las la dngos grub brnyes pa mang du byung ste/ smad las la rtsal shugs 'di las thon pa ma byung bar grags/ de la slob ma'i gtso bor gyur pa sna nam shes rab tshul khrims/ mong dgu'i skyi gyang sgyel/ rog gi skra phur bu mgo/ 'u yug rol po'i nyang nag go/ de la skyi gyang sgyel/ skyi ba na byang chub rin chen bya ba'i khang zhing dang nor rnams pha spun gyis

'phrogs/ skyo ba shin tu 'phel te lang lab la phur pa zhus pas zla ba dgur lha bsnyen gyis/ de nas bse lcags shel gsum la zla ba gnyis sgrubs shig/ don 'grub bo gsungs/ de ltar byas pas nus pa tshad du phyin/ byang gi drung na mi mang po nyi ma 'de zhing 'dug pa la bltas pas/ thams cad dgra ru ma gyur pa mi 'dug nas/ phur pa gyang la bsdigs pas gyang 'gyel/ thams cad phyi ma'i lam du bkod pas skyi gyang sgyel du grags pas mtshon nus pa can sha stag byung ste yi ger brir mi lang/ lar phur pa 'di nus pa mchog tu che bar grags pas/ slob dpon chen pos tsan+dan gyi nags la me shor ba la gdengs pas nags sor chud/ bi ma las gang+gA gyen du 'phyur ba la gdengs pas gang+gA yan man du chad/ bal po shrI la many+dzUs brag mkhar gong can la gdengs pas brag ri dum bur nyil/ jo mo mkhar chen bzas spyang ki'i rjes sa la btab pas spyang ki rbab la 'dril/ me nu rgyal ba'i snying pos bya rog gis phreng ba khyer ba la bsdigs pas bya rog thang la lhung/ lo dpal gyi blo gros kyis dmag gi sgra khyim la thebs pas mon dmag cham la phebs/ de la sogs te dgra bgegs gnyis la thebs pas chos 'phrul stobs po che gang gis kyang rdzi bar ma nus/ nang du nyon mongs dug lnga la thebs pas mchog gi dngos grub thob pa dpag tu med pa byung ngo//// yang gter ma'i phyogs rang bzos ma bslad pa'ang shin tu mang mod de/ mngon rtags gsal ba slob dpon chen pos btsan po la dbang rgyud gdams pa dang bcas gnang nas/ rta mgrin yang gsang gi chos skor dang lhan cig yer pa se ba lung gi brag la gter du gtams pa/ grub pa'i dbang phyug 'dar phya ru bas jo mo nag rgyal gyi phug pa gong mar bsgrub pa mdzad pas slob dpon chen po dang dngos su mjal/ yer pa zla ba phug tu sgrubs shig gsungs pas de bzhin du mdzad/ der nang re bzhin slob dpon chen po nyi zer la chibs nas phebs te chos gsungs/ nub re bzhin srin po 'dul du 'gro zhes nyi zer la bcibs te bzhud/ de'i tshe yer pa'i seb lung nas mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa gter nas phyung/ lha sa'i tshong dus su phebs pa na/ rlung 'tshub chen pos khrom 'thor ba byung/ de nas gtsang du byon tsa na/ sa paN skyid grong du 'byon pa dang gnas khar gcig tu 'dzom/ 'dar phyar zhal 'chos pas A+oM badzra kyi li kyi li ya zhes bgrags pas sa paN gyis/ de ma dag/ badzra kI li kI la ya zer ba yin gsungs/ der 'dar phyar thugs yus nas/ sngags ma dag kyang 'di bzhin byed pa yin gsungs nas brag la phur pa tham tham brgyab pas 'jim pa la byas pa bzhin song/ slar phur pa tshul la gcus

gyin then pas dpal nas cung zad gas/ der sa paN gyis grub thob tu shes nas/ nga mu stegs pa dang rtsod du 'gro bas de'i rim gror 'byon dgos gsungs/ rung gsungs nas lhan cig tu byon/ skyid sgrong du phebs pa na/ rgya gar gyi lugs bzhin bstan pa gang rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du btsugs/ sa paN dang 'phrog byed dga' bo gnyis nyi ma bcu gsum gyi bar rtsod pa'i g.yul ngo la zhugs pas/ mthar sa paN rtsod pa las rgyal yang/ grub rtags 'gran zer 'phrog byed dga' bo nang pa'i bstan pa la 'jug tu ma nyan/ des mu stegs des ral pa rgyab tu bskyur/ lag pa gshog pa ltar byas te nam mkha' la 'phur bas/ sa paN gyis rigs sngags kyi mthu las gzhan gyis mi thul bar gzigs te badzra kyi li kyi la rgyugs shog ces 'dar phyar pos/ der rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos mu stegs kyi grib ma'i snying gar/ oM badzra
