lugs kyi thugs sbyong bar tshegs med par mkhyen/ kun mkhyen rgyal mchog lnga pa chen por gtsug phud phul te/ mtshan kun bzang pad+ma phrin las su bstsal/ phyis de nyid kyi zhabs drung du bsnyen par rdzogs shing zab chos mang du gsan/ gzhan yang zur chen chos dbyings rang grol/ mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan sogs mkhas grub kyi bla ma mang du bsten nas/ gsar rnying gi dbang khrid bshad lung man ngag sogs chos bka' mtha' yas pa zhig ngom pa med par gsan cing/ bsam byung gis gtan la phab pas thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen rab rgyas/ sgrags yang rjong/ chu bo ri/ gdan sa la sogs par sgom pa'i shes rab kyis nyams su bzhes pas bskyed rim la brtan pa thob/ rdzogs rim gyi ye shes la dbang 'byor pas mkhas grub chen por gyur te/ mkhyen brtse nus pa'i phrin las bshad sgrub las gsum gyi 'khor lo las nam yang mi g.yel ba dang/ khyad par kun mkhyen rgyal ba lnga pa mchog gi lung gis bskul te 'dus pa mdo'i dbang mchog dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs zhes bya ba'i bka' rtsom dang/ mdo dbang kyang tshar mang du mdzad pa sogs kyis mdo'i bstan pa la phan pa chen por gyur cing/ dgung grangs bdun cu don bdun gyi bar de snyed du bstan 'gro'i don rgya chen po mdzad cing bka' rtsom kyang bka' gter gnyi ga'i phyogs su bstan pa'i sman yon chen por 'gyur ba pod gsum tsam bzhugs so// gnyis pa zur mo'i brgyud pa ni khams lugs te kaH thog gi skabs bshad zin/ gsum pa sras brgyud ni/ sgrol chen gyi sras sangs rgyas rin chen gyis/ zhang ston nam mkha' rdo rje la brgyud de/ 'di ni sgrol ma pa yab sras gnyis ka'i bslab rdzogs kyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig ste/ 'jam dbyangs bsam grub rdo rje gshegs pa'i mchod 'bul la bu chen gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i bla ma rnams kyis dbu mdzad pa'i chog gra bcu bzhi tsam bsgrubs pa'i bu chen 'dren dus bla ma zur chen pa dang/ bla ma gnam sdings pa dang/ zhes rnam thar du bgrangs pa de yin/ khyad par mdo dbang gtad rgya bshad pa gdams ngag dang bcas pa sras sangs rgyas rin chen la bde chen sgrol mar gsan/ rgyud lung man ngag sgrub sde dang bcas pa thams cad la mkhas/ rta nag gnam sdings kyi sgrub khang du nyams len la gtso bor bsgril bas rlung sems la brtan pa thob/ bskyed rdzogs kyi dgongs pa mngon du gyur/ phrin las bzhi la dbang 'byor bas gdul bya'i don mdzad do/ des mkhas grub sha mi rdo rje rgyal mtshan la gnam sdings

dpal gyi sgrub khang du dbang bskur zhing bshad pa gdams ngag dang bcas pa gnang/ dben gnas bde chen du sgrub pa la bzhugs pas bskyed rim la brtan pa thob ste las bzhi thogs med du 'grub/ rdzogs rim gyi nyams rtogs mthar phyin/ bshad sgrub gnyis ka'i phyogs nas bstan pa'i don mdzad do// des rig 'dzin g.yu 'brug rdo rje la bde chen gyi sgrub gnas su 'dus pa mdo'i dbang gtad rgya dang bcas pa rdzogs par bskur zhing/ bshad pa dang gdams ngag kyang bstsal/ 'on dang rdo sogs dbus ri'i dben gnas rnams dang gtso bor g.yas ru rta nag gi la rgu rdos dgon du nyams len la chig sgril gyis bzhugs pas bla ma sgrub chen pa zhes kyang mtshan du grags/ nyams rtogs mthar phyin pa brnyes/ byin brlabs mdzad pa tsam gyis nad gdon las grol ba sogs mthu stobs nus pa'i rtsal thon/ dgung lo yang shin tu smin par bzhugs te dben par nyams len dang sbrags nas thar 'dod kyi gdul bya skal ldan rnams smin grol la 'god par mdzad do// des gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ra'i sprul pa mkhas grub blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po la 'dus pa mdo'i chu bo bzhi rdzogs kyi dbang gtad rgya bshad pa gdams ngag phyag bzhes dang bcas pa bstsal/ 'di ni gtsang g.yas ru'i thag gdong kha ru ldong gi rigs su 'khrungs/ chung ngu nas tha snyad kyi rig pa rnams tshegs med par mkhyen cing/ khyad par gso rig la mkhas/ gzhon nu'i dus lde pa gdong khar pa'i zhabs phyir bzhugs pas mtshan gdong khar 'tsho byed du grags/ dar la bab pa na rigs sad de rab tu byung nas/ bla chen rdo rje 'chang grags pa rin chen/ yongs 'dzin ngag dbang grags pa/ pang gling thugs sras zla ba rgyal mtshan/ gter ston zhig po gling pa/ sku lus ma spangs par mkha' spyod tu gshegs pa rdo rje seng ge sogs mkhas grub kyi bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs la gtugs te/ chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa bzhi ngom pa med par gsan/ de yang gsan lo tsam du ma bzhag par sgro 'dogs chod par mdzad nas/ 'du 'dzin dang g.yeng bas mi 'phrogs par nyams bzhes la 'bad pas thos bsam sgom gsum cig car du grub/ de'i mthus nyams rtogs dang mkhyen rabs kyi klong nang nas brdol te/ mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs spyi dang khyad par snga 'gyur bka' gter gyi chos gang la'ang thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen rab rgyas/ rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa shar/ rtsa rlung thig le'i 'gros dbu mar thim/ rmi lam sbyong spel sprul sgyur la dbang 'byor pas dag pa'i zhing bgrod nas sangs rgyas dang byang sems mang po'i zhal mjal zhing lung bstan thob/ nus pa bod 'phung byed kyi 'byung po dang mtha' dmag gdug pa can rnams tshar gcod pa

dang/ bsrung zhing bzlog pa'i rtags phral du thon pas snyan grags kyis kun tu khyab/ sku tshe'i smad la nyang smad skyid sdug tu bzhugs nas 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i dgongs pa las ma g.yos bzhin du dbang bshad lung zab khrid sogs gdul bya'i dbang po dang 'tshams pa'i chos 'chad spel rgyun chags su mdzad pas so so'i re ba skong zhing rnam bshad sgrub yig chog 'phrin phyag bzhes chos 'byung rtsod lan sogs kyi rtsom pa dang/ gser pod kyi rgyud bcu bdun/ bi ma snying thig/ bde 'dus sogs kyi mtshon bka' gter gyi glegs bam du ma bzhengs pa la sogs te bshad sgrub las gsum gyi phrin las rlabs po che snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa gsal zhing rgyas par mdzad/ 'dis 'chi ba brtags bslu'i yi ge de dgung lo bdun cu don gsum pa la mdzad par gsal bas sku tsher yang ring por bzhugs pa mngon no// des gong ra lo chen gzhan phan rdo rje la 'dus pa mdo'i chu bo bzhi rdzogs kyi dbang gtad rgya bshad pa gdams ngag phyag bzhes dang bcas pa gnang zhing/ dam pa 'di ni gnubs khro phu ba'i gdung rigs rtogs ldan chos nyid rang grol gyi yang tsha lo chen ngag gi dbang po'i gcung dpon chen zhes pa'i sras su shing pho rta'i lo la 'bras yul bkra shis gling du 'khrungs/ byis pa'i dus thugs rgod cing brtul zhugs che bas su la'ang mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa mtho/ chung ngu nas chags bral gyi rten la 'dun pa ltar zha dmar chos kyi dbang phyug gi drung du dgung lo bcu gnyis pa la dge tshul dang/ nyer gcig pa la bsnyen rdzogs bzhes nas sku btsun pa'i mchog tu gyur/ rang gi khu bo zhwa dmar ba'i rig gnas kyi slob dpon du spyan drangs pa'i phyags phyir 'brangs te/ sgra ka lA pa/ snyan ngag me long/ sdeb sbyor/ skar rtsis/ rgya bod kyi yig sna sogs brda sprod yan lag dang bcas pa la mkhas par sbyangs/ chos rje nyid dang rin po che smra seng sogs las mtshan nyid kyi gzhungaci rigs pa'ang slob par mdzad cing chos gsungs pa rnams kyang zhar chos su gsan/ khyad par rang gi khu bo lo chen ngag gi dbang po/ mkhas grub blo gros rgyal mtshan/ gsung sprul tshul khrims rdo rje/ snyi phu ba rig 'dzin snying po/ rtse le pad+ma legs grub/ kaH thog pa pad+ma blo gros/ yod do ba bkra shis lhun grub sogs skyes chen mang po bsten nas/ snga 'gyur bka' gter gyi chos dpag tu med pa gsan cing sgro 'dogs chod par sbyangs/ bskyed rdzogs kyi sgom sgrub la brtson par mdzad pas nyams rtogs mthar phyin/ 'jig rten chos brgyad kyi 'du 'dzis ma gos pas rjes su 'brang ba thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos la ngang gis sbyor/ rnying ma rgyud 'bum tshar gsum bzhengs pa'i dang po gnyis bstan rgyun la dgongs nas khams dang kong yul du skyel bar

mdzad pas mtshon 'gro don nus pa la phyag dpe sogs phyag na gang yod stsol zhing med na'ang sgrub pa'i rgyu'i dngos po lhug par gtong/ rnying rgyud kyi lung rgyun kyang rje 'di las khams dbus su khyab pas bstan pa la sku drin che/ mdo sngags rig gnas dang bcas pa'i 'chad 'phrin rgyun mi 'chad pas gdul bya'i re ba rdzogs par mdzad cing/ chos nyan pa rnams la 'tsho bas kyang rtag tu skyong/ mdor na mkhan btsun bzang gsum gyi yon tan gyis mtho zhing/ bshad sgrub las gsum gyi phrin las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang nas/ dgung lo re gcig bzhes pa dgung keg gi thog tu zhi ba'i dbyings su gshegs so// des gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang srid gsang bdag phrin las lhun grub la brgyud de/ 'di ni yab smyos ston mkhas grub chen po mdo sngags bstan 'dzin gyi sras su lcags mo phag gi lo la chag byang chub gling du 'khrungs/ dgung lo lnga nas bri klog gnyis ka byang bar mkhyen/ brgyad la yab rje'i drung du dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa gsan/ mtshan o rgyan tshe 'phel du gsol/ de nas brtsams te phrin sgrub phyag len gyi skor mkhyen nas kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung rab rnams dang/ sgra rtsis sogs tha snyad la'ang sbyangs pas blo gros kyi mthu thob/ khyad par yab rje las bla rdzogs thugs gsum sgrub sde brgyad sogs bka' gter gyi dbang khrid bshad lung du ma gsan cing bsam sgom gyis gtan la phab/ skyes chen gtsug lag rgya mtsho las rab tu byung zhing mtshan phrin las lhun grub dpal bzang por bstsal/ gsung chos kyang ci rigs pa gsan/ gzhan yang gsung sprul tshul khrims rdo rje/ lo chen gzhan phan rdo rje/ lha btsun kun bzang rnam rgyal/ rdzogs chen pa 'brug sgra bzang po/ bon lugs pa tshul khrims rgyal mtshan/ zur chos dbyings rang grol/ 'khrul zhig nor bu chos brtan sogs rnying lugs pas rgyal tshab grags pa mchog dbyangs/ mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan sogs gsar ma ste/ gsar rnying gi bla ma dam pa sum cu lhag tsam bsten nas mdo sngags kyi chos mtha' yas pa ngom pa med par gsan cing/ bye brag 'dus pa mdo'i dbang ni/ dgung lo brgyad pa la sngags 'chang kun bzang dpal 'byor byang chub gling du spyan drangs te yab rje dang lhan du zur lugs dang khams lugs gnyis gsan/ nyer gcig pa la lha btsun kun bzang rnam rgyal la khams lugs kyi yi ge'i steng nas gsan/ nyi shu rtsa dgu pa sa yos hor zla bzhi pa la gong ra lhun grub sdings su ma hA lo tsA ba gzhan phan rdo rje'i drung du 'dus pa mdo'i rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdul tshon gyis bzhengs par/ gnyal pa bde legs pa'i yi ge'i steng nas chu bo bzhi'i

dbang gtad rgya sgom rim man ngag dang bcas pa sgrub chen gyi las rim dang 'brel par zhag bcu bdun gyi khongs su rdzogs par gsan/ gong lo de nyid skal ldan la chos sbyin lhag par bstsal ba las/ 'am bu chos mi 'tshong gsungs nas su'i yang chos yon mi bzhes par phyir slog par mdzad na'ang/ rje 'di'i dbang bum grwa tshang dgu phul ba mnyes mnyes kyis bdag gir mdzad ces grags te/ dbang gi chu bo'i snod du gzigs shing bstan pa spel ba'i rten 'brel sgrig byed kyi brda' thabs bstan par mngon/ de ltar thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs yin lugs su bcad nas/ dben pa'i gnas du mar snying po'i lam srol ji bzhin pa thugs nyams su bzhes pas/ ma dag pa'i snang ba 'gog nus pa'i bskyed rim gyi gsal snang la reg mthong gi mtshan ma thob ste/ phrin las gang brtsams thogs med du 'grub/ rdzogs rim ka dag gzhi rdzogs 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gnas lugs ji lta ba nyid rtogs pas/ 'khor 'das bden 'dzin gyi 'khri ba chad/ snang srid lhun grub 'od gsal gyi klong du dwangs pas yi dam gyi lha du ma'i gzigs snang shar zhing lung bstan thob/ rang don yid byed kyi 'dzin pa zhig pas gzhan phan mkha' khyab kyi thugs rje rtsol med shugs 'byung gi sgo nas/ thar pa dor gnyer gyi skal ldan mchog dman mang po bshad sgrub kyi chos 'khor rgyun chags su bskor bas bstan 'gro'i phan bde rgyas par mdzad cing/ khyad par sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog gter chen chos kyi rje la zab rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshang sprugs su bstsal te rgyal tshab tu mnga' bskur nas/ dgung lo nga gnyis pa chu stag dbo zla'i nyer gnyis la dbu gtsug phyur bur 'phar ba las zla ba'i zil pa skya chil li ba dang spos dud lta bu'i rlangs pa 'phro bzhin du gzugs sku'i bkod pa chos kyi dbyings su bsdus so// des lo chen chos rgyal bstan 'dzin rjes su bzung ste/ 'di ni e 'dam sngon po grong smad du lcags lug la 'khrungs/ sku tshe snga ma'i bag chags gsal bas grwa rigs rnams kyis bdag sprad de dwags stod gling sogs gong ma'i dgon pa rnams su spyan drangs/ bri klog dang chog phrin rnams tshegs med par thugs su chud nas/ 'phyong rgyas dpal ri grwa tshang du thugs gnyer la 'byon/ gdan sa ba bsod nams rin chen las rab tu byung zhing/ mtshan chos rgyal bstan 'dzin du gsol/ dbang lung yang ci rigs pa gsan/ dgongs 'dus la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshig 'dzin dang/ de dag bri thig bcas dbyangs sogs nas brtsams te/ kun mkhyen chen po'i bstan bcos sems nyid ngal gso rtsa 'grel rnams la sbyangs/ der gnubs ston grags pa dbang po la yang bzlog dang lok+t+ri sogs drag

sngags kyi lag len dang rtsis dkar nag kyang bslabs/ dgung lo bco brgyad pa sa pho byi ba'i lor grwa sa'i dge bskos mdzad pas non che ba'i dper 'jog pa byung zhing/ lo de'i nang du rig 'dzin phrin las lhun grub 'phyong rgyas dpal rir spyan drangs te/ sprul pa'i sku mchog phrin las rnam rgyal gyis dbus grwa gtsang yongs rdzogs la 'dus pa mdo'i dbang bskur gdams ngag gtad rgya dang bcas pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du sgrub chen dang 'brel par zur lugs dang/ zhar byung dpon slob nyung 'dus la ras bris kyi steng nas khams lugs gnyis stsal ba'i tshe lhan cig tu gsan cing/ phyis su'ang gnas dus ci rigs par bka' brgyad bde 'dus/ dgongs 'dus/ bi ma snying thig/ zhig gling gi gter chos sogs mang du gsan/ gzhan yang lha btsun nam mkha' 'jigs med/ gsung sprul tshul khrims rdo rje sogs mkhas grub kyi bla ma dam pa mang po bsten nas bka' gter gyi dbang lung khrid bka' du ma dang/ rgya ri dpon pa'i lung gis bskul bas gong rar thegs te/ nyang ston blo mchog rdo rje la/ sgra ka lA pa dang/ snyan ngag/ sdeb sbyor sogs brda sprod yan lag dang bcas pa gsan te mkhyen par mdzad/ de ltar gsan pa rdzogs rjes e mthong smon dang mtsho mer steng du'ang ci rigs bzhugs shing/ gtso bor dwags stod gling gi dgon par stan 'jags te sbas tshul gyis bsnyen sgrub la brtson par mdzad pas nyams rtogs bzang po 'khrungs/ srung ma las la khol ba'i mthu rtags nar mar 'ong bas yul de dag gi grong pa rnams kyang bla ma gling pa'i bka' dang 'gal na chos skyong gi bka' chad 'ong zhes 'jigs par byed/ khyad par dgung lo so gnyis pa chu stag lor dar gling du phebs te rje 'gyur med rdo rje las pad gling gi chos bka' 'ga' zhig gsan/ de dus yab rje nas gsan pa'i mdo'i dbang rgyun phyag bzhes dang bcas pa rnam par dag pa 'dug par mkhyen te/ phyis gdan sar spyan 'dren gnang ba ltar byon nas rje gter chen bla ma la mdo dbang 'bul bar mdzad pas/ snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa la phan pa bla na med par gyur/ dgung lo don brgyad pa sa byi hor zla bzhi pa la dwags stod gling gi dgon par sku gshegs so// de'ang bka' ma'i phyogs su zur mes dbon gsum las slob ma'i rnam grangs ji ltar mched pa shar gyis btab pa dang/ de dag las mched pa'ang grangs med pas gang gi ring la dar rgyas su mdzad pa gsang bdag sgro phug pa chen po de gangs ri'i khrod na gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi bstan pa spel ba'i slad du byon to zhes pa de'ang grags pa don dang ldan no// dus phyis ni gdul bya rdzogs pa ltar gyur nas snyigs ma'i rgud pa stobs su gyur pas

snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bags kyis nyag phra ba'i ston gyi chu bran bzhin bltar mi mngon pa'i gnas skabs su gangs can pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa na dang g.yu sgra snying po'i thugs bskyed phrag par khyer bas phyogs mtha' dag nas gdams pa'i chu rgyun phra mo thams cad bsdus te bstan pa'i chu gter chen po mi 'dzad par bskyil bas mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi ring lugs mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen po gsar du slong bar byed pa ni gter chen chos kyi rgyal po 'gyur med rdo rje dang lo chen thams cad mkhyen pa ngag dbang chos dpal yab sras slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa ste/ de la rje btsun gter chen dam pa 'di ni/ rang gter gab rgya can gyi lung bstan lasaH bai ro khyod ni skye mtha'i byang sems teH khyod kyi 'di gong skye ba 'das pa niH smra bsam brjod 'das ye shes snying po'i donaH sems can sangs rgyas mnyam nyid khyab gdal yang \u0f7f khams gsum 'gro ba'i 'dren par rdo rje chosaH shAka thub nye gnas A nan+da zhes dang \u0f7f rgyal po dza dang shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang \u0f7f bod 'dir sam+b+ho Ta sogs dag pa yiH skye ba de tsam snang gi ma dag pa'iH skye tshul brjod du long ba'i gnas ma yinaH de ltar dag pa'i skye ba de dag gisaH 'gro la snying rje chen po'i thugs bskyed pa'ang \u0f7f bai ro khyod du skye ba blangs pa yinaH khyod kyang shrI sid+ha ye shes mdoH pad+ma bdag sogs gtsug gi bla mar brtenaH gdams pa'i gnad rnams phu thag bcad byas nasaH chos sku'i rang zhal mngon sum rtogs gyur pasaH las 'phro ma dag skye ba len mi sridaH 'on kyang sems bskyed smon lam bzang po yisaH mtshams sbyor mtha' yas 'gro ba'i dpal nyid duH dbang phyug 'bar dang ra shag rdo rje gling \u0f7f kun skyong gling dang mdo sngags gling pa sogasaH pad+ma bdag gi zab gter bdag po dang \u0f7f gzhan yang theg pa che chung sna tshogs laH de dang mthun pa'i ngo mtshar skye ba'i grangasaH bcu phrag gcig dang gsum tsam 'das pa'i mtharaH zhes gsungs pa ltar/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje chos nyid gsang sngags kyi bstan pa spel ba'i phyir/ skal ldan rgyal po dza dang/ lo tsA ba chen po bai ro tsa na dang/ zur po che shAkya 'byung gnas la sogs pa gang la gang 'dul gyi sku'i bkod pa mtha' yas par bstan nas don mdzad pa ste/ de yang snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus 'dir bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen du skye srid bzung ba'i tshul ni/ sku tshe snga ma'i sku rten 'chi srid 'od gsal gyi dbyings su bsdus pa las/ rig gdangs mkha' 'gro'i glus gzhan don du bskul ba'i rkyen gyis/ ye shes kyi sku he ru ka'i rnam par bzhengs nas lhums su zhugs te/ yab gnyos ston gsang bdag chen po phrin las lhun grub dang/ yum rje rigs lha

'dzin dbyangs can sgrol ma'i sras su me khyi'i lo dbo zla'i tshe bcu las g.yo zhing 'ja' 'od 'khrigs pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i ltas dang bcas te/ grwa nang dar rgyas chos gling du sku bltams/ btsas ma thag yab rjes blo rno ba'i rten 'brel dang/ bar chad bsrung ba'i dbang bskur byin brlabs du ma mdzad/ de dus kyi yul dang bya spyod kyi rnam pa dang/ de nas bzung ste lo gsum gyi bar dzo ki sngo sangs thor tshugs can zhig dang/ bud med mdzes ma gnyis kyi rgyun du sri zhu byas pa'i dngos gnas rnams phyis kyang thugs la gsal ba'i dran shes khyad par can mnga'/ pang du 'tsho ba'i dus nyid nas ting nge 'dzin la dbang 'byor ba'i rnam 'gyur dang gzhon nu rol rtsed kyi tshe yang rgyal ba'i rigs sad pa'i ngang tshul dge bas blo ldan rnams dang bar mdzad/ dgung lo bzhi'i thog yab rje la bka' brgyad gsang rdzogs kyi dbang gsan pa'i tshe yul snang thams cad la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los rgyas thebs pa'i gtso bo dang bla ma dbyer med du gzigs shing dbang bzhi'i sa bon thugs rgyud la thebs pa nyid/ bcu pa shing lug gi ston bde 'dus kyi dbang gsan dus 'od gsal gyi snang bar slob dpon chen pos pad+mas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i nus pas 'phel te bum dbang gi nyams myong yul snang sgyu ma lta bur gtan la phebs/ de yan chad du bri klog dang/ rang lugs kyi sgrub dkyil dbang rjes gnang rab gnas lung sogs cho ga phrin rnams kyi tshig 'dzin dang/ phyag bzhes thams cad tshegs med du chub ste/ de nas brtsams te yab rje'i sku tshab mdzad nas phrin las kyang ci rigs pa skyong bar mdzad/ dgung lo bcu gcig pa la dpal ldan 'bras spungs su khams gsum pa'i gtsug gi nor bu kun gzigs rgyal ba lnga pa'i drung du gtsug phud phul te/ mtshan ngag dbang pad+ma bstan 'dzin du bstsal/ skyi grong gi rang byung 'phags pa thog mar phebs pa dang dus 'grigs pas gong nas rten 'brel bzang zhes dgyes pas dbugs dbyung zhing/ de dus 'phags pa'i zhal zhi 'dzum chags pa'i nyams gsal ba'i thugs ka nas 'od zer nyid kyi sku la thim pa dang/ bcu bdun pa la bsam yas su rje rgyal ba'i dbang po mjal ba'i tshe spyan ras gzigs kyi rnam par gzigs/ rim par kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang po lnga pa chen po dang/ yab rje gsang bdag phrin las lhun grub gnyis ni/ sku dngos kyis rjes su bzung ba'i bka' drin phul du byung bar ma zad/ phyis ye shes kyi skus kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnad kyis bka' drin mtshungs pa med pa'i rtsa ba'i bla ma rnam pa gnyis dang/ gzhan yang smin grol zab lam gsan pa'i bstan 'dzin chen po bcu drug/ zab chos sna

tshogs gsan pa'i yongs 'dzin sum cu rtsa lnga rnams bsten te/ yul dus ci rigs par yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen/ byang sdom bka' srol gsum/ sngar smos pa ltar bka' brgyad yongs rdzogs kyi dbang brda don 'phrod pa thog ma'i smin byed du gsan pas sdom pa gsum gyi gzhi bzung ste/ mdo/ sgyu 'phrul/ sems sde lugs gsum/ mnyam sbyor/ yang dag phur pa/ gshed skor sogs sngags 'gyur bka' ma deng sang rgyun yod do cog dang/ gter ma bla rdzogs thugs gsum sgrub sde spyi dang bye brag gi bka' rigs mi 'dra ba du mas mtshon yongs grags phal mo che/ gsar ma'i rdo phreng/ sgrub thabs brgya rgyam sogs spyi bka' dang/ bde mchog/ dgyes rdor/ dus 'khor/ gsang 'dus/ gshed skor kr-i yog sogs kyi zur bka'/ mdo phyogs mang po dang bcas pa'i dbang khrid bshad lung/ de thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa bka' 'gyur ro cog gi lung sogs chos bka' gsan pa ni mtha' yas te ming tsam 'dzin pa'ang dka' ba'i gnas so// dgung lo bcu gsum pa tsam nas bzung/ rtsa rgyud gsang ba snying po/ rgyud bla ma/ sems nyid ngal gso/ yid bzhin mdzod rtsa 'grel rnams thugs la bzung nas yab rje las gsung bshad rim par gsan cing/ phyis gnubs zur rong zom rnams kyi gsung rab dang/ sa skya pan+Di ta'i rab dbye/ bcom ldan ral gri'i spyi rnams/ rang byung zhabs kyi nang don rnams kyang thugs la btsud cing/ khyad par kun mkhyen chen po'i gsung rab rnams la gzigs rtogs nan tan mdzad pas blo gros kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i mthu thogs pa med pa brnyes te/ ji snyed pa'i chos thams cad la sgro 'dogs chod/ dwags ston chos rgyal bstan 'dzin la 'dus pa mdo'i dbang chog rin chen phreng ba'i steng nas dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lngar phye ba las chu bo bzhi yongs rdzogs gtad rgya mtha' brten tshe dbang dang bcas pa'i dbang gdams ngag bshad lung dang bcas pa dang/ dbang chog sbrang rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi steng nas dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gcig ras bris la brten par dbang lung gdams ngag dang bcas pa rnams gsan/ yang rdo rje drag rig 'dzin mchog gi sprul pa'i skur dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bdun du bsdus pa'i rtsa dkyil ras bris dang de phyin tshom bu la brten te dbang mchog rin chen phreng ba'i thog nas dbang gdams ngag bshad lung dang bcas pa mtha' rgyas su gsan cing/ gsang mtshan gnyis kas 'gyur med rdo rje rtsal du gsol/ smon lam gyi 'brel pa sad pas zab gter gyi bka' bab tshul kyang/ dgung lo bco brgyad pa chu yos zla ba lnga pa'i tshe bcu la g.ya' ma lung nas rig 'dzin thugs thig/ nyer gnyis pa me lugs khrums zla'i tshe brgyad la rdzu

'phrul gyi bkod pas shel brag nas gshin rje gshed dregs 'joms/ so gcig pa me 'brug stag zla'i nya la o dkar brag nas gur drag dang rdor sems a ti'i skor/ so lnga pa lcags sprel chu stod zla ba'i nyer dgu la sha 'ug ltag sgo nas thugs rje chen po bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi chos skor khrom gter du spyan 'dren par mdzad cing/ de dag gi snga phyi ci rigs par brag dmar mchims phu/ g.ya' ma lung sogs grub pa'i gnas chen ngo mtshar can rnams dang/ gdan sa gsar rnying gi gzim chung/ gzim spyil 'od gsal rtse dang bsam gtan rtse sogs dben pa rnams su sku mtshams lo sbrel ma dang/ zla drug ma/ zla gsum/ zla gcig gis mtha' brten pa yan gyis/ bla ma zhi drag/ rdor sems/ bka' brgyad/ thugs rje chen po/ yang phur/ gshin rje gshed/ rta mgrin/ mkha' spyod ma sogs yi dam gyi lha sum cu rtsa lnga tsam gyi bsnyen sgrub dang/ rdzogs pa chen po khregs chod kyi nyams bzhes la snying por dril nas/ thod rgal dang rlung sbyor sogs kyang dus gnad dang bstun te thugs nyams su bzhes pas/ ma dag pa'i snang ba 'gog pa'i bskyed rim la brtan pa thob ste/ las bzhi gang yang thogs med du grub/ rdzogs rim rtsa rlung thig le'i 'gros d+hU tIr dag pas zhu bde'i ye shes phyogs brgyar 'bar/ rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa 'khrungs pas gzung 'dzin gyi mtshan ma rang sar grol/ 'khor 'das thams cad gzhi med rtsa bral mnyam yang khyab gdal chen por byang chub/ mnyam rjes ris med 'od gsal khor yug gi ting nge 'dzin la dbang 'byor/ snang spyod thams cad ye shes kyi rol par shar bas/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma dang/ bi ma la/ hU~M mdzad/ sangs rgyas gsang ba/ bai ro tsa na/ mtsho rgyal/ nyang ral/ kun mkhyen chos rje sogs rgya bod kyi paN grub du ma'i ye shes kyi sku mngon du snang bas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor spros te/ rang gter gyis mtshon pa'i bka' gter du ma'i dbang bskur zhing zab lam gyi gdams pa'i gnad thams cad lhug par bkral nas ston pa dang/ rdo rje gzhon nu/ rdor sems/ yang dag/ thugs rje chen po/ zhi khro/ rnal 'byor ma sogs yi dam gyi lha du mas kyang zhal bstan te dbang bskur/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ bde ba can dang rnga yab dpal ri sogs dag pa'i zhing khams mang por bgrod pas zhing yongs su 'byangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang 'byor pa dang/ mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams kyis las thogs med du sgrub cing lung ston pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i gzigs snang mtha' yas/ chags thogs med pa'i mngon shes mnga' bas dus kyi 'gyur ldog sogs kyi lung bstan pa rnams kyang phyis thog tu bab pa'i yid ches kyi gtan

tshigs mang du snang ste ma spros so// de yang dgung lo so gcig pa yan chod du sngar thugs rgyud la smin byed kyi sa bon thebs pa nyid rim gyis 'phel bas bum dbang gi nyams myong yul snang thams cad gsal stong sgyu ma lta bur gtan la phebs pas/ shas cher sku'i 'gro don spyod pa'i dus yin par phyir/ shod chen skyi lung sogs lho byang gi yul tha dad pa du mar chibs bskyod nas sku'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ris med kyi gdul bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud la rnam grol gyi sa bon bzhag ste 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad pa dang/ so gnyis bzhes pa me sbrul dbo zla nas bzung gsang dbang gi nyams myong rang rig gsal stong du shar te gzung 'dzin dbyings su grol bas/ gsung gi 'gro don la gtso bor spyod pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir/ mchog dman bar pa'i skal ldan tshogs la zab rgyas kyi chos 'khor bar med du bskor bar mdzad pa dang/ so brgyad bzhes pa chu phag khrums zla nas pho nya'i lam gyis zhu bde'i dpes mtshon pa'i don gyi ye shes rig stong bde ba chen po lhan skyes mi 'gyur ba'i dga' bzhi thugs rgyud la 'khrungs pa'i nyams myong rim gyis 'phel bas thugs kyi 'gro don la shas cher spyod pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir/ de phyin chad spyir chos bka' ris med du gsung ba yin na'ang/ khyad par zab khrid kyi gdams pa nyid rgyud thog tu ci smin 'debs par mdzad pas skal ldan rnams rang byung gi ye shes zhal blta ba la btsan thabs su bkri pa'i mdzad pa kho na gtso bor bdag gir bzhes pa dang/ de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum dang ro mnyam pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas phrin las kyi 'gro don mnyam yangs khyab gdal du spyod pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir/ mdzad spyod thams cad rang don yid byed kyi 'khri ba las rnam par grol nas/ bstan 'gro'i phan bde 'ba' zhig thugs su gcags pa'i snying stobs chen pos bshad sgrub las gsum gyi phrin las rnam par dkar bas dus 'da' ba ste/ de la 'chad pa'i phrin las ni/ gtso bor kun mkhyen rgyal mchog lnga pa chen pos snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum rin po ches mtshon zab rgyas kyi chos skor ji snyed pa zhig gsan nas ti shrir bkur zhing/ des mtshon te sa phag 'bri stag sogs chen po'i go sar bzhugs pa'i skyes mchog du ma dang/ dpon chen dpon skya sogs mi chen/ bstan pa gsal bar mdzad pa'i bshes gnyen sku'i sras mched rnams dang/ gsung gi sras dam pa mang pos mtshon dbus gtsang khams kong lho mon mnga' ris sogs nas dad 'dus kyi skal ldan mchod dman mtha' yas pa rnams so so'i blo dang 'tshams pa'i snga 'gyur bka' gter dang sngags gsar ma mdo phyogs skor sogs kyi dbang

khrid bshad lung gi chos sgo du ma zhig rgyun chags su stsol ba'i 'chad phrin 'gran zla med pas bstan pa gsal zhing rgyas par mdzad pa dang/ bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhi ba'i sgrub thabs ye shes char 'bebs/ dkyil chog rin chen phreng ba/ khro bo'i sgrub thabs bde chen char 'bebs/ dkyil chog rdo rje'i phreng ba/ 'dus pa mdo'i sgrub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs/ dkyil chog dri med 'od phreng/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor rigs bsdus kyi sgrub thabs bde chen 'dod 'jo/ dkyil chog kun tu bzang po'i zhal lung/ dbang chog byin rlabs char 'bebs/ dpal he ru ka zla gam dgu pa'i sgrub thabs bde chen thig le/ dkyil chog bdud rtsi'i nying khu/ dbang chog bde chen 'jug ngogs/ tshe dpag med lung lugs kyi sgrub thabs/ na ra gdong sprugs kyi cho ga 'khor ba kun sgrol/ dong sprugs pad+ma brgya ldan gyi cho ga bde chen lam bzang sogs dang/ bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i las byang bde ba chen po'i rnam rol sogs bka' gter gyi sgrub dkyil khrid yig rnam bshad zhal gdams sogs legs bshad kyi bka' rtsoms kyang pod chen bdun du longs pa mdzad/ sgrub pa'i phrin las ni/ rje nyid mnyam rjes 'khor yug gi ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos bzhin du sgom khrid 'bogs pa rnams go yul tsam du ma lus par mngon sum rig thog tu ngo sprod cing/ dbang dus su ye shes kyi byin slob ma'i rgyud la dngos su phebs pa dang/ bsnyen sgrub kyi las rab 'byams thams cad kyang bshad pa tsam du ma lus par phyag bzhes su thebs par mdzad pa yin no// bya ba las kyi 'khor lo'i phrin las ni/ gong zhabs yas phyin sogs kyis bla nas bstsal ba dang/ dad ldan rnams kyis phul ba'i dngos po rnams mdzod phugs ma'i sgo lcags mi bsdom par/ sdom pa gsum gyis rgyud bsdoms shing bshad sgrub kyi bya bas dus 'da' ba'i 'dus sde o rgyan smin grol gling pa dge 'dun sum brgyar nye ba tsam gsar du bsdu bar mdzad pa la rung ba'i rnyed bkur gyis mi brel bar rgyun chags pa dang/ de dag gi gnas mal dang rten gsum mchod cha/ dus bzhi'i sgrub mchodakyi yo byad dang rnyed pa/ gzhan yang bris 'bur gyi sku brnyen mang po dang/ gser dngul gyi bka' 'gyur gyis mtshon pa'i glegs bam lnga brgya brgal ba dang/ snga 'gyur gyi 'brel bshad chog phrin la sogs pa'i bar mang po/ sku 'bum mthong grol chen mos thog drangs pa'i thugs rten du ma rnams bzhengs par mdzad cing/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pas ris med pa'i mchod sbyin gyi yul rnams la tshogs gnyis kyi rgyur lhug par gtong ba sogs bstan 'gro'i phan bde rgyas pa'i mdzad pa rlabs chen

kho na bdag gir gzhes pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rnam thar ro// de ltar dgung lo bcu drug nas drug cu re dgu'i bar chos kyi phrin las bskyangs pa'i mthar shing rta hor zla dang po nas cung zad bsnyun pa'i tshul bstan nas/ khyad par tshes nyer lnga nas khu dbon rnams la zhal gdams phyi mtha'i bslab bya bstsal/ de nas bzung zhabs rim du gnas pa rnams kyi snang ngor nub gyi phy-i rtsigs ngos na yod 'dra ba'i rgya gling lta bu'i sgra shin tu snyan pa rgyun chags su byung zhing de mtshungs ga pur lta bu'i dring ngad kyis gzims chung phyi nang thams cad khyab pa'ang byung/ shar phyogs su gom pa bdun 'gro dgos yod gsungs bzheng te zhabs gom bdun spos nas skyil krung gis bzhugs te/ snang grags rigs gsum lha sngags chos sku'i ngang/ sku dang ye shes rol par 'byams glas pa// zab gsang rnal 'byor chen po'i nyams len la// dbyer med thugs kyi thig ler ro gcig shog/ ces 'da' zhal chems kyi tshul du gsungs te/ shing rta hor zla gnyis pa'i tshes gnyis kyi nyi dros la da ste mkha' 'gro'i bsu ba yang byung ngo gsung ste/ phyag gnyis DA dril 'khrol ba'i brda dang spyan lta stangs dang bcas skad cig la mkha' spyod du gshegs so// thugs kyi sras dang gsung gi sras kyis mtshon pa'i bu slob gter lung nas bshad pa ni/ dam ldan chos bdag slob bu niH da lta'i mnga' bdag yab sras sogasaH sa thob rje 'bangs skye ba'i mtha'aH 'gro don nus pa sum cu lngaH rang don thub pa brgya rtsa brgyadaH chos kyi 'brel pa stong tshogs gnyisaH smon lam 'brel ba khri phrag lngaH las kyis 'brel pa drug cu bdunaH gdugs thogs bdun gyis zhabs nas 'degasaH mi chen gsum gyis mnga' thang spelaH zhes pa ltar/ gsung gi bdud rtsi bzhes pa'i zhal slob kyi gtso bo ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu phyag na pad+ma rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku zhabasadang/ 'jam dpal mi skyong chen po'i rnam rol sde srid rin po che sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchod yon nyi zla zung gcig dang/ sku mched thun mong gis slob ma che longs tsam zhig 'og tu gsal lo// g.yu sgra'i rnam 'phrul bstan pa'i nyi ma kun mkhyen d+harma shrI ni/ gter gzhung las/ g.yu sgra'i rnam 'phrul blo ldan d+harma'i mingaH byang sems dad brtson snying stobs ldan pa 'byung: zhes lung gis bstan pa ltar gter chen rin po che'i gcung du shing pho rta'i lo la sku 'khrungs/ rje gter chen bla ma'i drung nas skyabs gsum 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa nod cing mtshan bstan 'dzin 'jam dbyangs dbang por gsol/ dgung grangs bco lnga pa la rje thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa chen po las rab tu byung ste/ mtshan ngag dbang chos dpal zhes bstsal

zhing dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang/ dgung grangs nyi shu par slar yang mkhan po de nyid las bsnyen par rdzogs/ phyis kyang gong ma'i lung gis bskul ba bzhin kha rab zhal snga nas dkon mchog bstan 'dzin las snga 'gyur smad 'dul gyi sdom rgyun rnam dag bzhes/ rje gter chen bla ma las bka' srol gsum gyi byang sdom thugs bskyed dang sngar dgung grangs bcu gnyis bar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rig 'dzin thugs thig gi dbang gsan pas thugs rgyud smin par mdzad cing rjes su thob pa'i so byang gyi sdom pa gnyis po de yang snga ma'i sngags kyi tshul khrims las phye ba'i de dang de'i sdom pa'i ngo bor skyes pas thugs rgyud legs par bsdams/ yi ge 'bri klog dang chog phrin rnams byang chub par mdzad/ dgung grangs bcu drug par gung thang paN chen bshes gnyen rnam rgyal las sgra ka lA pa dang sde sbyor yongs rdzogs kyi bshad pa/ lAny+tsa dang wartu la sogs yig rigs rnams dang sum rtags kyi bshad pa'ang gsan te/ brda sprod yan lag dang bcas pa la mkhas par sbyangs/ ldum po don 'grub dbang rgyal gyi drung nas rtsis dkar nag dbyangs 'char rnams mthar phyin par mdzad/ stag lung sgra pa las sa ra swa tI'i ri mo dang/ tsan+t+ra pa'i yi ge bsdu ba dang ting mtha' sogs kyi bshad pa dang sdeb sbyor yang ba'i bya ba rnams gsan/ gter chen bla ma'i drung nas snyan ngag me long gi bshad pa gsan/ snga 'gyur rang lugs kyi gar thig dbyangs gsum rnams kyang dpyis phyin par mdzad/ gcen rgyal sras bstan pa'i nyi ma las gdul ba'i lag len dang brda chad la mkhas par mdzad/ sems nyid ngal gso dang 'dul ba lung rig gter mdzod la sogs gzhung phal cher bzung ba tsam gyis go don thogs med du shar/ gter chen chos kyi rgyal po'i drung du snying po'i 'grel pa spar khab dang g.yu Tika sbyar ba'i gsung bshad gsan pas rgyud dngos sbas kyi don thams cad gting slebs/ dge ba'i gshen gnyen sangs rgyas chos dar las 'dul mngon phar phyin rnams kyi bshad pa zhib tu gsan/ gung thang paN chen las dbu ma'i stong thun dang 'dul ba sum brgya pa'i bshad pa/ mkhas grub chos skyong rgyal mtshan las zab mo nang don gyi bshad pa rnams dang/ rje bla ma'i drung nas chos rje kun mkhyen chen po dang/ zur pa yab sras/ rong zom chen po rnams kyi gsung rab rnams mang du thos pa rgyud grol te thos bsam gang byas kha phyir bltas su ma song bar rgyud thog tu dril thub pa'i bka' drin thob pa yin no// zhes gsungs/ khyad par gter chen bla ma las snga 'gyur mdo sgyu sems gsum sogs rgyud sde dang sgrub sde'i dbang bka' bshad lung man ngag gi bka' bzhugs so cog dang/

gter ma'i skor la gter kha gong 'og gis gtsos gter ston grags che ba phal mo che'i gter chos kyi dbang lung man ngag ji snyed pa dang/ de dag gi rtsa bar gyur pa rnying ma rgyud 'bum gyi lung yongs rdzogs dang/ dgyes rdor nA ro mkha' spyod sogs gsar ma'i rgyud sde mang po'i dbang lung dang/ rig 'dzin pad+ma phrin las las dus 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi dbang dang sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang gis mtshon pa gsar rnying ris bral gyi yongs 'dzin bcu phrag gnyis las so so'i bka' srol tha dad pa'i chos tshul rgya mtsho tsam la gsan bsam bsgom pa mdzad pa'i tshul smos kyi mi lang zhing/ bstan pa la dgongs pa'i bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa gnang ba'i dge slong bzhi brgya dang zhe bdun/ dge tshul chig stong nyis brgya go brgyad/ dgung grangs zhe brgyad nas bzung drug cu re bzhi'i bar dbyar dgun gnyis su skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i blo gsal rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun drug cu skor re la gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi chos 'khor chags med du bskor/ sdom gsum rnam nges/ phar phyin/ 'dul ba sogs gzhung chen mang por yang bshad pa mdzad/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang kho na'ang tshar brgyad dang/ mdo dbang tshar gsum/ dong sprugs tshar lnga la sogs pas mtshon pa'i bka' gter gsar rnying gi dbang lung smin khrid gang gsan thams cad lan grangs gsum bzhir ma 'chad par med pa lta bu dang/ khyad par dpal ldan sa skya pa bdag chen ngag dbang kun dga' bkra shis la gter gsar gyi dbang lung yongs rdzogs dang/ thugs rje chen po'i smin khrid/ phur pa spu gri'i dbang sogs chos bka' shin tu mang ba gnang/ dgung grangs nga dgu pa chu 'brug lor mdo khams chab mdor spyan drangs pa bzhin phebs te 'phags pa lha rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang/ zhi ba bzang po dang/ ngag dbang sprul sku bcas la gter gsar skor gyi dbang lung khrid dang bcas pa/ bla ma gsang 'dus/ nyang gter drag dmar/ phur pa spu gri/ na ra gdong sprugs/ thugs rje chen po rgyal po lugs kyi dbang khrid sogs gsar rnying ris med kyi dbang lung man ngag gi bdud rtsi mang pos thugs rgyud smin cing grol bar mdzad/ sgra snyan sdeb sbyor sogs tha snyad rig pa rnams kyang don gnyer so so'i blo dang 'tshams par tshar lnga drug re ma 'chad pa med pa sogs mdor na dam pa 'di nyid kyi sku tshe ril por mkhas tshul gsum gyis bstan pa'i bya ba rgya chen po mdzad pa'i ngang nas rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa mngon du gyur pa'i 'phags pa'i sa chen po la gnas pa ni rtsod pa med la/ bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir mdo dang sgyu 'phrul gyi dgongs don 'grel pa'i shing rta chen po sngon med pa'i

bstan bcos/ sgyu 'phrul rtsa rgyud gsang snying la Tika gsang bdag dgongs brgyan/ spyi don gsang bdag zhal lung/ dkyil 'khor blos bslangs kyi rnam gzhag gsal sgron rtsa 'grel/ mdo dbang rnams bshad lung rig man ngag gi gnad gsal byed sgron me/ yan lag dkyil 'khor rnams kyi sgrub dkyil dngos grub 'dod 'jo/ rgyud dang man ngag gi lugs gcig tu dril ba'i dbang chog rdo rje'i them skas/ sgrub khog rin chen 'od kyi snang ba/ zur 'debs dpag bsam snye ma/ thugs rje chen po bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi rnam bshad de kho na nyid snang ba'i 'od/ sdom gsum rnam nges kyi 'grel pa legs bshad ngo mtshar dpag bsam snye ma sogs dang/ gzhan yang sngags phyi nang gi sgrub thabs/ rjes gnang/ dbang/ bsnyen yig/ khrid yig/ tha snyad rig lam gyi bstan bcos sogs legs bshad phun sum tshogs pa'i gter chen por mngon sum du gyur pa'i pu sta ka drug tu longs pa bzhugs/ sku mched lhan cig pa'i gsung gi bdud rtsi myangs pa'i slob ma'i tshogs kyang/ sa skya bdag chen kun dga' bkra shis/ 'phags pa lha rgyal ba rgya mtsho ston 'khor/ gsung sprul ngag dbang kun bzang rdo rje/ thugs sras sprul sku/ rgyal ba'i sras mchog pad+ma 'gyur med rgya mtsho/ yid bzhin legs grub/ rin chen rnam rgyal/ 'od mchog sprul sku/ thang 'brog sprul sku/ bon lung sprul sku/ yon do sprul sku/ khams pa sprul sku kun dga' bstan 'dzin/ dres pa sprul sku/ dpal ri sprul sku/ zangs la mkhar sprul sku/ da la'i hu thog thu ngag dbang bshad sgrub rgya mtsho/ rong pa rdzogs chen pa/ khams pa rdzogs chen sprul sku/ kaH thog rgyal sras/ kong po drag sku skye/ sna bo gdung brgyud/ me rag bla ma sogs dang/ gzhan yang lung rig smra ba'i mkhas pa dang/ nyams myong ldan pa'i grub pa can bgrangs kyis mi lang bas zhabs la gtugs shing bka' srol gyi brgyud pa 'dzin nus pa'i bshes gnyen kho na'ang shin tu mang po byung bas deng sang gi dus su snga 'gyur bka' ma'i phyogs la bshad sgrub gyi sgo ma nub tsam dang lung gi mtha' brten pa ma chad tsam du thos bsam byar yod pa 'di ni/ dam pa 'di dag gi bka' drin kho na las byung ba yin par snga 'gyur rjes zhugs da lta dang/ slad kyis 'byon par 'gyur ba thams cad kyis shes par bya dgongs shing sku mched 'di dag gis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams kyang ngo bo'i sgo nas 'phags yul nas bsgyur ba'i sngon gyi slob dpon chen po rnams kyi bstan bcos dang khyad par dmigs su med pa'i legs bshad che ba'ang mngon sum gyis grub cing rang lugs bstan pa mun pa ltar mi gsal ba'i skabs su snang byed kyi sgron ma spar bas 'chi ka ma'i bdud rtsi lta bur

gyur pa'i phyir kun bzang rdo rje 'chang dang rdo rje chos sogs rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi gsung dang dbyer med pa'i rim gro bskyed par 'os pa'i phyir/ da lam 'dir yang snying po'i 'grel pa dgongs rgyan dang/ spyi don zhal gyi lung rnam pa gnyis po sgyu 'phrul gsang snying gi skor dang rtsa 'grel stabs gcig tu bkod pa'i rgyu mtshan kyang de yin no// yang rje btsun gter chen de nyid kyi 'o bran dpal gyi dbang phyug gi zlos gar du gter lung gis zin pa ltar chos bdag tu ngos 'dzin gnang ba da la'i hu thog thu ngag dbang bshad sgrub rgya mtsho zhes rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yang dag pa'i lam gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen por gyur pas khong nyid kyang dbang rnon chos kyi rjes su 'brangs pas gter kha gong 'og gis mtshon pa'i gter chos rnams kyi dbang lung man ngag yongs su rdzogs par gter ston rin po che dang/ mkhan chen lo tswa ba dang/ rgyal ba'i sras mchog sku mched rnams kyi zhabs la gtugs shing bum pa gang byo'i tshul gyis gsan bsam rgya chen po mdzad/ bsgoms pas drod tshad brnyes shing mngon shes dang lam bzhi la rang dbang 'byor pa'i grub pa'i go 'phang mthon por gshegs/ byang phyogs kyi skye bo thams cad snga 'gyur rnying ma bka' gter gyi gdul bya'i zhing du mdzad pas deng sang gi bar du phyogs der rgyal ba'i phrin las nges don mchog gi 'ba' stegs cung zad mchis pa ni rje de nyid kyi bka' drin kho na las byung ba yin cing rnying rgyud tshang ma skya chos su bzhengs pa dang/ gter chos gang gsan thams cad kyi glegs bam bzhengs pa rnams kyang bstan 'gro'i mchod sdong chen po 'ba' zhig tu gyur to// yang kaH thog tu bar skabs su bu 'bor pa bkra shis rgya mtshos zhig po gling pa'i drung du bla ma zhig gtong bar zhus pas gtsang pa pad+ma rgyal mtshan mngags shing kaH thog tu bzhugs/ de'i slob ma stag bu re khe 'bri rgyud du 'khrungs pa pad+ma blo gros zhes grags pa zhig mkhas grub chen por gyur nas dbus su gong ra lo tsA ba dang/ g.yung sprul tshul khrims rdo rje/ zur chen chos dbyings rang grol sogs skyes chen mang po dang zab chos kyi bdud rtsi stob res mdzad cing/ dbus phyogs su rgyun dkon pa'i chos bka' du ma nyams pa'ang gsos/ khams phyogs 'dir snying thig ya bzhi dang/ dung mtsho ras pa'i yang tig nag po sogs chos rtsa ba chen po du ma spel ba sogs rnying ma'i bstan pa la sku drin mchog tu che zhing sku tshe sgrub pa kho nar dril ba'i bya bral 'ba' zhig pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa sogs mkhas btsun bzang po'i pha rol tu byon pas kun mkhyen klong chen pa'i sprul par grags/ bstan bcos kyang yang tig gi rgyab chos don gsal me long sogs pod

chen gsum du longs pa mdzad/ de nyid kyi dpon brgyud stag bla'i rabs kyi phreng ba mang du byon pa thams cad kyang mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa sha stag byon/ khyad par sa bla sangs rgyas rdo rjes gong ra lo chen ba ra hi ta'i drung nas rnying rgyud phal che ba'i dpe lung gnyi ga'i rgyun blangs te phyogs 'dir spel/ der ma tshad pa rnams phyis kun bzang khyab gdal lhun grub kyi rigs dbon kun bzang rnam rgyal dang/ kun bzang blo gros sku mched kyis smin gling du gter ston rin po che'i zhabs la gtugs te dpe rnams tshang ba dang/ bka' lung rnams kyang rgyal ba'i sras mchog yid bzhin legs grub las zhus shing dpe lung gnyis ka'i rgyun phyogs 'dir tshang bar mdzad pas bstan pa la phyag rjes shin tu che/ rgyun de nyid las rdzogs chen sprul pa'i sku rin po che 'gyur med theg mchog bstan 'dzin gyis bka' lung dang glegs bam bcas thugs rtsol chen pos sgrub par mdzad cing/ bdag cag gi 'dren mchog mtshungs pa med pa de nyid kyis kyang smin gling rgyal ba'i sras mchog rin po che rnam rgyal kyi dngos kyi zhal slob stag bu sprul sku mdo rgyud rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po de nyid las/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro/ nA ra gdong sprugs/ yang dag zla gam dgu pa/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor/ 'dus pa chen po mdo'i dbang rnams gter chen sku mched yab sras rnams kyi chos khrigs kyi yi ge legs bshad rmad du byung ba'i steng nas gsan pa dang/ gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa dgongs rgyan dang zhal lung gnyis sbyar gyi bshad pa go don rnams kyang legs par dpyis phyin par mdzad/ rgyud 'bum spyi'i lung yang tshang ma gsan cing gzhan la lan gsum bzhir 'chad spel mdzad pa sogs kyis phyogs 'dir gsang ba sngags kyi bstan pa nyin mo ltar slar yang gsal ba mdzad pa yin no/ khyad par snyigs ma las kyang ches snyigs mar gyur pa'i dus kyi mtha' ma 'dir bka' gter gyi bstan pa spyi dang khyad par mchog tu zab pa rdzogs pa chen po snying thig 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i bstan pa dus kyi rgud pa'i 'og tu bltar mi mngon pa ltar gyur pa spar yang gzhi bzhengs lta bur slong bar mdzad pa po ni/ bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung bstan bka' rgya ma las/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshe lung zin thams cad la mi 'gyur pa'i brda rtags gsum gyi gzer yod pa de nyid las/ gang yang mi 'gyur brda rtags gsum dang ldanaH lus la lte sme snying gar sha mtshan reH ngag ni snyan 'gyur sngags tshig rtsol ba can: pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i ming can gnyisaH yid ni rtse gcig gdungs shugs nga nyid dranaH gur tshug 'di min yid la mi byed gsungs/ de gsum gsum 'dzom mchog yin

gnyis 'dzom 'bring \u0f7f gcig 'dzom tha ma gang yang las can reHzhes bstan pa dang mtshungs pa'i sku'i rtags mtshan rnams kyang ldan cing/ gzhan yang chos rjes gling pa'i bla ma drag po'i lung bstan las/ dbu g.yor gzhung du byang sems pad+ma'i ming \u0f7f bka' rnying bstan skyong thabs mkhas 'gro ba 'dulaH zhes bka' rnying ma'i bstan pa bshad sgrub kyis 'dzin par ched du bsngags pa bzhin/ slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje dang/ sprul pa'i dge slong a dkar ma ti/ chos rgyal khri srong lde'u btsan/ rgyal sras lha rje/ yar rje o rgyan gling pa/ kun mkhyen dri med 'od zer/ mnga' ri'i paN chen/ byang pa bdag po sogs kyi thugs bskyed gcig tu smin pa'i mkhyen brtse nus gsum gyis snying po'i ring lugs gsal bar mdzad pa la don du lnga brgya pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon dri med bshes gnyen zag pa dang bral ba'i sku de nyid kyis 'khor ba ma stongs par 'phags pa 'jam dpal bus pa gzhon nu'i tshul gyis chos ston pa'i gnas ri bo che po'u tha'i shin tu bzhugs pa las/ lo brgya brgya re na bod kyi ljongs su nyid kyi sprul pa res snying thig gi bstan pa la nyams pa rnams gso ba dang/ 'khrul pa'i dri ma rnams dag par mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin yul dbus 'gyur lho phyogs kyi rgyud du rang byung rdo rje 'jigs med gling pa zhes mtshan gyi yi ge rnam par gsal ba zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i thog mar kun mkhyen shes rab 'od zer gyi 'khor lo gsum gyi phyag rjes rma med pa'i gnas dpal gyi ri bo'i chos sde'i khrod du grwadakyus ma'i tshul gyis bstan pa'i sgor zhugs par mdzad nas/ sdom pa gsum gyi bdud rtsis thugs rgyud legs par gtams shing bka' gter gyi chos tshul spy-i dang bye brag la gsan bsam rgya chen po mdzad pa na rgyal ba'i sras mchog rnams kyi tshad med pa'i snying rje chen pos gzhan don kho nar dgongs pa'i spyod pa rlab po che skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du bskyangs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i smon lam dang/ rigs kyi sa bon dus su sad pa las srid pa'i ngang tshul ltar snang ji ltar legs kyang sdug bsngal gyi yo lang 'ba' zhig tu gzigs pa'i skyo shas dang nges 'byung tshad med pas drangs pa'i thugs kyis chos sde de gar lo gsum du snying po'i sgrub pa la rtse gcig tu gnas pa'i bcad rgya mdzad pa'i tshe/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang 'jam dpal bshes gnyen 'od gsal gyi ngang du mjal te/ brda don spros pa med pa'i dbang mang po bskur ba'i mthar rang nyid la thim par gyur pa'i snyams snang byung bas de tsam nas rtogs pa byung rgyal tu skyes/ nyams kyi 'dzin stangs bud/ las rlung dbang du 'dus/ snang ba'i rdzun phugs rdib/ rig pa

brtul bzhugs kyi gdeng dang ldan par gyur nas sngon gyi skye ba dran pa sogs dag pa'i snang ba kho nar 'byams klas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen brten nas tha snyad dang gzhung lugs rnams la sbyang brtson gyi ngal dub brten ma dgos par sngon sbyangs kyi rang stobs ston pa'i rtsal rdzogs pa'i rig pa phyogs med du grol zhing longs spyod 'khor lo'i mdud pa dbyings su zhig pas/ rtsa rlung gi rgyu ba rnams yi ge'i sprin du spro bas grag pa thams cad chos tshig gi sgra dbyangs su rang rdol du gyur pas snang ba thams cad dpe char shar zhing byas tshad man ngag tu go bas bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa'i cho ga'i rnams bshad mkhyen brtse'i me long zhes bya ba mdzad/ dgung lo nyer dgu pa me glang lo'i smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcur slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs la mos gus dang skyo shas kyis drangs pa'i 'od gsal gyi snang bar rje nyid seng ge la bcibs nas nam mkha'i lam nas byon pa zhig la chos sku ye shes kyi DA' ki nI mngon sum du mjal zhing shing gi za ma tog gcig phyag tu gtad de/ dag pa'i 'khor gyi snang ba laH khyod ni khri srong lde'u btsan yinaH ma dag gdul bya'i snang ngo ruH khyod ni seng ge'i ras pa yinaH kun tu bzang po'i thugs nyid gteraH rig 'dzin pad+ma'i klong chen brdaH mkha' 'gro'i gsang mdzod chen mo yinaH d+ha thimaH zhes gsungs pa'i mod la yal/ der thugs la spro ba tshad med pa skyes te/ za ma tog de kha phye bas shog ser hril mo lnga dang/ shel dkar sran 'phos tsam pa bdun bcas byung ba mkha' 'gro'i lung bzhin thams cad zhal du gsol bas tshig dang don gyi gnas thams cad par gyis btab pa bzhin thugs la bkra lam mer gsal ba'i ngo mtshar tshad med par gyur cing/ de tshul gyi lo rgyus rnams dpal ri sprul pa'i sku'i snyan du gsol nas dngos gter ram dag snang dgongs gter gyi tshul gang rung 'byung bar som nyi bral mod kyi/ 'on kyang re zhig gsang ba gal che tshul gsungs bzhin thugs las chung ngu'i ngang nas lo bdun gyi bar du rlung phyogs tsam du'ang ma bsgrags par rtogs med kho nar mdzad do// de nas dgung lo so gcig pas yos lor dpal gyi mchims phu bre gu dge'u 'og lhun grub rang byung gi phug pa lo gsum du snying po'i sgrub par rtse gcig bzhugs pa'i tshe/ ma byon bde gshegs snying po ri rab mar me'i rgyal mtshan kun mkhyen bsam yas pa ngag gi dbang po'i ye shes kyi sku lan gsum du mjal ba ste/ de dag kyang lan dang pos brjod bya don gyi rgyud dang/ rdzod byed tshig gi brgyud pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don rgyun kyi dgongs pa 'pho bar mdzad pa sku'i byin rlabs dang/ gnyis pas mdzod chen bdun dang shing rta gsum sogs kyi bstan pa

gtad nas nges don mthar thug gis grub mtha' bzang po 'di nyid 'dzin cing/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa'i sgo mi nub pa'i phyir 'chad pa dang rtsom pa rgya chen pos gzhan don phrin las la dbang brnyes pa'i kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po nyid kyi don gyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba'i gsung gi byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gsum pas brjod du med pa'i de kho na nyid rig pa rtsal gyi byin rlabs 'pho ba'i dbang bskur nas don rgyud rtogs pa'i bdag por rjes su gnang zhing thugs kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o// de'i tshe bstod pa dpyid kyi rgyal mo'i rgyang glu bya ba mdzad/ kun mkhyen chen po'i gdams pa rnams kyi don thugs la shar ba bzhin man ngag gi yi ge kun mkhyen zhal lung sogs than thun mdzad/ gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi gter byin dge bsnyen mkha' ri'i zhus lan du/ bang so dmar po'i shar ram lho yi phyogasaH lha bab mchod rten dgon sde 'cha' yang sridaH zhes rdo rje'i lung gis gsal bar bstan pa bzhin dgung grangs so bzhi pa chu rta lor g.yo ru khrag 'brug gi gtsug lag khang dang mi ring ba bkra shis srong btsan bang so'i shar gyi phyogs bskungs kyi ri sul byang chub shing gi nags khrod tshe ring ljongs zhes bya ba'i dben gnas chen por sbyin bdag sde pa pu shud pas zhabs 'degs bsgrubs te pad+ma 'od gling thar pa chen po'i grong khyer rten brten pa dang bcas pa bskrun par mdzad cing ris su ma chad pa'i skye bo skal ba bzang po chos kyi 'du bar lhag pa rnams la rig pa 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gtso bor gyur pa'i bshad sgrub kyi sgra dbyangs rgyun mi 'chad du sgrog par mdzad do// sngar babs pa'i thugs gter klong chen snying thig gi chos skor yang rigs lnga DA ki'i gtso mos brda 'grol gyi skangs dbye ba nas rim par shog thog tu 'bebs par mdzad pa'i dus kyang gnad byang thugs kyi sgrom bur gsal dgung grangs so drug pa shing sprel lor nges pa bzhin sprel zla'i tshe bcu mchod pa'i cho ga mdzad pa na u rgyan chen po nyid 'khor mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas pa mjal/ lho brag gsung sprul rin po che sogs sprul sku rnams gsum gyis thugs gter 'bebs pa legs po'i bskul ma'ang byung bas rten 'brel gyi sgo 'grigs shing/ kong smyon sbas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang sngon chad mthong thos med par mngon shes lta bus bskul ma mdzad pas smon lam dus bab kyi rten 'brel la dgongs pas 'dus pa dang po'i 'khor bco lnga la smin grol gyi sgo dbye bar mdzad pa nas bzung rim gyis spel bar mdzad do// smin gling gter chen sku mched kyi dngos slob kong po thang 'brog sprul sku rin po che pad+ma rig 'dzin dbang po las mdo dbang chen mo/ grub dbang

dpal mgon las gsang ba snying po'i bshad lung/ lcags zam rin po che bstan 'dzin ye shes lhun grub las rnying rgyud yongs rdzogs kyi lung rnams gsan/ gzhan yang sgyu 'phrul zhi khro/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor/ dong sprugs/ yang dag sogs kyi dbang smin gling gi rgyun las gsan cing/ phyag rgya bcing thabs dang/ cho ga'i khrigs dang/ dkyil 'khor bri thig/ gdangs dbyangs rol mo rnams kyang bstan rgyun la dgongs te gsan/ mdzod chen gsum dang shing rta gsum gyi don bsdus pas bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i bstan bcos chen por 'gyur zhing gzhan rnams lam stegs tsam dang/ nges don rdzogs pa chen po grub mtha' kun gyi rtse mor gnas pa gtan la dbab pa yon tan mdzod rtsa ba dang/ de nyid kyi rgyu'i theg pa'i dgongs 'grel bden gnyis shing rta dang/ 'bras bu'i theg pa'i dgongs 'brel rnam mkhyen shing rta zhes grags pa'i gzhung chen po dag mdzad de lung dang rig pa'i skya bar nas 'od gsal snying po'i ring lugs slong bar mdzad pas bod yul kyi ljongs su sngon chad klog pa kho nar glo ba zhen pa'i ston chen rang rgyud gnam ru ltar gyong ba rnams kyang bsngags pa'i me tog chal chil du bsnyil zhing gus 'dud lhur len pa la spro bar gyur to// phyogs gang du'ang snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa rin po che nyag phra bar gyur pas sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po dang lo paN mchog rnams kyi thugs bskyed rgya chen po'i 'phrag par khyer ba'i gsang mchog nges pa don kyi bstan pa'i phrin las rgya chen po chud 'dza' ba dang 'phags pa mchog de rnams kyi phyag rjes rma med pa zub tu nye ba thugs kyis ma bzod de rnying rgyud rin po che smin gling gi dpe gang bzhugs tshang ma dbu shog lnga rin po che sna lngas bris shing de phyin skya chos pu sti nyer lnga skor yo byad dang rgyu dngos phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs par mdzad/ sngon chad phyogs 'dir dkar chag tu 'debs pa dang gtan tshigs kyis bsgrubs pa'i deb ther rgyas par 'god pa ma byung mod/ rje btsun chos kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyis gtan tshigs gsum dang 'brel ba'i spobs pa zab la rgya che bas snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum rin po che'i rtogs pa brjod pa 'dzam gling tha grur khyab pa'i rgyan ces bya ba mdzad de lung dang rig pa'i snang ba bzang pos log par rtogs pa dang the tshom gyi mun pas phyogs bslad pa thams cad drung nas 'byin par mdzad do// rlangs dpal gyi seng ge'i ye shes kyi skus badzra kI la ya'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba rdzogs par mdzad pas byin rlabs kyi mtshan ma thob pa la brten kI la ya'i tan+t+ra shin tu mang ba gangs ri'i khrod du byon pa las dngos grub brnyes pa'i brgyud pa bar ma chad pa'i bka' srol rgyal po lugs dang/

jo mo lugs dang/ lcam lugs gtso bor gyur pa'i bka' bab tha dad kyi brgyud pa mang du bzhugs pa rnams don du rgyud kyi dgongs par gcig pa'i phyir bka' bab thams cad 'du ba'i rten 'brel gyi nges pas/ rdo rje bkod pa rnal 'byor chen po dang/ ye shes rtse mo dang/ rtsa rgyud rnal 'byor chen po gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud sgrub thabs su bsdebs pa sngon med pa'i bka'i bsdu ba mdzad/ de skabs tsam du dpal mgon zhal gyi lung gis bskul ba'i rten 'brel las dpal sa skya'i bdag chen sngags 'chang chen po ngag dbang dpal ldan chos skyong dang/ ngag dbang kun dga' phan bde rgya mtsho mched kyis spyan drangs pa ltar dpal ldan sa skya'i grom pa rgyang gi gtsug lag khang du phebs/ sa skya pa chen po sku mched la byang sdom dang rgyud nas btus pa'i phur pa'i dbang chen/ klong chen snying gi thig le'i dbang lung dang man ngag gi khrid bka' sogs smin grol gyi bdud rtsis thugs rgyud legs pa gtams par mdzad/ phur pa'i dbang ma mdzad gong sa skya bdag po'i mnal lam du/ da res phur khang du bla ma rdzogs chen pa la yang dag gi dbang zhus shig/ ces byung bas yang dag pa'i chos tshul du nges pa brnyed nas chos sgo thog mar phye bar mdzad pa yin no// gzhan yang yang dag sogs yab chos sngon rnying pa rnams kyang nyams pa gsos pa sogs phyogs der bstan 'gro'i don rgya che ba du ma sgrub par mdzad/ gzhan yang lho mon du mtsho sna dgon rtse sprul skus spyan drangs shing phyogs de'i skye bo rnams kyang mthong thos don ldan du mdzad/ gnas chen rnams su mchod pa dang/ bdud rtsi sman gyi sgrub pa khyad par can du ma mdzad/ skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams la gdams ngag gi khrid dang/ dbang lung du mas smin par mdzad/ bsam yas ri mthil/ khra 'brug/ shel brag/ srong btsan bang so rnams su bdud rtsi bsgrub pa dang/ zhi rgyas dbang drag gi sbyin bsregs/ tshogs mchod/ gtor bzlog sogs bstan 'gro'i bde thabs du ma dang/ gnas chen gsum gtso bor gyur pa'i chos rgyal mes dbon gyis bzhengs pa'i gtsug lag khang rnams su mchod pa sna lnga/ brgya/ stong/ khri'i bar lan grangs shin tu mang po dang/ srog bslu kho na'ang bgrangs kyis mi lang ba/ rin po che'i rgyu tshogs las bsgrub pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten khyad par du 'phags pa du ma dang/ mchod pa'i yo byad rgyud dngos phun sum tshogs pa kho na las bsgrub par mdzad nas 'bul sbyor mdzad pa sogs 'khor lo gsum gyi phrin las kyis dus 'da' bar gyur cing/ dbus gtsang/ khams kong/ lho mon tshul gyi chen dgu mtha' dag dang/ thos bsam par rlom pa'i mkhas pa dang/ sgom pa la dril ba'i sgrub pa po pho mo/

rang bzhin gyi bstan pa la zhugs pa'i btsun gzugs yan chad kyang rje 'di nyid kyi zhal mjal kho na don du gnyer zhing de dag rnams la gang la gang 'tshams kyi 'jug pa'i chos bka' dbang lung/ smin khrid/ dge sdig 'jug ldog gi bslab bya dang bcas pa sgo ji snyed pas mngon mtho dang nges legs kyi gnas su bkra bar mdzad pa'i tshul mtha' dag pa ni smos kyis mi lang la/ sgyu 'phrul zhi khro dang tshogs chen 'dus pa rnams kyi chog khrigs kyang gsar du mdzad nas/ byang theg mchog gling du sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i sgrub mchod rten ji srid bar sbyor 'jags dang/ dpal gyi ri bor 'dus mdo'i sgrub mchod sogs bka' ma rnams 'phel rgyas kyi thabs rgya che ba mdzad/ bstan bcos kyang tshad ma gsum dang 'brel pa'i brjod bya dang rjod byed phun sum tshogs shing lung rig man ngag gi gnas rgya cher 'grel pa smos ma thag pa rnams gtso bor gyur pa'i pu sta ka bcu gcig tu longs pa tsam bzhugs shing/ da lta'i dus su'ang rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin skyong spel ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor bzhin pa dang/ da dung yang bskal pa las bskal pa lhag par bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen dang rtsa lag gcig pur 'jig pa med pa rdo rje lta bu'i gzugs kyi skus bzhugs shing zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad par skor bar gsol ba 'debs so// 'dir smras pa/ ji snyed rgyal ba'i chos mdzod bzung pas srid pa 'dir ni 'byung dka' ba'i// bstan pa rin chen snang mdzad u dum wa ra ji bzhin rmad byung ba'i// yon tan bgrangs yas 'khri shing gi 'khyud smin grol bye ba'i 'bras rdzogs pa'i// dam pa'i dpag bsam dga' tshal thob pa'i e ma srid gsum skal ba spom// thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu byon cing// bsams pas don gyi nor bu lag mthil lon// bsgoms pas thub gnyis 'dod dgur 'jo ba'i char// ci yang g.yo ba'i ded dpon mkha' rnams kyis// spros pa'i mtha' kun spangs pa'i chos nyid kyi// rang bzhin gnas la rab tu spobs gyur pas// rnam pa'i chos kun chu zla ji bzhin du/ gzigs pa'i spyan ras rab rib dang bral bas// mi zad kun rtog rje son shes bya'i khams// spros pa'i tshul gyi ji snyed mkhyen gyur pas// rnam 'gyur ma nges spros tshogs rab mang gzugs// cig char 'char ba'i me long bzhin du gyur// srid nyon dug can drug khri'i dag byed phul// ma smad rgyud du 'bab pa dbang rnon gyi// 'jug ngogs rig 'dzin sde snod mtho ris klung// dgongs brda brgyud pa'i ral par bsgyings pa la// 'phags yul mkhas dang grub pa'i rna ba la// nye bar babs shing thugs kyi bum pa ru// legs par 'khyil ba'i bdud rtsi gangs can 'dir// drang srong

du ma'i mgrin pa'i rgyan gyur pa// rnam dag grub mtha' shing rta'i srol brgya yis// phyes pa'i lam bzang snang byed 'jig rten na// nyi ma lta bu'i khyu mchog bshes rnams kyi// ngang tshul 'di la mi bsngags shes ldan su// gang gi rnam thar bsil zer gyis reg pas// 'dir snang dga' ba'i chu skyes nyams byed cing// nges 'byung chu yis rab brlan steng 'thung dkar// zhi ba'i phyogs su grol ba'i 'dzum dkar ston// mun pas byugs pa'i gling 'dir dam chos kyi// bstan mchog zla ris snang byas bka' drin mtha'// 'chi med gnas las nges par brgal ba yi// mtha' yas yon tan brjod pas ci zhig longs/ 'on kyang chu thigs gcig gis chur gter bzhin// rab tu dang ba'i blo yis phyogs tsam zhing// bsnyad pa des kyang dpag dka'i rnam thar gyi/ gnas su blta ba'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur// dkar min las kyis 'khor bar dam bcings pa'i// brnag dka'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses bdag 'dra yang// dam pa'i rnam thar 'di lta'i rdzas bslab ste// 'dren mchog rnams dang mdzad pa mtshungs spyad shog/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod rdo rje theg pa snga 'gyur rgyud sde rin po che'i rtogs pa brjod pa lha'i rnga bo che lta bu'i gtam las bstan pa de nyid 'jigs rten du ji ltar bskyangs pa'i tshul rags pa tsam bshad pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// d+hI ro pA ya ka lA da da k+Sha mA bi dz+nyai rbo d+hi ma naM ga bi kra ma/ sbyin dang bzod sogs thabs mkhas sgyu rtsal la goms pas// byang chub phyogs su mdza' ba ma yin rnam gnon pas/ shi Sh+tiM pr-i th+ya b+hi mA na tA ba lA ta A ts+tshi d+ya d+h+ri ya te nr-i bai r+b+hu dze: bstan mchog sa chen mngon rlob stobs ldan las bcad nas// mi bdag 'di yi legs byas dpung pas rnam par 'dzin/ sa bdag 'ga' zhig rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon sbyor la yang god par 'gyur// 'ga' zhig chud zos mi bdag ro yi yul la sred pas chos kyi bya ba la ma byin// rdzas rnams gang zhig sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de ni de yi sdig par bcings// de phyir blo mchog rnams kyis gzhan gyi phyir du nor rnams ma lus par ni zad par mdzad// gang gis sems ni snying rje'i chus bkrus pas// dpag dka'i yon tan du ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa// de la zhi ba chen po'i phyogs 'dzegs pa'i// mngon mtho'i lam yang them skas bzhin du snang// grags pa'i me tog dar ba'i mdzes sdug gis// 'byung po kun gyi brtan pa 'phrogs pa bzhin// chos ldan rgyal srid kun gyi snying sdug pas// zla ba bye ba'i khengs pa tshar gcod bzhin// bsod nams gser gyi khams las grub gyur

pa'i// sde bzhi'i snying po rab mtho dge bcu'i rtsibs// yang dag smon lam brgya yi khor yug can// las kyi byed pos lha 'di'i sug par gtad// yon tan dri bzangs rgyas pa'i gter// gtong pa'i ge sar 'khrigs gyur pa'i// mi bdag dang tshul pad+ma la// kun dga'i sbrang rtsi rab tu mngar// e ma rin chen du ma yi// 'byung gnas gtam gyi bdud rtsi'i gter// cha shas lhung ba'i rna ba yang// legs byas ro yis lci bar byed// gang du'ang phyogs su ma lhung ba'i// nyi ma lta bu'i rgyal bstan yang// bsod nams 'bab stegs mngon mtho ba'i// sa skyong 'di dang nye snyam bgyid// dam pa'i rang bzhin brtan ldan cing// spyod tshul dag pa'i shing gis 'khril// sbyin pa'i grib gsil rgya che ba'i// dpag bsams ra ba 'di byung ngo// gsum pa bstan pa de nyid las deng sang gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir ji tsam snyed pa dag phyi mtha'i bar du mi nub cing 'phel ba'i btsas su mi'i dbang pos chos sbyin mi zad pa'i phyi mor bsgrubs pa'i tshul bshad pa la gsum ste/ sngon gyi dus su byung ba'i log par bltas pa'i phyogs gsal ba dang/ rnam dkar byed pa po'i lo rgyus 'chad pa dang/ de dag gi bya ba dngos so// dang po ni/ de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi rnam 'phrul gangs can gyi lha btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan gyi thugs bskyed phul du byung bas ri kha ba can pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi bsod nams dam pa'i bgo skal du brgyud pa gsum las babs pa'i gsang sngags bla na med pa 'od gsal rdo rje'i snying po la sogs mchog tu zab pa'i rgyud sde mkha' 'gro dang rig pa 'dzin pa du ma'i thugs bcud thun mong gi spyod yul du ma gyur pa mang po zhig bod 'dir grub pa'i slob dpon chen po mtsho skyes zhabs dang/ bi ma la mi tra sogs kyi byin rlabs las byung mod kyi/ de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa dang sngon gyi chos rgyal dang sprul pa'i lo paN chen po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa la phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin te/ 'di ltar bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam yang med pa'i gdol spyod mun pa'i gling gnas skabs kyi bde 'bras tsam re ster ba'i 'tshe ba chos su smra ba la gtan gyi skyabs su re ltos 'cha' dgos pa'i skal ba ngan pas nyams nyes par gyur pa la sprul pa'i rgyal pos chos kyi sgron me spar bar brtsams pa'ang nag phyogs kyi 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams 'khrug pa'i cho 'phrul 'thor rlung drag po mi zad pas gzhan dbang du gyur par nye ba'i tshe slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs kyi thugs rjes lha srin gdug pa can du gyur to cog btul nas bod rnams chos ci bder byed chog pa mdzad/ gtsug lag khang dang chos 'khor bzhengs/ sngon chad ma grags pas chos skad tsam slob pa la'ang blo mthu chung

ba'i bod rnams la 'bad pa chen pos chos kyi srol btsugs/ rab tu byung ba btub bam mi btub thog mar nyams sad pa nas brtsams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gyi rmang gzhi bzhengs su btib/ sde snod gsum dang gsang sngags kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho tsam sprul pa'i lo paN rnams kyis bsgyur/ 'thor ba bsdus/ gcus pa bsrangs/ gzhi gtan la phab lam nyams 'od tu bcug/ nyan bshad bsgom gsum gyis gtan la phabs nas rgyal khams dkar 'jam du btang nas thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la bag yangs su spyod chog pa 'di sngon byon pa'i mkhan slob chos rgyal sprul pa'i lo paN de rnams kyi bka' drin yin pas so// de'i phyir phyis 'gyur ba la grub mtha' 'dzin pa'i mkhas pa dang lo tswa ba rnams kyang sngon gyi chen po de dag gis lam srol btod pa'i bshul du dka' ba med par 'jug tu yod pa dang/ rang gi blo gros de'i snon mar song ba la ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin pa'i khar sngon gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig rgya gar na med pas bod du byas par bsgrags pa sogs phrag dog gis dbyen bcos pa shas shig byung mod kyi/ rgya gar na med pa tsam gyis rgyud yang dag ma yin par mi 'grub ste/ rgya gar du yod pa'i rgyud rnams rgya gar rang nas byung ba ma yin cing lha klu gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i gnas dang/ 'dzam bu gling gi cha shas za hor dang/ sham+b+ha la dang/ sing+ga la'i ri ma la ya dang/ o rgyan dang/ 'gro lding gi yul sogs gnas chen po gzhan dang gzhan rnams nas grub pa'i slob dpon chen po rnams kyis spyan drangs nas der byon pa yin pas rgya gar na mi bzhugs pa tsam gyis rgyud yang dag min pa'i khyab pa med la/ gal te yul der bzhugs pa 'ga' re yod srid kyang lan re tsam phyin pas mthong mi nus te sngon gyi sprul pa'i lo paN 'phags pa'i sa la bzhugs pa rnams yul nyer bzhi la sogs par rdzu 'phrul gyis byon pa yin na der so skyes bgrod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// rgyu mtshan de dag gis jo bo chen po a ti shas kyang chos kyi gtam mi nus par gsungs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rong zom pas gsang sngags snga 'gyur la phyis 'gyur ba rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i che ba drug yod ces gsungs te/ dang po spyan 'dren yon bdag gi che ba ni/ snga 'gyur gyi yon bdag 'phags pa rigs gsum mgon po rnam pa rgyal po'i tshul bzung ba mnga' bdag mes dpon rnams gsum yin pas phyi 'gyur pa rnams kyi yon bdag dang mi 'dra/ gnyis pa gang du bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'i gnas ni/ sngon sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang bsam yas sogs chos 'khor stod smad du yin pas/ da lta'i dgon phag phug tu bsgyur ba dang mi

'dra/ gsum pa sgyur byed lo tsA ba'i khyad par ni/ sngon gyi lo tsA ba sgra bsgyur bai ro tsa na dang/ ska cog zhang gsum/ rma gnyags sogs sprul pa'i lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'i chos yin/ da lta'i lo tsA ba dbyar mar yul du bsdad/ dgun rgya bal du yug re phyin nas bsgyur ba dang mi 'dra/ bzhi pa pan+Di ta'i khyad par ni/ sdon gyi pan+Di ta mkhan po zhi ba 'tsho dang/ sangs rgyas gsang ba dang/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ paN chen bi ma mi tra sogs sangs rgyas dang sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang 'phags rnams kyis spyan drangs pa'i chos yin/ da lta'i gser 'tshol du 'khyams pa'i pan+Di ta dang mi 'dra/ lnga pa zhu rten me tog gi khyad par ni/ sngon gser sha ba'i blud bu gang dang/ bre la gzhal nas phul te zhus pa'i chos yin/ da ltar mchan nas gser zho re re gnyis gnyis bton nas zhus pa dang mi 'dra/ drug pa chos kyi khyad par ni/ sngon 'phags yul du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gra ma nyams dus su bsgyur ba ma zad/ 'phags yul na med pa'i rgyud dbang thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ grub pa dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bzung ste/ dag pa'i zhing na bzhugs pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi cha shas sing+ga la dang/ nub phyogs o rgyan gyi yul sogs nas slob dpon chen po pad+ma dang/ bi ma mi tra sogs kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pas blangs nas bsgyur bas rgya gar du paN grub yongs la ma grags pa mang po zhig kyang bod kyi bsod nams kyi skal par byon/ 'gyur yang sngon gyi lo tsA ba rnams sprul pa'i sku yin pas don ji lta ba bzhin du gtan la phebs pas go sla zhing byings 'jal ba la rlabs che/ phyis kyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis don brgyur ma nus par rgya dpe'i go rim ltar sgra bsgyur byas pas tshig grims la go dka'/ byings 'jal ba rlabs chung ba ltar snang bas mi 'dra ba yin no// zhes gsungs pa ltar la/ bod du bstan pa phyi dar gyi bar skabs der rnam rig sgrin zhing gser cung zad yod pa thams cad rgya bal du 'gro ba'i srol zhig dang/ mtha' gcig tu bstan pa dang sems can gyi ched du yin na rjes su yi rang bar gyur la/ 'di ltar phrag dog gi kun slong can phal cher zhig ni mkhas par 'dod pa dang/ gzhan gyi rnyed bkur la chags pa dang/ grags pa don du gnyer ba dang/ rang gi bla ma dang skal mnyam gyi bshes gnyen la 'gran sems phrag dog gi dbang gis rkang pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mang ste mar pa'i phyag dpe rnams grogs kyis chu la dor ba'i rnam thar gyis shes par nus la/ de'i phyir kun mkhyen rong pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gra ma nyams pa'i dus su/ sprul pa'i lo tsA bas bka' 'gyur ba med par gtan la phab nas/ shes bya

dngos po'i 'dug tshul 'bebs shing/ de rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs du mas brgyan pa'i chos dang/ dus da lta'i lo tsA rdzun po che sngon gyi 'gyur la bcos ma sna tshogs byas nas/ 'gyur nga bzang/ khungs nga btsun zer nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang/ bla ma'i gsung la ras chod byas nas/ mi res chos res bcos/ gcig skyon gcig la 'gel/ pha'i chos la bu'i dpe mi btub pa'i chos dang mi 'dra zhes gsungs pa 'di shin tu'ang mad/ dngos grub brnyes pa o rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis/ bod kyi lo tsA ba kha cig rgya gar na rnying ma bsgyur rgyu mi 'dug zer/ de la chag lo tsA ba bdag rang gi dbang zhus kyi bla ma yin yang/ rgya gar na rnying ma'i rgyud bsgyur rgyu mi 'dug zer/ de 'dra khong rang blo chung gi gtam yin/ lo tsA ba rgya gar shar phyog su yug re las ma phyin pas rgya gar na gang yod cha ci chod/ de las bod na gang yod kyi cha yang mi chod/ spyir yang rgya gar tshad khungs che bas/ rgya gar gyi dpe rnams rul pa mang/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' la tshad gzung med pa la/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis res khungs ci chod/ ngas nub phyogs u rgyan gyi yul la phyin pa yang/ mu dang mtha' ma chod/ de yang dang po'i rgya dpe rnams dus phyis bal po na mang ba yin/ de bas bal po b+he ha ra'i gtsug lag khang gcig na/ rnying ma'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam grangs rang yang bsam gyis mi khyab par bzhugs 'dug/ ngas bod kyi rnying ma rnams khungs rnying ma'i rgya dpe dang/ pan+Di ta tshur dgug/ khyed rang rnams mang yul skyid grong du 'dong/ ngas lo tsA ba byas bsgyur zer ba byas te ma grub/ rnying ma'i 'gyur da rung bya ru yod pa la/ yang bod kyi shes par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig na re/ rnying ma'i dgongs pa 'dus pa bod kyi sngags rgan tshos bcos pa yin mi dag zer/ de 'dra yang 'os su mi 'gro ba'i gtam yin/ shes na de 'dra ba'i chos rang re tsho yang 'chos dang de las legs rgyu ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' la'ang med/ ces pa dang/ de bzhin du jo bo'i rnam thar na/ yang jo bo'i thugs dgongs pa/ mi yul du bzhugs pa'i gsang sngags la nga las mkhas pa med snyam pa'i thugs rgyal mnga' ba la/ phyis bod du byon nas be har gling gi dkor mdzod gcig sgo phye nas rgya dpe gzigs pas/ jo bos de gong du ma gsan ma gzigs pa mang po bzhugs 'dug nas/ theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di la mi shes pa med snyam/ DA ki mas kyang nam mkha' nas gzhal yas khang dpag tu med pa bstan/ rgyud sde mang po bstan pa yin pa la/ 'di rnams mi gda'/ theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di la mtha' yod yod mi 'dra gsungs thugs rgyal chags/ bod kyi rgyal po la rjes su yi rang ba mang po phul/ bod du bstan pa dar ba 'dra ba rgya

gar du yang ma byung ba 'dra gsungs/ zhes dang/ slob dpon pad+ma rdo rje 'chang gnyis pa de'i drin las rgya gar na yongs su ma grags pa'i mkha' 'gro'i gsang mdzod mang po bsgyur nas bsam yas be har gyi dkor mdzod na bzhugs so// zhes pa 'di dang/ rje btsun tA ra nA thas/ 'gro ldeng gi gling na sngon bstan pa rnal ma med pa las/ slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis dang por btsugs/ mar me mdzad bzang pos kyang byon/ de nas brtsams te lo brgya tsam gyi bar du ma ga d+ha dang/ u rgyan dang/ kha che la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po byon te/ sngags kyi theg pa lhag par rgyas par mdzad/ sngon rgyal po d+harma pA la'i skabs su sbas te/ rgya gar du nub pa'i rgyud kyi rigs dang/ au Di yA na nas spyan drangs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud rgya gar na med pa mang du yod/ ces legs par bshad pas thugs gzu bor gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par dpyod pa 'di dag gis 'phags yul du mi 'dug dang ma dag zer ba'i rdzun gtam dang bzang brdzu'i mtshangs thams cad dus gcig la brtol bar snang ste sdang zhugs kyis smras pa de dag gis rang nyid chos spang bar 'gyur ba'i zhar la blo gros dman cing bsod nams chung ba'i 'gro ba gzhan dag the tshom bskyed pa'i phyir dge slong lha chen po'i spyod tshul kyis bstan pa'i dbyen tsam du 'gyur bar srid kyi de las bsam pa mthar thug pa'i lam du ma song ngo// yang phyis kyi mkhas pa bus snga 'gyur gyi srol 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi thugs zhen dang/ nyang gter mgon po phyag bzhi sogs la nyams bzhes dang/ gu ru mtshan brgyad zhal bstan nas lung bstan thob tshul sogs dngos bstan ltar yin na rnying ma'i rgyud rnams btang snyoms su gsungs pa'ang dus skabs de'i grub mtha'i kha 'dzin gzhan gyi ngo la dgongs par mngon te tshal pa si tu smon lam rdo rje gangs can 'gyur ro cog gi gsung rab rnams bzhengs pa'i zhu dag la khong nyid kyis byon par mdzad pas/ rnying ma mdo sgyu sems gsum dang sgrub sde'i skor bcas bka' 'gyur gyi rgyud 'bum khrod du bzhugs par mdzad pa'i phyir dang/ de yang gdod nas grub pa'i rgyud gzhung du tshad mas grub pa'i phyir bzhag pa yin gyi gsar ma'i ra li so gnyis yongs rdzogs dang/ gnyis med rnam rgyal sogs mang po sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin par bsgrubs nas dor bar mdzad pas so// paN chen zi lung pa shAkya mchog ldan gyis sdom gsum rab dbye'i dgongs pa dngos bstan drang don du gser gyi thur mas 'chad pa na gang zag blo gros ma byang ba rnams ni ne ma nur bskyed cing/ blun po phyogs lhung can rnams kyis rgyab rten du 'khyer ba zhig byung mod kyang/ paN chen nyid kyis bzhed pa ni 'di skad du/ spyir rnying

ma chos ma yin par khas len nus pa dag yod na/ de'i tshe de ltar 'dod pa des ska cog zhang gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i sde snod gsum gyi chos rnams dang/ bya ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sogs lo chen rin chen bzang po ma byon gong du 'gyur ba thams cad chos ma yin pa nyid du khas len dgos par 'gyur ro// bye brag tu gsang sngags bla med kyi rgyud rnying ma chos ma yin par khas len nus pa dag yod na/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa dang/ zla gsang thig le dang/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor rnams chos ma yin pa nyid du khas len dgos par 'gyur te/ de gsum rnying ma'i lugs kyi tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad du grags pa de'i gtso bor gyur pa dang/ rtsa ba de gsum la brten nas bod du rnying mar grags pa'i chos mang dag cig byung bar sngon gyi chen po dag gis 'chad pa'i phyir ro// bye brag tu yang phur chos ma yin par khas len pa dag yod na/ de'i rgyud kyi rgya dpe dang/ lo tsA ba tshad ldan gyis bsgyur ba sogs kyi gtan tshigs las rnam dag tu grub zin pa dang/ khyad par rnying ma'i rgyud du grags pa gzhan dang gzhan rnams rgyud 'bum gyi dkar chag tu 'debs par mi mdzad pa'i chen po de dag gis kyang yang dag dang phur pa rtsod med du grub zin pa'i phyir/ dper na ral gri dang/ bu ston rin po che'i chos 'byung las bshad pa bzhin no// zhes gzhan gyi 'dod pa na yams su bkod nas rang gi bzhed pa'i snying po ni bstan pa 'di'i bdag po ston pa thub pa'i dbang pos/ chags bral gyi gzugs sam 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis gsungs kyang rung ste/ ston pa gcig pu de nyid kyi lha dang sngags kyi rim pa kho na nyams su blangs pa las grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ de'i slob ma rim pa gnyis la brtan pa thob nas grub pa'i sa brnyes pa de dag gis/ bod du dam pa'i chos dar ba la gegs su gyur pa'i lha 'dre gdug pa can 'dul ba dang/ rdo rje theg pa'i snod du gyur pa rnams rig 'dzin gyi sa la 'god pa'i phyir du/ gang dang 'tshams pa'i lha dang sngags dang lta ba'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa dang/ de'i don slob mas tshul bzhin nyams su blangs pa dang/ de las grub pa'i sa brnyes pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa mang du byon pa dang/ de dang mthun pa'i snyan brgyud dang dgongs pa yi ger bkod pa la brten nas rnying mar grags pa'i chos rnam par dag pa 'di nyid byung ba yin la/ 'di dag la'ang yang dag par na bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid tshang ba yin te/ ji skad du/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'ba' zhig gi/ dbang byas rnam g.yeng med yid can gyis bshad// ces sogs kyi mtshan nyid de tshang ba'i phyir/ slob dpon pad+mas gsungs pa'i bstan bcos ni

sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ thar pa thob pa'i lam dang rjes mthun pa// de yang drang srong bka' bzhin spyi bor blangs// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ dper na rje btsun byams pa'i chos lnga dang/ dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud dang/ de'i 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa bzhin no// yang/ rdzogs pa chen po'i gshis la bya ba dang bral ba'i grub mtha' rgyu rkyen 'dus byas kyi khams su mi gnas pa'i ye shes nges don mthar thug pa drang thad du ston pa'i skabs dkar nag dang rgyu 'bras 'bad rtsol gyi byas chos la ltos 'cha' mi dgos par bshad pa la bod 'ga' zhig gis spyod pa'i phyogs spangs pas hA shang dang mthun par thal lo zhes skyon mthong ha las las tsam byed pa byung mod/ lar bde bar gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo gsum bskor ba'i rim pa dang po dge mi dge'i rgyu 'bras mi bslu bar ston pa de yang 'jig rten gyi ngo la ltos nas bstan pa'i phyir drang don du bzhag pa yin/ bar pa dang tha ma gnyis rnam thar sgo gsum gyi mtshan nyid du don gyis mi mthun pa med la/ nges don zab mo'i gnas lugs ston pa la zab pa dang ches zab pa'i khyad par tsam yod/ drang nges kyi don de yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi sgo nas 'byed cing brjod bya de dag shas che chung gi sgo nas dbye ba yin par mkhas pa kun grags shing grub mod/ de lta nyid kyis re zhig bka' bar par rnam shes kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong par khas blangs nas de nges don du 'chad pa'i skabs/ gang la dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa/ gang la blang bar bya ba dang/ dor bar bya ba'i chos su mi dmigs pa ste mdor na gzung 'dzin gyi chos rnams las yang dag par 'das pa'i 'dus ma byas kyi gnas lugs gang yin pa de la rnam par thar pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyang gnas pa'i phyir rdzogs chen pas gzhi'i dus su 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du blta bas rgyu 'bras tha dad du mi 'byed/ lam gyi dus su ci la'ang rnam par mi rtog pas blang ba dang dor ba'i mtha' mi dpyod/ 'bras bu'i dus su thob bya re dogs dang bral ba'i gdeng chos kun zad sar 'khyol ba la grub mtha'i snying por byed de/ kun byed rgyal po las/ yo ga shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen la// rgyu dang 'bras bu yod zer smra byed na/ de ni rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i don mi ldan// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su smra byed na// sgrodang skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig yin te// de yis gnyis su med par rtog pa med// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtog pa yang// gnyis su ma mthong rnam gzhag gcig tu rtogs// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// de lta

bu'i grub mtha'i 'cha' lugs chen po 'di ni gnyis su mi gsung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi nges don zab mo'i mdo sde rnams kyi dgongs pa'ang de kho na nyid du gnas pa yin te/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyi zhus pa'i mdo las/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can te dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin can te rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin can te blang ba med pa/ dor ba med pa/ bsam pa med pa/ nus pa med pa shin tu ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin te/ de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ de'i phyir sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// de'i phyir lta ba khas blangs dang bral ba/ bsgom pa yid byed dang bral ba/ spyod pa blang dor dang bral ba/ 'bras bu re dogs dang bral ba bzhi po des rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi mtshan nyid nyams len rjen par de las gtan du ci zhig phab/ khyed nyid kyis tshad mar khas len sor bzhag gi rgyud sde du ma'i rdzogs rim man ngag gis 'chad pa na grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbyer med ces pa 'di la ngos ma bzung na rtog ge'i blos bzhag pa'i grub mtha' dang ni 'di gnyis gcig tu mdza' ba'i skabs mi 'byung ngo// 'on te lta ba'i ldog pa nas de ltar yin kyang spyod pa'i phyogs dor bas so zer na/ lta ba don dam pa'i bden pa ma 'khrul ba'i gnas lugs mthong ba la bzhag nas sems dang sems byung gi go na gnas pa'i bslab pa sogs 'dus byas kyi dge rtsa sogs byas chos dkar nag gi 'ching grol las 'das pa'i phyir blang dor med par grub cing de smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa
